title: Boat Ride & Mall Road
review: While in Nainital, one has to enjoy a boat ride. A fun activity for kids and grown ups alike.

title: Beautiful lake
review: A beautiful mango shaped lake in the heart of the town. Boating facility is available. There are options of paddle boat and usual boat.

title: One of the most Beautiful lake
review: Nainital lake is one of the beautiful lake I have seen. The colourful boats and the mountains enhances its beauty. If you are a photography loving person you will never stop clicking photos of the lake and surrounding beauty. While boating in the lake you can have a complete view of the Nainital city and the mountains decorated with colourful cottages all around. The Tibetan market helps you to spend some time in shopping where you can find good warm cloths and toys for your kids. Even you can enjoy the Butta and chai as well. The people are so sweet and helpful in Nainital. Every year I visit this beautiful city and I every time I enjoyed it.

title: Wow.
review: 33 Kms. From Kathgodam, Nainital Lake is a natural freshwater mango shaped flora/fauna enriched lake, surrounded by hills.

title: The lake visit in Nainital .
review: Just like forever , when we were young children . Still the fun of boating and rowing remains and it is the heart of Nainital rippling in its pristine beauty .

title: Best lake
review: Nice, clean full of energy. The boating in Nainital lake is an experience in itself and is a must for every visitor.

title: naini lake
review: nainital as a town derives its names from this lake which is main water body around which there is a lot of buzz and action. most of the tourists are found strolling around the lake and there are hundreds of eating joints surrounding it.

title: Nice experience!!
review: Boating in Naini lake is most amazing experience for kids.we enjoyed a lot..

title: Gives you a swiss view right at Home
review: If you're a nature lover, this place is a paradise . My husband is quite fond of the mountains and breaks into a conversation about the Alps and all of Europe in an instant but this was one view he's been content with . Especially from the side opposite to the bus stand right after the mall road toll.It has to be on the list when visit Nainital.

title: Very pleasant
review: I have been a regular visitor to Nainital since 1975. One was sad to see the declining cleanliness and the crumbling infrastructure.This visit was after a gap of a few years and what a pleasant surprise!

title: Words can't explain the beauty of nainital lake!
review: Nainital lake is known for its exquisiteness. Lying on the lap of kumayun range of Himalaya, one side is hill side covered with pine forests and the other side is nainital town. It's a must visit for tourists who likes hill station.

title: A LAKE IN HEAVEN
review: Nainital lake is very big and beautiful.It is miracle of nature- A LAKE IN MOUNTAIN.Boating is available here.One can enjoy boating for a long time.Motors boat are also available.Shoping complex and hotels are available very near to Nainital lake.

title: Very calm and beautiful
review: Great views, great experience of boating down the lake, very windy but very refreshing!

title: City of Lakes
review: Nainital, famously known as ‘City of Lakes’ is nestled amidst the Kumaon Hills in the state of Uttarakhand, is an enchanting hill station built around a uniquely shaped lake known as the ‘Naini Lake’ (thus contributing to its name Nainital).

title: wide natural beauty
review: lake is quite wide,clean and nice place for enjoyable boating experience.it adds to natural beauty of Nainital,surroundings are eye pleasing.water depth is considerable and source of water

title: The most beautiful lake of Uttrakhand, India
review: Nainital town is surrounded around the lake.Beautiful lake in one of the  most amazing setting. DIY boating fromone end tthe other.

title: Amazing places to spend time
review: Naini Lake is a famous lake of Nainital as well as Main lake in the city near Mall Road. You will enjoy the boating in Naini Lake

title: Beautiful Lake
review: A very scenic place, friendly ppl, visited in March, not much crowd, lake boating is a must, clean area well maintained, can see fishes ... plenty of them ... over all a very good experience

title: Pleasant boating
review: Four members of my group hired 2 boats.  We squeezed out of the crush of boats and were rowed around for 30 minutes in a relaxing ride. Life jackets were available. Fish could be seen in the clear waters and the lake was not crowded with boats. A pleasat change from walking amongst the crowds of shoppers.

title: The lake is a heavenly
review: I visited this lake in winters.nothing is more beautiful looking at the lake in the morning from your room. Nothing is more beautiful in boating in colorful boats. Nothing is more beautiful watching the night sky along the breezy winds. Absolutely Amazing experience.

title: Must visit in Naimital
review: Nainital lake is a must visit place while in the hill station. However touristy it may sound, and even if you are there for some quiet time, one cannot give it a miss. All along the mall road, this lake also offers boat rides at very reasonable price. You can get pedal boats for either two or four, or a rowing boat to accommodate more people. Lake is well maintained and the experience can be very pleasant.

title: The place to be in Nainital
review: Absolutely amazing place, whether you are near the lake or you are boating on the lake or you are on top of the hill to watch it's mango shape. Where ever you are the lake is just superb.

title: Nice Boat Ride
review: It was a nice boat ride on the lake. It was cold and windy as we did boating at around 4 pm in the evening. Overall nice experience.

title: Nice place to hang around
review: This is the main lake in Nainital. There is a road which goes all around it - part of which is motorable. You can of course walk around the lake - which is what we did. There  are plenty of eating and shopping places around - specially around the motorable road. There are quite a few hotels on this stretch, but I would not recommend staying here - it is way too crowded.

title: Queen of lakes
review: Nainital has always been a very very favourite place for tourists in India.

title: Always a treat to be at the lake.
review: The lake's bunds on the Mall road is secured now. The lake was brimming to its capacity, so beautiful it was. We came down to the lake in the late evening, had a long walk on the Mall road and then went to the temple. We couldn't do boating.

title: The centre of Nainital
review: The lake is the gorgeous focus of Nainital and offers lots of photo opportunities.

title: Best place to enjoy the nature in Nainital
review: If you are visiting the Naini Lake make sure you spend enough time in the lake area. As everytime you enter the area with a vehicle you have to pay entry fee. Not sure whether the funds are for development of Nainital town or the lake area. In case it is for the lake area then parking needs to be improved. Policing need to be improved. The tricycle ride is a good environment friendly initiative to travel in the Mall road. The Naini Devi temple should be part of the visit and in case you enjoy boat ride that must be included in your package. So about 3-4 hours of quality time is necessary for the area. The lightings and breeze in the evening are enjoyable. The mosque and temple lightings make contrasting colours and dazzle on the lake water.

title: Star attraction of Nainital
review: Its a good lake specially when the temperature is cold but u have got sunshine u will fell good taking a boat ride with. You can say life runs around this lake with mall road and naina devi temple just beside it .

title: Best place in Nainital.
review: While boating you can take the best view and mesmerizing view of Naini lake and also the city of Nainital. Best place to enjoy nature and greenery in india.

title: Beautiful
review: Enjoy the boat ride in a bright sunny day or take a walk by the lake or u can sit by and enjoy the view and have some snacks

title: Uttarakhand is incomplete without this lake
review: It is one of the most attractive place for tourists. It has derived its name from naini temple situated near this lake. Similar to motto of uttar pradesh tourism "up nahi dekha to kuch nahi dekha" you can say "Nainital nahi dekha to kuch nahi dekha"

title: New Year
review: One of the best place to relax from the hustle and bustle of city and enjoying in a natural environment full of fresh wind. one can spend endless number of days admiring the natural beauty.

title: Memorial Boating experience in the evening
review: Must visit place in life....️️️️️...

title: Soothing place to be
review: I often visit Nainital just to take a break from chaotic city life. Though it’s very crowded during the summers as it’s the on-season there but from Sept to March is also a good time to visit as the place is less crowded and you are more likely to enioy good views

title: Relaxing
review: Very clean and scenic. Though the agents keep pestering you about the boat ride it does not take away the charm away from this lake. Do go out for boating as well.

title: Lake is beautiful with boating activites
review: There are a many taal but I found Naini lake to be the best. It doesn't have activities like zipline which is available at Bhimtal but overall this lake is more scenic

title: Must Visit
review: A very Beautiful Lake. One can enjoy boatings. You get paddle boat on rent which you can paddle on your own. Enjoy the Hot Maggis and Sweet Corn near the lake.

title: Nainital grew around this lovely lake
review: The beauty and major attraction of Nainital is this lake. A huge water body gets augmented by natural rain water, the place is flooded with tourists during peak summer season. A boat ride is very interesting and enjoyable.

title: Amazing place for love birds
review: This is an amazing place for love birds and family. The boat ride in the Naini lake gave me a feel of old bollywood movies of Rajesh Khanna. The flee market near lake is a steal, you can get cheap woolen items and dryfruits too.

title: You have to take the boat
review: Please take the boat to go around the lake. Its beautiful; never mind the crowd; or just by to take a view and find out the shape of the eye on the lake

title: Summer resort
review: Nice lake, many shops along the lake side. Snow viewpoint is near by and easily accessible with cable car.

title: AMAazing
review: This lake looks great in seeing. This lake has settled down in my heart after seeing it for the first time. I would like to come back here again.

title: Beautiful landscapes
review: Take a road from Ramnagar side to Nainital if you are going via Delhi. The landscapes are good. Give camera a try. While coming down be slow.

title: Breathtaking views..amazing boatrides.
review: Make sure to reach the Nainital boat club if you want to wind surf before 3 pm. Other boatrides also close by 5 pm because it becomes too chilly after that. Take both morning and evening rides to see the surrounding horizons and mountains and their brilliant modes.

title: Beautiful view
review: Its a beautiful lake on mall road. Boat riding was a great experience. For boating the lake is divided into 3 parts. Before booking its better to check.

title: The Magestic Nainital Lake
review: Nainital Lake, a word is enough to describe it. Surrounded by hills from 3 sides with a majestic beauty, the lake is mesmerising.  It's beautiful and can't be just described in words. The place is famous for Summer Vacation as well to enjoy the chilly winter season. It gives a feast to your eyes and gives you a immense pleasure by just simply watching it. Go for a walk side by side to the lake, go for a boating and enjoy the beauty, go to thandi sadak which is on the opposite side to Mallital. Do shopping from Mall Road, Bara Bazaar. Go to Naina Devi temple, go for Tibetan Market and do lots of many things. A perfect place for spending time with family. You can hire prepaid Rickshaw to travel on Mall Road. Vehicles having restricted entry and allowed for few hours on the day. A must visit Place. To reach there one can travel by road from Haldwani/Kathgodam.

title: Large and beautiful lake
review: Enjoyed the boating in the lake. Very beautiful lake. The water is clean and near the boat stand lots of fish can be seen. View of Nainital from lake is nice.

title: Amazing
review: This is a very big lake. You must try boating in the lake. They charge you rs. 210 for a boat. The ambience around the lake is really very beautiful.

title: YACHT Sailing a true fun from Naini Boat Club
review: We took a round trip boat from the club, the wind was high and the temperature was around 4 degree during afternoon, it was a complete frozen experience when we reached to the other bank of the lake. It takes  around 40 minutes for a round trip and another 10 minutes to take photographs of the yacht. We also made a trial with the gear of the yacht while turning back, it was amazing and thrilling because our hands and the face were completely frozen and was difficult even to hold the gear for long. Many boats pass through besides the houses, trees and the Mall Road on the other side. Great fun indeed.

title: It used to be fantastic.. it has gone down a lot
review: 1. This is one of the main attractions in Nainital. SO this becomes a must to do when you go to Nainital

title: Nice place for Boating & relaxing
review: As it was very cold, 13 - 14 degree C and light breeze, we went to boating in the afternoon around 1 PM.  Rates are fixed by local authority. Rs.230 for Full round with 3 persons on board and rowing by Boatman. Paddling boats also available.

title: Good view
review: good view from all sides of the lake. Different types of boats available for boating at reasonable rates.

title: Awesome
review: It's one of the most picturesque Lake in the middle of the mountains in the Nainital town ..boating here is really good

title: Nainital Tour
review: It was an amazing tour of nainital and the atmosphere is so cool of there. The experience of naini jheel and bheem taal is so good. Must go there.

title: No taal like Nainital.
review: The famed naini lake is pristine and beautiful. The weather was cool and when boating in the lake  you can feel the chill. Tough hustle and bustle around and honking of vehicles have taken away the calm but once in the lake you feel serene.

title: The best lake i have ever been to
review: The boating experience in this lake is something i have never experience in any of the lakes i have ever visited. The calmness you feel can not be described. The size and the beauty of the lake will mesmerize you. Boating here is the best park of Nainital.

title: boating
review: clean good lake for boating. you can travel through boat to the temple on the other side. nice view in the evening.

title: Beautiful relaxing experience
review: Being Deepavali day, crowd was very minimal and hence took boating for a long round. the experience of the crystal clear water and views were awesome. Warm sun, cool breeze and water surrouding gave a surreal experience of the things. Watched a few cormorants basking in the sun apart from the ducks of the duck house giving us company. Since we whiled quite a time, we could see the weather changing from all clear to misty, reflecting the moods of the lake.

title: Naaini jheel
review: This is supposed to be the famous taal out f the 7 talabs.

title: Best boating experience
review: The view around the Nainital lake makes an amazing boating experience. The water is pretty clean and it appears that lake is well maintained.

title: Superb
review: Nainital Located by the famous Naini Lake in the valley, surrounded by mountains on all sides where one can enjoy majestic vistas of nature here. We have enjoyed well.

title: Good Clean Lake
review: A clean lake along Mall road and surrounded by mountains. It has non polluting boats like peddle boats or rowing boats. A good spot for boating for an hour or walking along the Mall road.

title: boating is great
review: if you are in nainital, you just cant miss the boating in naini lake. great experience and scintillating view of the mall road and lake. a must do thing in nainital.

title: Simply awesome
review: Great weather with great lake and boating.Dont go here during peak dates as it get very crowed and driving becomes a hell.

title: Beautiful Lake surrounded by Nainital Town
review: We went on a boat ride in the lake for about an hour & took in the beautiful surroundings to include some nice cottages , hotels & temples. An ideal place to take photographs especially on a clear sunny day.

title: Family holiday
review: Beautiful lake , many option for boating nice scenic view . Well maintained lake clean water.  after boating shop around mall road.

title: Beautiful lake with great view
review: We visited nainital while returning from kausani to Kathgodam. So we had only 2 hrs time in hand to visit nainital. So we opted only for boating in the lake. The rate of the boating is very reasonable and quite wonderful. The lake is surrounded by hills and while boating one would get a great feeling.

title: Good hill station near Delhi
review: Good family vacation time with lots of fun boating. Very clean and well maintained boats and beautiful view around the lake. We tried both paddling and rowing boats, both are equally fun!!

title: Amazing Place.
review: I went with my family on a vacation last week the lake is so clean and beautiful we had a boat ride for 25mins and the morning view was just amazing you can have book a single boat for 4people.

title: Pristine
review: We went for boat ride in the evening and it was a great experience.  The water was clear and one can see scores of fish.  The boat charges 210 for a full ride.  Overall a great experience.

title: Clean Lake, Picturesque!
review: It is not just for boating.

title: The Jewel of Nainital
review: Pristine waters of the placid Naini lake, teaming with fish in the heart of Nainital. With the mall road on one side & a hill on the other, boating on the beautiful reaches of Naini is something else. A major attraction in this part of the land.

title: Ecology at its BEST
review: My first visit to Nainital was in May/June 1968.2nd visit June 1975,3rd visit June 1977,fourth visit September/October1992,fifth visit June 1999 and latest visit Oct.2018.In my prior 5 visits, I did'nt see a single fish in the lake.The locals would always say "there are fishes but you can't see them".But this visit of 2018 was AMAZING and full of SURPRISE.Water was emerald green and fishes COUNTLESS.I was so HAPPY! so HAPPY! so HAPPY! that i along with my daughter fed the fishes with bread and popcorn close to the Boat House Club.

title: Beautiful view
review: The lake is situated in the centre surrounded by mall road on one side and local flea market on the other. One can enjoy the spectacular sceneric view while enjoying the boat ride. At the end of the flea market Naina devi temple is located.

title: Large lake but overcrowded surroundings
review: The lake is beautiful and large but the overcrowded surroundings spoil the whole experience. Boating in the lake while enjoying the surrounding beauty is the best part.

title: Picturesque,  Calm and Enjoyable
review: Most of the hotels at Nainital arre situated in such a way that you can enjoy the panoramic view of the lake from the Hotel Terrace. We stayed at Shalimar Deluxe which had beautiful terrace at each of their floors (4 floors, and the hotel itself is at quite a height from the lake). NainaDevi temple can be seen and with the lightings in the evening,  it looks really bright. Boating in the lake is 160 rs to 210 rs, you can opt for self paddle boats or sailed boats. Do it in the afternoon.

title: Wonderful view of Hilly habitates while Boating
review: The view from Naini Lake while Boating with plethora of colors changing with light is scenic. Relatively over-crowded being the prime attraction in Nainital.

title: heart of nainital
review: This is located at the center of the nainital with a great sceneric view. Travellers can have boating experience.

title: Just Wow!
review: Serene, pristine and beautiful! These are the words that describe this lake well. Named after goddess Naina Devi, Naini lake is the centre of attraction in Nainital. Shikara and Paddling boats are available in this lake for excursion. Shikara costs ₹160 for half round and ₹210 for full round per boat around the lake. The same pricing goes for paddling boat for two and four persons, i.e., ₹160 and ₹210 respectively. The Mall Road runs adjacent to the lake and Naina Devi temple is situated at one end.

title: Excellent boat trip!!!
review: We like the Nainital lake ,well maintained, clean water, beautiful view and lots of fish. Also i like one thing that fishing  is not Allowed. Boat trip was best and staff was very helpful and it is safe they provides life jackets even for kids.

title: Nainital
review: I have visited Nainital for 4 times. Its my favourite hill station destination for vacations anytime. Amazing buzz in the atmosphere, full of energy. Just love the amazing beauty of the place. Can spend hours just sitting in the bench along the lake or boating around.

title: Nice Clean lake
review: Very beautiful and scenic beauty. you can enjoy the boat ride or just walk on mall road, the view is truly mesmerizing.

title: Tranquil place
review: silent hill station around a lake as a main attraction and lovely nature blended with pahadi cuisine to taste.

title: Superb experience
review: Visited in mid oct. Cool atmosphere and midday boating is an amazing experience.

title: Beautiful & Serene
review: The lake is really beautiful and clean also.Located as the centre place of Nainital, Its a definite visit for Boating. Many fishes are also habitating here. the whole mall road forms part circumference of the lake. The view of mountain while boating n the lake is beautiful.

title: Simply Amazing
review: The nainital lake gives Nainital its name. The lake is beautiful. We did boating and enjoyed every bit of it. The whole town was looking beautiful while we were on the boat. A must visit place in Nainital.

title: Scenic lake surrounded by mountains
review: Boating in the Naini lake is a very soothing experience. A calm and scenic lake in the middle of the city surrounded by lush green mountains.

title: Beautiful
review: Morning walk next to the lakeside Mall Road. Great view

title: Main Attraction of Nainital
review: Just sit beside and watch the Lake .Truly Mesmerizing.Thats the main attraction of the tourist. Street Vendors just add the charm

title: Nainital is cool in Diwali
review: Nainital lake gives great view on Diwali night.ensure you enter with car by 5pm as it's no traffic zone after 5pm and u can't take car near the lake after 5pm.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Possibly the most visited lake in the country. It is undoubtedly one the most beauful lake also. A boat ride here will leave you happy and content. The ride charges are reasonable and well regulated. The lake is still clean compared to the challenges it is facing due to pollution and landslides caused due to unchecked constructions going around the lake.

title: Lovely Nature
review: One of the most serene and peaceful hill stations.... try travelling in the off peak season this place is damn beautiful.

title: too crowded
review: It is too crowded, however a beautiful lake and good for boat ride. The parking is far and have to walk a bit.

title: Main Attraction
review: Nainital is Nainital because of the lake .in the bowl shaped hill station the lake is surrounded by hills on all sides . The lake is huge clean and offers rowing boat with an oarsman self ridding pedal boats and has a Boat Club with Yachts.

title: Nice but crowded
review: Gets extremely crowded during the summer time. Even otherwise also it is very crowded.   U can enjoy boar ride. Early morning is the best time for boating, as it is lot cooler and very few people around.

title: Memerising beauty
review: Indeed a city of lakes...sarovarnagri....one of most sceinic and beautiful place...clean hill station...loved the boat ride in the lake. Justified prices...would love to come again

title: Lovely setting
review: Beautiful lake. But parking is difficult nearby. Also it gets very warm so its recommended to go early morning or late evening. Plenty of shopping on the road around the lake. Boating is a relaxing activity in the lake

title: A loveable lake
review: I have seen quite a number of lakes at different places, but Naini lake is something else. We went for a boat ride which costed us ₹210/- for a full ride. The safety rules, their policy of maintaining the lake and preserving the fisheries is worthy of praise. We went for a boat ride at around 8 in the morning. It was a great experience, so peaceful and natural.

title: the most beautiful and charming naini lake
review: Nainital has a lake after its name .. Naini lake is one of its kind in whole of nainital . The most beautiful views of lake can be seen in the evening when the lights are lit up .. There is boating which has ticket and everyone can do that from child to an old person . There are many cafes and hotels near the lake which adds so much to its beauty .. travellers can do camping in nainital but it is little far from the main city ..

title: Yatching
review: A must for all ages.A new experience, also knowledgeable. Costs ₹500/- per half a trip of the lake in a somewhat figure of 8. Accommodates one person per yatch. One can gather lots of local knowledge from the yatchsman. "Yatching only when the wind is there "

title: Avoidable
review: There are so many lakes with similar experiences, one can rather enjoy the mall road here, and do boating at Saat taal or Naukuchia Taal, as there is virtually nothing to do in those places as court has prohibited adventure activities.

title: Good experience in rainy weather.
review: Location and environment both are perfect when I reached this place.

title: clean and well maintained lake
review: this is the heart of nainital and hence well maintained and binds the city. mall road next to lake adds to its beauty. lake is big and beautiful surrounded by hills on all sides. boating is fun here. paddle boats, shikaras is available for 160 , 210 respectively.

title: Great
review: Huge lake surrounded by hills.. perfect romantic place .. you can take boat ride small circle is 150-180 larger one is 260-280 rs

title: Once in a lifetime experience
review: Nainital lake is a surpriseingly beautiful and serene place and provides a strike contrast to all the urbanization around it. Boating in the lake is special even if you have been to hundreds of lakes. The experience may not be this good during summer holidays as water level tends to go down and number of boats swell up

title: scenic
review: Very beautiful and lovely lake. Boating options are there. View of entire Nainital is there which is awe inspiring. Water is relatively quite clean and not smelly. You could see big and small fishes towards the edge of lake. The weather is mostly very pleasant.

title: Superb view in between hills
review: Nice location as it provide excellent view in-between hills and picturesque location. This is nice place to boat.

title: Amazing Experience
review: The lake is indeed huge and boating on the lake is a superb experience. The view of nainital city and peaks from the lake is very breathtaking.

title: Beautiful Nainital
review: Great weather, beautiful scenery, surrounding Lush green, many attractions nearby, bhimtal is also beautiful place

title: Nainital lake
review: One of the beautiful lakes of india but not overcrowded. Visit only when u seriously want some good crowd around you else avoid this place for stay . You can rather choose bheemtal or sat tal for the stay and you can visit from there it's 30 min journey from bheem tal

title: Awesome weather and you will never bore here
review: I can how many times to Nainital.. it has best Mall road ever seen among all hill stations. Near by places to visit are Mukteshwar, Ranikhet, Jim Corbett national park, Bheem Taal and many more. Best time to visit is except to rainy season.

title: Beautiful and peaceful
review: Naini lake is the main attraction of nainital. Above which the whole city is located. Serene lake with boating facilities.

title: Rain in Nanital
review: We have tickets to Dehradun on 6th Sept 2018 and need to go by road to Nanital. How is rain and weather in Nanital and Hrishikesh? Any risk due to rains or it is safe in these two areas?

title: BEAUTIFUL LAKE
review: Very beautiful place. you can enjoy with friends/ family. Go for boating or sit nd feel the freshness of  the air.

title: awsome !!!
review: awsome view,nice weather entire area is so cool and claim that you will try to spend most of your time. wonderful mall road  pls try nainital thuppa...........

title: Pristine colonial.. love to walk a lot
review: Very pristine n fav place for those who love to walk n enrich the colonial flavour with plenty of cafe bakeries without much pollution and unwanted people roaming around. Well maintained n beautiful though

title: Nainital
review: Nainital lake is one of the most famous place in uttrakhand... And nainital is one of the most peaceful and clean hill station... Beautifuly covered by nature... Must visit place..

title: Naini lake is beautiful af
review: Beautiful with picturesque landscape. We loved boating and photography on boat. One boat with full round costs 210 whereas half round costs 160. One boat can accommodate 4 people.

title: Beautiful place and not much things to do
review: Good escape for those coping with hot weather, switable for short holiday. I was there for a weekend and enjoyed walking around the lake. This might not be interesting for people who are living in mountain weather because it is just a small lake sorrounded by hills. Foods in the restaurants are mostly indian , expensive and poor hygiene. Mostly travellers are noisy indian people.

title: the main attraction
review: this bean shaped lake right in the centre of the place, covering the entire length of mall road is so picturesque, especially when the water glistens with sunlight.....its stunning view seeing the water making ripples, the mountains across and its beauty is different with each phase of the day...most popularly known for boating and where also the boat festival takes place...its just amazing

title: Just ok
review: Nainital is very commercialized. Lake is very big and good. But, due to commercialization, one can not enjoy natural beauty. There is no place to sit in peace at the bank of lake despite the lake being very large.

title: Nainital visit Aug-2018
review: This is indeed a beautiful lake. Mall road is full of restaurants and shops and the local people are really helpful. We had to go to the local hospital because of small injury and to our surprise the hospital was really great and fully organized.

title: A beautiful tourist place
review: This lake is located in Uttaranchal and is a beautiful place. There are many schools, offices, temples, shops, restaurants etc. located on its periphery. Over the years it has become crowded. Being in hilly area the temperature is low and the air is cool. Boating is a must at this place.

title: Enjoyable boating
review: Nainital is situated in Himaylayan region in Uttrakhand. I like that place because if you want some relax from your busy life style then it's good to visit Nainital. Weather is good if we compare it with Delhi Ncr and it's also only 300km from Delhi . On of best think I found in Nainital is that Govt took an initiative so that Tourist were not suffered. They made some rules so that no one charge extra money from the tourist.

title: Serene & Beautiful lake
review: Naini Lake is a true jewel and has its own charm.  Boating, strolling n walking on mall road from one end to another is just real pleasure.  Local people are warm and welcoming, variety of food n restaurant available on mall road, Fun and relaxing atmosphere. A must visit place.

title: excellent boating place
review: One of the best boating place I came across after travelling most of the hill stations. You can either take half lake tour or the full lake tour.

title: serene
review: quite a beautiful lake in the middle of all the hustle bustle....it has got dirty at a no. of places though thanks to the human effort...

title: Cool and calm
review: Its nice place i have seen and nice place for relaxation  and i had good experince with the people and boating .lake boating is very nice experience and ofcourse i just tried for ride the boat buti diddnot get how to ride a boat. Nice place  and nice looking area

title: Must visit
review: We hire two boats for our family, we had fun and our boater were really nice . The weather was really nice . My niece got scare at first but later she was really happy

title: Beauty and the Nature
review: Simply beautiful and specially when you have clouds passing over the lake,You will definitely be short of words to explain the beauty of that moment.

title: Try their full round on boats , is worth it !
review: Their boats offer 2 Tiers of ride. One being half round and the other being full. You should try their full round as it offers good view of all across the lake and the corners can be viewed more closely which otherwise would take a lot to travel !

title: Memory
review: Heven on Earth...

title: Beautiful India
review: I visited Nainital with my friends

title: Nainital experience
review: It's a chic valley with good maintenance, being an important administrative point,for uttarakhand. It's better, to reach nainital by train like shatAbdi, kranti exp available from Delhi to nearby rail station katu.., instead directly hiring vehicle from Delhi&parking at nainital.railway station to nainital many taxi available for 500 to 1000. local vehicles are allowed to go all over to explore nainital freely. Food at Shiv restaurant, Badabazar is enjoyable, where ever you are from. Umbrellas also available on return/refund basis. Most Imp try to stay at nainital, which is center and happening place for tourism.

title: Summer vacation
review: The best hill station in india after kqshmir. Has beautiful lake and surrounding hotels and also has many other surrounding places to visit

title: Naini Lake
review: Beauty at its best, u would love it if u like place with people a litlle crod, its on mall road and u would enjoy boating and make sure u take buns or bread as u would love when fishes come to eat food

title: Family
review: Had so much fun in Nainital. It's a very happening place awesome to visit in month of April and may  the best thing over there is its weather and food

title: Wonderful experience!
review: A must visit while you are in nainital. Recommended.

title: One of the Best lakes in India
review: One of the Best lakes in India. Nicely maintained. Please do Boating here, very good experience.Lot of things to eat. You can spend whole day just relaxing here.

title: Big Lake...Beautiful
review: The lake is very big, the water though isnt very clean. The boat ride costs somewhere around 200rs for 2 people, through govt counters, so no bargaining there. Make sure to keep a hat/cap if boating in sun.

title: Good lake for boating
review: We went for boating in this lake. View from the lake was very nice as it is surrounded all over by mountains with greenery all over them

title: Nice to visit in Summer
review: Beautiful lake, with lots of greenery around. The boating experience is unforgettable here. It is clean water, clean air with green mountains.

title: nainitaal's Gem
review: very good lake with nice view and lots of greenery around. The boating experience is too good. One can easily spend hours here. But i think due to crowded area pollution is increasing day by day. so Govt should look aobut it

title: Nainital Lake
review: I have visited in June 2018 with my family. It is the best lake in hill station with so many attractions.

title: Beautiful... Breathtaking
review: One of the most beautiful lake in the country at about 5500'. Adequate steps by the administration to keep the place neat and clean. Govt controlled boating facilities. The beauty was highlighted on the foggy day. Located next to the Mall, it is a must see place. See the pics

title: Boating in Naini
review: Its great to take Catamaran or Peddle boat to enjoy the lake and its beauty. Morning and evening time is great to enjoy the lake.

title: its right on midldle
review: you can take bike ride and surounded by very good places to eat not far from many hotel.and shopping is near by there is a doctor office at one corner of lake.,

title: Tranquil Experience
review: Boating experience in Naini taal was an lifetime experience.... You can view the water from where ever you look....Taal is very deep... and its water keeps on changing colour. You can take a peddle boat or ask a boatman to row you across the taal... water is calm... you can see various fishes in the taal...

title: Its in the name!
review: Bang in between the city, the lake probably sees most activity. Boat around if you want to see views from the lake, enjoy the view from the boat house club or climb up and look at the mist covering the lake from the top of the mountain. Surrounded by many good places to eat and just hang around.

title: Perfect getaway
review: I have been to multiple hill stations however almost all of them are plagued by one issue- too many people that’s why too much garbage.

title: nanital lake
review: It is a beautiful lake :) wen i was there lake is very clean.. boating in the lake gives so much peace. if you vl get weather of clouds and drizzling it will be more beautiful,.

title: My nanital visit
review: I visited nanital on 25june and could stay there for only few hours.A lot of litter left by tourists was floating on waters of nanital lake.i was dismayed the lake was foul smelling. This famous tourist place is really dying under pressure of excessive tourist influx. Local authorities should really act fast.

title: beautiful lake
review: The boating in this lake is like a paradise . The water is very clean and with the view of mountains around you feel so good seeing the reflections on water .

title: 💓 of the city
review: Very nice place . Baoting can be avoided .  costs 210 for four persons for full round and 160 for half round. Very clear water. Lots of  boats . Great view of mall road.

title: Always great to visit the Nanital Lake and the market around it
review: The Nanital Lake is what people visit Nanital for. Have always had a great time at Nanital, the experience becomes more enjoyable when there are light drizzles.

title: Mesmerising experience
review: This is a must visit place and boating is a must... throng with a lot of tourists this place offers a lot to be explored... highly recommended

title: Serenity
review: Such an amazing experience. It was cloudy on the day we went, so it was very pleasant weather and the descending clouds added charm to our boat ride,

title: Lake and Band Stand visited by @GhumantuBaba
review: Lake is the beauty of Nainital .... this is the USP and makes the difference when compared to Mussoorie or Shimla.

title: Eye soothing
review: When in nainital this lake and boating is a must. When ww reached there was chance of rain but that environment i will not forget for long time. Plz visit in evening

title: Beautiful world
review: Nainital lakes are also specially the Naini Lake it is in the shape of a Nano that is why it holds the name Naini Lake the boat ride so very nice while doing Boat Ride you can experience the coming after with you while doing the boat ride what is great experience

title: Unforgettable
review: It was an unforgettable movement which I enjoyed with my friends we all enjoyed a lot specially boat ride in lake and views are awesome.......

title: Also know as Tri Rishi Sarovar
review: The emerald green lake is the life of Nainital.

title: Great view
review: It was a great time there... We enjoyed a lot of the scenic beauty

title: Lovely
review: All great we enjoyed boating and Lake view we all enjoyed a lot in this Lake must do thing boating and sightseeing..

title: Nice place to enjoy boating.
review: Nice place for boating, you can see fish as well. Reasonable price. You can also visit market n naina devi temple just next to lake. Local market is also very good.

title: Nainital is known for this lake.
review: Nainital Lake is the main center of attraction of Nainital city. You can hire a boat (Paddle Boat, Launch Boat, and Oar Boat) with life jackets and a guide(If wanted). Now do whatever you want to do in the boat only. You are not allowed to enter in water even with life jacket due to safety purpose the lake is around 80 feet deep in center and there are many big fishes.

title: Too many tourists, overcrowded
review: May be we went at the peak of tourist season. The lake is overcrowded with boats. one can see only boats all over.

title: Experience Nainital !!!
review: The best thing about Nanital is its weather. The place is very beautiful & mesmerizing. There are 6 lakes in Nainital, one should travel during its visit to Nainital, Naini lake, Sariyatal, Sattal, Naukuchiatal, Bhimtal and Khuruptal. Just the traffic there can bother you during peak seasons since the roads are almost single lane. The activities you can do here are boating and ropeway...you won't find much adventures activities here.

title: Splendid
review: Nanital lake is the main attraction of Nainital, situated in the heart of the city. Paddel boating for 4 pax are available of fixed rent on hourly basis. Lake is a fresh water body. Naina devi temple, Mall roard and local market are attached with the lake. It is now symbol of the Nainital

title: Calming place. Enjoy boating here
review: This lake is so calming and one can enjoy boating for hours.

title: Mongo shaped lake in the city centre
review: Huge lake in the centre of the city. People enjoy boating in the lake.  Love walking along the lake on the mall.

title: Best Places to visit in Nainital &  Best Resorts in Nanital
review: Packed around a wide, lush volcanic lake, Nainital is Kumaon’s biggest town and favorite hill retreat. It holds a sheer jungle valley around the namesake lake Naini. Loads of hotels are set in the hills around the lake. There are a bustling market and hillside viewpoints facing the distant Himalayan peaks. For travelers, it’s an accessible town to sit back and unwind, eat healthy, and go horseback ride or paddling on the lake. These are some of the famous places in the vicinity Sitabani Temple, Naini Lake, Tiffin top, Astronomical observatory, Eco Cave Park, Nainital governor’s house and much more

title: Perfect Lake
review: If you visit Nanital and don't go to Nani Lake for boating then you have missed something. The lake is huge and beautiful and cleaned a lot over years. There are various boating options like peddal boats, rowing boats, etc. and the rates are also reasonable, around Rs. 250 for one hour ride in a peddal boat for 4 people. Must do boating few times, especially in the morning and evening to get beautiful view of the lake and surroundings.

title: good for boating
review: A perfect and safe place for boating and the rates are also reasonable. It was a memorable experience.

title: Awesome
review: I liked the tour of this lake by boat, as the weather was pleasant and the clouds were gathered over the lake so the view was mesmerizing. But one thing which really hurt me me was the Garbage thrown in the lake. Though they said that it all came due to wind and water. But still at least authorities should see in this matter as the Garbage was hindering it's beauty. What I think that all those people who do boating here should be provided with a net for fetching the garbage with them when they come back after taking a round, which will also help in keeping this beautiful lake Clean.

title: Serene lake
review: Every time I was planning to visit Nainital the views of my friends discouraged me. Finally my friend booked me and hijacked me to Nainital. What a nice place and wonderful lake. Well maintained peripheral road, nice boating options. I loved it. Must visit place but avoid summer or post Eid rush.

title: A big lake with boating facility
review: Weather was quiet pleasat , little rainpour was a added bonus , mall road and naini temple , shopping market in the vicinity are a great plus .

title: Really refreshing experience
review: This was a great experience its really refreshing to view this lake its surrounded with beautiful nature every one must try booting.You can seen ducks and fishes in lake.

title: HIGH ALTITUDE is the Key Word!
review: Not a very Big place or Zoo but has a good collection of Animals and Birds! Please Note you have to Either take a Shuttle from India Hotel on Mall Road or your own Private Cab or 2 Wheeler, walking is an option but only for the Fit! It's a quiet steep walk of almost a Kilometer to the Entrance , from there you have no other option but to take a Walk inside , no Battery Operated or other Ride options which are available in some zoos I've been to. It's a Proper Exercise to cover the entire zoo , can take about an Hour to cover it entirely from entrance to exit. Not a fan of steep walks and not a big fan of animals and zoo then please avoid , it's a task to walk.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Nainital Lake is one of the biggest lake in Uttarakhand and is extremely beautiful, the location of the lake is superb, one can enjoy pristine and beautiful views of the lake from the adjoining Naina Devi temple, there are numerous boats available for ride which takes you to the centre of the lake and back, the entire boat ride is about 20 mins and is extremely refreshing and rejuvenating, one enjoys the beautiful green hills surrounding the lake. Overall one of the best lakes in India and a must visit.

title: Beautiful lake of Mountains
review: Superb location. Very big lake, surrounded by Mountains. Boating in this beautiful lake is a nice experience. Different views of Nainital can be seen while boating.

title: nice lake
review: nice lake, price is 260 for one boat and 4 person can ride in one boat so per person price would be around Rs. 40/-

title: Famous beautiful lake
review: Naini lake is main attraction of Nainital. This lake is in centre of naitinal. Lake is good for bating specially evening time.

title: worth a visit
review: Great experience. Worth a visit. Boat ride in this fabulous lake is a must do. They have sikahra type boats with attendants who take you for a nice boat ride, reasonably priced. A must do activity.

title: Boat ride on the lake
review: Limited activities in the lake. The view and location is great but the boat ride is extremely small and parking area is not well maintained .

title: Best hill station surrounded by Lake
review: IF some one is looking for Best hill station surrounded by Lake in India. this is it. There are paddle and other boats.

title: A boat ride - A little worship -- A lot of Shopping and Fun
review: Take a boat ride and get the amazing view around. You will file amazed. While disembarking, look at the big fishes in the water.  Do your little worshipping at the NAini Devi Temple, the Gurdwara, the Mosque or the Churches around. There are all together, a very harmonious place. Then you have the Tibetan market or the Bara Bazar (behind the Mosque and you will get better deals here.) or you can straightaway start your shopping at the Mall Road. A day and night Fun place around the Nainital lake all round the year. Excellent.

title: Wow
review: Visiting after so many years but still the same....loved it..the boatman are quiet good as they work very hard for there earnings and also you have a nyc market next to it good shopping place.

title: Good view
review: The lake and the town is beautiful, however there is over crowding on weekends.. too many people and too much traffic. During summer season, this may not be the perfect place to find solace. Once you are here, the best option is to have a  ride.. really soothing and provides an awesome view.

title: the biggest attraction of nainital
review: The Lake offers shikara for 210. Each shikara can accomodate 4 adults. The lake has numerous fish which are a joy to watch. A must for all visiting Nainital

title: Too Crowded for Comfort
review: The lake is very pretty, but the crowds make it difficult to find a quiet spot where One can appreciate the beauty.

title: Beautiful
review: Beautiful place to hang around very good weather in the month of June very good time pass enjoyed a lot

title: A magical view from the boat.
review: This small place is surrounded by this lake and is well known because of the lake. Try to go at a time when it's just you and few more people in the lake. Otherwise, it's not fun to see the view in peace. There is so much to do in Nainital apart from boating, one of the longest mall road I have seen. In case you don't like local food much, other options like KFC and Domino's are there. I would suggest you go and eat local food there. If you are into shopping, then there is a huge market right across the lake is well known for the Woolen stuff. There is a small trek from the main market to China peek view. Try to look for some young guides who can make you explore hidden gems of the trek while coming back to the main market. There are activities near China peek as well. Do carry some warm clothes with you as you never know when it starts to rain and the place is chill at night.

title: Great view
review: Lake is the heart of Nainital. Try yachting at the lake. It's wonderful experience. You can shop around the mall road near lake

title: Star attraction of Nainital
review: Boating in the Nainital Lake is a must if you visit Nainital. You can take ample time to watch the lake shores while the boatman will expertly row the boat. However, only half of the lake can be toured since the lake is divided into 2 portions- Mallital and Tallital. Boatmen of either portion don't enter each other's territory.

title: Mesmerized by Lake Nainital
review: Out of the world..cushdy experience..beauty of lake is mesmerizing..road from Rampur to Rudrapur is not that good n make your move tardy.. Nainital is grt place indeed

title: Life line of Nainital
review: Think about Nainital first view will come in once mind is Nainital Lake with its lush green water. One can say  Nainital and it’s lake is synonymous. In winter when sunlight reflects from the water, surrounded by green trees, so many boats of different types are plying like proud swans it is really mesmerising. Boating is must. Paddle boats , rowing boats, yachts too. If you do not fear water, yachting is must at the rate of Rs500/ per person for 45 minutes. One can see big fishes are playing to add more fun

title: the epicentre of nainital
review: this is the focus of your trip. the lake is very pretty. lots of boating and sailing takes place throughout the day. the experience is slightly marred by tourist touts and also the horn blaring traffic on mall road.

title: Naini Lake
review: Reached Nainital by 6.30AM in the morning and visit Naini Lake which is just opposite to bus stand. We booked a cab for Nainital travel. It charged Rs.1500/- for 2 to 3 hours and drop us to Nainital Mall road. The driver was very good and provides useful information about the spots. His name is Kailas and he can be reachable at 9 9 2 7 9 3 3 1 0 7.

title: A good visit
review: This is one of the main attractions at Nainital. A huge lake, with facilities of row/ pedal boats. Lots of eating & shopping options. Better to come walking rather than car to avoid traffic.

title: The main attraction in Nainital town
review: Naini lake is probably the first choice to stay around among tourists.

title: Excellent
review: Excellent location widin d city n mall road besides.have many exit points. Boating round d lake give a very nice view & photographs.

title: Best part of nainital trip
review: I love to visit nainital because of this lake. It has so nice view and is so huge. You can do boating in it. Beauty of this lake increases when it rains. Would love to visit this place again and again.

title: Nice place for stroll around the lake and boating
review: Beautiful lake with a magnificient view of the nearby hills. Nice place for boating and at a very reasonable rate.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Awesome experience on boat in Nainital Lake. Very energetic n spiritual experience while boating in Nainital Lake and finally heavenly atmosphere in Nainadevi Temple. Must visit hill station.

title: sailed with Naini Delux
review: Really enjoyed the boat ride with Naini Delux(rowing boat)if you want you can take paddle boat as well for 1 hour(with the sitting capacity of 4 People).Lake is divided into 2 parts,(one part on the backside of Naina devi Temple & other part is in front of Nainital bus stand(along with the Mall road).You can also enjoy Yatching(Available in the backside of Naina devi Temple), that will cost you around(Rs. 500/-) per ride...

title: Lake
review: I did boating dere . My driver was very friendly. He shares lots of knowledge abt Nainital. Local ppl are good guide actually.

title: Excellent place to realx and unwind
review: The lake offers spectacular views as it is surrounded by hills. The boating costs 210 per boat and it takes around 10 minutes to complete a round. You will be relaxed and perplexed at this natural lake, the serenity makes you spellbound. The lake has Naina devi temple and a market too near it. Don't miss it.

title: Nice
review: Nice view, did boating also they have many other activities to do near the tal. We did boating and the weather was awesome. Also, we wore their traditional dress and got pictures clicked.

title: Crowded Place
review: After visiting Ramgarh when we visited nainital we found it overly crowded. You can just enjoy boat ride there but that option u get in naukuchiyatal, sattal and bhimtal with less crowd.

title: Beautiful Lake. Nice options for boating and spending time
review: This is one beautiful lake and the main attraction on Nainital. It has 3 temples around it, which are also tourist attractions. Lots of boating options available here. The view in the morning and evening is beautiful. The Mall road is besides the lake, so evening shopping and time spending options are plenty.

title: A picturesque lake surrounded by green hills & natural beauty
review: Nainital lake is one of the most beautiful & picturesque lakes in India & is a very popular tourist destination.It is surrounded by hills & you have the option of boating through yachts, paddle boats, attractive & decorated gondola boats and traditional rowing boats in the lake. The lake is full of big fishes & has a very beautiful temple on one side. Naini Lake is within a perimeter of nearly 2 miles & is girdled by lofty hills studded with attractive villas and cottages. The nucleus of Nainital’s exquisite beauty is beautiful lake. The lake becomes very beautiful & mesmerizing at night. There is a walkaway around the lake & benches to sit & relax. All the shops & hotels are lined along the lake.

title: Beautiful.....thats the only word
review: The lake is stunningly beautiful. Surrounded by beautiful hills, lushgreen forests, tiny houses - its a view to die for. Loved the boating here. Its a must see if you are visiting Nainital

title: heart and soul of Nainital ,lake view hotels are the best
review: Never miss the boating part on Nainital lake which is the heart and soul of Nainital.It is not only fun but relaxing

title: Big naini lake
review: Enjoy Boating, visit temple, gurudwara and do shopping at Mall Road.

title: Nice clean ecological garden
review: The lake has been diligently maintained and kept clean wherein the ecology thrives. The plethora of fishes add to its beauty and offers a relaxing experience.

title: Beautiful lake with beautiful views
review: The best attraction of nainital, gives you the best experience of living in hills. Two points of nianital are mallital, upper region and tallital, lower region. There are almost 7-8 boating points in nainital. For best experience hire boats from naina devi temple side. One can hire sailor driven boat in 250 inr per round for 20-25 mins. Pedal boats are also available. Boating is a must activity there. Once can take evening walk along with shopping on mall road around naina lake to enjoy the place.

title: Lovely
review: Must visit ! The whole boating experience is simply superb. The lake is huge & the water calms you.It's a pretty sight.

title: A must visit to have a break from hot weather
review: Near to Delhi. One place u can always visit round the year. The lake is so beautiful. Just walking on the mall road rejuvenates u...

title: Incredible India
review: Must visit places. Mother Nature had her own mercy ,I'm stunned by the  fury of mountain, the lakes no  words to explain

title: Beauty at its best
review: Natural beauty worth a visit. Cheaper than bhimtal boating and way better too

title: A Big one and a Good Lake
review: Nice boating activity with several fronts on the Mall road, Nice view of the Hill and good skippers , calm and peaceful atmosphere

title: Meeee tym
review: Beautiful place...beautiful people...just loved it...but food was not tasty...jab badal jheel pe utarte hai to apki trip wahi complete ho jati hai...and the awesome part is that moment apko jheel mei boating kar rahe ho

title: amazing lake
review: its like a heaven on earth...amazi g lake with awsome wheather...what can u expect more..taalo me taal nainital...

title: Behold the divine enchantress at the sunset and I bet you wouldn't have seen anything more romantic!
review: I still remember the day when our bus took a detour from Jim Corbett and headed to Nainital on a gloomy day. We started late afternoon and the wind around was biting cold. Soon it started to drizzle and outdoors looked as fascinating as it could get.

title: Beautiful
review: Nainital lake is situated right between the town. All around the lake is the nainital town and above that there are beautiful mountains. The boating is a must when u visit nainital lake. You can either choose pedal boat where you will have to pedal yourself and it will leave u tired or choose shikara ride where you can sit back and enjoy the lake's beauty. The best time of boating is in the evening. During day time it is usually hot in summers. You can also go for a long walk around the lake and click photographs. I simply loved nainital lake.

title: Lake have boating facilities
review: Naini lake is the best place to enjoy the boating and motor boating,this lake surround the malli taal to talli taal,one can view this place as a hidden gem in hills of nainital,here in summer they arrange the race of boting and yact

title: Good to visit
review: Nice place, over crowded and lot of tourists were there. We did boating and it was fun.

title: Excellent place for a relaxed weekend
review: Loved the boating and self paddling boats as well. I love this city for it's lake and Mall road where I loved to walk in the mornings and evenings.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The beautiful eye shape lake, the main attraction of Nainital. Time stops here when you visit lake, in morning beauty goes on their high level, in whole day boating and other activities makes day busy and in evening mall road market and Tibetan market near the lake on boom and makes festival feelings.

title: Spend time boating
review: The place is good for boating and you can visit Naini temple on the other side of lake by boat. There is famous Tibet market and various other options for entertainment nearby. You can also spend time shopping at mall road.

title: Clean water and beautiful view
review: Great view, clean water, no smell, well treated with underwater filteration process, boating option is available in the lake , one side of the lake is Naini temple and the other side is the old bus stand. A great place for families and friends to enjoy weekends.

title: Very serene, beautiful and well kept.
review: This place is the whole highlight for the entire tourism in that area. The Government has taken good initiatives to make it tourist friendly like fixing prices for the boat ride along with compulsory life jackets. Even the lake is cleaned daily to ensure clean water.

title: Lovely view
review: This has an exotic feel but too crowded! Boating is fun though. and the area around is a fun place with video games parlour, Capitol cinema, Naina Devi temple, Tibetan market.

title: Beautiful place
review: Lake is pretty neat and well maintained. Beautiful site and enjoyable boat rides during evenings or non sunny day at very reasonable prices upto 160-250bucks approx.

title: If you want to enjoy natural beauty at some hill station during summer, this is worth going.
review: Main lake situated in centre of Nainital city. Good natural beauty on one side. Boating is available in two ways-regular one and self pedal boating. Young persons may choose pedal boating as you spend more time in lake (around 1 hour) enjoying surrounding nature.

title: Beauty of hill
review: Best place for visiting with family in summer.. wether is so cool ...lot of enjoy here ..it's is best for family vist

title: Cool and Beautiful place.
review: Nice happening place. Small shops and eateries and nice restaurant all all long.

title: marvels view
review: Nani Lake  view was very beautiful . my family enjoyed boating in Nani lake . Cool wave given very good feeling  and around atmosphere .

title: One of the best lakes in the country for boating
review: What a view! Perfect setting for a romantic boat ride. Natural beauty only rivalled by pykra lake in Ooty. Went for a boat ride twice and loved it. I read people recommending Bhimtal/Sattal/Naukuchiatal over this one but I fail to understand them! I visited them all and this one is the best

title: Naini lake
review: Made of 2 lakes tallital and mallital. Boating a bit pricey but worth. This is the best lake of nainital. Must visit when in nainital

title: A Mango
review: I would always visit this place as many times as possible. The best place to spend an evening with your loved one. If you look this lake from snow view point you can see that the shape of this lake is like a Mango.

title: Cleanliness and lakes are the USP
review: Being a pahadi, Nainital failed to fascinate me. Majority of the tourist spots were a routine sights for me. There's really not much of a difference for any highlander. The only thing which differentiates Nainital from other hill stations is its cleanliness. It's spick and span. And locals take due cognizance of this status. You will not find trash unattended, unlike other tourist places. Another thing which stood out were the lakes. Had it not been for the lakes, Nainital wouldn't have thrived this good. Credit also goes to the tourism department for encashing it aptly. All the lakes were well maintained and services provided to make the best of it. Prices are exorbitantly high. Expected of a hill station. Hotels; had a horrible experience. They don't give a damn to the customers. Probably because they know eventually someone will book it.

title: Heart of nainital
review: This lake is the heart of this magnificent hill station...as compared to Dal Lake of Srinagar, this lake has much more impact on the beauty of nainital...

title: Beautiful place with even more beautiful people
review: A must visit if you are looking for a weekend getaway with your friends and it fits your budget also

title: Wonderful
review: Great experience with family. Boating  was a nice experience and they did provide life jackets (comparatively Bhedaghat did not). Good well mannered rowers accompanied us. Lake has Mall road on the bank for shopping lovers with lots of accompanying restaurants and Nainadevi temple with Tibetan refugee market.... A total shopping paradise for a tourist.

title: Wonderful experience
review: Good for boating. No long queues. Clean lake water. Boating rates fixed by govt. No chance of getting fleeced.

title: Awesome...
review: You can enjoy lush green mountains while enjoying boating. There is Naina device temple.on the river side.you will get shopping options while enjoying walk near lake.

title: Nice place for boating and walk around
review: This is main lake of Nainital. Big 120 ft deep water body has good location advantage for boating. Rs. 160/- for half round and 220/- for full boat (4 persons).

title: Romantic. View so beautiful! Picturesque mountains not barren but with trees now!
review: Good clean lake

title: Romantic
review: Take a boat ride either in the morning or evening to experience the romactic aura..of the city.

title: Clean and Big Lake
review: Boating in the lake is one of the good experience one can have. The lake is well maintained and is clean. Different types of fishes can be seen at the shore. The boating rates are too genuine. Do not opt for pedal boat if you want to take the real feel of the lake. The chappu boats are well maintained as well.

title: Good place to take a boat ride.
review: This is the most famous lake in Nainital wherein you can go peddle boating, kayaking or sailing. You will have various tour guides come and approach you, make sure that you bargain with them correctly before you agree to anything.

title: Beautiful lake
review: The lake and the mountains surrounding it is so beautiful. Do not miss boat ride in this lake. The mall road adjacent to the lake is also nice and perfect for shopping and food.

title: Enoyed My Recent visit
review: This was Fantastic trip of Nainital Lake i have been enjyod with My Friend. Amazimg scenic beauty we have seen also we have enjyod Boat Riding into Naini Lake.

title: A Great Getaway from Delhi
review: We took this trip on the long weekend of Republic Day , Me and my 3 college buddies in my Thar. The lake is amazing. And yes it was snowing that day as you can notice in the photographs. It was freezing cold and even after few shots of vodka and rum we were shivering. Amazing place for a 2-3 day trip at the max. There are 9 lakes in all hence the name Nainital.

title: Lovely Lake
review: The lake was beautiful , tranquil and clean. Yatching had not yet begun There were plenty of row boats and paddle boats. I was very happy to note that the lake was clean. Nainital is a plastic free zone.The municipal corporation needs to be applauded.

title: Leisure
review: A must see place with friend or family..especially for people moving for peace of mind from city like Delhi

title: Dream buster
review: No, it doesn't fit at all with your old Bolly dreams. Big, green lake from Mallital (higher end) to Tallital (lower end) surrounded by green hills and Mall road hotels. Rarely a sail-boat is found. Usually 3-4 persons for a FULL trip , handdrawn by the honest boatman  for RS 210 only covers less than HALF of the lake. It is great only after darkness when boats withdraw, lights from all sides are reflected in the placid water among bells from the temple nearby ; yes, it's pure bliss.

title: Beautiful lake
review: No hill station in India has lake on the side of Mall Road Naini lake  is very clean lake and one should enjoy boating Boating in Nainital has fixed rates and there is no need to bargain

title: Lake
review: You fill awesome while boating and just watching mountains. You will get peace of mind. They just charge around 200 - 250 inr per person. You love it.

title: feeling awesome
review: Our boating experience is very good in Nainital as well as in Naukuchiatal. Don't opt for photographs as well. They don't even provide you the soft copy.

title: Cool !!!
review: We have done boating in Naini Lake 2-3 times during our stay, Clean water and amazing weather chills you !!

title: Boat ride in Naini Lake is golden moment.
review: Must enjoy boating ride in Naini lake. you will enjoy and feeling awesome watching surrounding hills and mall road. There is two type of Boat available. Self paddle boat or local boatman will take you for ride.

title: Unforgettable boat ride
review: About half an hour of boating does not cost much and you find yourself surrounded by lake water and the mountains. Nature, truly, is so beautiful. You will take these beautiful memories with you.

title: Pretty...
review: Pretty, and not as awful as Ooty Lake, the walk around it was interesting - as it gave one an idea of how the British must have lived. The Mall on one side, a theatre and a walking path along the other. We didnt go for a boat ride but just strolled around. crowded in the evenings, but pleasant at midday.

title: beautiful lake in mountains
review: what a beauty, very nice to have boating. it is of course crowded in evening but it gives splendid view , full of  fresh natural  air free from pollution.

title: Better than before. Go have a boat ride.
review: Last time I visited Nainital water level in lake was very low but this time it was full of it which was pleasant to see. Boat riding is always a bliss in this lake. Enjoy your ride.

title: Beautiful and crowded
review: Naini jheel is the usual stuff. Try to avoid weekends to enjoy the calmness. Beware of local pickpocketeers  :)

title: Na initial Lake
review: We spent 2 days in Nainital & thoroughly enjoyed the view of the lake. From the Ropeway(cable car) , the hour boat ride was special , views from the our walk right around Nainital lake , it is a very picturesque with the nice colour of the water to the surrounding mountains. Very enjoyable area.

title: Very enjiyable
review: Not too many hill stations are built around a lake. This one is very clean and well maintained. Very enjoyable.

title: Lovely place to spend the day with family!
review: We visited in April. Beautiful lake, nicely maintained. Great to go out and do some boating in the warm sun and glistening ice cold water!

title: So beautiful lake☺
review: Nainital lake is one of the best lake in India i think.  I arrived yesterday evening and visited the nainital lake and i fall in love with nainital lake

title: Soothing
review: A boat ride in the Naini Lake is very soothing.I was there on a family vacation and not.mch rush.With the clouds coming over and excellent view around nothing could be better

title: Naini lake
review: Nainital is known for its beautiful lake and is one of the major tourist attraction.It is open on all days and one can take ride anytime.You can choose according to your budget if you want to take a half or full circle.Its a different experience  as the lake is not man made.

title: Heart of Nainital
review: If Nainital has something to offer that is all because of Naini Lake. One of the most famous tourist spot in Nainital. Walking beside the lake is always refreshing. There is a boating available which one can enjoy as per their choice. They have paddle boats too. Charges are around 200 rs for full round and around 150 for half round. For me lake is the only and main attraction in Nainital.

title: Excellent view and ease of access to Mall Road,temple and other locations
review: Excellent view and ease of access to Mall Road,temple and other locations. It has one temple to visit and adjacent to which you can enjoy boat surfing as well.

title: A romantic time
review: Being a Delhiite , I don’t love boating but this place is worth it and our guide : boat man (Rahul), rite in front of grand hotel  is a great guy. Don’t misjudge them a looter bcos they call you while walking on main road. They do it bcos of competition . They all follow govt rates and are very honest

title: beautiful and calm exprience
review: Cost of boat for full circle is rs 210. Total  journey took 20-30 minutes. It's a beautiful river and has a splendid view. River is adjacent to mall road and view of houses and hotels erected on mountain makes it more beautiful, it gets more better at night with lights on.

title: Naini Lake - Can not skip..
review: The lake is surrounded from all sides with mountains. One side of lake is mall road, hotels and shops, busy and other side is thandi sadak.

title: Peaceful
review: Peaceful but it's beauty was spoiled by the garbage thrown into the lake..

title: Eye of uttarkand
review: Lake shaped like an eye is mesmerising and beautiful . Little bit of care should be taken by the local authorities and the tourist also to preserve the sanctity .

title: Amazing
review: Clean , neat and amazing views ..

title: Serene lake
review: The lake is quiet and serene. Boating is th e main activity there. Boating in the lake gives a good view of the multicolored trees and flowers around the lake. It is really beautiful. The lake water too is not very dirty like the water in other lakes that I have visited. Boating has fixed rate by the government.

title: One of the Best Lakes in India
review: Beauty of Nainital is just because of Naini Lake. Here you can do Boating with Family. Two types of Boats are available. One is traditional, a sailor will take you on ride. Other is self you will take ride by paddling self. But, you should take care and never remove safty jacket, as the depth of lake is approximate 90 ft. and security arrangements are very less.

title: The beauty of Nainital
review: The beauty of Nainital is from the lake only. You can enjoy the boating here. charges are 210.00 for a half circle and 420 for full circle.

title: The purpose of being in Nainitaal
review: Naini Lake is the focal attraction in Nainital. The Lake gets its name from Naina Devi. The temple is on the shore of lake on malli taal side (Higher side). Beautiful temple where you can enjoy excellent view of lake from.

title: Super clean and wonderful lake
review: This is a wonderful place with activities likes paddle boating and shikara kind of boat... It a really clean lake... the weather is cold and it night it gets colder .... It's a calm and a wonderful place to just relax and enjoy your holiday

title: No words to Explain
review: If you love peace, this will be your best destination. You can hire a boat and experience the beauty of nature. No bargaining required. Must visit location.

title: nature's surprise
review: it is really surprising to have a huge lake at such great height. the lake make the place livable . it is because of the this lake only people goes there . but it is unfortunate that there is proper upkeep and maintenance of the lake , even the water level is also going down day by day.   you can visit the place before it is completely deteriorated.

title: A jewel of a place hidden admist the himalaya
review: Naini lake as the leagend goes came into exsistence when the eye of Goddess Sati fell in the Himalaya. This lake is emrald in color and is in the shape of a human eye. It has fantastic fishes of many colors and ducks adding to its charm.

title: Splendid
review: I visited this land of lakes after around 10 years and the Naini Lake still has the charm in it. The very fist view of the lake will take your breathe away.  They offer boating at a price which may be a bit expensive at first but it is definitely worth the price you pay. Boating is recommended after 5:00 PM, in evening so as to avoid the sun and enjoy the chill of the lake. The lake is vast and encircled by hills all around which adds to the beauty of the lake. You can also sit around the lake on Mall road and absorb its beauty. Well maintained, clear water, you will also spot fish in it. Must visit place in Nainital.

title: Beautiful as always !
review: The clouds that surround you while boating are superb. Nothing can beat that !  And the weather is at its best in the month of January.

title: Nani Lake an Awsome Place
review: Awsome Lake and Boating is a real pleasure.One can walk around the lake and even take a Rickshay which is regulated on charges.The cruse is also a standard rate of Rs 210 per rip and any part of the day is good.

title: A signature of Natural Beauty
review: Its a wonderful experience for us (me & my wife) to visit this jewel of nature in Himalaya region. The lake & lakeside environment was so pleasant & perfect for vacation.

title: Nice and pleasant place
review: I liked this cool, calm place in mid of mountains. It is mango shaped lake which is beautiful surrounded with greenery and govt is maintaining it quite well. I loved both night and day view of this spectacular lake.

title: Good for boating
review: Deep lake. good for a 30 min boating. Nothing much to do. doe not have good seating place for relaxing and doing nothing.

title: Always so refreshing
review: Going from Kanpur doing work at Haldwani we reached early evening, roamed the famous Tibetan market, had amazing momos and then rushed ... Rushed to buy ourselves some thing warm, amazing as always , lovely weather , lovely food around , enjoyed always buying those amazing candles , it is always a lovley place to visit and enjoy.

title: Enjoyable boat ride!
review: Nainital is famous for its “Naini Lake”! It is amazing that that within a 25sq km area, there are many lakes in this region, Bhimtal, Naukuchiyatal, Sattal etc. This lake was explored by a Britisher and a settlement was made beside it. It is since long become a favourite holiday destination for people across India and also  round the globe. The Nainital town is situated around the Crescent shaped lake. Boating is famous in this lake and is enjoyable in the cool breeze of the water.

title: Romantic Lake
review: I have been to Nainital round about 20 times and the star attraction of this place has always been the beautiful Nainital Lake. The surroundings are romantic, the Mall road runs on one side from where you can just sit and admire the beautiful surroundings. Of course a visit to Nainital is never complete without taking a boat ride on the lake.The boats are generally well maintained and colorful and the price has now been fixed by the government

title: in the lap of the mountains
review: nainital is terribly crowded and I do not stay the night there. however when in the area, l seldom return without a boat ride on the magnificent naini lake. I know nainital from childhood. every summer at least one month was spent in the hill station for decades. it is here that I went horse riding around the lake and learnt to skate. this is the lake area and I have visited bhimtal, saatal and naukuchiatal but there is no lake like nainital. the freshness, peace and serenity experienced during a boat ride on this lake is to be experienced as I have no words to describe the rejuvenating feel.

title: Beautiful
review: The lake was calm and serene.. loved the views..

title: Excellent view and relaxing lake
review: Naini lake is the best lake in Uttarakhand from a view standpoint. Boating is expensive but it is relaxing. Better to take the Shikara boats than the Pedal ones as pedal ones are risky if you have children. Also, shikara boats give you freedom to relax.

title: The Heart of Nainital
review: The Lake is the main place of attraction of Nainital City. The lake is clear and surroundings are very well maintained. We stayed in a hotel adjacent to lake and the view was really nice. The colorful boats and yatches are nice to look at. We enjoyed a boat ride for Rs.210 for half an hour. From boat you can see the full view of Nainital city in the lap of mountain. Throwing rubbish, swimming, washing the cloths or fishing are strictly prohibited in the lake.

title: Beautiful
