review: Boating in the chill weather was an experience in itself. The view is beautiful and quite inviting. Clean and well maintained.

title: Must Visit Place in Summers
review: Nainital is primarily famous for the beautiful Naini Lake. During summers one can visit this place for blissful weather. Haldwani and Kathgodam are nearest railway station from Nainital. I would suggest taking bus from Haldwani as the bus stand is near the Railway station and Roadways busses start from here.

title: Beautiful and Peaceful
review: I am from Nainital and I have seen this from my childhood. This is so peaceful and pleasant to take a walk on maal road. Flat has good food for every taste. Must visit.

title: Clean water with 360 degree mountain view
review: Nainital lake is the only centre of attraction in Nainital with clear green water and 360 degree mountain view. The off season is the best time to visit nainital (Jan-Feb), when it is less crowded. Boating charges are Rs. 210/- (full round paddle boat 2 persons for 1hr/rowing boat 4 persons for half hour) and Rs. 160/- (half round). Lake is the only place in nainital where the crowd is less. Therefore, its recommended.

title: EYE SHAPED
review: Beautiful and clean lake.now all the  encroachments near lake have been removed .the area looks clean and beautiful.oxygen plants has been put in lake to give it new life.really enjoyed

title: Great place for weekend gateway
review: It's a nice cool place to spend time with friends and family for weekend or small holiday outing .. it includes many attraction points like rope way, caves, lake where you can do boating and fun activities .. also this place is having very interesting place "cave".

title: Nani Lake
review: The lake is Serene & Beautiful. Try to hire selfdriven boats as the hired boatman finishes the tour very quickly & one really cannot enjoy the view.

title: Excellent
review: We tried boating at evening 5 o’clock in winter days, its really cold at that time and really not much recommendable. Try between 12 to 4 pm during sunny part of the day. View from the middle if lake is outstanding. Be little careful with boating guys. They are not harmful or cheaters but better to have ride time and money fixed before you board the boat. There is fixed charge from local authority and tickets can be bought at the kiosk at the lake but boating guy gives minimum service with that if you want a little extra time and distance just pay 200-300 directly to the man at the boat. Overall a must have experience.

title: Excellent Boating & Yatch Sailing
review: Enjoyed & Repeated

title: Huge lake surrounded by hills on all sides
review: The Nainital Lake looks great from the Hotel Balcony as it is surrounded by hills on all sides with roads encircling the lake. The sparkling clean water can be enjoyed if one goes for boating in the lake. The sudden dip in temperature makes the place more so interesting. There are temples, masjid, church and gurudwara situated beside the lake thus serving all major religious communities in case anybody wishes to offer prayers to God.

title: A good ride though costly
review: The nainital lake is a good boating site .along it the mall road has a shopping paradise it's a nice leisure trip for people who love freaking out worth enjoying

title: Good Place for Boating
review: Go and enjoy boating here in Just INR 210, really an enjoyable place pear shaped lake, surrounded by hills

title: Great place to be!
review: A lake in the lap of Himalayas what else can define serenity more accurately.The best time to enjoy this lovely place is early mornings (enjoy boating for mere 75 INR) as other times the place is overcrowded, and you won't get best out of this place. The lake is a major attraction and so has turned the vicinity into a "tourists' market place".Rent a bike and roam the valley enjoying the cool breeze and magnificent views. We got an avenger for about 700 INR(all you need is a valid driving license ) from one of the many lenders in the market. Families can book a tour guide with a car for approx. 2000 INR.

title: Beautiful lake
review: The lake water is clean, steady. The boat ride is must to have. The Tibetan market is good for winter wares.

title: Awesome Lake
review: Boating is provided on it by local parties and it feels awesome to have a boat ride. Go for it. Have some photos as well when on boat.

title: Relaxing
review: It's a relaxing experience, while boating in the lake. Regulated boat rates are very helpful for the tourists, and INR 210 for 30 minutes is very reasonable also.

title: Exceptional
review: One of my favs ..worth visiting ..beautiful lake that has calm and serene environment..Many variety of shops have been set up beside the lake.

title: Nice lake in the mountains...
review: There is something about 9  corners of this lake and Nirvana... Since have not seen nine corners, cannot confirm or deny... However, definitely a very nice lake.... You can take a boat and actually be on the lake... Recommended....

title: Peaceful.
review: Off all the nainital the most beautiful, calm and serene place to be is the nainital lake. Boating is must. The ride was peaceful. Our boat rider was a friendly chap.

title: Enjoyed Boating
review: We have visited Nainital lake in our 3 days tour. Anyone can enjoy boat ride, Naina Devi temple and market nearby lake.

title: Best of all lakes, chilled weather, boating paradise
review: Superb and best of all nine lakes.

title: Safe & clean
review: Adults & kids get life jackets and boat ride for a family costs Rs. 210... clean lake and full view of the city is a good sight..

title: Sailing on great tradition of Kumaon.
review: I normally don't prefer to hire a boat for ride in a lake.But romantic science with sheer wind in Nainital prompt me to do it in Nainital lake. I choose to go for a full ride of boat sailed by locals who are Pandey or Joshi from nearby mountainous location. I used to discuss how they come and choose this procession and hear patientfully about the rich heritage of this Naomi Lake which feeds entire Naintal and also about depth of Suicide Point...comparatively clean lake and rate sod rides are controlled by KMVN. You can go for instant photography and relish the taste of Maggi and Bhooja in Tallital....romantic place to hangouts for couples and families...

title: very calm and please
review: when the weather is awesome u can spend hours . a good time to do boating it was pleasant and calm experience

title: Nice place
review: Nainital ￼ pronunciation  is a popular hill station in the Indian state of Uttarakhand and headquarters of Nainital district in the Kumaon foothills of the outer Himalayas. Situated at an altitude of 2,084 metres (6,837 ft) above sea level, Nainital is set in a valley containing a pear-shaped lake, approximately two miles in circumference, and surrounded by mountains, of which the highest are Naina (2,615 m (8,579 ft)) on the north, Deopatha (2,438 m (7,999 ft)) on the west, and Ayarpatha (2,278 m (7,474 ft)) on the south. From the tops of the higher peaks, "magnificent views can be obtained of the vast plain to the south, or of the mass of tangled ridges lying north, bounded by the great snowy range which forms the central axis of the Himalayas."[1]

title: Take you Wife or Girlfriend here
review: Superb place to hang around with your love or friends or even with all family. No regret and full enjoyment.

title: Boat ride at nainital lake
review: On 12th feb , nainital was very cold and it was raining , winds were blowing. Luckily the weather was good on 13th feb , it was warm and little sunny. We immediately decided to take a boat ride and booked for one full round. It was truely a nice ride with a little warm and cold weather being felt as we were in the middle of the lake. Also i must say that its good to visit such places during off season as the place is not heavily crowded with tourist. These places like boat ride during off season is best experienced and it leaves a lingering experience

title: Love To Visit Again
review: Nainital is most popular hill station of Kumaon district. Nainital Lake also known as Naini Lake is the major attraction of Nainital. Surrounded by Panoramic seven hills, The lake is bounded by the high and steep Naina peak on the North West side, by the Tiffin Top to the south west side and snow view peaks on the north. Nainital Lake offers various opportunities for kayaking, boating and paddling. You can find the Nainital Boat Club which provides yachting facilities to the tourists. Rowing and pedal boats are available for hire. There is no need to hire a guide or avail their services. The place is pretty much self-explanatory.

title: simply amazing
review: naini lake is one of the best romantic place in India, a shikara boat ride with your loved one would take you to different level of romance. amazed to see cleanliness in and around the lake.

title: Must to boat when in nainital
review: Serene and blissful view from the distance and you just want to surrender to the beauty of nature.

title: Good lake
review: Good lake clean with good boating options with safety and security. Nearby temple and market is also very nice

title: An unforgettable experience
review: When you enter to the the Nanitaal , you will se a beautyful and huge lake will be welcoming you and it will give goose bumps. its a queen of all the lakes without any doubts if you are in nanitaal I will recommend you to do boating. One of the best thing to do.

title: Queen of all lakes
review: Nainital Lake is the heart of the town with beautiful resorts and hotels from British time could still be seen at its best. Boating is a must do here. Visit to Naina Devi temple added a special touch to our trip.

title: It is hence Nainital is!!
review: Used to be dirty but govt has done good job in keeping it clean!! Do your bit when you go visiting, keep it clean!!

title: A very large and beautiful lake.
review: The lake is huge and rowing a wooden boat was an amazing experience. If you want to experience real thrill do not use the paddle boat but the rowing one.

title: A short trip to Nainital was full fun,awesome,masti
review: A short trip planned all of a sudden was just fab.Enjoyed this place the weather was awesome.the best thing we found was the snow,it happened to be the first snowfall of the season and we were there to see it.

title: Cleaned up and refreshed
review: A boat ride is a must. Do tip your boat rower.

title: Heart of Nainital
review: its incredible lake, i have been there with my friends and had a nice time there , you can see around there is market and zoo and some temples for attractions.

title: The Activity Hub! and Truely So!
review: The Mallital-Tallital: as called as Nainital Lake is the prime center of activity and tourist destination and a central point of planning a trip to the region. The Lake is the Hub of all the business as well as leisure activity and also to plan the trips to the surrounding areas. You get a lot of options to explore the near vicinity which are more peaceful, less crowded but are as picturesque as the Nainital lake. A boating in the lake in the evening is a must during the trip. The lake needs to be cleaned up more often. The large number of Big sized Gold Fishes and Golden Carps are a treat to watch and you may feed them, however i would advise you against doing that! The swans floating alongside the boat while you are boating are a delight. You have a variety of boats from peddle boats to row boats with boatman available from the state government to facilitate your pleasure!

title: boating in chilly evening
review: We have gone there as 20 people group in late Jan and we have taken a one hour boating in the lake. The experience is really good and the chilly wind increase the pleasure twice. some of us done shopping in mall road around Nani lake.

title: Main attraction in Nainital
review: Nainital Lake is the main attraction in Nainital.

title: Mesmerising
review: Well I believe this is the only attraction which makes the city Nainital worth visiting for. There is not much to visit in Nainital tbh.

title: beautiful boating location :)
review: This lake is very huge and present near mall road. This lake covers almost the whole of Mall road. A walk near the lake is more enjoyable than the boating. There are 5 vendors here that provide boating to visitors. You will be taken half the circle of the lake. you can ask the boats men to drop you at Naina Devi temple. The ticket prices are cheap and hence affordable.

title: Mind blowing
review: Nainital, another heaven on earth, the lake is all like a movie location surrounded by mountains and clear sky gives you such a touristic place to visit.

title: Nainital, Amazing place!!!
review: Nainital, Amazing place. Full of energy and freshness. As the entire city is located in mountains, the environment and climate are amazingly refreshing. An extremely beautiful landscape full of greenery and trees of Pine, oak, cedar, walnut, apples, and oranges.

title: serene!
review: It was a complete luxury to sit back and enjoy the chilly air with very few tourists around and nobody to bother you.. we really enjoyed the boating, our daughter was also very excited to be on the boat. Will definitely recommend for all families to visit if in Nainital!

title: Execellent Place for short breaks
review: If you are running out of time but want to spend sometime in mountain and near water, visit Nainital. A place with beauty but over crowded. Viewing lake from your hotel give you a different feel. Shopping & Dining in Mall road will make you happy. Must go Nainital for short getaways.

title: Cannot miss it while in Nainitial
review: How is Nainital visit complete without  that Nainital Lake.Go any time and it mesmerises you. we even had a sailboat ride from the marina along with normal row boats from both ends of the lake.Always worth it.

title: good view
review: niceplace for sight seeing must go over here

title: nice pace
review: nice lake with good boats people are very helping but taxi drivers are very high demanding on rates.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Beautiful large lake set at the bottom of mountains - it is good for boating though very crowded, just like the place itself.

title: IF nothing else, visit Nanital lakeside
review: To me this was the most versatile area I visited while in Nanital. I spent almost the entire day here with easy access to shopping, dining, taking in some local cricket, easy boat ride and lots more. Most of all, contrary to the hassle of other cities, here you can truly relax at your leisurely pace without anyone disturbing you and with a sense of safety.

title: Nice boat ride
review: Once in nainitaal and enable to do boating in bhim taal or any - this is good too. Its by the mall road and its called to be in mallitaal. The guys are dere to escort you from parking itself to ride with them.

title: A nice place for weekend gateway
review: It's a nice cool place to send your time with family and friends for weekend ..  it includes many attraction points like rope way, caves, lake where u can do boating ...

title: A Perfect Lake... with Perfect Mall-Road
review: We went to spend our Christmas holidays in Nainital.

title: Beautiful lake!!!
review: The nainital lake was very superb and fantastic. The photography  view is superb. Climate was too good.

title: Maj
review: The most accessible Hill station lake from the Delhi NCR region. Boating on this lake is always a pleasure with great views of the mountains on one side and Mall Road on the other. The air is always cool and fresh around the lake. We paid around 240 bucks per boat(4 persons) for a full round. The lake is as clean as a whistle, thanks to all the efforts made by the relevant authorities.

title: Mesmerising
review: A very beautiful and mesmerising lake. Do go boating there that too full round. Very calm and peaceful around evening time. The sceneries are very beautiful there and hospitality very good. Maggi, momos and corn  near this are too awesome.

title: Calm between the Hills | Just Relax
review: The lake is in between hills from both sides. Enjoy the silent and romantic boat ride of 1 hour. It will cost Rs 210 for full round trip to lake and Rs. 160 for half trip.

title: Common lake and nothing else
review: The lake and the town are nice but not that especial for to deal with the crazy overpriced hotels and guesthouses.

title: Nainital lake
review: Walking along the lake is really a good experience.

title: Wonderful landscape!
review: The Nainital Lake is definitely one of the most beautiful in all India. We’ve really enjoyed the boat trip and all the local stores located near the lake. Worth a visit!

title: Fun and frolic
review: Boating in Uttarakhand and that too in Naini Lake is a dream for the lovers and the young generation. I met Raju the person with whom we enjoyed the boating along the Mall Road of Nainital from Tallital to Mallital.

title: Enormous lake surrounded by mountains
review: This lake is one of the  main attractions of nainital.Located  in the heart of  nainital.

title: Mesmerized by view
review: a lovely city and nicevlake .full of clouds. Good shikara rides .view to mall road is good while boating .must visit lake boat club house for coffee

title: Lakesss of lakes
review: Good lake clean city good options for shopping at Mall Road gurudwara was also very closer parking is also close

title: Awesome Beauty & boating experience in Mallital
review: Did a 45 min. guided boating in Mallital, worth experience in the clean & beautiful lake. Its surrounding greenery is candy to eyes & soul. Definitely recommended to all visitors to Nainital.

title: Famous Lake
review: This lake is famous lake of Nainital.This have two parts one is Tallital and other is Mallital.Mall Road is around the Lake.Various famous attractions are situated around the lake.

title: Beautiful lake !!
review: The Naini Tal or Lake made up of Malli Tal and Talli Tal hits you with its beauty and expanse the moment you enter the town centre which got its name after the lake ! Boating is a must do besides walking or cycling around it ! The town centres around the lake and the evening crowds are huge. Try and do the boating around sunlit hours like between 11 AM to 4 PM otherwise it becomes really cold. The options for boating are the paddle boats or row boats of the enterprise boats/yachts. A full round of the lake costs ₹210/- on the row boat and ₹160/- for half round. The paddle boat costs ₹210/- for an hour. Must do at Nainital !!

title: Irresistible!!
review: Boating in the Nainital lake is completely irresistible. One should not miss this opportunity to go for boating if in Nainital. It gives you a mesmerizing feeling with great views of the hills & clouds and cold breeze blowing over your face.

title: Beautiful Place
review: Day by day it is going to dry. Gov. should take the necessary action before it will dry permanently.

title: Heavily Commercialized!!
review: Pros:

title: The prime attraction of Nainital
review: The boating on Nainital lake was very interesting - providing for a scenic view of the entire place. Enjoyed it thoroughly!!!

title: Nice lake
review: Very well maintenance neag ckean nice lake with a giid moubtain vuee. Cloyads passiang by. Near to temple

title: Good
review: Good view and good boating experience. Boating charges are 210 per boat. Will drop you at Naina devi mandir or tibetan market as u want. Good view of Lake from cable car rope way

title: Beautiful is very small word for Naini lake
review: Gem of Nainital, Do boating every day if you are staying there. Experience is not able to express in words.

title: Worth boating

title: Very romantic place
review: This lake is very quiet and the scenic beauty is very pleasant. If you are there for the first time, you must do the boating. You'll very much enjoy the cold weather with the bright sunlight.

title: Peace at nainital
review: Best place to visit..It was so peaceful and quite romantic place..

review: visited with family. took a boat ride into the naini lake. its a beutifl lake among the mountains. best part was the story which was told to us.

title: Unmissible beauty
review: Unmissible beauty of this lake. Attractive. It is spread along the boundary of Mall Road. It has ducks and fishes.

title: Nice place
review: It is the place for romance. Specially honeymoon place. Hotel rent too costly. December is best time for travel. This time you will get snow fall

title: Beautiful Lake
review: It is a beautiful Lake in himalaya at uttarakhand. Superb view. beautiful entertainment for riding. Lake is deep and very big. Water is of green colour but transparent. lot of fish of different type is into the lake

title: Must go place
review: Nainital lake is the famous tourist attraction place!  Although the water level at the lake is depleting slowly! Parking own car in nainital is a problem! Once can also go for para gliding!

title: Niceest Lake in world
review: Clean calm and nice .good cleanliness. Amazing views. Boats are also very much beat and clean. Ticketing also properly organised

title: Experience
review: Boating experience is good

title: AMAZING
review: Boating in the Lake is an amazing and lasting experience. Feeling good throughout the journey. Weather was pleasant and waters shining.

title: The lake of beauty !
review: Coming to Nainital and finding the gem of this lake was an unforgettable experience . Surrounded by hills all around this lake is a place to admire , enjoy any time . The night time

title: Beautiful lake
review: A very big natural lake and the main attraction of Nainital.  It offers very scenic views. You can enjoy a boat ride in the lake in the  evening to refresh yourselves. Th Goddess Naina Devi temple is located on the banks of this lake.

title: Anniversary celebration
review: It's a visit u can do just for leisure . As it is very common activity good for new commers  . View from boat is good and u can c some fishes and ducks in the lake

title: The Mesmerizing Naini Jheel
review: Viewing the Naini Lake is one of a view to be captured in the eyes. The boats ferrying in the lake just looks perfect.

title: Nature's beauty
review: When you visit Nainital the first thing you see is the beautiful lake at the heart of the city. It is the main attraction of Nainital with scenic view stretched from one corner to other. For an outsider the good part is that boating rates are fixed as per government norms so there is no bargain or cheating. I have paid Rs. 230/- for big ride.

title: Summer break at tal
review: Super space of life, enjoying every moments. Lakes, hills, persons of this places. This site run 24 hours for your enjoy only. Clean weather and masti.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Feels fresh on lake banks especially while boating. Naini devi temple on its bank and a market nearby.

title: Beautiful
review: Beautiful for evening boat ride. You will get boats at rent from near the tibetan market. Excellent for romantic ride.

title: Enchanting Lake
review: Nestled amidst the mountains this lake is truly beautiful and serene. One can do a myriad of things while enjoying the view. The most popular would be to go for a boating trip on it on the numerous options available on the shore. A walk along the periphery is another great option, which we explored. Riding on the far side of the lake (Thandi Sadak) is a unique experience where mostly only the locals venture. One can also shop along the numerous shops which dot the lake. The final one would be to just watch the lake and be enchanted by its beauty.

title: Noida to Nainital
review: We started our journey on Friday around 1AM and reached Nainital around 7 in the morning after 2 short tea breaks. We had online booked 2BHK Apartment, 11km away from Nainital towards Bhimtal. We reached there and enjoyed beautiful sunrise on the hills.

title: The beauty of Kumaon
review: Visiting Haldwani - Kausani  - Nainital . was a wonderful Experience. We had this trip in Jan 2016 and was fantastic. We started our journey from mumbai by Flight and reached Delhi. from Delhi Airport we went to vasant Vihar Bus Depot and Took a night bus to Haldwani. We reached Haldwani at around 3:00 am in the morning. From there everything is taken care by Ashraf Ali ji. A wonderful guide and person who helped us throught the trip. His number is 09412982839. He made us visit nainital, Kausani, Mukteshwar. He can customise your trip as per your need. Travel and Hotel is designed by him. Only Food has to be taken care individually.

title: Nice Lake in Nainital
review: This lake is definitely the attractive place for the visitor over here. You could enjoy boating over here.

title: One of the best maintained lake in India
review: Being a traveler, I have seen quite a few lakes. The lakes in the lap of nature and less population around stay clean but the ones in a city which is as densely populated as Nainital is tough to maintain. The administration has done a tremendous job in maintaining the lake and the adjoining areas. It's big, scenic and clean. We were staying at Jim Corbett and decided to drive down and it was completely worth. Boating there was a pleasant experience

title: Incredible lake to visit
review: This lake is too beautiful to visit and it is nice family place to visit. you could enjoy a lot over here.

title: Peace and silent place
review: Peaceful

title: Beautiful lake
review: Nainital lake is very beautiful.and there are many fishes .there are peddle boating . There are boats which take us in the lake.lake is very good . The location is also good .near the mountains and the weather  is also extremely  good

title: Heavenly, calm n breathtaking.
review: This is the place be if you really want to visit a hill station with something different from crowded mall roads and bazaars.

title: Heaven!!!
review: Its the most underrated place I have been to. Best climate, best view. You should visit this city during December-January. If you are lucky you'll experience snow fall. Its damn cool, but you'll enjoy it. The city is also blessed with mouthwatering cuisine.

title: its allways amazing to see a water channel
review: went there in mid octobe r in morning session. There was no rush. i was about to hire a boat for lake ride. but unfortunately something terrible happend their with a guy. so dropped the idea of riding lake.  this was my experience of the lake

title: A must visit place in Nainital
review: Nainital lake is the most significant and visible face of Nainital. The lake itself is about 2km long and at the broadest place maybe half km in breadth. This is arguably one of the best maintained lakes in the mountain towns of India, much better maintained as compared to towns such as Ooty and Kodaikkanal in the south of the country.

title: What a Lake!
review: A beautiful lake this is. On the lake side, almost all the hotels are located. One can take a stroll along the lake on the mall road, one can take a boat ride which is very pleasant, one can just sit and relax by the side.

title: Awesome experience & very beautiful view..
review: The fact that Nainital is named after the Naini Lake speaks highly of its significance. This beautiful, stagnant pool of water in the heart of the city, is surrounded by seven majestic mountains and is a popular tourist attraction. You can enjoy row boating as well as paddle boating at the lake, while the stunning scenic surroundings please your senses.

title: very good lake
review: It is a very beautiful lake. There are many boats which take tourist in the lake. It is near the mountains. Clean water, very peaceful area.

title: Major Tourist Attraction
review: I went to Uttarakhand. Nainital Lake is located in the Nainital District of Uttarakhand and serves as the major tourist attraction in the hill town. One can engage in a number of activities such as boating, Yachting and various exhibitions and festivals that are organized near the banks of the Nainital Lake.

title: Only 1 work beautiful
review: This is probable the best lakes in mountain beautiful green and around 120 ft deep.. excellent climate always and good for boating

title: Superb view
review: Nainital i have visited in my childhood but this time i went with my family and the lake was superb. That slow wave was so serenne. Lovely spot to spend some good time either on the boat or walking by the lake, mall road and bada bazaar are the market where you can buy woollen stuff and candles which are famous in Nainital.

title: Nainital india
review: It's way crowded at this time and cold . But the view and location is awesome.  Definitely good for  solo and it's quite reasonable.

title: Lovely spot to spend some good time either on the boat or walking by the lake, mall road and bada bazaar are the market
review: Lovely spot to spend some good time either on the boat or walking by the lake, mall road and bada bazaar are the market where you can buy woollen stuff and candles which are famous in Nainital.

title: Very nice lake
review: It is very charming to have boating in the Naini lake. The weather was very nice. So, we were able to enjoy the full circle boating.

title: Overcrowded
review: 2 days are enough in this chaotic town whose natural beauty has been submerged under uncontrolled commercialism. It should have been made a national park years ago.

title: Average lake
review: This lake is an average lake. Good for family enjoys. Boating can do and charges are normal. Plastic free area.

title: serene lake bustling with activity
review: the naini lake is the centre point of tourists visiting naintal. nestled among mountains it offers great vista..wrapping the lake is the quintessential mall road, which is bustiling with activity..so enjoy boating in the lake or stop for a photo-op or if you want you can feed the fishes in the lake..

title: The most beautiful lake in the valley.
review: It is the most beautiful lake amongst all the lakes. Surrounded by the hill in all direction, it builds the most scenic view. You also can enjoy and have this most beautiful view by boating in the lake.

title: Holiday visit
review: It's like straight from kati pathang movie , I was waiting always to go for boating in naini lake , u get a beautiful feeling gets nostalgic , but the surrounding of the lake needs to be taken care , it's not the people there Uttarakhand people kuddos to them was surprised to see the way along temporary toilets which were clean . Good job .

title: Beautiful view
review: Must see for all nainital visitors.

title: Must visit if you are in Nainital
review: Boating experience is quite good here. You can fresh water lake as well fishes inside it. Overall a great experience with family.

title: Nainital
review: I have visited Nainital for 3 times. Its my favourite hill station destination for vacations anytime. Amazing buzz in the atmosphere, full of energy. Just love the amazing beauty of the place. Can spend hours just sitting in the bench along the lake or boating around.

review: This lake is the identity of Nainital. Lake is quite big and gives a splendid view of the sorrounding mountains. Boating in the lake is very attactive and also the feeding fishes is very interesting.

title: Pleasant WaterLake with beautiful views.
review: The Nainital Lake is major attraction of city . It is a beautiful Lake and gives secneric views.

title: clean lake

review: This is the biggest attraction of Nainital. A cool breeze blows here all the time. Mall road runs along this lake which is the most happening place. Boating is the main point of attraction.

title: Lovely boating trip
review: Large lake. Clean water. Enjoyed boating.Best to go early morning or after 4 pm, weather is better.awseme views , lake surrounded by lush green mountains on all sides

title: My Nainital Trip
review: This is the best place for doing romance in north India.

title: Lovely place for couples
review: Best for 2 day trip. Beautiful place. Weather is always awesome. Must visit place for couples and groups.

title: Crowded, yet wonderful to be..
review: Very crowded place, and that is expected as this is one of the best location to be in Nainital. Boating in the lake is a muct to do activity for visitors to Nainital hills

title: Beautiful lake
review: Lake is very beautiful. Lots of cloud touch you during boating. Boat drivers may cheat you . First  they will tell you full round boating but during boating they drive only half round. Charges are not so expensive.

title: Clean Lake
review: Naini Lake is quite clean and walk through it's bank on mall road is good.. The other side of Lake is quite silent and only for walking...  So one can go through mall road and then return from the other side passing through Naina Devi temple..

title: Naini Lake, one of the best in Uttarakhand
review: On long Dussehra weekend of 2017, I visited Nainital with my wife and 6 year old naughty son Aditya. It is best weekend destination if you are travelling from Delhi/NCR. Temprature is always cool compare to Delhi/NCR, almost 15 degree down to what we get in Delhi and in night it cool down more. In Naini lake you can enjoy the boating. There are 4 boat points from there you can get the ticket for boating. Price for one boat is ₹210 for maximum 4 adult. This will take around 30-40 min max.

title: Mememorable trip
review: Mid Sep was a perfect timings to be in Nainital: lovely weather in mornings and evenings, no rush at all.  Walking on Mall Road was a great pleasure.  Boating in Naini Lake was quite a fun. Visit to nearby places and temples was also good.  Shopping of decorative candles, a speciality of Nainital was an added attractive.

title: Mango Shape
review: Done boating with my family in the evening time. Its looks like a Mango from Naina peak. Water in the lake is clean

title: Amazing
review: Very beautiful place and amazing atmosphere. Best place to enjoy vacations. Boating, evening walk, high altitude zoo is awesome. Must visit attraction.

title: Vacation Trip
review: Huge lake with attractive view of the town on two sides. Boat service was excellent and well operated by the government tourist board. The boats man was good one explained us all the sites come across the lake and took a snap of us also. He also drove extra km as my kid enjoyed a lot. This place is must visit one in Nainital

title: still a hillstation charm
review: Lake as as usual the main attraction and can spend a lot of time boating or just watching it. its still a pleasure

title: Nice Lake
review: Very nice lake we enjoy a boat ride fo 30 min. very clean and cool palace. here is many ducks and fish.

title: Awesome time !!!
review: If you love bike ride this is the place... We did had a traveller booked, however we opted for bikes and it's was a wonderful ride. Lake side boating is just awesome.

title: Lovely walk along the Mall Road in a light drizzle :-)
review: We were driving on the way to Ranikhet and took a break at Nainital for a nice leisurely  lunch and a stroll along the Mall Road in a lovely foggy weather with a slight drizzle :-).

title: Best in what it is
review: If India has any decent lake hill station then it's nainital.

title: NainitalLake
review: Best place to enjoy boating in north India a place where you have an options to stay in hotels which is in front facing of the lake & on the Mall Road where you also roam and eat in restaurants a good yummy food

title: Naini Lake
review: Nainital is famously known for Naini Lake surrounded by panoramic seven hills. Naini Lake is a favourite spot among romantic travellers around the world. The lake becomes more beautiful and mermerizing during night.

title: Nature lovers can visit this place...!!!
review: One of my favorite place in Uttarakhand is Nainital,because I belong from here.For studies I have to shift from here but whenever I get chance I visit to my favourite place Nainital.people who loves nature and clean enviroment,free from pollution so I reccommand to visit this place.Nainital is a beautiful place with beautiful lakes and friendly people.Many tourist come here from around the world to visit this place and they always have better experience.many good hotels with nice food is also provided here like the famous hotels are"The Naini Retreat","Shervani Hilltop" and many more .you all are always welcome here.!

title: Over Hyperd
review: It's too crowded. Better to visit other Tal like Sattal, bhimtal, GarudTal, Khurpatal and avoid this place specially Mall-road.

title: Beautiful views
review: Definitely enjoy a good boat ride. But be careful - a lot of peddlers around trying to get you to sign up for a boat ride and then luring you into buying a whole sight seeing package. Once you get off the boat you can enjoy some time at the Naina devi temple and also the Tibetan market nearby. It's indeed quite a scenic one.

title: Very scenic
review: Nainital derives all its charm from this beautiful lake. Its well maintained has a bean shape if you look from some high point and has boating facility,

title: Best hill station tourist place in low cost
review: It was a awesome experience in Nainital we went to celebrate our first anniversary in Nainital because there is so many amazing lakes like naini lake, bhimtal, ghoda khal mandir is one of best attraction points it is a temple where is 1.2 millions bell hanged there..also we went to Mukteshwar whis approx 60 km far from Nainital that is also one of best place we like its hight from ocean 7000 thousand feet. I love to visit nainital its totaly natural place nice clean cold air and heginic foods.

title: Beauty of God's Creation
review: Close to nature and magnificent view. Do not miss the boat ride. Wonderful weather and fresh smell of nature.

title: Outstanding scene at Lake
review: Best place for honeymoon. It v variety of secret scene in different weather. U can enjoy here very well with family. Here u can go zoo,  bhimtaal,  malitaal  blah blah.

title: Art of God
review: It is utmost relaxing to take ride on a boat in naini lake..the scenaries all around and nature at its highest you feel peace deep inside ...the best spot in nainital

title: Nature Beauty
review: Close to nature and magnificent view.

title: Beautiful
review: Nature is always remarkable, as this lake is surrounded with big green mountains.Must Visit place in Nainital....you may sit near the lake or at the temple which is adjoined the lake.....nothing better then this in a evening time.

title: Visited One of the famous lack of India
review: Visited Nainital lack on the next deay of our stay at Nainital. It is a popular hill station in the Indian.It is one of the 64 Shakti Peeths, Surrounding Nature of the place was amazing we visited around 3 km area by walk and enjoyed the beauty of the place.

title: Mesmerizing
review: While in nainital,if you miss boat ride in naini lake,your visit remain unaccomplished..Cool breeze would enthrall your soul...

title: Serene, Calm and Peaceful
review: I will describe this place as one of the nicest stops if you walk down early morning. Evening and mid-days will see a lot of crowd, however one must not miss to boat here! CCD next to the lake offers amazing view, and one should definitely visit it.

title: The Walk Across The Lake
review: The Nainital Lake is the main attractiom of Nainital. The lake distinguish Nainital from other hill stations. One can go for a walk on the Mall road which is on the east of it and explore the local market. Or one can just go for a peaceful walk, sit and relax on The Thandi Sadak which is on its west.

title: awesome
review: it was a one of the best lake i ever visited. silent place with awesome weather and great location.

title: I Like It
review: its beautiful and specially when you are with friends then boat ride in this lake will be more awesome and amazing.....climate is amazing....been there June,2017

title: Friends
review: Its really nice place.weather is superb and the naini mata mandir is good.felling like hill station and the place is overall fantstic for friends trip

title: amazing view with surrounding city around it
review: what an amazing view when u enter nainital it takes all your tiredness in one go.. the city is around the lake and gives a perfect picturesque view. night or evenings are perfect to roam around and feel  beauty of lake and nainital

title: Experience the best gift of nature
review: My Experience... i  believe the feeling that i have when i went to Nainital can  not be explained in mere words its always been such a nice place - Lake between the mountains with a temple and then u can climb high and see all the point .. just lovely

title: If boating is on your mind-Go for it!
review: Boating is an experience to remember as you boat with the entire valley surrounds you.Cloud and mist kiss you occasionally and make it all the more memorable.For couples its a must!

title: words are less for this lake
review: Naini lake and its surounding area is impeccably beautiful,wel manged now and boating in the lap of this lake is truly a heavenly experiance especially in the month of august because of the clouds descending on the lake and soft winds, no dout its the best lake in India to go and stay near

title: A small lake at Nainital,
review: A small lake situated almost in the centre of the town, clear waters, sight to behold. Occasionally we can find swans and ducks swimming in the lake

title: Amazing place
review: Nice place to Hangout between hills. Very quite place. Boating can be done which is at very reasonable prices. There are lot of places where you can visit.

title: Fascinated to see the beauty of lake
review: I went there with my husband. I would like to say that if you really want to feel the heaven of earth then you must to go there by motor bike. And the foggy weather/clouds  was looking like the crowning jewel of earth. I fascinate to see the beauty of nature at Nainital.

title: It's awesome
review: If you are in Nainital, nainital lake is prime attraction. You can enjoy boating and yacht. It's a very big lake.

title: Pure joy and happiness
review: Early morning or evening boat rides in the lake are very enjoyable. Lazy strolls by the lake were the best things we enjoyed

title: Cool place but overcrowded
review: We visited Nainital from Mukteshwar on a day trip by our own car. The moment we entered Nainital there was a huge line of cars and it was very difficult to get the parking spot. We found the spot after 45 minutes. The lake was good though it was damn crowded - as a matter of fact the whole area was overcrowded.

title: Nice Boat Ride and Evening Walk
review: Self Boat ride is available easily. Life jackets are mandatory but still remain calm in the boat as accidents happen in excitement. Evening walk on Mall Road is good for small shopping eating out.

title: Beautiful
review: The lake is very calm and clean. You will enjoy boating. The only problem is they have allowed the transport on Mall road which makes this place noisy

title: nice place for couples
review: Nainital lake is in mid of two hills. you can walk on the mall road and can experience  the amazing view of lake and also u can do boating.

title: High Point lake
review: Nice fairly large lake with a path all around for an exhilarating walk.Boat rides available,but no real control on the distance they would take you. ? cost effective. Need to know the local lingo.

title: Just see the view when you enter to forget the world
review: When you enter in nainital to see the first glimpse of lake, you forget the world. Beautiful lake covered by mountains on sides with beautiful walk way of Mall Road is an amazing place.

title: best
review: it's like homely in nainital extremely good best weather in August wearing cardigans in nainital best hotel channi raja super deluxe suit and deluxe suit are very good

title: Amazing experience
review: Have a great experience enjoy the boat ride in the serenity of Nainital lake.  The views are amazing from the boat

title: Wonderful & Clean Lake
review: Wonderful Lake with Clean water. Lot of colourful boats roaming in it. Pleasant and cool air flowing on it. Feel Good experience

title: As good as ever
review: Do boating, walk around or do anything around the lake to have a great and unforgetful experience. Hope people and administration can maintain the sancity of the place always.

title: Holiday at its best
review: One of the best hill stations in the North India. Plenty of good hotels and restaurants. It has a good market for shopping lovers. I was missing the lights across the lake which was shut down which used to give a colour to to already beautiful place

title: Natural lake with life depends of many many people and best for flora & Funa
review: A place which is god gift, must visit with family & friends. For taste bud must visit Uttaranchal Restaurant at waterfall, Nice place to spend time & enjoy food with family. Highly secure & trust worthy restaurant.

title: Weekend at Nainital
review: We had well spent a family vacation at Nainital. Very pleassant climate. No need of AC. 2 days are sufficient to visit Nainital and nearby attractions.

title: A huge huge lake , but  now a days level has dropped drastically.
review: 1. Lake is huge , probably biggest lake i have seen in my life till now.

title: A soothing trip
review: Though we went there for a weekend getaway, but the crowd due to holiday season made it a bit hectic. We decided to go boating during daytime when there was not much rush. That gave us a soothing experience in naini lake

title: Naini lake review
review: A must see place. There is a counter of Uttarakhand Tourism Development Corporation who issues prepaid boat tickets at Boat House. Apart from this there are several unauthorised ticket counters who catch tourists and do not let them go to authorised ticket counter of UTDC. Although tariff for both is same i.e. Rs. 140/- for small boats and half lake tour and 240/- for whole lake tour and comparatively big boats. But try to get ticket from UTDC counter.

title: The best view of a lake in my life
review: Last November we went to nainital and we kept the lake boat ride at the end. We were tired of roaming and shopping. We hopped into one boat. Then next came the most amazing scene of our life. It was Misty and foggy and water was hardly visible. We enjoyed our 30 mins ride and came back. That was the best ever boat ride in India till now.

title: Wow boating service
review: we love boating and we did few times in a trip , its better to do your own but its really tiring to do.

title: the nainital lake in its full glory
review: we went in the first week of july, so obviously nainital was drenched and i found it amazingly beautiful. the nainital lake was brimming with joy and boating was so much fun. however, it was not very clean on the banks but i wouldn't blame the authorities for that! the tourists too have to be equally conscious..

title: Lake that Chills..
review: We visited the nanital lake in month of November..

title: Naini Jheel
review: One of the best place in Nainital. The only boating place which is neat and clean is the naini jheel. What a beautiful place. Temple,  Church Gurudwara and a masjid around it. Must visit place. This jheel is visible from all points of Nainital. Also don't miss High altitude Zoo,  it's simply the best.  Animals are healthy and in good condition. Zoo has their own shuttles from jheel tail end.  No private cars are allowed. Zoo is high altitude and with steep slope.

title: Nice place for romantic couple
review: Yes nainital nice place,  it's great place  for romantic couple ,  nice view lake.. mountain,  comfortable weather..  great summer time holiday..

title: Lovely Lake! Little dirty though, needs cleaning but was awesome experience during the boating in beautiful lake.
review: Once we reached there, it was great feeling and especially during the boating - we enjoyed a lot.. you feel like in nature's lap. Awesome experience!

title: Mr.akshay
review: Best place to visit...so refreshed climate with rains cmg and going...best for couple romance.many adventure points as well

title: Tourist
review: Very romantic and superb place to njoy with family and friends.one should come omce in life to this place.

title: Natural freshwater body
review: A natural freshwater body surrounded by mountains.Good place to sit, relax and spend some quality time with your near and dear.

title: Lovely lake
review: Boating is at fixed rates and for a fixed time. The lake is dirty near the boarding area. This place should be clean and made safe for the tourists. One has to walk carefully as the place can be slippery. Once you are away from the boarding place, boating is beautiful as the water is clear and the view of the hills on both sides is breathtaking.The fresh air and greenery is delightful.

title: Scenic view
review: Major tourist spots are in and around the lake. Naina Devi temple. Zoo. Boating, mall road, shopping centre

title: if good rowing person and cloudy weather then looks nice
review: looks good surrounded by hotels on one side (mall) and forests on other side, keeps changing colour as per weather , good for pedal and rowing ride. if good row man he will tell you full history of lake and the town

title: Lost old charm
review: Nice place but too touristy now. On our last holiday could only find crowds there. Wish somebody worked on more plantation around it.

title: cooling your eyes fills with beauty
review: Lake view  enjoyed  only through slow walk viewing both sides of the lake.

title: Relexing in Hot Summers
review: I was very disappointed to see the state of Naini lake and Mall Road. I stayed with family near Bhuvali in a Cottage. When visited Nainital, It was in ruin state compare to my past visits 3-4 years back.

title: Very crowded and dirty Lake
review: The Famous Lake is unfortunately a let down. Due to the mushrooming of commercial establishments around the Lake, the water level has drastically dropped. The Lake is very dirty as people have thrown garbage and filth around it particularly towards the Naina Devi Temple side. Very disappointed to see such site.

title: Supaer view to see Nainital
review: View was good only parking is an issue, you can boating over there, same like Kashmir lake boating. mountain, city temples all you can see when you boating.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Beautiful lake ride around lake good enjoy atmosphere n weather ,hotels ,shopping etc.

title: Queen of Lakes
review: Nainital lake is the main attraction of town, boating there is a real fun, must visit place when in Nainital.

title: Bheemtal Lake is better
review: It is a touristy place and I would recommend Bheemtal lake vis a vis this one as that is quieter and more scenic.

title: Lake view to calm your soul and treat your eyes..
review: Mesmerizing views with a relaxing feeling at staying around the lake..Tibetan market and shikara boats worth a try..

title: Nainital Lake
review: Nainital is the best place amongst all the hill stations in India. Hotels opposite to Nanital Lake make the view amazing.

title: Lake city
review: Very good city with lakes and boating and other activities.  People here were very cooperative and nice.

title: Get amazed by the beauty of hills
review: Nainital is an amazing hill station and very accessible from Delhi.

title: Visit to nainital
review: Great view, awesome place, must visit,lake is beautiful surrounded by hills,best time to visit in Oct.

title: Boat ride in Naini Lake
review: Visit to Nainital is incomplete without a boat ride in the lake. Nice experience. Avoid while its clear sun.

title: Ultimate view of the city and clouds
review: Boating here is an experience of life time. One can have a clear view of the whole city and nature. you can see the clouds flowing in, the rope way and almost everything.

title: Only place in Nainital worth spending time
review: The lake becomes beautiful in the evening when the reflection creates a majestic view.

title: Beautiful Nainital Lake
review: Lake is surronded by  hills  on one side and Nainital city on other side, Beautiful views can be seen while boating in the Lake, Lake is  well maintained and the water is very clean

title: Heaven in nainital
review: Lake in between the hills is giving you god feelin, the aura is so good there that you cant resist yourself from there. One word for lake is Beautiful

title: most happening place
review: this is main centre of nainital.Morning view is very good as u can spot some ducks also .its good in june starting.try to get a hotel near this

title: Nice for family outing
review: Nainital lake is one of the attractions of nainital..Although its not that well maintained but still you can enjoy with your family..

title: Serene
review: Did a lovely boat ride on the Naini lake that gives a view of the whole town. the lake is close to many other interesting tourist points like Naina devi temple, the cable car and the tibetan market

title: Needs maintenance
review: The lake looks good from the top but when you visit the lake you'll see that it actually is in dire need of maintenance and probably a stricter governance.

title: Enjoy boating
review: Water is clear and deep , the best part about the lake is that fishes are human friendly they would not fear to come near you and mostly swim in shallow water near the shore .

title: Must visit in nainital
review: beautiful clean serene lake and lovely surroundings. Must visit place in nainital. Best part is that price is fixed for boating. Boating in the morning and evening is cool.

title: Beautiful spot
review: It was a delight to stand beside the lake and gaze upon the views everywhere. Sometimes full with people, not so much in the monsoon. Pack a lunch if you want to spend an our or two with nature.

title: Must visit!
review: Nainital is all about lakes. So the main attraction in Nainital is the lake view and the lake visit. Most popular lake is naini lake. Do visit for the boating

title: serene natural lake surrounded by hills
review: just came back from Nainital, visited the famous lake. Great place to stay around, take an evening stroll and do boating

title: Boating
review: Good for a one time experience....amidst hills so nice but essentially only when climate is good not in sun

title: Boating and feeding ducks and fishes
review: Feeding ducks alongside, Taking a boat ride and feeding fishes in the lake while enjoying the large spread of Lake and the view aroynd is always a soothing experience. More so if you are tired from long shopping hours spent in the market aroynd.

title: Amazing Place!!
review: It's an amazing place to visit . Good to spend some quality time with family . Visit in the evening and enjoy the sunset .

title: Beautiful
review: Nainital named by Nainital lake. If u go nainital and u miss the lake, u miss everything. Lake is awesome and riding on boat feel like a king. Nothing too much adventures but you get to be a part of hlilstation Totally greenery area surrounding. If u gone any were of sightseeing in Nainital, lake will be with you. So must visit there.

title: Beautiful lake a paradise
review: Lake is very beautiful boating is enjoyable the man who was sailing our boat was very nice local person who told us and showed  every possible place which you can see from lake

title: Average
review: Nanital is over crowded, with horns honking on the mall road. For the serene quitness one needs to go higher in the hills.

title: Beautiful Scenary
review: Its a beautiful busy lake.Lots of eating options as its just parallel to Mall road.Best time of boating is in the evening.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Lake is must see in Nainital. We took boat ride in evening and the scene was just amazing. You can opt for paddle boating as well. The rates are fixed and very reasonable

title: Nice
review: Very awesome place to boat it's very economic as well 210 per boat only for long run max4 person can sit in a boat

title: Enjoyed
review: Enjoyed boating but the lake was clean may be due to rain.

title: Beautiful view
review: Main point of attraction in Nainital. Very beautiful lake and nice boating experience. There are 2 types of boating : One with pedal boating and other one is the normal one. You can enjoy maggie and corn at the lake side. To see beautiful view of the lake, I would recommend to take ropeway to snow view point.

title: Please Avoid During Summer Vacations
review: It was a nice experience but was spoilt a tad by the crowd in summer vacations time. It looked as if all of india was there. Great difficulty to park cars . But do go there if in the area as its worth the wait , a lake sorrounded by hills on all sides looks fab.

title: Naini Lake
review: Lake is not beautiful as it was earlier ..... secondly its very dirty now

title: Nice place to visit
review: This was my first trip to Nainital. We have booked Hotel on Mall road just in front of lake. We have visited Nainital Lake twice. There are lots of fish in this Lake which attracts our children. Boat ride is also a good option to enjoy the beauty of Nainital Lake. Weather was just too good in this Month.

title: Boating is cool here
review: Boating is only option and is cool here. Best part is that prices are fixed.  Best part is that prices are fixed.

title: Still Charming! The water levels are quite low but boating possible.
review: Boating was good! The prices are standard so no opportunity for any fleecing. Young kids really enjoy this activity which is a big attraction for the hill station

title: A nice lake with decent boating options
review: The lake is serene. A gem in nainital. The rates for boating is fixed. 210 for full round however the boat owners cover only about half the lake. The boat person Raju  of boat no 72 is extremely good and clicks some nice pics.

title: Family trip to Nanital
review: We took a one day trip to Nainital which was not WORTH the money and effort. Excessive rush, Traffic jam of minimum one hour to enter nainital. The Lake is good but the Mall road does not have anything with no restriction for vehicles as such it is a nightmare to walk. The ropeway requires advance reservation as such the entire trip was very tiring

title: Nice Lake with Boating facilities...
review: Nice lake with boating facilities. Lots of fish, very large ones in the water. You can see them from the banks. If you drop some food they will come rushing.. Alas!! You can only watch!!

title: Awesome view
review: I visited with my family in nainital.must see place.weather was awesome.you can do boating in naini lake at very nominal charges.

title: Awesome Lake,bful surrounding
review: We have visited Nainital on 24/05/17. The Naini lake was very beautiful & Boating was a very nice experience.It is surrounded by Mall road having beautiful surroundings....

title: Nice place.
review: Nice place to hangout with family or friends. Try boating. Very beautiful crystal clear water. Very refreshing.

title: visit to nainital 2017
review: beautiful clean serene lake and lovely surroundings. on one side you have a lovely calm jogging track by the lake and on the other end is the  goddess naini mandir and tibetan market buzzing with people

title: Awesome place
review: Very awesome place ........boat riding is awesome .......I did it 5 times in a day

title: Beautiful lake
review: Nice place well maintained. No touts.. rates are fixed and no cheating. Our boatmen showd us all the placs around and explained history as well

title: Not a very clean Lake!
review: Not a very impressive location for me. With dirt all around, honking , lot of traffic the lake has really less water during summer time. Also, tourist are just not respecting a beautiful nature creation. Nohing bad for the lake, the issue is with tourists who just don't want to see their future generations to come and visit this place anymore.

title: Nainital
review: Very good lake... but very crowded...

title: too crowded on shore .. but too beautiful within
review: in the month of May the surroundings of this lake is like a railway station ... too many ppl and too much crowd...

title: Low water level
review: Water level was low due to summers. Very scenic.  Should be better post monsoon.  Markets along side the lake sell good stuff.

title: Best place
review: Wonderful location, great scenic place.

title: Lake surrounded by hills
review: There are many boating points around this lake. They offer many types of boat like roving or paddle boats tickets for the same are to be bought from counters and you get printed receipts so there is not fear of being cheated by goons.

title: never seen such a beautiful lake
review: excellent view of hills , while boating we were feeling awesome , boats were good , rates were reasonable

title: Leisurely boat ride and sidewalk
review: For a frequent traveller this might be the only attraction worth your time.

title: Very nice place
review: It was really nice place.it is very beautiful. One can do boating there. And u can eat a lot of things like bhelpuri, mommos,  gogappaes etc.there you can also watch 3D movies , you can play games etc. Really everyone must visit there.one can see huge trees and mountains while boating. A excellent place for enjoyment.

title: Very good, but crowded during summer
review: Main attraction, very good but try avoid during summer as it is too much crowded. There are many activities like boating, yachting, kayaking etc.

title: A boat ride
review: A total hoot for the kids, the short boat ride on the drying Nainital lake, was great fun for the kids, they saw fish but they were really into rowing. The boat man are kind and kid friendly & the kids had a blast competing to row. Just be careful of the water splashing , as it looks really dirty. Thankfully it does not smell.

title: Beautiful Lake surrounded by religions
review: its a beautiful lake situated at the center of the city at mall road.

title: Lot of pollution
review: Crowded. Naina Devi Temple was good. Lake was mediocre, dirty. Lot of traffic. Parking costs Rs100. Tibetan market is nothing but some rural clothes and trinkets from China.

title: Incredible Place
review: Another visit to this picturesque beauty during peak tourist season. A beautiful place. One must go on a stroll with hand in hand with the companion of life. A place to relish memories, relax, have Bhutta, aloo chat, gol gappas are not that good(water is dicey) . Live each moment to its fullest.

title: Boat ride with family
review: Excellent experience at lake and boating experience with family was awesome. Children were really excited and boatman Raju was very friendly and like a guide explained many things about lake and its surroundings. Weather was cool and breeze was at its best. Took full boat ride and it was safe too with life vests.

title: Beautiful lake and beautiful time that I have sent there!
review: A place where you can enjoy nature at its best... lake is very calm and beautiful.. boat ridding wow experience with office seniors

title: Average lake
review: Water level of naini lake has fallen up to 10 - 12 feet when we visited in June 2017. Water was muddy specially at the corners it was totally damp.average experience. However sattal , bhimtal & nauchakiya tals were were superb.

title: Spoiled place
review: Too crowded, you can see sewage water entering the lake from the side of Nainadevi temple, entry toboats broken , uneven

title: Good place to visit
review: Nanital being a very famous hill station has undoubtedly scenic beauty but it has become very crowded specially in peak seasons, well lake is also having same condition. But you will surely enjoy boating. On one side of lake there are fishes which are clearly seen and you can feed them with some food. There are lots of duck. It is photogenic place. Roadside by lake will give you some remarkable pics.

title: Boating
review: Boating is great fun at nainital lake. You can run the boat yourself after taking the permission from owner of the boat. Wonderful weather, clean water and cold make a perfect combination. You can find many boat on the spot. There is no need for pre booking.

title: Lake everyone must visit
review: Well no introduction is needed for Nainital Lake . Its a beautiful lake

title: Scenic View from all sides
review: We had a good boating experience and a good evening by the lake too. The Boat operators were very polite also.

title: Worth a Visit
review: Came back to this lake after 10 years with my wife n 6 year old daughter....The place has a lot of activities for kids - trolley ride uphill, boating, swings, zoo n a lot of shops to buy stuff from...highly commercialised but worth a visit !

title: Serene and beautiful
review: Lake situated in between the main road and the thandi sadak! Beautiful lake ... boating and all can be done during the day time. It's generally open till 5 pm.

title: Drying lake
review: The water has started drying in the lake. Good boating experience but the banks are filled with garbage.

title: Nice and serene
review: Good to see such a big natural lake which is around 150 feet deep! Boating, sailing and paddle boats are few activities worth doing at the lake.

title: Family Boating
review: Badly maintained lake. Govt & local authorities need to tighten their belts. Aside, good for boating - Dont touch the water - The sewage flows into this lake :-) Do visit the temple on the bank of the lake - Naina Devi temple. You can ask the boat guy to drop you at the temple.

title: The main attraction of Nainital
review: Naini Lake is probably the biggest attraction of Nainital. Spread over a large area, it offers the tourists nice scenic views and options to boat. The charges are Rs 210 for a 1 hour ride in pedal boat. The lake is not pristine clean as in the past, hence slowly losing its charm.

title: Serene
review: Nainital is known for its famous lake surrounded by mountains. Although it's more crowded these days but still quite well maintained and organized considering the crowd.

title: It was Good!!
review: Almost entire Nainital is around this place!! one can spend a day or two only around this place. Boating facility is there with 3 options. Do whatever you wish to do man!!

title: Thank Goodness! its Clean
review: Naini lake is nice to just sit across or in boat and just while away your time in the lap of nature. It is clean with no polythenes in sight although not the case with rest of the place.

title: Amazing Hill station !!!
review: Visited here after a long time and was amazed to see the cleanliness. The cleanest hill station near to delhi.

title: No chance of miss this when you are in Nainital
review: You can say this is the center of attraction of Nainital. There is almost 0% chance of missing this if your are visiting Nainital, because the entire city is around this lake only. Firstly if you are planning to stay just near by of this lake, it will always be a good choice, only hotel rates are bit high and the place is slightly crowded(mostly by tourist). On the other hand if you are staying a bit far, choose up-hill hotels for great aerial view. Just read in news paper that in this summer (2017), the water level is far lower than normal. But I think you can still enjoy boating in Naini Lake. Paddle boats are there, you can rent it hourly, but do not be too adventurous, obey rule and wear life jackets. Guided rowing boat is also a good option. Just sitting by the lake with popcorn will be a good time pass.

title: Good for boating
review: Famous naini lake is well talked about, so there is nothing more to tell. When we visited this month - may-2017 water level has decreased. Naina Devi temple and tibetian mkt. is near to lake.

title: Holidays
review: The beauty of Nainital is this serene lake known as Naini lake. Boating is the key feature and to experience it is a must. Though the govt. there should take care of its entrance which needs maintenance. The mountains from the centre is beautiful.

title: Must Visit Place
review: Boating is must, many options are there from paddle boat to normal ride costing 250 per person.

title: Awesome x mas on the bank of nainital lak
review: Just visited of Nainital lake second time and i am mesmerizing again on its beauty. Last time i visited on durgapuja , this time on x mas. It is a happening , charming. Also never miss the boating on lake preferably the paddle boating. Nice market of surrounding

title: Boating paradise.
review: I enjoyed boating here every day during my stay at Nainital. It is the heart of City and you can see every activity of city around this lake.

title: lake with great view
review: Lake is located in heart of city surrounded  by hills from all side. Boating is fun, they charge around 210 for 4 people.

title: nice view. Amazing night lights
review: Visited in May end 2017. It was quite crowded but they have a nice parking lot.

title: Mango Lake @ Nainital
review: The beautiful city of Nainital offers a lot and is place you must visit in India.

title: beautiful lake...
review: the naini lake was so beautiful...cool trip...awesome surrounding....beautiful sounds the lake water gives...must visit place in nainital...

title: Good spot for all day activity
review: One can enjoy Naini lake at any time in a day. Boating is one of the famous activities here. Walk down the Mall road along side the banks of the lake, the walk is really a great pleasure. I could notice that lake and the surrounding area is more cleaner than it was few years back. Must visit place while in Nainital.

title: Must visit in Nainital
review: The lake trip (via boat) was peaceful and good. The surroundings and view was wonderful.  Its a must to go there

title: Good lake
review: The lake was not so big, but due to its proximity to mall road and naina devi temple, it attracts more tourists. Worth visiting place and boating. I feel that sattal lake was more big and peaceful than nainital lake, but little far off from the city.

title: Too commercialised
review: The lake is quite a beautiful sight, however the same is too commercialised and usually very crowded. Boating in the lake is an ok experience not much to cherish

title: Nice Boat tour
review: Naini lake Boating was quite good experience. View from lake was awesome. In late evening View of Mall Road was too good.

title: Could have been Better
review: Since this is the lake around which the whole nanital City is built, it should be of Great importance to its people but that dos'nt seem to be so, I found that the Lake is full of waste which comes with sewage specially after a downpour , city Muncipal coorporation should specially take care of solid waste that goes in the lake.

title: Customary boating
review: 210 bucks for 20 mins boat ride. Well easy nothing special and just been there , did that. Lots of stands- Naina devi stand is easy from temple and bhutia market.

title: Very mesmerizing and cool
review: Naini lake is very cool and mesmerizing place to relax from metro cities stress, though water level is going down YOY, but still it provides relax to tourist.

title: Serene and Peaceful
review: The Lake is huge and provides very good atmosphere to relax... The boat ride was joyful, we hired rowing boat instead of paddling and it was very good decision as our guy took us beyond the fixed mark and we spent quality time on the boat watching the sunset. There are lots of fishes and swans at some places. Many naval boats can be seen training the defense people. Good things - rates are fixed by the govt. for all activities and there is no scope of cheating. A must visit place.

title: I loved it
review: The Naini lake is one thing which pushes Nainital way over mussoorie, the naini lake is right along the mall road, the mall road is a very happening place, one would get all typical shopping needs satisfied there itself. There are multiple place like bara bazaar, mall Road, place near naina devi temple where one can do a lot of shopping, great place to buy stuff. Also, the lake has boating 210 for half round for row boating and 450 for full round. 210 for half hour of pedal boat and 420 for one hour. The rates are fixed and clearly mentioned from where one can take the boat. The naini lake is huge and multiple places you could take the boat. Also, one would get all sorts of eateries along the mall road and many other restaurants as well.

title: The main attraction in Naini
review: Scenic for sure. As in most hill stations, all activities are around the lake. I would advise going high up (to Lake view point in a car) and getting a shot of the lake from that angle.. it's stunning!

title: Naini trip
review: We had paddled in lake. It was very good experience and very cool atmosphere. It was little crowded but good location.

title: Scenic lake
review: Amazing lake providing scenic views. One can enjoy boating with all kinds of boats. Once in the middle of the lake the view of the hill and the city will leave you spellbound. The water level of the lake have gone down in the summer otherwise it's a great experience.

title: Tranquil place
review: See the changing colours of the lake at different times of the day. Boat ride is a must. The soul of Nainital. The Mall road alongside has lots of shopping and eating joints.

title: Awesome lake
review: The first time i see the lake i was like really this place exist. The lake se deep and it has fishes in it. I love boating there. Overall a great experience and the charges for boating is really cheap.

title: Good for boating
review: Nani lake is meant for a good boating experience in reasonable rates. Enjoyed the scenic view of nanital while boating. A must thing to do when you are in nainital.

title: Clean
review: Breezy, refreshing, great view , sat in boat number 101 in which rajesh Khanna sang the song jis gali mein...Mr.bhatt is a good n God fearing man..Do contact him for a good boat ride

title: Good place
review: Do boat riding in evening time good time to enjoy evening time is very good you will get a different experience

title: Awesome boat ride in Nainital lake
review: Boat rides are awesome and very relaxing. The boat owners are very simple and accommodating and you have an option of pedal boat as well.

title: Lake
review: Superb for boating. Charge is Rs.210/- for 30 mnts. Timing morning 7-30 am to 6-30 pm.

title: Awesome.
review: Me and my wife get the last ferry when sun is about to set down. The whether, cold winds and almost no other ferry around make my first visit in Naini Lake awesome.

title: Awesome boating experience
review: We visited in the month of August. It was rainy season at that time. So the weather was very soothing. boating in the lake is a very nice experience. The tickets are available form the boat house, but be sure you should bargain to get the best price.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Nainital lake & city is so beautiful. Water is clean and good enough to enjoy boating. It cost 200 rupees for a boat ride. It was cold climate in the month of April. Try to feed fishes, they come right at you. We really enjoyed a lot.

title: Normal boating experience
review: Just because you are in Nainital you still end up doing it and it is like any other places boating experience

title: a touristy place
review: this is the famous Naini Lake (Tal means lake), its a superb place to be at, but it has become far too touristy for a person like me. too many people, completely commercialised. Yet, if you want to take your family to a good holiday destination,  this could be it. try to explore the neighbouring places.

title: Serene
review: Thrilling is what comes to mind when you are on a small boat in the lake. Many facets of life come alive. You trust a person, who you have paid just 210 rupees with your life. You feel great in the lap of nature . It grows on you. It goes slow and you got mountains on both sides. I can go on and on. All in all pretty nice

title: Soo peaceful
review: Boating is just wonderful!!! Water is cold and full of fishes and swans !! Offer food and fish will surface

title: God's Gift to mankind
review: Simply amazing. The boating experience in the Nainital lake is one of the best experience we had. Time stands still there.

title: beautiful lake
review: Nainital lake, which is also called naini lake, is one the best lake/Tal, in the nainital, It has very pleasent envirnoment and is very calm. recommended

title: Amazing boat ride
review: Though a little crowded once in the rowing boat (evenings preferably)..you can have a serene and pleasant time. The experience itself is very beautiful.

title: Disheartening.
review: All I have to say is... Wake up humans. With the gorgeous pictures on Internet I was expecting the lake to be the best I have ever seen. But unfortunately all my hopes were shattered.The Lake is a dumping place for the tourists.plastic bottles,packets at the sides.the way to the boats is filthy,unpleasant,polluted. i was disturbed seeing this sight.the joy of visiting the lake was not at all there.please go through my pictures.you will know what I mean.hope we tourist act in a  responsible manner and take care of the gorgeous places on earth.

title: NAINI LAKE VIEW IS AWESOME ....very very good and very very clean place . you should vist this place.
review: Naini lake is very very nice and very clean . Its no 1. destination of nainital. all the people do visit this place atleast one time. Its near by bhotia market which is famous for shopping. and it is also near temple.

title: Nainital Lake has exotic view
review: Nainital lake is quite serene and have its own ambience with stadium and market nearby and very helpful locals

title: amazing lake
review: well it was a mesmeising lake with a cold climate in the month of april we really enjoyed the boating in the lake

title: Clean and Lovely lake
review: It is the attraction of Nainital.  Lake is beautiful and perhaps one of the cleanest. Boating facilities are very good. One can sit and enjoy. Walking around lake is also refreshing. An excellent place to visit

title: Excellent nature beauty
review: Nainital lake & city so beautiful.everybody must visit once .so natural surrounding jungle & ferfar,pine,enhance it's beauty.boat riding is also extra ordinary experience.boat riding also in bhimtal.but no need to waste money there.

title: Clean!
review: After visiting the Dal lake in Srinagar, this place is much cleaner in comparison. The rates of the Shikara ride/paddle boats are fixed and one doesnt feel duped(unlike Srinagar).

title: Still Clean
review: A great surprise this water body is still clean, and good enough to enjoy boating. It cost 210 rupees for a boat ride, and for a paddle boat its the same cost for an hour.

title: Beautiful , serene and clean
review: After seeing lakes at lot of hill stations in India nainital lake is very beautiful and clean.. the waters are crystal green and the walk on lakefront is beautiful.. one can do the boat ride which is very economical and also visit the Tibetan market nearby..

title: Beautiful Lake Surrounded by the Mountain
review: The Naini Lake is huge and great place to hang around in the evening, we did the boating which was a good experience.

title: Beautiful Lake, clear water, awesome weather
review: This is a beautiful place to visit, definitely the best attraction at Nainital. Plenty of Shikaras are available and tickets for a full round is Rs. 210. On the banks of this lake are the Naina Devi mandir and Gurudwara and there are plenty of shops for buying candles, woolleen clothing and other items.
