There is a huge sports ground and parking for vehicles is adjacent to it. Mall Road and Bara Bazar are very closeby. Overall it is very much worth a visit.

title: Wonderful romantic and full of nature
review: Very nice place to enjoy the boating with your beloved and also enjoy the scenic beauty of mountain and town.

title: Well maintained lake
review: I am impressed with this lake. Well maintained. The best part is only rowing boats used. No motor boats.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Beautiful lake but quite a bit crowded. People can boat in the lake. Actually it was filled with boats. But the lake and surrounding area is quite clean

title: Wonderful
review: Wonderful.... Awesome.... Great..... You will feel cool breeze near this lake. Boating in this lake gives immense pleasure and serene to the soul which you will never ever forget.

title: Lake on a mountain
review: Beautiful lake on great height in the middle of mountains. It's stunning and picturesque which attracts huge amount of tourists all year round. Popular amongst Indians, it offers cold temperatures in summer and snowfall in winter. Boating, restaurants and lake facing resorts make the naini lake experience even better

title: Best
review: Best place to hangout in summer vacation

title: enjoyable boating experience
review: the nainital lake has very clean and calm water in which boating rejuvinates your mood. very much recommended. boating is not expensive at all. it was around 250 rs.

title: One of the most beautiful tal
review: Naini lake is a great place to visit. It provides you a pleasant environment and also the scenic beauty is unthinkable. You can opt for boat ride here which is a great experience. It is very large in nature and surrounded by hills which has made it a panoramic place for nature lovers.

title: A beautiful lake in the lap of Kumaun Himalayas.
review: It is the tal or lake situated at an altitude of about 2084 mt  in the district of Nainital, Uttarakhand. It is named after  Naini Devi temple, one of the Shaktipeethas according to the Hindu mythology is adjacent to the lake. The lake and the surroundings area  are very clean, decorated and well maintained. One can also enjoy boating over lake.

title: Lake
review: It is nice. Not very up and down roads. But very crowded.Must see bheem tal also. Boat ride is also good. They charge only 200. Sunset is good.

title: Of course the central location of this place....
review: Nainital Lake is the most central lake which is right at the mall road and the main attraction. The best part being its connectivity with main mall road, one can enjoy boating here and there are plenty of restaurant and hotel around as well.

title: Summer weekend getaway
review: Naini lake can really be avoided if you are staying at Two Chimneys. Enjoy the property as their is nothing to do in Nainital.

title: A great Lake indeed... Awe-inspiring!
review: A place high up in the mountains... Simply peaceful and very well maintained. the Mall is interesting especially knowing the British History

title: Pristine Lake and Surroundings
review: Naini Lake is like the centre of everything in Nainital. And this is what enhances the beauty of this city. A boat ride in the lake is a must but what I would really suggest to do, is to sit by its side and enjoy the panoramic view.

title: The awesome Place to spend the Day
review: Nainital is a hilly area and every thing is situated on the hills only. You will hardly find plain places at this place. Naini Lake is surrounded with hills and like the centre of everything in Nainital. And this is what enhances the beauty of this city. A boat ride in the lake is also available at Rs.50/- per person and this can be enjoyed with your family / companion. The view is beautiful and can be seen from the Naina Devi Temple also where you can sit easily and enjoy its panoramic view. The place is very cool and calm most of the people do visit this area daily.

title: Amazing day spent at the lake
review: Between boating and eating.. we spent an entire weekend here without realising where the time went by. The pedal boats offer an amazing workout. If u r not looking to do that u can opt for the shikara  type boat which isn't self driven.

title: Interesting place
review: Beautiful Place of Nainital must visit attraction in region here you enjoy boat riding and here you do adventure there is a church on mountain where you go with a path of mountain

title: beautiful lake
review: beautiful lake and awesome views around..boating was fun and people were good..good place for family activity...refreshing air

title: lake tour
review: nice place

title: Stunning lake
review: Its a beautiful lake and get very crowded on busy weekends. I would love to come here on a quieter day and enjoy the serenity and calm. There are boating facilities around the beach as well. The weather in Nainital was wonderfully chilly even in the month of April.

title: Very nice
review: I am generally not a boating person but in the month of march in the afternoon a ride in the peaceful beautiful soothing lake is quite a nice experience. The good thing is you  an take a one way boat ride. We took the boat from one part of the lake where we had our lunch towards the main mall road to the other part of the lake where there was a temple. The boats are also quite good. Overall quite a nice experience. :-)

title: Very Pristine Lake
review: The Lake for which the city itself is named. It's very pristine and calm and whole Nainital is built on the banks of it. We did a boat tour on the row boat. It was slow but we could see the city bounds and majestic mountains on all sides. The boats are basically of two types, the rower ones and pedal ones.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Lake is beautiful.. but try to not visit on long weekend and holiday, it is too overcrowded. Nice place to sit around and relax and chill in boat ride

title: Lake tour
review: A nice boating experience on a clean lake with a beautiful mountain view and cool breeze blowing around is a perfect place to spend your weekend evenings.

title: boating on nice clean lake
review: Really enjoyed boating in this lake. Rides are reasonably priced, we paid Rs 210 for four of us for a long trip. The boatman, a local was good natured and told us alot of things about the lake and nainital in general. Saw a number of fishes in the clean water...and also a few turtles. Good experience in nice weather.

title: Nice clean waters
review: Boating and roaming around the lake was very pleasant. Also the mall road provides good opportunity for shopping.

title: Wonders of the lakes!
review: Nainital Lake, in the Nainital district called the Lake District of India, is one of the four Lakes of Kumaon hills; the other three lakes are the Sattal Lake, the Bhimtal Lake and the Naukuchiyatal Lake.

title: Amazing Experience
review: I visited at Nainital with my cousins, we were feeling amaze when we were driving in Cloud because On the way to Nainital you feel very cold and after reaching some distance the weather was normal.

title: Must GO Place
review: the serene environment will make you feel calm, for other water sports get up early morning , at one side of the lake lots of water game have been taught that too in free!!

title: Naini lake
review: Beautiful lake and is the main attraction of Nainital. Boat option is available here for standardised government rates.

title: Good lake for boating
review: Naini lake is a good choice if you like boating and want to enjoy some time appreciating nature. There are two typed of ferries provided. One will take you till half way and other will make you circle the whole lake. You can get a good look of the whole city while boating. There are many boarding points but most of them are makeshift. Make sure to board from the safe points only.

title: Beautiful
review: Being a resident to nearby place Haldwani Its our favorite outing destination in summer and even in winters. Cool and loving place .... lake is quite beautiful....enjoy boating... a place of must visit....

title: Great view
review: It is good lake at a mountain location. It has 15min ride, 30 min ride, with paddle, row boats. Charging Rs160 and 210 for the time slot. I went for 15 min ride. They take you to 30% of the lake. It has good view of Rope car, mountains and nice ride.

title: Best place for a boatride in Nanital
review: This is perhaps the largest and most beautiful lake in Nainital and best place to enjoy a boat ride specially early in the morning or during the evening time just before the sunset. You can see the Mall road alongside the Lake with beautiful green mountains full of trees. Its 120feet deep with clean water lets you witness one of the beautiful places nature has created.

title: Breathtaking view
review: Boating is a must if you visit Nainital Lake. Cost is 210 INR for 4 people.The lake water is cold and the cool breeze helps you refresh your mood and relax. A n hour or plus can be spent here. Naina Devi temple and Tibetan Market are very close to it. In fact best to visit Naina Devi temple first, in doing so you will automatically cover Tibetan Market and Naini Lake.

title: Relax and enjoy the lake town
review: Nainital is always enjoyable! Walk down the street with the lake to your  left Mallital to Tallital, window shop at lines of stores, enjoy a windy boat ride, take temporary membership of Nainital club and relish the food and drinks; bite into corn sticks laced with lemon and salt, watch soccer matches on the ramparts; and at night bask in the glory of twinkling lights in the mountains that protect this quaint wonderful hill resort! It's a fun town, - walk, boat, eat and shop. Open throughout the year, many sight seeing destinations within 50 kms- temples, lakes, wildlife at Corbet, snow views and treks - need you wish for more! Just do it.

title: Extended Holiday destination
review: Nice place for family and extended weekend holidays specially for people from Delhi-NCR. Weather is pleasant with evening breeze around the lake. Most irritating part of the place is that everytime you enter the Mall Road by car, you have to pay 50 rupees entry fee. And the collectors are so rude and ill mannered that they will instantly change your holiday mood into a bitter experience!!

title: Lake
review: I just visited nainital with few of my friends.

title: Good when you visit there during pre-monsoon
review: The lake is life line of Nainital. Although, it looks contracted and dirty during peak summers, but during most of the time of year, you will be enjoyed this place

title: SPIRITUAL-CUM-ENTERTAINMENT TRIP
review: We have been there for Nainital to visit Patal Bhuvaneshwar.  Awesome place must visit with family friends any one a great place to relax ur mind body and soul.

title: Lake Naini
review: Great Experience you can do boating there .Best view in Early morning . do not try to taste water freshness, you can find  treated water is mixed in lake.

title: Love in mountains
review: Ñearest railway station: Kathgodam

title: Friends time out
review: Winter's special.

title: Boating at Naini Lake is an absolute pleasure.
review: Naini Lake is as beautiful as it can get. Boating is a must if u visit here. Nearby, NainaDevi Temple and Tibettan Maket should also be visited.

title: Surrounded by mountains,  Near Mall road Nainital
review: THIS is the center of attraction of Nainital city.

title: Ahh Nainital Lake
review: If Nainital is one of the most beautiful and complete hill stations of India, lake Nainital is the queen. Thanks to eco friendly government, the water is clear, boatmen are regulated as is tariff. And one can spend days sitting on the shore in the club reading book as the days go by. Simply wonderful.

title: Beautiful!
review: A large, beautiful lake bordered by the hills on one side and the bustling mall road on the other. You can get row boats or pedal boats on hire to take a leisurely turn around the lake. On one side, you can see the Naina Devi temple. Go after 5pm on a weekday and you will have the lake practically to yourself. When it grows dark and the hillside comes alive with lights twinkling through the trees, it is a magical experience.

title: Not much to do unless you are a couple or with kids
review: Mainly boating for a nominal fee or you can take a walk alongside the lake and try any of the foodjoints on the mall road. The view is nice but the view is worth only once.

title: A view of Nanital Lake
review: Coming from plains, hilly terrains of Nanital is breath taking. It is very refreshing when one reaches the lake. The Mall Road along one side of the lake is the shopping area for tourist. It also has number eateries and hotels. A must visit hill station.

title: Awesome
review: The facilities like boating, cycling and restaurants make this a very nice tourist place and one can spend one whole day here

title: Clean and serene
review: This lake is very well maintained by local authorities. Boating is a must at this lake. The look from above the mountains looking down at this lake shows its shape as a mango :)

title: average place
review: average lake to get to if yo need to kill some time. stinks at places but overall okay experience...

title: The best attraction !
review: Set amidst lush green mountains, this emerald green lake is the best attraction of Nainital & its majestic view from the top can be seen from the rope way to the Snow View or from Naina Peak.

title: Must go
review: It was really a wonderful experience to have boating in a clean & calm lake like naini lake. The rates are fixed by the boat owners association & hence are quite reasonable. Great experience.

title: The Mirror of Beauty
review: Naini lake is the real mirror of beautiful city Nainital. If you're an adventure lover then you should choose paddle boat for boating in Naini Lake. Price is fixed & you can enjoy boating for one hour in that price.

title: Weekend trip
review: Sonu(2748)....Trip was awesome and driver was amazing and guiding each and every thing....Such a memorable trip.....

title: Boating at naini lake
review: Very nice experience. Rates were fixed rs 210 for around 30 mins. Will surely refresh your body and mind. Main attraction of Nainital visit.

title: Awesome Experience
review: It was once in a life experience. Lake surrounded by green mountains. We went for boating every day of our stay at Nainital. It relaxes your mind after tiring day. Enjoyed a lot.

title: Serene and peaceful
review: This is the lake from which Nainital gets its name. It is the main sightseeing point and all other attractions like Mall road, Naina Devi temple and Tibetian market are located around its periphery.

title: Lovely boating experience
review: The Naini lake is beautiful and nestled within the hills. Boating here is a tranquil experience, with lovely views of the hills all around and the Naina devi temple in the distance.  It is safe too and wearing life jackets is compulsory. Definitely recommend.

title: A tranquil place to be!
review: The lake is much much cleaner that it was a couple of years back!

title: One must visit the place
review: Enjoyed the boat ride and clean environment, Boat sailors were excellent and very honest. It felt like heaven.

title: Good place
review: Amazing place nice view Great Lake good time to spend with family ....the best thing is the lake with boating

title: Nainital lake... A famous hill station
review: Nainital lake, yatch club, horse riding, mall road walks, paddle boats, lovers peak, and other wonderful sites which together define the miracle of Uttar Pradesh

title: Heart of Nainital
review: It is the biggest lake in the center of Nainital. Nice walk along Mall road. Enjoy paddle boat as well as shikara boats. Shikara boats is driven by its driver, they charge Rs. 220 for 30-40 min boating ride

title: Heart of the city
review: Its really good on every aspect. You can enjoy the lake view while walking on the The Mall, enjoying food and during gossips. Boating is the good experience for everyone.

title: Nice, tranquil, beautiful!
review: This obviously is a place that one visiting Nainital will always visit. The lake is clean - thanks to the restrictions and maintenance by administration.  Motor driven boats are not allowed.  Water was cold - the boat ride was nice, cool, relaxing.  If you are in Nainital for 2 days, you can always go for the boat ride on both days.

title: ताल है तो नैनीताल है।
review: Romantic lake, Wonderful weather, Beautiful Mall road makes perfect combo to attract you. Honest people at your service. Enjoyed नौका in lake as well as रिक्शा on Mall.

title: Lovely...
review: Amazing experience...Nice place...I love it...boatsman behaviour are good...but plz keep tight hold your children...

title: best place for boating
review: i love this lake, its so beautiful shape like an eye.

title: Good place to stroll around
review: You can do yatching, boating and if tired sit down aside to enjoy chilly sunshine. The lake feels cooler in winters. It is clean.

title: the epicentre of the city of nainital
review: the lake is well kept & clean & whole tourism in naintal revolves around this lake . this is the most happening place in nainital.

title: great view
review: great view, awesome lake, boating there was good experience, clicked photographs, great place to hung around

title: Scenic Place
review: Visited in October-2015 for couple of nights and it was a wonderful experience in the nainital lake. we had the boating around 6 pm and the temp was almost 4 .

title: Finding myself
review: Valley of happiness... ice cold water in the palm of snowy mountains. Night view is amazing. Walk through the streets and feel the mesmerising love of nature.

title: Cool place to chill out your day :)
review: Calm water and surrounded by mountains; This lake is worth spending your entire day. Boating is an adventure where you get to see the entire city and Naini Temple nearby gives you a fabulous experience.

title: Enjoyment
review: The boat ride is good and serves good views. Take the full course ride, you will enjoy. The Lake is deep and the water clean.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Its amazing to see such a large and beautiful lake at such an altitude. The lake has a very crowded mall road on one side and hills on other. It was encouraging to see the cleanliness in spite of maddening crowds. We did boating and enjoyed the sail boats. There is a good tibetan market where you can do bargain shopping.

title: Beautiful
review: This lake is sorrounded by hills and it is just so beautiful.  you can ride a boat at a very reasonable rate and enjoy.

title: a beautiful and pristine lake
review: We really loved this beautiful lake, the water level was less ( not like it used to be 10 years back ) but really picturesque and pretty. The whole market is around the lake and you can spend lot of  time shopping and eating out here. A perfect place to spend a afternoon/ evening

title: It was good.
review: It was a pleasant atmosphere. But the thing is they have clubs and every boat rider rides in their particular zone, otherwise, it was good.

title: A Bowl with Water
review: Nainital Lake is surrounded by hills and man made structures on these hills, beautiful place, always crowded with North Indian Tourist, no off season for this place because of lively crowd. Worth going repeatedly.

title: Most Important Lake; Go for Boating
review: This lake is in the heart of nainital city; you must go for boating. Naina devi Temple and Mall road are side by Naini Lake. You can take a round view of whole city while boating.

title: A fabulous family vacation
review: Wanna visit hill station in summer vacation chose nainital.  One of the best place to visit in inida.  Now for nainital lake me and my family had taken a Boat ride that doesn't cost too much it's just 200-250ruppees we had a great time. You    will see the nature buety in its untouched condition. The clouds touching tge mountains (hills)  were an amazing view.

title: Beautiful and clean
review: Nainital Lake is the biggest one among all Nainital lakes. It is situated in middle of the city but still is a very clean and beautiful. This lake is surrounded by Thandi Sadak on one side and mall road at other side. I recommend to walk on both. Boating activity is owned by government, so you can do it at a very cheap price. But the experience is priceless.

title: Dont Think Twice, Go for Boating
review: Nainital Take is situated beside Mall road and surrounded by hills. Boating in it just cost Rs. 200 - 250 per boat. I must tell its an awesome experience. Dont think twice, just  go for boating.

title: Lake
review: Nice view surrounding Nainital. Boating for 30min cost you around Rs. 210. Rate card maintained by the Govt

title: A Beautiful Place
review: Lake is very beautiful.

title: Beautiful at Night
review: We reached Nainital at around 8 PM, parked our call ad went for a walk on the Mall road. How beautiful it is at night with all those lights. Almost breath-taking. IT was still cold there in 3rd week of Feb.

title: Beautiful but not maintained
review: I request Uttarakhand Govt and Tourism department to keep Nainital lake clean and Green..all we see is plastics,wrappers. When people will get educated god knows but we should not affect our nature

title: Its worth a visit
review: Generally, you find lakes in most hill stations - Ooty, Kodaikanal, etc. But this Naini lake is little different. The sights of the lake at night and the sights from a height (There are certain points up in the hills classified as Lake View Points) are really majestic. Not only boating, just a stroll on the adjacent Mall road or sitting on the Mall road situated eateries and sipping a cuppa gives a very good feeling. You will hear the words Tallital & Mallital. So don't get confused. It is just Lower end of the lake(TalliTal) and upper end of the lake (MalliTal). It is a welcome break from the din & bustle of city life. Most importantly, the urbanization seems to be not there in Nainital. So i like it very much.

title: Boating paradise
review: A place for boating, very neat and clean lake. Go for boating and enjoy weather. It is more advisable to go in evening time.

title: Serene Beauty
review: First natural lake i seen in life having silent water flow and enjoyed boating...

title: Dry even during winters
review: The lake had some stunning views of tue mountains. But the lake itself was very dry even during the winters. The water had receded and rocks were visible which were once submerged. The lake was very dirty too.

title: Wow, What a view!!
review: Breathtakingly beautiful lake, extremely clean. Epitome fo natural beauty. Right in the middle of multiple attractions. Shop at mall road or Bara bazar and boat at the Naini lake and enjoy the tranquility.

title: Loosing its charm
review: The lake is not as pristine as it used to be and the walk ways, markets and traffic around it seems to be killing the entire experience.

title: lake for perfect boating
review: Perfect Boating Experience with good views of Nainital mall road mountains. you can enjoy boating at the cost of INR 210 per boat and INR 160 for pedal boat.

title: Lake
review: Perfect place for a outing with family charges 210 full round and 160 for half round.clean water to enjoy

title: Most popular attraction in nainital
review: Clean water..cold wind and boating at twilight takes you to another world.

title: Entertainment
review: The lake was so beautiful.and i wish that we will visit it again to see its beauty.really its so nice.

title: awsum
review: Too good.naini lake is beside the mall road.Having view of naini lake while walking on mall road is a awsum experience.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Beautiful lake with Mall Road on one side. Its view from the rope way is very nice as well as the view from top of the mountain

title: Neat and clean well managed small lake
review: Visited on a Sunday all alone. Visited nainital lake in a boat ride, all the view points on the hill by a small local also cab who has taken a charge of rupees 700 and paid a darshan in the Nainina Debi temple which is situated in the bank's of lake and also there is a Tibetan market near to the temple. These are the only places available in nainital city.

title: Chandani raat mai nokavihar
review: Having cursed my luck any time i saw that essay topic, i was nostalgic when boating there. The lake has shrunk considerably but the concerted effort to keep it clean and hydrated shows

title: Calm and serene
review: Beautiful well maintained lake in the mid of city.

title: At the heart of the hill-station
review: The lake is big and yields a panoramic view of the surrounding sloping hills. You must go for boating in the lake in the late afternoon to watch the sun set over the hills.

title: Awesome
review: Awesome place must visit with family friends any one a great place to relax ur mind body and soul awesome and really get

title: Beautiiiiifuuuuullll!!!
review: Hi Guys

title: Very nice plaace
review: This is very old lake and has clean water  boating experience with my wife. Was so memorable.and she loved it

title: Pleasant boat ride
review: Boat ride in naini lake gives you a glimpse of nainital. Pleasant during evenings but also can get very crowded.The boat ride is bit costly. Few hotels offer yacht rides. Do inquire at front desk. Overall a pleasant experience

title: The heart of Nainital
review: Nainital is the lifeline of Nainital. Enjoy boating in the lake that cost INR 210 for one full round of the lake, though it is never full. The lake is very clean and give a good view of the town.

title: A Nice time spend in evening
review: Nice time paased in boating.

title: New Year celebrations at Nainital
review: Enjoyed our stay in Nainital during new year.. Good Mall Road , Nice decorations on the street..Visited Machan restaurant..

title: Romantic boat ride in Nainital
review: This place is so full of romance, nature, serenity and surroundings. The water is amazing and the boat ride gives you feeling of Dal Lake in Srinagar. If you are in city, it's a must visit and one should do boating with bae and ensure to relive their romance in that 20 minutes boat ride. It's amazing that the river was so clean and green. It offers you amazing view of city and its locales. It's equally amazing if you visit post sun set or in day light. The boating stops at around 4 pm.

title: Trip that worths it
review: Visited in April, we had a chance to enjoy this place with nice weather and temperature. It is obvious that Nainital is very popular for Indian people as well as for visitors. Trip to Nainital was long - mountain ride by car but with beautiful views. Going higher than lake you have a chance to see Himalayas but in certain part of the year and weather...

title: Good place to visit
review: It was a niceand short journey but the only issue we had was the weather.it was extremely hot even for February.The place can have some shades above seating area

title: Calm and Beautiful
review: This is one place which is always crowded in Nainital. A very beautiful and well maintained lake. Initially we were hesitant of going for a boat ride but then thought "If you dont take a boat ride in Nainital then whats the use of coming to this place?".

title: Best Place @ Nainital
review: in three days we visited almost every day and did boating twice. have no words to describe the feelings which you felt by surrounding of great atmosphere.

title: Main attraction of Nainital
review: Lots of tourist visit just to see and do boating in the famous lake. Life jacket necessary for boating & is provided by boat owner. Price of boating are fixed and run by local authorities.

title: Amazing View, Perhaps One of its Kind in the world
review: Beautiful natural lake, just relaxes you, boating idly in the late in the mornings and evenings is just a memory worth it. Clean surroundings, surrounded by Naina Devi and Pashan Devi Mandirs is just breath taking...

title: One of the most beautiful lakes in the world
review: Surrounded by green forested mountains this is one of the loveliest of lakes not just in India but the world. Located in the center of Nainital town it has numerous hotels to choose for a stay. A boat ride with a boat available in the flats is a heavenly experience.

title: A MUST VISIT PLACE IN NAINITAL ALONG THE MALL ROAD.
review: Serene atmosphere.Visited on two cosequitive days. 1st day was cloudy and raining. nest day was sunny. So got double enjoyment.

title: Well maintained lake
review: Very good and peaceful place (especially in off season). The positive part of this lake is it's clean and clear water and surrounding (special focus by Govt).

title: amazing place
review: no words to explain the beauty of the lake, amazing view from every  where, very refreshing cool breeze make the day like anything....stunning beauty of nature...loved it

title: Memorable Boat Ride
review: You just cannot afford to miss "A Nainital Boat Ride" while you are in Nainital. Its a great view of Nainital.

title: Naini lake is breathtakingly beautiful :-)
review: The lake is awesome.One can spend an entire day just raoming around the lake soaking the nature.

title: Nature at its best..
review: A beautiful natural mango shaped lake surrounded by mountains. Lake when full after rains is at its best offers lush green surrounding and beautiful panoramic view. I only expect local authorities to work to beautify the surroundings and desilting the lake. Boat rides (pedal and rowing) both very interesting and enjoyable....

title: Boat ride perfect lake
review: I am not too fond of over-crowded, commercialised areas so I don't rate this place very high. If you want the lake to set the backdrop for your pictures, and nothing more... great place. If you prefer a more 'self-meditative' sort of natural setting - Garudtal (on way to sattal) is perfect. Nainital is a shopping haven of trinkets. My favourite aspect of the lake was the boat ride and eating paranthas at Panditji dhaba. Scrumptious!

title: eye catching spot
review: The place was very nice to have a visit with family. One can enjoy boating in the lake. Lake is situated between the city and is good place for hangout with friends and family.You can find lots of hotel and guest house as per your need with lake view rooms. I must suggest this place to all.

title: Fun
review: One of beat thing that we could watch in Nainital is the Naini lake.The lake is wide enough and boating facility is also been provided.

title: Beautiful and enjoyably
review: Nice to enjoy the boat ride. It was very nice to see the hill . the lake is between two hill. We enjoy 1 hour boat ride with my friends.

title: Charming lake
review: We spent time sitting and watching the people sailing.

title: Lake with an awesome view
review: When we visited it was raining. Hence the boating was unavailable. However you can click some good photos along the lake. The lakeside area has been developed pretty good. There was no litter around the lake. The boating rates are fixed. The mall road runs along the lake and it is fully commercialized with restaurants, hotels and cafes situated on the road giving a mesmerizing view of the lake.

title: A good for climate lovers
review: A very good place for climate lovers and for snowfall.

title: nice lake
review: lake is good. but nothing different. it is like other lakes only. nanital is too near to delhi. thus too crowded place. if you are going for peace and staying near lake. your purpose will not solve.

title: Nainital
review: Nainital : It is believed that the Naini Lake is one of the 64 Shakti Peeths, or religious sites where parts of the charred body of Sati (Parvati) fell on earth while being carried by Lord Shiva.The spot where Sati’s eyes (or Nain) fell, came to be called Nain-tal or lake of the eye. The goddess Shakti is worshipped at the Naina Devi Temple on the north shore of the present day lake.

title: Serene and pretty
review: Everything that you expect a lake to be. Surrounded by hills make it look so beautiful all day long. Sit by the side of the lake, enjoy the view, try boating, walk on mall road that runs parallel to the lake, enjoy small eateries on mall road. All in all, a perfect place to spend the weekend with family.

title: Nice view of lake
review: Its a good view of the lake from top of the town. You can also enjoy the boating here surrounding by the local market.

title: Beautiful time
review: This is the most beautiful place in nainital.The best thing of this place is boating specially in evening time you will feel freshed, calm and completly peaceful.Cloud of this lake is awesome.We all friends enjoyed a lot here.Every one should visit here.

title: Natural Beauty
review: The late looks very beautiful all round. The water is pretty clean and there is boating activities available also there is mall round surrounding to it incase you like street shopping.

title: Amazing View
review: Wow!!! Loved the view from the lake it is simply amazing and giving refreshment in mind and the view it is simply amazing

title: Nice view
review: It is the most popular destination amongst people who visits Nainital .Its open for all age of people and you can enjoy 2 rides there long and short,  it's pocket friendly also.

title: Pretty Lake
review: You can guy walk around the lake. The government has put in money to get extra air into the water and to are not allowed to fish the lake, there is huge fish in the water due to this. If you can avoid the road as one side has a very wide path and there were locals picking up litter. Brings you out by the Tibetan market.

title: A treat for the eyes
review: We spent a considerable time near the lake on the 24th evening and the music, dance, celebration was mesmerizing!

title: Can't miss if you are in Nainital
review: Nice lake in Nainital also you get here horse ride a excellent boat ride you enjoyed boat ride very much only here not every where

title: titanic pose can be practiced here
review: the visual highlight of nainital is the lake at its centre

title: Pristine lake-view
review: The lake is set amidst the lush green landscape -- boating facilities are available or you could stroll around. We visited Nainital from nearby Corbett -- was a wonderful stay.

title: Beautiful view of Valley-Lake combination!
review: One of the best places of attraction in Uttarakhand. Best time to visit is in Spring and Summer. There are many nearby places to visit as well.

title: Best mall road in north indian hill station
review: The best scenic lake and place in nanitaal. Boating options also available. Good market area and just beautiful view.

title: Relaxing...
review: This is one of the most beautiful placees I have seen in my life.. Boating is the best thing here. there is market near by.

title: Nice and clean lake; very well maintained
review: This lake is the lifeline of the city and has been maintained very well. A boat ride in the evening provides spectacular view of the surroundings. A must visit for a nainital trip!

title: Mesmerizing view and astonishingly clean and beautiful
review: Well this lake is the lifeline of nainital anad is the only reason that makes nainital different from any other hill station. A relaxing and calm boating scession at the evening after a tiring day is all you need. you can even start a day with the paddle boat.

title: Gem of nainital
review: beauty.

title: Best lake !
review: Whenever I go near nainital I make it a point to go for boating there. The best thing about this lake is the clouds which is awesome ! And I think they are there around the year. It is amazing to do boating in the clouds M

title: Beautiful lake
review: Wow....amazing to visit Nainital lake,just walk around along with Lake on Mall Road n night vision,i think one can not forget in whole life

title: A NATURAL BEAUTY
review: A wonderful lake and boating is a must to enjoy the beauty of this lake. Neat and very clean with hand rowing boats and we enjoyed the boating in Naini Lake. The location is fantastic and I feel one must visit Nainital to enjoy the natural beauty of this place. We have a wonderful Naini temple, Gurudwara, Mosque and Church near the lake.

title: Peaceful experience
review: we went there in April 2016. the lake has adjoining a temple, a mosque, a movie theatre, a kind of hong kong market. The boat rides are affordable and they do it for half n hour or one hour.

title: Awesome mango lake from top
review: I was visiting this place for the first time and it attracted me a lot. The awesome Mango view of the lake from top and snow covered Himalayas ranges at far side provides more awesome view then ever. The cold weather and the spring water from lake looks beautiful. The market is also attractive.

title: The eye of Nainital, beautiful lake & Thandi Sadak.
review: If you are lucky to get an accommodation  that overlooks this beautiful lake, you can keep watching it all day ! The Lake Authorities of Nainital is doing an outstanding job of keeping it clean. The lake is accessible round the year, boating is fun here. To get the best experience of the lake, walk around the banks of the lake , relaxed.  Also, Nainital and the areas around the lake, particularly the Mall Road is very safe for the young honeymoon couples and other young men and women; even late nights. If there's a way to measure the index of romantic feelings aroused by a lake, the ever beautiful Naini will be one of the top 10 in India !! Don't miss the Thadi Sadak walk, absolutely wonderful.

title: Awesome
review: Near to Mall Road, Fixed price for Boating, Good View,

title: Superb lake
review: very cold hear we go for boat ride weather change any time but good experience in lake we enjoy hear..

title: Winter bliss and summer delight!
review: Recently visited nainital after a gap of 2-3 years and found the naini lake water much clearer than it used to be! Must compliment the local authorities for this and hope they continue to maintain this beautiful lake surrounded by hills ! Boating is a must followed by a leisurely stroll on the mall road by the lake. There are ample cafes/ restaurants and shopping to spend some good time in nainital. There are a few car parkings nearby, and the vehicle flow is managed well on the mall road.

title: Beauty lies here
review: The lake is the main attractive with boat riding. The lake can be seen from the Rope .The night view is excellent.

title: Amazing as usual
review: The weather is awesome cool breeze with sunny day takes out all your stress. The way clouds embrace valley is mesmerising

title: "Lovely Lake"
review: Do boating in this nice lake was a beautiful experience! You can spend relaxed moments with family and enjoy the cool breeze of Nainital!

title: A nice place to visit with your family or friends
review: I visited Nainital last Dec with a friend who happens to be a local. Nainital is an awesome place to spend couple of days with your family or friends. During Off season hotels are cheap, I got good bargain in Dec even when there was a fest between 25 DEC yo 31st Dec and I had booked hotel in 24th. During peak season though it may cost more.

title: A soothing sight
review: The lake is extremely calm and beautiful. Boating is a common scene. The boating trips are very smooth. Fog is present in the early morning and in the afternoon. Water is clean and well maintained. Overall, its a beautiful experience.

title: Enchanting
review: It has history of thousands of years that mata eye has fallen on the ground and the lake it self has shape of eye , it has boating , restaurants , cultural avtivity and picnic spot.

title: This is very beautiful lake
review: a must experience if you visit nainital, you can do boating, sit and enjoy the cool breeze, mall road is very near. can also go shopping there

title: The first thing you want to see in Nainital!
review: Boating in the lake will keep you thrilled. The name of the lake is Naini because of it being eye(Nain) shaped. Our boatman told us that it was nearly 120ft deep and still deeper at the center. He took us half of the way and then turned the boat around, it was drizzling at that time, he gave us plastic sheets to cover ourselves. I must admit that I was a little bit afraid though I was wearing life jacket! Nevertheless, we enjoyed like anything there. I would recommend to take boats from the side of Goddess Naina Devi temple.

title: A Serene Beauty !!
review: This time around I stayed at a location (Nainital Willows) which was at a certain height that in turn provided me a Picturesque view of the lake from the top. Experience was enthralling watching the sun dawn on the lake and the golden glitter that it produces..

title: The Beauty of this place lies in this very lake
review: As soon as the day starts the lake will be busy with lot of tourists enjoying the boating in this lake and viewing the mall road on one side and the steep hill on the other side. There are lot of boats to choose from and you can spend good 30 to 45 mins boating here enjoying the beautiful views and mountains on the opposite sides.

title: Good Secenrice View from the Lake
review: Nainital Lake is situate on the Mall Road A person can do the boating and many tourist place is near by. Like Zoo and rope way.

title: nice large lake
review: lake is quite big for a 1 hr paddle boat ride.views along the perimeter of the lake are photo worthy.water was quite clean.

title: Nainital with the family
review: Naini lake is a delight even though it is packed with tourist and the hustle bustle of the mall .. There is a sense of ease like many other hill stations

title: Pictursque Scenery
review: A wonderful place to spend relaxed moments - whether boating across or walking by the lake. Surrounded by hills and thick forests, this is a place in serene surroundings and pleasurable calm.

title: B'ful lake in mountains
review: Place is good for one time visit. lake is between the mountains & th main attraction of nainital.  There is mall road on one side of lake & Thandi road on other side. Mall road is a crowded area. one can boating in the lake to enjoy the scenic beauty. charges were rs 200 per boat.

title: Don't get fooled by half and full circles
review: The half and full circles, they say on the boating ride is not actually half or full circles of the Nainital Lake. Every boating contractor has a designated space and a full circle, only includes the region of the lake for which they have obtained permit.

title: Good romantic quiet place in middle of the town.
review: Look for an accommodation in front of the lake and it gives different views of nature at different times of the day. Mornings the lake is emitting vapour, reflecting the sun during the day and multi-colored boats lingering on surface, in the evenings the lights on the sides and the temple, market make it glow. Good place to take a boat ride, paddle / row.

title: Beautiful lake with clean water
review: If you are visiting Nanital, then this is a must visit. Boating is available from both ends of lake(Malital and Talital). The boat ride will take 30 mins. Water is too clean. A boat ride in evening is recommended.

title: Lazy boat ride
review: Great view. Nice pedal boat activity. You get 1 full hour which can be tiring. overall a must do activity

title: nice place
review: boating was good, the view around the lake was amazing. pedal boat is better than row boat. walk around the lake is nice

title: Good place
review: Nice and clean place. Boats are clean and well maintained. Price is also not very high. You can book and boat ride across the lake for 135 rupees only.

title: The place which took my heart away
review: Nainital is one of the most romantic and sought out hill station in India. Unlike some other hill stations there are signs of maintenance is visible. The mall road still have that heritage feel there. Though too much of commercialisation around. However the lake which is lifeline for locals through tourism is extremely well maintained. No throwing litters allowed inside lake or even fishing. This has helped to preserve eco system.

title: Too much crowded
review: Nanital has become so popular these days, it attracts lots of tourist which makes is so crowded that you actually cant enjoy the nature. I was practically unable to find a place to park my car in the whole town so after trying for 4 hours i found going to Jim Corbett was more worthy option than staying in Nanital.

title: Beautiful Nainital
review: Beautiful and romantic hill station. This place is famous for the beautiful Naini lake.Great place for holidaying.

title: Awesome nainital lake
review: the lake is great and the boating too. The mall road. But take care when you are buying Chinese woolens thinking them to be uttarkhand specials.

title: It is the Main Charm of Nainital
review: Be there , Take Pictures, Do Boating , Enjoy Around, but don't waste time while hiring cabs offering full view of Nainital in 3 Hours . It will be Waste of Money Only.

title: It's a beautiful lake !!!
review: Was initially reluctant to go boating but did so on insistence of my 4 year old kid. It turned out to be awesome experience with whole family in one boat sailing over big lake surrounded by beautiful site and hills. It was quite cold and windy but a very good experience.

title: Simply Amazing....
review: Awesome...Awesome.... natural beauty with amazing atmosphere with all around hills and valley must do boating here to experience which give you feels

title: Uttarakhand
review: Lovely clean place. Lovely weather. Boating around d serene picturesque  surrounding was beautiful. People  are v friendly.

title: Nainilake
review: One should must view and do boating in lake will give you immense view to mountains and culture of nainital

title: A Clear Lake surrounded by beautiful mountains
review: A boat ride on the Nainital lake is a must for anyone who visits Nainital. A row boat could be hired for 100-200 rupees for 30 minutes. The rates are fixed and very reasonable.

title: Awesome Place
review: Main attraction of place is lake. Well maintained surroundings. Boat riding is fixed rate. Had to wear life jackets. Feel the cool breeze while boating

title: Beautifull Lake
review: One of best lakes ! serene , clean and picturesque. Boating is availaible at Rs 210 per boat (max 4 pple )  for full round . Recommended time is noon during winters and before 3 pm.

title: Beautiful
review: Peaceful n calm nainital love to stay there specially in rainy season n summers. Beautiful place for quality time.

title: Boating Available
review: This lake is the main high light of this place Nainital, Naini Lake it's a very big lake, neat and clean water, here you can do boating with the attaindent or you can hire paddle boat also, a big round for 30 minutes cost Rs 210/- all inclusive, people visiting Nainital do make it a point to visit this place, as this is the main attraction of this hill station..

title: Beautiful lake with pollution free
review: This lake is beautifully maintained with recycling plants. Large fishes are a beauty to watch. Afternoon boat ride is suggested

title: Nice and Tranquil
review: Very Clean lake with excellent options for boating. They are constantly airing the lake to maintain it

title: nice view
review: good place to visit ..

title: Enjoyed boating here
review: The nainital lake is quite big. We enjoyed boating in the lake twice during our stay in nainital. As rates are fixed by the authorities, you don't need to bargain here. On one side, there is mall road while on the other, the road is called thandi sadak. Our experience was quite memorable.

title: Away from the Madding Crowd - The Calm Lakes of Nainital
review: This beautiful lake appears in every calendar, posters or postcards from my childhood days and has always been on my dream list, so when I reached Nainital, it was hard to stop myself from rushing towards this lake. Yes, I was on my way for a boating trip on this beautiful lake which is shaped like an eye. The lake is surrounded by mountains and makes a picturesque location. The warm sunshine and the cool breeze from the lake made my experience a memorable one. It was comfortable and felt like living in a dream. The beauty of the lake with boats and their colorful sails will make you want to become a painter, but not all are blessed with such fine skills so I decide to simply enjoy the boating and soak in all the beauty of the place. The best experience was to drift in the clouds - the banks are crowded but the place is serene. When you are in the deep waters you can also see a lot of fish - a fun experience for children. to sum up a divine experience.

title: Fun being a tourist, especially in non-peak season and enjoying a boat ride
review: We decided to take a day-trip to Nainital, as we were staying in Jim Corbett. One of my primary motive was to enjoy the boat ride in the famous Naini lake and I was not disappointed. It was offcourse touristy - with the boat-fellas trying to lure you. As our boat fellow said - in summer, tourists line up to them and in winter, they chase us :) We took an hour ride at a very reasonable rate. The lake is clean (yes surprised). We spotted some beautiful pair of bird perched on the lake.

title: Excellent
review: Excellent boat ride. One of the best ever. We thoroughly enjoyed the scenic view. Feels paradise at your own reach.

title: Best boating experience
review: Naini lake is an asset of Nainital. It provides the best boating experience in all seasons at all times. The rates for boating are reasonable. It gives immense pleasure, peace and serenity while boating in the big Naini lake. It is an ecstatic feeling.

title: great place
review: Good chill out place for couples , family. one can enjoy the lake view while roaming at mall road...

title: Good & peaceful during non season
review: Non season is the best time to go. Its peaceful. Even the ticket counter is well organised. Little harassment from boat people approaching but at least you do not need to negotiate.

title: Peaceful Location
review: Good place to visit when travelling in India for a break from the crowds and traffic.  It was a little cold in the Evening but was pleasant in the sun during the day.

title: Nice place
review: Boating in Naini Lake is major attraction in Nainital. Boat riding is around 20-25 minutes long and good time pass.

title: Holiday at Lake
review: It was one of the best visits in Uttarakhand. With my wife had a wonderful time. We could also witness a rafting competition too.

title: Awesome place to rejuvenate
review: I visited Nainital at the end of Oct'16, during Diwali vacation. It's a awesome place. Must visit place in north India.

title: The only sight worth seeing!
review: Of all the places in nainital, we visited Nainital lake was the most serene calm and soothing. Can easily skip all other tourist spots in the city and spend an entire day sipping hot chocolate staring at this beauty.

title: Heavenly, pristine, mesmerising....
review: One of the most beautiful lake you'll ever see, I went in the winter season, the place was quaint and peaceful the scenery was breathtaking and fabulous.

title: must visit place during your nainital visit
review: awesome place to visit, natural beauty, very old natural lake,

title: most clean lake at center location
review: its lovely to walk around in morning, evening or in moon night. you will always remember the moment in your life. boating is also nice experience.

title: Scenic view
review: Boating in chilling winters in naini lake was one of my best experiences. Standing aside the lake during evening and watching the light reflections in water and naini temple was mesmerising.

title: heaven on earth
review: nainital lake is like other lakes in hill station however one should take boat ride for sure in evening or whenever there is sun shining as it is risky to ride boat during when weather is not fine. There are many hotels and complete market along with the naini lake.

title: Lake having Historical Significance
review: The Nainital is named after this lake.This beautiful,stagnant pool of water in the heart of the city,is surrounded by seven majestic mountains.You can enjoy row boating as well as paddle boating here.

title: Fantastic
review: Boating in chilling weather is altogether different experience. Lake gives all different scenic views. We really enjoyed

title: Relaxing
review: Lake Naini is a picturesque blue green lake located right in the heart of the city. A natural freshwater lake, it stretches over 3.5 km and offers captivating scenic views especially during sun rise and sunset when the lake’s water carries impressions of the bright crimson and vermilion colored sky. The southern side of the lake has a beautiful view of the town and is more peaceful.

title: lovely lake - gem of Nainital
review: it was amazing night view of the lake and houses along the hills on lakeside- in the morning  boat ride was worth to explore beauty of this lake.  a mesmerizing experience..

title: Simply exquisite !!
review: Had a beautiful boat ride in the evening. Our boatman Mr Inder was so sweet, took awesome photos of us from all angles of the lake. Thank you Mr Inder for such a lovely time.

title: Nanital the beauty
review: This lake is in the middle of town. Its real fun in boating here. Nanidevi mandir is next to it. Beautiful view all around of mall road. Boating is must!!!

title: Gorgeous mountain lake and natural beauty
review: High high up in the hills a whole lakeside town is nestled.

title: Good sight seeing and peaceful boating experience
review: Went in Nov, 2016 on office trip. Its walking distance from all major hotels. We had pass from our hotel booking so this worked well for us. It was 40 mts boat ride with person roaring the same. Its mild sea but really deep.

title: Feeling refresh
review: The nainital is lake city, same thing 9 lake city adds jewel on the city a best panoramic view in night time, city is based on mountains view of the houses is charming, love this lake, really nice place to visit.

title: Beautiful n Serene
review: The nainital lake was really beautiful. Our hotel was right in front of the lake and we had a lake view room so it was really beautiful. Make sure to take a lake view room if going to hotel. The lake was very clean and the boata were in great condition.

title: Naini,  the all pretty lake !
review: This beautiful lake on the foothills of Himalayas is the centrepiece of Nainital. A walk around the lake or boating through the lake are both rejuvenating. Naina Devi Temple ,  Jama Masjid, Gurdwara and Methodist Church are all nearby.  Hotels, Restaurants and Shops are all around the lake. The cable car to the snow view point gives a spectacular view of the lake from above.

title: One time visit.
review: Not good experience for me. I just liked one early morning walk around lake, little shopping, monos and boating. It has no test of hill station now. Crowded place all the time.

title: Charming
review: I can never have enough of this place. Have been to this place more than 20 times.

title: Boating experience in Nainital lake
review: Good experience with a friendly boatman, affordable break. Add to that purchase of warm woolen wear available around the lake, with fried corn cob to eat - that's Nainital experience

title: Scenic
review: This lake is the reason behind Nainital being one of the most beautiful Hill-Stations in India. Plenty of boating options are available.

title: Mango shape lake.....
review: Amazing place near to delhi 350 kms only, too many indian tourists are there. Good for all ages. Boating is there to entertain and shikara boat is there for rides. We have done 4-5 times boating its too good.

title: Boot Ride
review: Would cost you about 210 for 4 and 160 for 2 however the 160 is a paddle boat and may want to avoid it.

title: serene lake
review: nainital lake like any other lake at hill stations is very calm and serene. worth taking a boat ride in the evening.

title: beautiful view
review: shopping next to nainital is very affordable and fun..great food and you can go for sky views in cable car

title: Very nice lake surround by a city
review: Nainital is a very nice looking lake inside a city in the Himalayan mountain. Mall road is very nice to enjoy. One can pass entire day just by roaming around the city. From here one can do local sightseeing which includes temples, lakes, cave, view point etc. One can have experience of zoo in the Himalaya also. Zoo is very near to the Mall road. Zoo shuttle service is there for transportation to zoo. One can hire a bike for roaming around too. The adjacent to the lake there is a huge play ground, a gurudwara, a mosque and obviously Naina Devi Temple(The lake is named after this temple). The adjacent market to the lake is also very good for the travelers to buy memento(Candle) of Nainital. There is boating facility on the lake too. There is a rope way from which one can enjoy the beauty of the city from birds eye view.

title: Family trip to Nainital
review: A very much perfect trip to spend with family and also with family. Cool breeze in the days nd in night the temp as low as 12-13. If u can manage to reach here by 11am then 1 night stay will be enough. There are few points to see which u can cover in 3-4hrs.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: A wonderful trip of boating in beautiful, very cleaned lake one of 7 tal of Nainital ,surrounded by hills,beautiful nature.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Very beautiful lake.the Beauty was around evening time.romantic place.. you can so boating.good place to visit

title: Beautiful lake
review: A really beautiful lake. Loved the sail boat. Charges are 500 per boat for half an hour trip. You need to maintain balance as it tilts a lot. The normal boat charges around 210 per boat, take up to 4 people. Self paddle boats are also available. The sail boat is fun but it does not go till the very end of the lake. Scenes are beautiful. This is the main attraction of this beautiful town.

title: very silent & peaceful
review: it  quite big , there are boat and sail boat rides to be enjoyed in this lake. couples can go on a romatic boat ride.

title: Nainital lake
review: Nainital lake is a beautiful lake...Boating is a must do experience in the lake.. Mountains looks beautiful from the lake..

title: A BEAUTIFUL NATURAL LAKE
review: Boating in this lake is a must do activity when you visit nainital. The lake is divided in two parts Tallital and Mallital. bothe are surrounded by green mountains. The lake is properly maintained by the local authority. The lake looks always beautiful whether it is daytime or night. The floating of colorful boats or the beautiful swans or  the golden fishes...... In one word it's amazing

title: Must Visit
review: Had a great time at Nainital Lake. Boating was fun. The whole vibe is great. Enjoy the beauty of nature.

title: Lake that never disappoints
review: A well maintained lake at affordable prices. The view offered on the boat ride were pleasant and fulfilling. The boat ride lasted 30 minutes and gave an all round view of the city.

title: Fantastic lake and very beautiful city view
review: If you visit Nainital then you should visit this lake. The  boating experience the evening is memorable one. I visited during the Diwali time so evening time was best to experience lighting on   roofs of houses contructed on the hill. . Great place

title: great views.
review: There are some great photo opportunities if you go when it's not crowded. but everything is overpriced there.

title: Spectacular lake
review: Beautiful city surrounded by the city offer spectacular view. It has a temple on one the shore of the lake.and all hotels and eatery on the other side.must visit

title: nice place to stay for two  days
review: its rally good to walk in mall road, but still traffic is horrible and  many cars and bikes on road, lovely climate, good place to relax, all sight seeing is useless and not worth, its better to stay and  walk around mall road, do boatng and  enjoy the vacation

title: Beauty at its best
review: It is always a great experience to get into the lap of nature. For long I had been wishing to see Naini Lake and this time I was fortunate to feel the real treat of the nature. I was a bit scared of the small boats, especially with my small kids. But soon the fear was overridden by the beauty of the place. Can't find the right words to explain my feelings but I wish to experience this again. I suggest, people should prefer the boat with paddles as they look far more safe.

title: Picturesque Lake
review: Water is about 100 to 200 feet deep at certain points. Go Boating or Sailing only if you enjoy this activity. else a walk around the lake is also relaxing

title: Amazing experience, must do at Nainital
review: Boating on the Nainital Lake is an amazing experience and is a definite must do. There are around 5 boarding points and more than 200 boats. Options range from row boats, pedal boats and sail boats. A row boat can take in 4 passengers and 1 boatman and costs 210/- (4 passengers) for a 30 min boat ride. The view and the experience is superb. Boat rides start at around 9.00 AM and the facility remains open till around 5:00 PM.

title: A shadow of the past...
review: The main attraction of the Nainital city is its lake...... but unfortunately due to excessive population and tourist pressure, the scenic beauty of the city because of the calm and serene lake, is now a shadow of the past. Huge environmental pollution is another main reason of the downgrade. Huge traffic jam, jungle of concrete will make you feel down. However, standing at the Naina Temple in the evening and looking at the reflection of the city in the lake will lift your mood.

title: Once visit...
review: Yes this the place you have to vist once you will be there in naintal..

title: Beautiful view
review: A nice place to visit with family. You can go boating or enjoy a nice stroll alongside.The roads are crowded in the evening

title: The mesmerizing view
review: Love at first sight. Yes thats just what one can experience as he drives into Nainital. A serene beauty, the walkways by side of it make it convenient for tourists to enjoy the beauty, boating in the lake is an option hard to resist.

title: Unbelievably clean lake with yatches and boats
review: Surprise pleasent: no motor boats.get birds eye-view from zoo.good thing is every one has to wear life jacket.boatsmen are all intelligent and good conversationalist

title: You feel into the nature!!
review: This was a wonderful experience and the yacht ride was unforgettable. Do ask for the rowing person to let you row for a moment and feel the real fun.

title: The masjid is beautiful
review: The masjid looks so beautiful near the lake. It is an icon ! Landmark! Travelling with 4 kids please bring stroller as there are no rickshaws if you want to head out to the lake side marketplace.

title: Holiday
review: Good view and atmosphere. One have good time staying here and it may not be wrong to say its worth spending money going to nainital.

title: The Most Beautiful lake of Kumaon..............
review: Nainital Lake is the heart of nainital as all the bazaars,hotels are situated in and around the lake . From one end to the other its quite a walk and better take a rickshaw. I saw a Project of oxidizng the lake which is a great endeavour from the Govt.There are lots of places to visit aroun the lake e.g. the Naina Devi Mandir,The Zoo,A cave garden etc. which you can cover in a day's program.You can plan your visits to other places of Kumaon making Nainital as the starting base also.

title: Boating fun
review: Boating is clearly the main attraction here...The rates are clearly mentioned and boatmen charge 210 for a round..The lake is clean and you get great views of Nainital from the boat

title: Nice Lake
review: Big Beautiful lake with green water. good boating experience but boating is not allowed for the entire lake. It is divided by three separate operator and to boat the entire lake you have to ride three times separetly. cost of each ride is Rs. 210.00 and time is approx. 20 Min.

title: Naini Lake
review: It is very beautiful lake there was very enjoyed fill. We were did boating and ate some beautiful fruit like rasbary strawbary and other food. There boating person take care to all customer they wear first water proof and then they do boating it is very good and amazing view there surrounding hotels and very clean place.

title: Chillyyy
review: The view is amazing. We went to the lake at around 3:30 and it was super chilly...  so do carry warm clothes. You can take a long walk along the lake. There are also boating facilities.... so you can enjoy ure time.

title: Gliding over calm Nainital Lake
review: I with my brother visited Nainital this August. Upon arrival the first thing we did was boating by crossing the Naini Lake from Tallital to Mallital the two opposite shores of the Naini Lake. The boatride presented a very picturesque sight watching the tall sailboats and swan paddle boats surfing over the placid green waters of the lake. At the Mallital end of the lake we visited the Naina Devi Temple where devotees throng from morning to evening. |Then just to the left is a gigantic mosque _ the Jama Mosque or the Badi Masjid. Just below the mosque is a large open area The Flats. Here in Nainital is year round Cricket, Football (soccer), Basketball, Field Hockey, and Boxing tournaments upto National level. Occasionally music concerts and cultural events also take place on the premises.After jostling our way through the local and holidaying crowd we headed back on foot via The Mall. Out here you can buy shawls, scarves, cardigans and local jams. You can also buy wooden handicrafts which are good and cheap option for souvenirs. All in all it was an unforgettable experience.

title: In one word, its awesome
review: Naini lake is really a beautiful, very quiet and clean water body. Half an hour of boating in this lake will give you a mesmerising experience. Chilling cold in winter but the best season, I believe, for this.

title: Best Part of City is the Lake and adjoining Mall Road
review: A boat ride in the lake is must for all Nainital Visitors. One can enjoy the serene beauty of the valley from these waters. The sunset is romantic when you visualize it from the lake. Try to take row boat as you can enjoy the beauty of lake rather than straining yourself by peddling the boat.

title: Serene & mesmerizing
review: The lake forms the eye "Naina" of Nainital...all the hustle bustle surrounds it. Yet it has a tranquil quality. It's extremely clean despite the city's tourist crowd. The glistening water draws you in. Boating is a must do. One four seater boat for an hour for 210/ INR is completely worth it. If possible find yourself a hotel with lake view and trip will go down the memory lane.

title: The only Prime Attraction
review: Its the main and probably only prime attraction of Nainital. Nice huge water body with boating facilities. Remains crowded most of the times.

title: Most Beautiful place in India
review: Visited with my friends, to enjoy the city from Delhi. The lake is so beautiful, surrounded by hills and market. Nainital is a best place to visit in rainy season or winter. Nainital is suitable for all kind of tour or tourist,, like family , kids or couple. I never had a chance to explore more

title: Best place
review: Nainital is place of lakes there are many great views and mountains one should once in life should visit here

title: huge lake worth a visit
review: we stayed at Corbett park and visited Nainital for a day. Naini lake is huge and my 5yr old enjoyed the boating here. The lake is surrounded by the typical hill station stuff like hawkers selling roast corn, small tea stalls, dressup photo shops and a little bit pahadi shopping of woollens. You can definitely spend a day out here.

title: Dull and boring lake
review: Quite boring lake

title: Nice Zoo
review: We full enjoy in zoo. Lots of take photos of tiger , leapord, different type of birds bear , deer, jackals... Nice

title: Naini lake
review: It is one of the biggest lake in nainital in the heart of nainital city.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Lake is situated in the heart of the hill station and is quite big. Water is very clear and you can see many fishes swimming in groups

title: insight of nainital lake
review: This a very long lake with lots of garbages at the side of lake.paddle boats are their and a very nice mosque beside it. A very large market parllel to road.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Very big and nice lake. Boating experience was superb. We have to wear life jackets. Rs. 210 are charged for full boat.

title: Very scenic lake nestled in the hills
review: Surrounded by hills on all sides, this lake is very scenic. Boat ride for around 40 mins costs 210 bucks for 3-4 persons

title: The best lake in india
review: The best lake in india. No doubt about it. The water is crystal clear. You can see the fishes near banks.

title: Awesome place
review: It's not unique, but the way local populace and administration has maintained the lake ,it's very commendable. Not something that you see in india. Lake is clean and rate for boating is reasonable. You have to be careful regarding time you are spending during boating as some boatman might quickly go through the ride.

title: A lazy ride
review: The only attraction in this hill station. we took a ride recently in the Naini lake during our recent trip to Nainital during the Dussehra weekend break. While being in a boat on the lake is an  interesting trip, somehow the boat conditions overall leave a lot to be desired

title: Awesome
review: The lake is huge, surrounded by lush green mountains and clouds flying just hundred meter above. The boating people are good and kind, lake water is very much pure, lots of fishes in the lake. The experience is just memorable. Anyone can't describe the experience in words, just be there and feel it. Once you will go in the middle of the lake and take a look around, it's breathtaking.

title: An excellent Lake to enjoy
review: We visited the  lake and temple at Nainital lake. Huge lake he's two ends Talli tal and Malli tal. A boat ride with its blue water with chill and cool breeze is just fascinating. A slow and lazy walk on the opposite bank of the lake is very pleasant.

title: Indias one of the most popular lake
review: Obviously its must visit if you are a travel freak. Try to stay atleast two night to discover its beauty. Silent n deep. Go to lakeside about 8 pm, yes its cold, the silence n calmness will give you lot of understanding about life.

title: heart of Nainital
review: Nainital lake is the heart of activities in Nainital. Do the boating or do the shopping around, this the place to be in Nainital.

title: Always charming
review: Have been coming here since 1971 and seen the waters of the lake go through its ups and downs.  Happy to report the green efforts have restored the lake beautifully.

title: Must visit when in Nainital
review: Nice boating experience and the pleasant weather added to the feel good experience. Situated in the heart of the city, the rates charged are reasonable and one can go the full trip experience. The attitude and behaviour of the boatsman was friendly and warm.

title: Heavenly
review: Chilling clear water a ride will give a heavenly feeling, a must add on experience when ur in Nainital.

title: Good Place to travel with your family
review: A very nice place in Kumau Region (Uttranchal ), rich with natural beauty and soft hearted people. to reach Nainital last Railway station is Kathgodam, you need to book a cab or drive down(will tale 1 Hour ), kindly book your hotel in advance. visit Nainital Lake , walk in Mal Road . Negotiate well if you are shopping from street vendors.

title: the centre of attraction of nainital.. the best lake of all
review: best place for boating and hanging around with family and friends. the only drawback was they have stopped the horse riding around the lake area which was fun for kids

title: heavenly feeling all the time you in boat  in naini lake sirrounding unforgetable felt younger by 15 yrs all the time  a
review: very very memorable trip in boat in lake felt take 1 round more n we took next day if you are only with yr life partner you feel a differnt touch n more young to enjoy trip

title: Peaceful
review: If you are looking for peace then spend some time at the Nainital Lake in the evening hours. You will get what you want.

title: Beautiful!!
review: The lake, surrounded by mountains, is really beautiful. It is the best place to sit and relax any time of day. The boating service here is also good and it will help you to reduce the stress of city life. The Mall Road and temple is nearby lake.

title: Awesome...Best place in Nainital
review: No wonder, this is the best place in Nainital. views are great, boating is fun with 2-3 options specially in good weather, you will have great time.

title: Heavenly
review: Visited nainital multiple times, never miss a chance to visit the lake.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Picturesque location !!

title: Relaxing Experience
review: This place Nainital Lake is such a relaxing experience you forget all your tensions and worries while boating in Naini lake. A beautiful picturesque scene in the middle of the Lake with all round mountains. Nice experience.

title: Don't get Cheated
review: Even though the rates for boating are fixed,  the route taken by dwellers is deliberately small. Please fix the route before boating. Good time is not peak season (may - jul) but oct.

title: Beauty of Nainital
review: It is the Naini Lake which makes Nainital one of the best hill stations to visit in entire Northern India. It is the beauty of Nainital and without it, the place would be a dull place. One must do boating here to enjoy it and view of most happening Mall Road. There are a good number of Hotels on and around Mall Road with Lake View. Being there one can benefit from the view of Nainital Lights mesmerising reflection from the lake water.

title: beautiful lake
review: I love this lake awesome view.. weather and boating so beautiful.. crowd was good. boat owner was tricky they charge us for full lake boat and return back after half so next time I will be more careful. otherwise everything is great

title: Cleanest water you will ever see
review: The lake is beautiful. Government has installed multiple water filters/cleaners which makes the water so clear that you can see scores of fish swimming no matter where you are standing or sitting.

title: EYE CATCHING NANI TAL
review: No words to express joy of looking at Nani Tal. The most beautiful Lake in India. We are visiting since 1975 Nanital and again recently in September 2016. I must congratulate local people for keeping NATURE INTACT surrounding the lake. Beautiful tall trees and other side of the lack is undisturbed.  We highly appreciate the welcome spirit,affection and love of the local people.  We SALUTE

title: Highlight of Nainital
review: Amazing and beautiful lake. Activities for all age groups. You can rent a shikara boat or self pedal boats and enjoy the lake and the views. Sail boat ride also available for adults....

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Beautiful lake in a picturesque surrounding covered by green mountains. The view above the lake is unforgettable. Good location, great place to hang around and eat by the lakeside restaurants. You can go boating but be careful about the promises they make before and show only half the lake. Overall great experience. Lastly, don't forget to spot the shoals of fish swimming across the edges of the lake.

title: Serene
review: This is a nice lake in Nainital for boating..The shape of the lake is a pretty mango shape. The place is highly crowded and commercialized.

title: Beautiful boat ride on Naini Lake
review: The lake is beautiful with different views at different times. we took a boat ride. it was nice. do recommend it.

title: Good and Actual view of Nainital
review: One cannot have a true feel of Nainital unless one rides in a boat on the lake. The price is reasonable at Rs.210/- for a boat, irrespective of whether it is for two or four, and if one opts for an oar-boat, one gets the chatty company of the local boatman. The boats are very safe and all have to wear safety jackets. One can see large fishes in the middle of the lake.

title: Nyc experience
review: The lake is too big and we enjoyed the boating through the lake which was very exciting. We had an excellent trip through the Nainital lake

title: Beautiful and relaxing
review: Great lake . Clean and picturesque . It is surrounded by mountains on three sides. The area is commercialised. Lots of buildings around destroying the beauty of the area. The boating experience is good. It is a must do. The adjacent mall road and ropeway are also nice to spend some time eating And shopping. The rope way usually have waiting so make sure you book beforehand. The whole place is built to cater families with small children and shop frenzied ladies.

title: Truly Heart & Soul of Nainital !
review: We had visited Nainital in the middle of September. The weather was great, in low 20s . We were staying in a Hotel with a view of Naini Lake. Naini Lake very clean and water looked fresh , no smell of any sort and did not see any garbage floating around. In fact it seemed the City Administration is taking a great care of the Lake and local people also supporting and helping the efforts by not throwing the garbage in the Lake. Nainital is Lake District  and has 7 large and beautiful lakes and all are well kept. The Lake has Artificial Circulation System (Aeration & Circulation) which does not allow water to get stagnated and become smelly as it increases supply of dissolved  Oxygen in the Water. Great Place to hang out , walk around the the Lake  and enjoy Boating .Only problem we found was the Traffic on the Mall Road, by the Lake,  where the vehicles were traveling at a crazy speed with lots of Honking.

title: Beauty of nature...!!!
review: The nainital lake is a perfect symbol of nature's beauty, this lake is located in the cusp of nature,  those who want to make love with nature it's a perfect spot, the climate was soo pleasant , we had a cycle ride along the lake, which bought me newer experiences and I really fell in love with nature, 7am to 8am is the best time to visit this lake, the lake is soo fresh... We really had a excellent time in this lake...!!!

title: Like any other lake on a hill station
review: A typical site of a lake with mountains around, houses / constructions on the hills, lots of boats, hawkers at the entrance and a shopping street on the side...

title: Beautiful hill station...
review: Nainital has always been my favourite hill station. The lake adds to the beauty of the city and is the center of attraction. We absolutely love boating there..its my daughters favourite thing in nainital.

title: Spend some calm time boating! Really refreshing.
review: Boating in the Naina Lake  for about 30 Mins is really calm down your mind. Forget all stress in routine life and be a part of you or your family. If you get a good boat driver, he will give some mythological history and present developments related to this lake. Completely artificial oxygen enriched lake and you can see a lot of big fishes around oxygen supply points.
