Need to appreciate the efforts of governing body to maintain the lake so clean and healthy.

title: Awesome lake
review: Boating in the Naini Lake amidst mist was an amazing experience. A walk around the lake was quite enough to relax our minds, watching boats drifting slowly with the pleasant breeze blowing smoothly. Shops on the mall road along the lake gives you good options for shopping and some great food joints.

title: Nainitaal Lake and must do things around it
review: When in Nainitaal, visit to the lake and mall road is a 'must do' thing. You need to park your vehicle in the parking area as parking on the mall road is strictly not allowed. Once there the captivating views of the lake will make you feel calm and one with nature. You can walk along the lake and do some shopping as well along the way. Candles make for a good souvenir. The famous Naina Devi temple is at one corner and you can walk down there. Another attraction on the way is the cable car ride. It is 200 Rupees per person and worth it for the excellent birds eye view of the lake. You should not miss this. The cable car takes you to lake view point, you can spend some time here but not much to do. So overall you can spend relaxed time by the serene lake and do quite a few things walking along the lake. And yes, if you love water sports, there is a lot more that you can do here.

title: Wolrd Heritage Site
review: Naini Lake is the only attraction in Nainital...One plus point its very clean n maintained.......Rs 210/- is the boat charges for complete lake ride and Rs 160/- for half way.

title: Lake is a very beautiful
review: Lake side is awesom and the lake provieds variety of views , boating experience on lake was awesome.

title: A good half an hour
review: This is a must visit in Nainital. However, It is impossible to miss though. I would suggest to walk alongside or boat in early morning or late evening. Sail boat is a must try thing.

title: A natural splendor otherwise marred by human negligence
review: This lake stunned me and evoked memories of Pokhara lake of Nepal. The water is clean and pollution free. The boat ride is safe and highly recommended. 210/- for full round and 150/- for half.

title: Nice calm Water Body
review: It's a big lake nestled between hills on all sides. It offers some breathtaking views. Boating there was a calming experience. A lake side walk on road, locally known as "Thandi Sadak" was a good experience away from the bustle of Mall road.

title: Nainital lake in the night is akin to heaven
review: We went to see Nainital in the evening as we had never seen it in the night time. It was a beautiful sight to behold! Since the tourist season is yet to begin it was peaceful minus the hordes of public whom you have to grapple while walking on the mall. We walked for two hours on the mall. It was a great experience overall.

title: Lake view
review: Nainital lake has an option of boat ride which we obviously went for since there were kids travelling with us..it is a serene lake but in the tourist season we heard a lot of boats will be seen in the lake..so possibly it won't be comparatively calm..and I highly recommend everyone to book hotels only with lake view..since it's a different feeling when you sip a cup of tea or coffee while enjoying the lake view

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Beautiful lake. Boating in it is fun. Do carry some bread to feed some fishes in the lake. Weather is always awesome.

title: Good lake at higher altitude
review: We had an evening to spend at this place & it is simply good to have a stroll around the lake watching the local bazar , handicrafts , temple act

title: Surprisingly clean
review: I was expecting the lake to be dirty and filled with rubbish but it was clean and we had great fun sailing on it.

title: just Amazing
review: good natural lake want to safe from encroachment and keep clean . wonderful feeling after boating wiht family

title: Lake With great views.
review: Small lake in the middle of town.Nice boating and sailing in lake even though small.Good walk around the lake half through town and half next to the mountains but flat.

title: Cool n Calm
review: The lake is obviously the best attention in that areas.

title: Peace and serene
review: Visited lake in mid sep...atmosphere was amazing with cloud all around...small boats are available not very comfortable. ..

title: Delight to the Eyes
review: Must visit. Peaceful place. Mesmerising lake in the middle of town. Nice to boat in lake.Good walk around the lake half through town and half next to the mountains but flat.

title: Excellent Place
review: Best part of Nainital complete city is surrounded to the lake. just looking at the lake will make your soul happy

title: Lake city
review: Altough I visited Naintal so many times. This was a festive time of Nandashtami with full swing to Nainital. Naina and Sunaina Godess festive time make Nainital super beautiful of local culture with people enthusiasm. People must visit Nainital to see this festive time for real attraction of Naina Devi temple.

title: Attraction
review: Naini Lake is the attraction of Nainital and source of survival for several taals around it. A very pleasant experience

title: Nainital nd nainitaal lake
review: Well its i can say its a pride of the Nainital city without which nanital totally fails to describe itself!!!

title: Cool and Calm
review: Nainital lake is a cool and calm place...

title: Awesome boating experience
review: We had a wonderful boating experience in this lake. The view of the mountain was really mind blowing. we enjoyed lot.

title: Cold and pretty
review: We stayed at Nainital the first time we visited. The second time we visited we stayed in Naukuchiatal. This was a few years ago. The place is very beautiful to say the least. Lots of activity for leisure or adventure seekers alike. Must go for a boat ride on the Naintal

title: must visit
review: excellent :) must go if you visit nanital.  so much fun with kids. you can see huge crowd and shopping nearby.

title: We love the experience
review: Nainital trip remains incomplete without boating in Naini lake, you are able to absorb the serene beauty of this place only after entering into this lake. Please do wear life jackets and try to avoid pedal boats if you are with small kids.

title: I love Nainital
review: Nainital is the only place which I am visiting regularly since 2004. I VISITED many hill stations in India but it's my personal favorite.

title: Huge lake and good valley view
review: Its one of the main popular attraction of Naintal. The lake is reasonably well kept though i wonder if the water could be less greenish.

title: Pristine beauty
review: This natural kidney bean shaped lake lies at the heart of Nainital city in Uttarakhand.  This lake was discovered by an Englishman in 1839. The pristine beauty of the place inspired him to start a European settlement around the lake which is today's Nainital. The lake and the city derive their name from goddess Naini. The lake is surrounded by high hills and forest cover. The water of the lake is emerald green in color and very clean. Tourist can enjoy paddle boating in the lake. There is a yacht club near the lake and you can spot yacht with colourful sails which make the entire lake extremely colorful.

title: Nice Clean Lake
review: Lake was clean though there is a scope to improve it further. The boating was quite disciplined. A nice cafe next to the lake will add it to its advantage!!!

title: beautiful place to spend time
review: The lake is so beautiful and so is the place... Nainital is also famous for candles..I got many of them, different shapes, sizes and very affordable..I brought them as gifts for all my friends and I could even get a Frog Candle for my son!!

title: Beautiful
review: It is a beautiful lake. The lake is clean and you can go for boating. We asked the boatwala to sing a song for us. It was so peaceful .

title: Nice place for boating
review: I stayed at Hotel Pavilion for four days , experience was great . Except rope way, boating was the only thing we enjoyed. Very Early morning or evening sitting on the bench beside the lake is awesome experience. But 2 days is enough. I shouldn't compare but it just can't be compared with Darjeeling or Gangtok.

title: lake
review: It has good feeling seeing the lake. Boating can be done. I could not do it as time did not permit. The rates are standardised by Govt. Their is a Boat Club and their rates are different

title: naini lake  memories stay forever...
review: Boating in naini lake makes u fall in luv with Nainital. Full round  costs you around  Rs 210. If you are fond of nature with cool breeze  , make sure to unwind yourself at naini lake

title: Excellent boating experience
review: Boating during clear weather is recommended to get beautiful views of mountains surrounding the Nainital Lake.

title: Boating Experience
review: Just being typical tourists and enjoying a slice of life in the hills. Walking along mall road and picking up candles as souveniours after boating wa sfun.

title: A soothing touch to a generation old lake
review: Having some fond memories to this lake, I come here again and again only to live by the old memories. The heart of Nainital, the lake, is still the very same. The boat guys may be ruining the ordeal by messing around with it, but they should learn to respect their livelihood. So should the tourist. Other than that, the lake is filled with fishes and calmness. The water is 150-200 meters deep and about 1.8 km in length. It takes the mall road in the arms and if the traffic wasn't flowing by its edges, it would have made an awesome lakeside boulevard walk. But alas! people in the higher bureaucracy don't understand how the tourism works! Nonetheless, a worthy visit. take a full round of boat for 210 INR (30 mins) boat ride or 420 INR (60 mins) full round boat ride.

title: Boating & Yachting !
review: We were lucky to have Lovely weather with no rain to do boating and Yachting in this beautiful lake !!

title: Awesome
review: Loved boating and not too costly. One boat can accommodate 4 people. They have 2 types of boat - paddle boat and wooden boat.

title: Dinner by the lakeside
review: A visit to Nainital is incomplete without an evening at the Boat house club need to be a member or a guest temporary membership is also available bar is well stocked but expensive by club standards food so but the lakeside experience in the evening truly remarkable

title: too crowded, maddening crowd
review: Once Beautiful lake of Nainital is too crowded and heavily commercialised. people looking for calm holiday will be highly disappointed.

title: Good Boating experience
review: This is one of the must visits if you are in Nainital

title: Looking like Mango
review: Naini jheel is the best part of Nainital.. It shape look like a Mango... Water of jheel.. And fishes awesome to see

title: Awesome tourist destination
review: Nainital lake is a must visit place of a tourist both Indian as well as foreigners. A beautiful natural view can be watched from the lake which is surrounded by Himalayan ranges.

title: Serene boat trip
review: The lake is beautiful to watch at the foot of the hills. The boat ride was a pleasure in the rain with umbrellas. We were lucky to be able to see some fish jumping out of the water. A counter is present with prices mentioned on the outside. Possibility of getting fleeced is minimum.

title: At the centre of the place after entering the check post
review: Centrally located , after entering nainital . has local attraction .

title: Serene experience
review: Deriving its name from the  Nainadevi temple, its a clean and calm lake that is managed by the locals. For 300 odd bucks they give you a trip halfway into the lake. The boats ply year round though I believe the best experience would be in winter months. The people and jovial and the short ride we took was memorable. The nearby shore has chairs looking upon the lake on which you can rest for a couple of hours in the evening

title: The best thing to do in Nainital
review: - Nainital lake has got its name from the nainadevi temple and Nainital lake. Boating in this clean lake is the best thing you can do in city.

title: Beautiful view
review: Nanital lake is beautiful, however Nanital itself is very crowded even if off season..its best to walk around if you can walk uphills and all. you can also make use of your car but be prepared to face traffic at times. There is boating in this lake, however we didnt opt for it.

title: Amazing lake experience
review: It was a great experience of the lake and listening to its history while capturing beautiful scenes of cloud coming out of trees ducks moving around and hundred of fishes

title: Must visit place in Nainital
review: Go for boat riding in this lake.

title: Pretty lake for a ride
review: We visited here early morning time which is recommended if you want to avoid the crowds -a boat ride here is a nice experience -do the full ride ( half ride also offered ) and enjoy the scenic beauty around the lake . We were there during the rainy season and low clouds and mist make it even prettier .

title: Do boating only if you must
review: Honestly lake side walk or lake side seat for that matter or eating at any lake view restaurant is better than boating at this lake. Best is to hike to tiffin top or naini peak and have a wonderful view from there.

title: Good Lake Experience!!
review: The Naini Lake is a must go during your visit to Nainital. Boating is a good activity for Family and couples there. Try to pilot the boat yourself.

title: No great shakes cleanliness required
review: Such a beautiful lake marred with the pollution near the banks.

title: An icon synonymous with the city ie Nainital.
review: The Lake is the heart of the city named after it ie Nainital- with the goddess Naina Devi showering her blessings from the temple at one end and the streaming tourists entering from the other. In between, a complete world of shops, temples, churches and other heritage buildings thrive that can be best viewed by boating through this lake.

title: Beautiful place to visit with family
review: Really beautiful place to visit with family. But prefer off season to visit, avoid summer times. Food in great variety.

title: Nice lake
review: Nainital is filled with lakes and I was told that it has about 9 lakes on the whole. Of this Nainital lake is the best as it is in the heart of the city. On its banks is the mall road.

title: Extraordinary experience with natural beauty at its best....
review: This was my second visit to nainital and this lake is famous for its serene environment and boating in that divine atmosphere. Surrounded by hills from all the sides this lake is easily approachable and situated at the mall road. Boating in this lake is a must. You can also pay a visit to the divine Naina devi temple nearby and mall road for shopping. Overall an excellent vacation at this place.

title: The main attraction
review: Naini-tal as the name says.. naini lake  is the centre of attraction and most beautiful surroundings. You can enjoy boating, yachting and paddling there too.

title: Lake is a stones throw away.
review: Naini lake, yes it is. The joy of boating or perhaps this is most loved activity in nainital, whether it is a traditional boat or a pedal one. You can't choose to miss.

title: Nanital lake
review: It's beautiful lake with lots of fish and scenic beauty, just loved it. It is a deep lake and is surrounded by hills.

title: very beautiful lake
review: boating in this lake is very nice experience, walking along with the lake side is great, I suggest every visitor to have these experiences

title: mesmerizing
review: nice weather and spectacular view. you can enjoy all the delicacies in the mall road and do some boating in the lake and some shopping.... good gateaway

title: Awsome voat ride and nice view
review: The entire boat ride was very nice . The climate was good. All the surrounding Canaries of mountains was really good

title: Beauty and wellness
review: You can go anytime but must select proper road direction.Must avoid Muradabad-(Rampur to Rudrapur)-Nainital road stretch as it is filled with ponds of water. Take Muradabad-Kashipur-Kaladungi -Nainitaal. It is bit longer but good driveway.

title: Beautiful,Serene
review: We walked the full Mall road, just to enjoy being by the lake.

title: Woh  nanital lake
review: Beautiful scenic and nature gift surround ed by hills all around . Boating is fun in lake. Flock of beautiful ducks can be seen in lake.

title: Awesome view.
review: This lake is situated along with hills.

title: Beautiful lake, disgusting water
review: The lake, no doubt is beautiful but the upkeep is so bad and the water is so filthy with water bottles & crap floating everywhere. Wish the humans had never discovered it at the first place.

title: “Heaven on earth”
review: When I saw first time the Lake, I was soundless. The Beautiful Lake is swirling. Everybody should visit the place once in a life. Real charm of seeing the Full lake is from mountains besides Nainital.

title: Beautiful
review: Beautiful place to visit and very bearable weather for a foreigner not used to Indian heat but the traffic is utterly insane and the road up through the mountains requires considerable nerve (or rather the bonkers other drivers do).

title: Boating while in Nainital
review: while in Nainital, the instant attraction is the Naini lake. Boating with family is joyfull and picturesque. Take your camera, sit in good posture and start boating. Preferably, take boat run by someone else so that you may not feel tired in the mid time. After some snaps put the camera aside and feel the lake and surroundings. After an hour of boating, it refreshes the rider and becomes life long memories part of you..

title: ride across the lake
review: we did have to take the boat across the lack so as to reach the spot where we could take the cable to the top of the hill....our timing was incorrect and were were told that these areas where the sight seeing takes place are best from October to April every year because thats when we get to see the Himalayan peak tops...

title: soothing oasis!
review: very cool esp. even in summer, nandadevi temple, boating, hand made toiletteries and candles, great metal work timepieces shopping.love the walk at mall road

title: Visit to Nainital in May 2015
review: Very good place to visit. The surroundings is to beautiful. Especially in the evening and at night when the market is full pack with almost all the tourist enjoying the beauty of the lake.

title: Naini lake (Mango Lake)
review: It is very beautiful Lake, Boating & other water adventurous activities available.

title: Nainital lake is the beautiful lake.
review: Lots of fun while boating in the Naini lake. One should really do the pedal boating and enjoy the scenic beauty all around.

title: Awsum place
review: It is a beautiful lake  and  boating and water adventures , nice people and ,  all things was fabulous  gud food............

title: Nainital Visit
review: This is surely worth a visit even though you might have visited many  such hill stations and done boating. They usually charge 220 for a one hour self ride. Dont miss it.

title: Heaven in nainital
review: If you visit nainital, do take a boat ride in this lake. If you do that most part of your nainital trip would be done.

title: Great Boating Experience
review: Awesome View with cloudy scene, breathtaking experience along side Mall Road. A Romantic place to be.

title: Best attraction in Nainital
review: Boating in Naini Lake would probably the best thing you will do when visiting Nainital. We went to visit this beautiful lake in the morning, the sunshine was abundant and it was all bright for the first half of the day. We rented a boat for our group of 4pax and went for a nice long ride in the boat and nearly spanned the entire lake. The boat rides are cheap and one only needs to shell about 210/- for an hour. This includes the rent of the life jackets that are provided. However, I am not sure about the quality of the material used therein and won't vouch for their life saving capabilities either. most of the persons renting the boats are professional and honest. There are plenty of places to sit and have a meal by the lake side.

title: First you walk around it, then you boat
review: Take a long leisurely walk around Naini lake and enjoy the views it offers. Then, go for a boating session for a change in perspective. I wish you a great time! :)

title: Beautiful n peaceful
review: The lake view is very beautiful. Boat ride is must. They have small shikara type boats. Mall road is parellal to the lake. One can enjoy the greenery on left side n mall road crowd n shops on right side.

title: Serene beauty
review: Nice for boating. Clean and beautiful

title: Fascinating!!!
review: Nainital Lake is not only the most sought after destination in the entire Nainitial Trip but it also offers an excellent scenic view to complete the panorama. Boating in the lake is a must and enjoy time taking snaps if you are a photography buff. The adjacent market is an added attraction for the shopaholics. There are plenty of places at the roadside with lip-smacking food items if you feel hungry for a quick bite or for a full mean before or after boating in the lake.

title: Boating at its best
review: This is so far one of the best places for boating. the overall experience is excellent. definitely not as compared to Dal lake but now Dal lake is out of reach for most of the travellers. i would say this is next best.

title: Awesome lake
review: I have visited nainital several times and each time I enjoy by doing boating in nainital lake. The pleasant weather is most attractive part of it..

title: Splendid Yet Amazing
review: The Naini lake view was really awesome from the rope way.  Boating in the lake will take you to another world especially when your better half is with you.

title: awesome lake
review: nice view at night times..boating is cool..and closed at night times..round trip cossts u 210rs..for whole boat..half trip is not recommended.

title: nice place to spend time
review: though it's a nice place to spend time, but avoid during noon time as you will get sun burn. next to it is tibet market.

title: Nothing much
review: Activities- Boating

title: mesmerize lake
review: Very clean and green water lake attracts all the visitor who visit Nainital.There are option of doing some types of boating and relaxing on the benches.The lake can been seen from every place of the city,there are lots of fishes in the lake which can be feed by the tourist.catching of fishes and getting down the lake is strictly banned by the local authority.

title: nothing like this must go
review: If you not go to nainital then must go nainital in summer. And first view of nainital lake is un forgot to you. And do boating in lake send your time with nature. Altitude zoo is also other place to go.

title: Well managed, good tourist spot
review: I've been to Nainital city many times in the past, but always saw the lake from the far. This time it was family visit and my daughter insisted to boat in the lake so here we went.

title: Mesmerising and Serene
review: The lake was peaceful way to relax after all the sightseeing. Really enjoyed the calm, gentle waves.

title: Summer trip
review: I had been here in mid June, stayed for 3 days, visit surrounding places namely  bhimtal, mukteshwar etc..stayed at mukteshwar.Nainital lake is superb...the climate was too good enjoyed the trip.it is speechless to comment on the hills view surroundings..one should spent few days here every year..

title: Nice one time visit
review: Boating arrangements are good, govt defined rates and the boatmen are open for longer rides with additional cost. There's another temple (not Naina Devi Temple) at the far end of boating trip, you must negotiate with boatmen (before the start of trip) for a break there. Its a nice visit.

title: Boating
review: Definitely visit this place . Excelent views  . avoid the self paddled boats as you will get tiered easily unless you are a strong built .

title: Enjoy with Family
review: Nainital is most popular hill station ofKumaon region. It is famous for its Naini Lake located at the centre of the town and several other lakes of nearby areas. Cool weather and Himalayan beauty attracts several tourists from all part of the world and particularly from the plan areas of north India during summer seasons. Located at a height of 1938 meter Nainital has its past glory in the form of its heritage buildings of British period.

title: warning , beauty of lake
review: feel good enjoyed boating but worried about  lake cleanliness.visited on 21 july 2016 ,request concerns   to please take care right now otherwise in future we will lost beauty of lake

title: lake looks like mango shape when you are looking from top of the hill
review: it was great fun boating with the friends,nice place to get tension free.if you are going with famely please take some woolen clothes even in summer also.

title: Mango-shaped lake, great views and very relaxing
review: The famous mango-shaped lake of Nainital, Naini lake is an excellent place of getaway. This was right in front of our stay at Nainital and we went there a lot of times. The boating facilities are good, but if you are going on your own in pedal boats please be safe, as there are no guards available. In case of mishaps, the locals are the best hope! We saw many lopsided family pedal boats from which people were about to fall any moment. Safety is your own responsibility.

title: Awsm place !!!!
review: awsm place to enjoy. with friends nd family i have visited hear last month with my frnds ..... nd it was an awsm experience ....!!!!!!!!!

title: amazing view of naini lake
review: amazing experience amazing place awesome people in the hill station nainital .......boating is also good

title: Nainital lake
review: During rainy season it has its own beauty... One can see clouds covering the entire lake.. Visibility almost nil and suddenly when it stops raining you can see beauty of the lake surrounded by all lush green mountains... A cool breeze will make your visit too refreshing... Why not try boat ride.. That's amazing... After enjoying boat ride one must try Maggi n tea from road side stalls... Taste is awesome n matchless... You won't get it in 5 star hotels even..

title: Beutyful Lake
review: naini lack is very beautiful and amazing this is a creation of nature enjoy in lack boating sikara and paidal boat looking so beautiful in night rain session the cloud in down in lake so amazing

title: Awful
review: Over crowded, polluted, exceptionally highly priced for no reason, nothing to explore, very boring...

title: This lake has lost its charm
review: I visited this place 6 years ago and it was better, it has lost the charm now. Best time to stroll around the lake is in evening.

title: awsome lake
review: this was amazing place to visit . we should go there once in year and enjoy our life . it is also peaceful

title: Nice
review: Nice place we have visited the lake and it's really a gift of God to the people of Nanital must visit for everyone

title: Summer vacation
review: Nice lake. With water ride facilities. Mall road surrounding the lake. No vehicles are allowed on this road in the evening.

title: Scenic Lake
review: Nainital lake is scenic but still it needs to be more cleaner. It is very close to Nainital Bus stop and one can walk around the lake with Mall roads and Naini Devi temple around the lake.

title: beautiful Lake
review: The lake itself is beautiful a bit crowded with the occasional hawkers and foodstalls but we had a lovely experience boating . A must do for visitors in Nainital

title: A serene lake
review: Nainital is a very crowded place but the lake provides a very relaxing sight and gives space to the whole area. Greenery all around and a cool place.

title: boating
review: I did boating with family, It was very cheap .

title: Good but crowded
review: Nainital lake has always been the main attraction for people travelling to that region. But it has become more crowded now. To enjoy the hills with peaceful stay, I would suggest people to goto Sattal lake for water activities as its surrounded with more greenery and is a peaceful place.

title: Very nice
review: Nainital is better than shimla as it has got less crowd and u have got too many places near by to visit like bheemtal naukuchia tal saat taal khurpa taal and pangot , u can visit zoo some adventures activities and mall road tibbetin market you should visit this place for sure beat time jan to june and sept to jan

title: Paradise on earth
review: Beautiful city with a lot of character.Hope that travelers don't mess it up more.Places to visit are China peak (but trek there). Snow view and lands end. Get to pangout if you are interested in true natural beauty.You will have a view of the Himalayas. A hill station worth having a good holiday.

title: Beautiful and serene lake
review: Beautiful, serene and scenic lake. Boat trips are good, but getting inside the boats is very tricky. An equally good way to appreciate the lake is to walk along the Mall Road which runs along the length of the lake.

title: Serenity
review: Serenity of lake will bring peace to you. It can be enjoyed more at night when there is silence and lake is illuminated with lights of the city and moon.

title: Good
review: Must go place in Nainital but personally i would recommend Saat Taal. Its amazing. Large panoramic romantic view.

title: Nainilake is awesome
review: Awesome...Pls do visit. We visited in july first week. You will see fog everywhere. Its ab awesome view

title: Nice place
review: This is pretty much the sole attraction inside Nainital town and offers really good views and boat rides for people interested in that sort of thing.  The road alongside lake has a number of shops, eating places etc and is fairly well kept and clean. But one thing that spoils the ambience is a huge and loud mosque. Also, there should be more greenery and better care of surrounding green cover and lake ecology.

title: Great lake
review: The nainital lake is near mall road and is best lake to visit in nainital . we can do boating their either ourself or by boat keepers... The price of boating is really low and good..

title: LAKE BOATING
review: Its good to go for lake boating as they priced for about 210 for single boat for 1 couple. If by chance you get FOG around lake, then you are sure to get wet while boating in a lake, which is very exciting and after all we move to hill stations for cold weather.

title: Beautiful lake in the heart of Nainital !!
review: The Naini Lake is located at the heart of Nainital. The Mall Road runs along the Nainital Lake and houses options for shopping.

title: Beautiful n clean
review: The lake is very well maintained n one can enjoy boating in the lake at very nominal rates. The mall road near the lake is well maintained too. It's great fun to take a stroll on mall road n try out various eating places strewn all around. The lake is the number one attraction in Nainital n understandably so.

title: Best thing to do in Nainital
review: Its beautiful, must enjoy kind of a thing. They have a govt rate of Rs.210 for 20-25 min but gives a good view of almost entire Nainital.

title: Beautiful well preserved natural habitat
review: It's one of the most beautiful place in nanital.. the water is very clean with fishes in it.. it a lush green and cold with a picturesque view of being surrounded by mountains all around.. the clouds usually form a cap over the lake filtering the rays of Sun and giving a shade to mountains.. the coast of the lakes looks very busy from far with a series of population all around d coast.. overall it's a pleasant place to visit

title: Great  place to visit
review: You can enjoy lake for an hour boating with awesome scenery and weather.

title: amazing
review: A boat ride in the lake is a great experience, a lake with some myth.it is said that the lake got its name from the eye of Godess parvati

title: family trip
review: Superb for booting with family with self boat Rs.160 for Two adults and one child,neat and clean water with color full fishes...

title: Awesome Place
review: Awesome place for a vacation. Lake is clean, boating experience was romantic. Never wanted to come back.

title: scenic beauty
review: the lake is very beautiful. i enjoyed boating in the lake.

title: Naini Lake
review: Main attraction of naini is lake the boating and the year boat racing.and while you are that side where Naini devi Temple is and if its the time around sunset if you look it will look like the sun is going inside the water.

title: Relax...enjoy the beauty: Must visit
review: Situated very much inside Nainital; when you are in Nainital you see this lake. Mall road is placed along one side of this lake. On other side are the Naina Devi Temple and Gurudwara. Boating normally starts at around 9 am and is on till 7 pm. Boating here is recommended either in morning or evening as during the day time Sun would be directly on you and you may not enjoy the boating. Peddle boats are available but then ensure that your team/ family is ready to peddle or else the boat just remains in the lake without moving :). In case you wish to do boating after 11 am, it is suggested to do it in Sat Tal as the boats there are covered. Also the rates of boating is lesser there. You may plan this place once you come back to Nainital after roaming in and around. And later you may do window shopping in mall road.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Its a very clean lake.. Boating can be done.. can sit at corner with partner & spen quality time.. Near the lake is the Tibetian market where u can buy apparels & household items at good rates after proper negotiation.. Also, there are different views while coming to nainital via kaladungi way.. charges are different for pedal boating & with proper boat..

title: Overhyped to some extent
review: My family and I enjoy quaint holidays, but due to overlapping summer holidays, this time we ended up in extremely crowded place like nainital which offer very less to one except boating in this lake. Boating trip itself was just okay, with the access to the boats not friendly for the elderly (the banks of the lake were damaged at several places). The trip cost us 250/- rupees for a family of 5, but not worth it at all.

title: Great place for summer vacation.
review: Great and cool place in Indian summer's.

title: My short escape
review: Me and my family love to visit this place. Beautiful lake. I love to walk along side of lake a lot.

title: Little swarg
review: Must visit for everyone it's a heaven on earth spend as much time u want to .. Once u get in there u don't feel to come out ... Heaven

title: Nice Weather
review: Nice Weather, but crowded in peak season and having problem of parking. its better to go in Bheemtal or Naukuchiya taal but temprature is less in Nainital instead of these places.

title: Average boating experience.
review: The lake was OK, not clean.  It really pains to see the people littering the lake. The boating is good except for the initial stretch where the lake is dirty. I certainly recommend Naukuchia Tal over this for boating.

title: Amazing boat riding experience
review: The place has its own attraction. Place having beautiful view. And boating in lake was amazing experience. I had visit in winter and weather was cold so it gave so much coldness to us. Hope to visit again that place.

title: Serene
review: Although Naini doesn't need any review, still let me try. It's Serene and pleasant.. visit to Nainital is incomplete without boating in naini lake.. you would also see fish and ducks adding to flavour. And surrounding hills, mall road and naina devi temple adds to the charm. Go for it :)

title: Good climate
review: Nice to be in Nainital and enjoyed boat rides, but management needs to improve the condition of lake, there is no appropriate place to get on boats.

title: Sail boats are amazing
review: I tried the sail boats with my kids and they loved it, it was slightly windy and the kids loved the 50 degree tilt of the boat on turns

title: Absolutely love Naini Lake!
review: Have visited Nainital many times and I just love boating in Naini lake. This lake is an absolute delight for any nature lover.

title: Naini lake
review: Nice experience. Boating on the lake is an experience that beggars description. You have a feeling as if mother nature is craddling you in her lap.

title: Highest alive lake in a city
review: Although you have to admit commercialization had made this small quaint hilly town very busy during the tourist season. This place still holds back enough charm for a repeat traveller owing to its magnificent lake, and the temple nearby.  Eating warm local Bhutta (corn cob) while rowing/paddling your boat with your loved one have special charm to it. Walking the lake road in the Mornings and at night for that special hot malai milk after your dinner, this place is totally family oriented and full of natural blessings. A must visit for any traveller, preferably either during closing tourist season or a months stay before snow come in, a chilly time you will never forget.

title: Nice Place, to visit, beautiful nature
review: Great experience had at nainital, its very beautiful, just one thing is parking is mostly away from hotels, all goes well when you park cars near hotel.

title: Beautiful!
review: Huge lake , surrounded by hotels and mountains and the mall road. An area full of hustle bustle and Boat divers who will catch you on a busy mall road and offer boat ride. Important to strike a clear deal in advance else they will just take you for a 15 min ride and get you back, which obviously is a raw deal at 250/-.

title: Boating in Lake
review: Good experience boating in lake. 1 lake is dived in 2 parts and you have option of choosing row boat or paddle boat. If you are lucky, you can get sail boat also.

title: Awesome scenery
review: Nainital Lake is one of the finest lakes in india.

title: Weather was Good
review: I had visited Nainital recently. Lake was just amazing, take a ride in paddle boat and you will love it. At time clouds was on my head and its feel like you are in paradise.

title: Beautiful
review: Lovely place to be for boating and enjoying the beautiful nature..very nicely organized...boat man's are we all behaved & they will also tell you the details about the lake...

title: The charm of Nainital!!
review: Though we found less of water in lake this year still it was fun to do a boat ride in lake.It costed current rate - Rs 160 for half circle and Rs 210 for full circle. By half circle it means Lakes 1/4 circle and by full it means lake 1/2 circle.

title: Main attraction of nainital
review: This is the main attraction of nainital and feel awesome while having a pleasure ride over boat in the lake. There are options to ride the boat using pedal boat as well. Rates of the rides are fixed.

title: My Nainital tour
review: I recently visited Nainital with my family from 13.06.2016 to 16.06.2016 in Ertica cab. I stayed there in a hotel Sarovar situated at Tallital Mall Road @ of Rs. 3000/- per day per room, its just opposite Boat Club of Naini Lake. There was huge rush of tourists and made much efforts to get hotels. The Naini Lake is awesome and seems from hotel. We enjoyed boating in the lake then went to Naina Devi temple and Gurudwara on the bank of Lake. Then taken lunch at "The Dhaba" restaurant. In the evening we visited and enjoyed Mall road which is very long. Kids played and snapshots with Rabbits. After dinner at Ashoka restaurant back to hotel. Next day after breakfast we book a cab @1500- to seen the 7 sightseeing points of local then went to Nainital Zoo. After dinner at "Punjabi Tarka" restaurant, back to hotel. The atmosphere of Nainital is very nice and beautiful.

title: Excellent boating options
review: There are several boating options on the lake.............we had a great time. We also walked the entire stretch around the lake in the morning. Had a great time!

title: Visit with friends
review: Had boat ride in the lake. excellent view of the town.very pleasant ride. Good weather and cold breeze added to the enjoyment.

title: A good escape from scorching summer...
review: It was a pleasent afternoon there but weekend rush and consequent traffic jam made it difficult to enjoy to the fullest... avoid going there durinh peak season...heavy rain a couple of days before made it scenic and pleasant...mall road is nice to roam and enjoy window shopping...lot of options for food lovers to settle there tummy rats.. boating is cheap in naini lake...210/- per boat for four person... if someone got strength to pedal all round through the lake ends, one can opt for pedal boat and enjoy...

title: amazing
review: boating, nature , fun 3 words to summarise it all. aside the mall road naini lake is a nature lover's delight.

title: Cool place to visit
review: A very nice lake with different types of boating.. visited in June.. temperature was just good to relieve from Delhi heat.. mall road is just adjacent to  where you can shop, eat, play games, experience rope way, have a walk etc.. lots of good memories to make in nainital..

title: Serenity at its best
review: Experience the beauty of the lake by boating .Tickets are available at the lake side of various rate depending upon the no of people and full/half.Night view of lake is awesome.

title: Nice lake
review: Nice place and enjoyed lot on boat ride. We also had pedal boat specially again to enjoy the lake completely. Must visit.

title: A good place to sit down and relax
review: My first experience of visiting this lake was during childhood. Me and my family went for boating in the lake. It was raining slightly. The feeling of light raindrops falling on me and the sight of hills wrapped in mist has still stuck with me like a magical memory.

title: Naini lake
review: Beautiful experience......many boats floating around and sailing in yacht makes it all the more fun....it was amazing....the cool breeze in the evening is refreshing....

title: Naini Lake
review: Mango view of Naini lake from the top gives you really nice. Boating  in Naini lake is also excellent

title: Awesome boating experience
review: Njoyed to the fullest. You have to be there to believe and Njoy the nature. Fishes in the lake are easily visible and my daughters liked feeding breads to them

title: A  good place to relax
review: This is a good place to relax. Boating in Naini lake is also good but this lake now need serious maintenance.  Naini lake from the top looks very nice.

title: Beautiful lake normally, but water level low, de-silting debris around
review: This lake is always fun to visit for boating, but this time the water level was very low. Low rainfall can't be helped, and depends on Nature's behaviour but the debris left from de-silting the nainital lake should have been removed by the govt. Not best of the time to visit Nainital this time!

title: Beautiful & Spectacular
review: Very nice clean lake and one can enjoy the scene of natural beauty, the lake is very long & wide flows between the mountains. On the bank of the lake, very old Boat House Club, NainaDevi mandhir, Beautiful landscape of houses etc. During the winder the sun set scene is very nice to watch.

title: great boating experience
review: - took a boat ride early (9:30am) in the morning , definitely was less crowded than what i saw it during the day time

title: Biggest lake in Nainital
review: The beauty of the lake is to be seen from cable car and completing the whole part by taking a boat ride in the lake itself. A must visit place in nainital.

title: Just another lake
review: The lake and boating are fine but for the prices they charge, it is ill maintained with garbage lying around the shores of the lake! Good to visit but the surroundings are a huge disappointment filled with all things nasty.

title: Dramatically located water body
review: The lake is so much cleaner now than what it was many years ago - there are no water hyacinths or weeds. This is a very pleasant surprise. The walk and drive around has been made so much prettier. Lovely to see the row boats and sailing yachts' on the water.

title: jgj
review: we are there for three time and very good for family trip we going there with two family and lots of enjoing there

title: Queen lake
review: This June 2016 is my third visit of Nainital. Naini Lake is the prime attraction of Nainital. The lake is surrounded by lofty mountains and having a great sight.

title: Tranquil Waters
review: The lake is very clean and Eco friendly as motor boats are prohibited. The boatmen are friendly and unlike other tourist lakes in India, offer value for money. Late evening boat rides are very refreshing and calm.

title: Always enjoyed coming back!
review: Beautiful! Non seasonal times are best to enjoy the lake.  Calm and cool surroundings less crowd .... Heaven on earth.

title: Breathtaking
review: Just sit on one of the chairs they have installed on Mall Road and take in the cool breeze and the beauty of Nature.

title: Heart of nainital
review: whole Mall road are surrounded at lake as well business area with crowd and congestion shera punjab and machan are gud food joints with other option too

title: The Nainital
review: The Nainital Lake is a major tourist attraction in Uttarakhan, India, majorly due to its climate. Situated in middle of the Kumaon hills, it is a lake bubbling with tourist activities. Boating is a majoe activity here.

title: Nice and cool place
review: Good place to enjoy with boating through boat club.You can give food to fishes in the lake and view full nainital while in the middle of the lake on the boat.

title: Awesome place
review: I visited nainital in the month of  March. Lake was huge and beautifully maintained by the authorities. Had a wonderful time.

title: Always a good experience
review: Boating in the Naini lake is always the prime attraction of Nainital.  They have both paddle boats and the rowing boats (with the boatman - for the lazy).

title: Good place
review: Its a good place to visit .

title: Much visit place
review: Lake is totally covered by green mountains. And doing boating in this lake is an awesome exprience. Lake is really deap as asked from boat driver. Visit before 5pm otherwise you will not be permitted for boat riding and you have to come again next day.

title: Nainital lake the heart of Nainital
review: Nainital surrounds the Nainital Lake.  I think without this lake Nainital would not have existed to its present form.  You are bound to touch its boundary no matter wherever you go.  Spending evening on a cool summer after you have exhausted, in adjoining areas to this Lake is like heaven comes true.  Lots of eating outlets, fashion apparels and bla bla..

title: main attraction in nainital
review: Nice lake which gives a chance to do boat ride. while doing boat ride we can enjoy beauty of nainital , lake is surrounded by mountains

title: nice place
review: Mango shaped, man made lake, for which Nainital is famous for. Couple of boating options available, where you can hire a paddle boat or boat being roared by the boatman.

title: One of the best lake in India
review: I am the regular visitor of Nainital and the thing i like the most is Naini Lake but this time it is little disappointing because water of lake is gone down by 5-6 metre. Lake look little small. But i enjoyed evening boating here. Temperature is good. Over all good experience.

title: Boating at naini lake was amazing.
review: You can get boats very easily here and at cheap rates compared to other places I have visited. There are at least 5 sponsors around the lake who offers boats for boat riding. Boats ranges from 2 seated to multiples ones. You can either row on your own or there are people who would do it for you and would cost you slightly extra. Perfectly borders  maal road and naina devi temple.

title: Relaxingly beautiful
review: nice place to unwind. Beautiful too. Nd not too crowded. Mountains all around. Pedals nd row boats available

title: Naini lake is awesome and must to have boating experience
review: During my 3 days there, i went for boating twice. The serenity is just great and if the winds are blowing with cloudy atmosphere..nothing like it.

title: Lake
review: Much dirtier than what I remember from my last 3 visits. The life jackets they insist on are horrible( old bad quality jackets), the boats are old, the docking points for tourists to get on boats are extremely bad.

title: Beautiful place - must visit place in lifetime
review: A must visit place for everyone. Great escape for Delhites (6-10 hrs drive from Delhi). It has great weather all the time. Mall road is on the banks of this lake. Must enjoy boating in this lake.

title: Lake in all Lake is Nainital Lake
review: We visitied the naini lake in my childhood days now I again visited it after a long period with my family and I enjoyed a walk in the morning of it and also take a bath in it

title: Beatiful view
review: Visited in May 2016,, Boating in lake was very good. View from lake is excellent. Strolling on mall road is also very good

title: Naini Lake
review: Was disappointed with level of water (primarily due to poor monsoons). However was happy to cleaner lake and fishes in it. Thanks for authorities. However, the tourist still need to be coached not to throw bottles, plastics and should be penalized for doing this.

title: Must visit place in Nainital
review: Very good place to visit in Nainital..Enjoy boating there and it is adjacent to Mall road area where u can enjoy shopping.

title: Serene beauty!
review: We did a day trip to Nainital Lake while we were on vacation to Corbett National Park. It was approximately two hour drive from Ramnagar, most of it through winding hilly roads. But given the scenic beauty the ride was totally worth it!. Inspite of it being middle of May, the temperature was very pleasant at 22 degrees and as expected the place was thronged with tourists. We enjoyed boating in the lake, a visit to the Naini Devi temple and just walking around the lake. We wanted to ride the cable car, but it was booked for the whole day it seems. I guess you need to book in advance during peak season. After a yummy lunch of Momos and Thukpa we headed back in the evening to Corbett!

title: good location
review: Its amazing experience at in Nainital. I am with my family stay at the same hotel in April 15. Hotel service is amazing and location wise outstanding. They had amazing Chef in Fooding and they good in lodging and boarding

title: Beautiful creation of nature
review: The lake is the center heart of the city. The whole city is strategically built around the lake.

title: Good Lake.
review: The lake is serenely located in between of mountains. It is good to spend time in boating. One should enjoy with Famil and kids

title: Nice and huge lake
review: Nainital lake is the main attraction of Nainital. Located on the main area next to bus stand, a very huge and long lake. The lake is very crowded and full of small boats and people enjoy boating there.

title: A must visit
review: Going to Nainitaal and not going to Nainitaal lake is like going to Agra and not seeing the Tajmahal. .it's a beautiful lake which looks equally stunning from all the angles..the shape is like a dolphin, like a mango, and like an eye. Boating here is an experience in itself and at a reasonable price also. I absolutely loved it.

title: Nainital ki jaan
review: Nainital is there because of the Naini lake.it is calm but dirty on the sides. People seem to worship it. The boat rides at Rs 210 look expensive but is enjoyable . If it starts raining then u have to rush back. Paddle boats are also there. It is lovely in the evenings . Only thing which I did not like is that full round of the lake is In fact half as it is divided into tallitaal and mallitaal.

title: Lake par excellence
review: The main attraction in Nainital. U can boat in it. Sit by the side of it. Enjoy coffee on mall road overlooking the lake.

title: lke district of India
review: Nainital is a highly celebrated scenic spot in uttarakhand india,It is surrounded by towering peaks of the himalayas,fruit orchards and thick forest.

title: Good place
review: its a nice place. shopping market is near to this. u can enjoy nature and shopping both at this place.

title: Little overhyped
review: It was very crowded and do not look like a natural lake because of so much construction work happening around. Rather bhimtal lake, nakuchiatal lake, saat tal have better lakes.

title: Great View and Boating
review: Great View of Lake, Good Boating Experience. Cool Cool Air must liked. Good Market all over. Must visit hare

title: Lazy Sunday at Naini Lake
review: Everytime I visit Nainital, walk along the Naini lake is always on to-do list. Lake adds to the beauty of Nainital & thousands of people throng the lakeside every day. Nainital can be visited anytime of the year, though it's not a recommended holiday destination during June for newly wed couples or travellers who prefer tranquility & quite environment as it's fully crowded with families who travel to this destination in large numbers during the summer vacations of children.

title: Awesome view
review: The nainital lake is the jewel of nainital and must visit for boating.

title: Great Lake to See with family and friends
review: In Nainital the most important activity is to sit near the naini lake and take the selfies of yourself and families, very good to see the lake and make a part of paddle boating or simply boating.

title: beautiful and mesmerising
review: Beautiful lake and awesome weather. awesome boating experience and walk through the town. good gateway

title: Mast mast lake...
review: Nainital lake is the essence of Nainital..Wide, lengthy and soothing to eyes..always..It accompanies the mall road from one end to the other..Either you can enjoy the walking on the mall road along the lake or boating in the lake..or even both...And you can enjoy viewing the thrilling of the great Himalaya..of course, if lucky one...in all memorable experience..

title: Nature at its best
review: Nainital visit is incomplete if the main attraction Nainital lake is not explored. Explored means..enjoying the colour and reflection of sun rays during morning, afternoon and evening. Moreover,mesmerising sight of the reflection of city light is simply awesome. Boating is must , if u are not fit do not try the peddle boat. While in the boat if you want to take pictures, please take help of boatman else u might lose your mob phone in the lake.

title: Scenic beauty
review: "Tallo me tal Nainital"very beautiful lake well maintained near by mall roaf is vety good.boating is real fun

title: excellent huge lake
review: just get on a boat ride in this huge heaven like lake. the boat will be some mid-ranged. so dont miss it out. just get on it. its fabulous and just awesome. it gives the full view of the mall road and the town and the naina devi temple.

title: Beautiful
review: We visited this place 2-3 times during our stay; one being its a great place to hand around with lot of small shops and eateries, secondly its one of the prime areas for tourists.

title: Wonderful club with boat rides
review: An old British resort with lots of activities and food joints . Horse riding as well as other traditional transportation is readily available .

title: Good
review: So beautiful lake..we liked it..a must visit lake in nainital along with mall road..though i liked bhimtal lake and sattal lake too

title: Nice and pleasant
review: Overall had a very pleasant ride in the lake, the only hiccup was the entry point to the boats which had broken stairs and lots of big stones which made really uncomfortable getting in and out of the lakeside. Overall a beautiful experience.

title: Jewel of Nainital....
review: Nainital Lake is The Centre of Attraction of Nainital Hill Station; Awesome Boating Experience with Cold Breeze  was Unforgettable Moment....

title: Pleasant boat ride is relaxing
review: When we first saw the lake in the evening, the first impression is quite crowded. But when we actually went to boat, its really nice and pleasant. Its worth a visit.

title: Cloud's own land.....
review: I went there on a day visit from Corbett National Park. On the way we had Corbett falls, Khurpa Taal. But on reaching Nainitaal, the tiredness of the uphill journey was wiped away in a minute as we approached the Mall road with a great view of the serene Naini Lake. We went to Naini Devi Temple and then went for Boating. Its very cheap. Rs 210 for Full circle of the Lake and 160 perhaps for the half circle. We chose full circle boating. The Boatman was very jocund. He told us about the history and tourism of Nainitaal. There is an another attraction - Ropeway. Though we missed it due to shortage of time, I will surely enjoy it next time I will come here. This place is also a good place for shopping. souvenirs like scented candles, different wax items are worth buy.

title: A nice experience
review: A boat ride in the lake is probably the first outing you will have in nainital. Overall experience is good. Boats are old and of three varieties. The traditional row boats, paddle boats and a few yatches( only available at boathouse club). The row boats and paddle are available at many spots around the mall and charge 210 for a round which takes around 25 mins.

title: Lovely view of the lake
review: Although over-crowded with shops all around, still this is the place to not miss - be boating or just enjoy the view or even feeding the fish.

title: Dr
review: Good serene place to unwind especially if one comes from metro city.  But it's overcrowded in peak season with infrastructure unable to cope with it.  Its better to come in off season if you really want to relax

title: Must visit in Nainital ...
review: WoW! Its beautiful.

title: Charm of Nainital
review: Nainital lake is a large water body around which this tourist town is built. It's surrounded by all the major tourist points of Nainital.

title: Very nice lake
review: Boating in the lake is excellent. All round scenery and natural views are very very good. Mall road around also gives a good experience.

title: Amazing Lake
review: Naini lake is one of the best lakes I have ever seen. This lake is the main attraction for me to visit Nainital.

title: Beautiful but too crowded
review: We visited Nanital in month of May. It seems everyone was there to beat heat. Water level of lake had gone noticeably down.

title: Very nice lake
review: The lake is very nice.  We enjoyed the boat ride with family.  We sit besides the lake for 3-4 hrs. and enjoyed the nature.

title: Great Place to have fun
review: Wonderfull hillstation near Delhi.  Took taxi from Faridabad and reached Nainital in 6 Hrs. Totally refreshing. Boating.

title: Very good lake
review: Boating is only activity you can do here, but its good & pls do it. Surroundings around the lake is mesmerizing.

title: A very good experience.
review: Nainital Lake provides an excellent experience. Evening boating is main attraction in Nainital Lake. Boating is done with life jackets. Though boats are very old but overall it's nice experience. After seven in evening boating is not permitted.

title: The best spot in Nainital
review: Nainital lake was probably the best attractions in Nainital compared to other wise quite an average hill station experience. The lake is quite large and they have two kinds of boats rowing boats and paddle boats.

title: Nain Lake-an enchanting sight
review: Naini  tal –tal means lake- the city Naini is named after the lake , the heart and soul of Nainital  district, also known as the lake district of Utthaarakhand state. According to legends, the lake sprang where one emerald eye-  nain in hindi-of the Naina devi  fell on the earth. The lake is a natural lake, one of the best lakes in India,  with the mighty mountains as its backdrop. Tourism  centers round this  busy, beautiful and enchanting lake. There is a promenade  running   around the lake and the lake is crowded with tourists, who gather here for  boating and yatching  and also for relaxing on the many benches. . At one end is the Naina Drvi   temple.  The waters are quite deep and the fish are maintained with many scattered  oxygen plants in the lake.

title: Great lake
review: Beautifull lake. One shud visit the point where u can see the lake of the shape of a mango. Adjacent to it is mall road and on the other side of the lake is thandi sadak and naina devi temple. On the whole u will enjoy the place very much. The market is also cheap.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The lake adds to the beauty of nanital. Although due to insufficient rains for last few years the water is less but still one can enjoy boating and yatching. Both paddle boats as well as row boats are available. Although if you opt for paddle boats then you can't cover the entire lake as they have marked the points from where you have to come back to the starting point. In row boat you can go from one end to the other end of the lake. The cool breeze in and around the lake is mesmerising. The approach to the lake is not easy specially for senior citizen. Children enjoy the fishes in the lake.

title: Beautiful lake in Nainital
review: Naini lake imparts great beauty to this hill station. Lake is famous for entertainment and excursion. Boating and yachting are regular activities. Walks around lake are highly recommended. Famous Naina Devi temple attracts devotees in large numbers.

title: my visit
review: you  had to walk too much if you want to see this place ,if you go by car then the car shouldn't b big one because the road is narrow ,just a normal zoo

title: good
review: awesome lake good lake nice view boating  water hotels nearby one would like to visit again there as it feels good to be at the lake and boating . boating there at lake was good experiance

title: Center of Attraction in one of the Best Hill Stations
review: Having visited numerous Hill stations across India & having visited Nainital thrice, I can vouch for this town being one of the best Hill Stations in India.

title: Awesome Scenic Place
review: It actually looked like water was standing still in the cupped hands of god. This natural lake is miracle of nature that it amuse everyone who visits Nainitaal.

title: Vacations
review: Great place for boating and walking along the lake side

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The lake adds charm to Nanital Visit. Its once the best place to visit in summers. Be careful if you are doing boating with infant or toddler as they need to sit still otherwise boat might loose balance.

title: Nice but bhimtal better n more serene
review: I was always for crowds n buzz n noise n hence preferred touristic options .. thus chose nainital over bhimtal..but I was wrong .

title: Naini Retreat
review: Nainitaal is the main attraction in small hill town of nainitaal. the lake is huge, nainitaal is densely populated hill station.

title: It was fun
review: Though the lake had receded by almost 10 feet, boating was fun. The shikara type boats cost Rs 210 for a full ride (which covers only a part of the lake). Life jacket is compulsory.

title: Great Lake - carefull while booking boat ride
review: This is one of the best lake I have visited across India in the hilly areas, including southern hill stations like Ooty and Kodai. It is a crescent shaped lake with clean water. In the morning, if you stand towards the Tallital side, you can see lot of fishes near the coast in shallow water. This is seen in other areas also once in a while.

title: The Lake which defined Nainital
review: Nainital lake and around is a busy place for most of the tourists. Whether is lower than places around. Spend some time there enjoy nature, taking up boating, shopping on mall road, eating etc. Cars are not allowed in evenings on mall road, so the visit timing must be checked and planned accordingly.

title: Gorgeous
review: Huge lake and very clean. Lot of boating options. If you take a local tour package they take you to a hilltop and show you a bird's eye view of the lake.

title: Reason why you are here
review: One cannot leave Nainital without a boat-ride in this beautiful lake. There are various entry points throughout mall road and the rates are fixed. Since water level was low therefore visit to the temple was restricted. Though lake can be visited anytime but I would highly recommend this lake during early morning between 7 to 10 AM.

title: lake in the mountain
review: nice lake , good boating, temples on the other bank of the river, the water is clean & clear have agood time with children

title: Beautiful
review: Nainital lake and around is a buzzing place for most of the tourists. One can spend a lot of time here enjoying nature, taking up boating.. Nice and clean lake.

title: Glittering Jewel
review: Nainital incomparable beauty is because of beautiful Naini lake.In the day,mirrored in its waters stand seven proud hills,Cheena Peak,Kilbury,Laria Kanta,Deopatta,Camel's back,Dorothy seat,Snow View, dotted with pretty  cottages.More beautiful than however is the lake at night when thousands of bulbs reflect their magic light into its water.

title: A bit crowded
review: The lake is very popular and can get very crowded in evenings. So try to come here during early morning.

title: Eye Catching
review: The lake itself is beautiful and boating on it is a blissful experience. The approach to it, though, can be tough because there are no jetties. Difficult for senior citizens to board a boat

title: Great place & pleasant wheather
review: Nainital lake and around is a buzzing place for most of the tourists. The whether here is lower than places around and the cook breeze is soothing. One can spend a lot of time here enjoying nature, taking up boating, shopping on mall road, eating etc. Cars are not allowed in evenings on mall road, so the visit timing must be checked and planned accordingly.

title: Looks polluted
review: Expected the waters to be azure but it was far from it. Boating seems to be the only activity of interest at the lake. However, it was way to hot to go on a boating trip. Give it a miss.

title: On 21st May 2016,A shallow lake.
review: As there was consecutive failure of monsoon for the last three years,the lake is unfit for boating.It is simply for the sake of boating.It would be good if Nainital gets sufficient rains in future.

title: Beautiful and clean Lake!
review: This place can be visited any time in a year but generally in India people love to visit this place in summers due to its cool weather.

title: Beautiful and Unique...!
review: When you visit hill station you have one thing in mind that you are going to witness a lot of hills and mountains but if you get water in form of streams and lakes it just make you day :) ... This lake(Tal) is in the shape of eye(Naina/Naini), you can witness from the Naina peak and that is why it is NAINITAL ;) . Lot of things to do here- Boating, Photo Shoot, Mall Road Visit, Shopping, Street Food etc. Visiting here with a group(friends/family) is what I suggest.

title: All Time Favorite
review: Nainital lake is my all time favorite and I never miss boating in it, whenever I am here. It is still preserved in comparatively very good condition and worth visiting.

title: Awesome boating experience here in naini lake for 40 minutes.
review: We hired 2 boats and experienced good time through boating in naini lake for 40 minutes . They provide guides for each boat and they provide good to know informations about  the lake and surroundings.

title: beautiful lake
review: We travelled in the month of May'16 and weather was hot. This is beautiful lake with mall road surrounding it. We spent lot of time there. There are lot of eateries, temple, Gurudwara around it which you can visit. There is also boating area where they take you to different points however we did not go for it. One good thing was that there are lot of benches and sitting area around the lake where you can sit quietly and enjoy the view.

title: beautiful
review: superb combination of land and water. Looks chilled yet so calm and serene. A paradise for people. superb

title: Nice and Clean lake
review: Nice and clean lake, Will suggest this to every one, Boating is available in multiple places, it will cost 210 per boat.

title: Most romantic place
review: We went to the lake in the evening. The atmosphere was very romantic. We did boating.  There is Nayna devi temple on the bank of taal.  Then we had a walk on the Mall road. Must visit place.

title: heavenly weather in july...amazing experience with freinds
review: first the bus trip from haldwani to nainital was full of fun. Bus ride with friends on a hilly road is one of a experience you would like to have. wish I had a car on that trip.

title: Main attraction of nainital. Must have boat for complete trip
review: Main attraction of nainital. Must have boat for complete trip.

title: Best part of nainital
review: the nainital is although is very famous for its lake. We can enjoy boating in that. Near by there are many clubs also.

title: Beautyful Lake, nice time spent
review: Nainital is the one of my favorite destinations.... it has mesmerizing beauty especially in good and cloudy weather. I love to stare  it and walking at mall road.......

title: good one if opt paddling boat
review: lake is very nice, serene ,. paddle boats are very good if you are on romantic trip. though water level was bit low but was no problem for boating.mall road alongside for shopping

title: Best view of this lake from all part of nanital
review: This lake is situated in and around mall road and worth visiting  Boating is also available and also you can have view of this lake from anywhere in the city

title: Abode of the Gods
review: Lovely place, good weather. The Lake is slightly at a low level due to lack of rains, but over all a great experience.

title: Nice Lake
review: Its a nice lake surrounded by mountains. Boating options are available for reasonable rates.

title: nice and very big lake
review: big and clean lake. we enjoyed the boating. view from the lake is very nice and scenic.nothing much to do in nainital.

title: Wonderful experience. Boating in this lake was very soothing.
review: Very large lake. Nicely located in the lap of mountains all around. Boating in this was a nice experience. You can take a walk around this lake..

title: Pleasant Trip
review: Had a boat ride with family. Weather was very good. Enjoyed the ride. Lake was clean and neat. But the boatmen were not paid by the Govt properly so they disturb us to take us for the boat ride.

title: Always a pleasure..........
review: The months of April, May, and June are the best time to visit. Clear sunshine and deep blue Naini Lake.

title: Nature's Beauty
review: Nainital lake is very clean lake and appreciate, locals as well tourists keep it clean. This is one of the best lakes I seen in my life. I much reward this as beautiful more than Dal Lake of Kashmir which is not like a mud pond.

title: Mesmarizing
review: A little dried up this summer but still a sight to see and the view at night with the lights reflecting in its waters is breathtaking

title: Nainital
review: Nainital town is a small but busy town. Mainly depends  on tourism for its livelihood. The lake is well maintained by the authorities and traffic is well regulated unllike other Hill Stations like Shimla etc.

title: Good
review: Aweaome experience by boating in naini lake..and the boat seller was good in clicking pics with awesome back ground. So its good be there and enjoy boating for sure..

title: The lake is big n beautiful
review: No doubts the lake is beautiful,we just need to restrict ourselves from getting it spoiled.Just keep calm and take a shikara(boat) ride.If the day is hot then choose to go for an evening ride,if you eat anything please don't throw the leftover into the lake.Do watch the Hanuman ji Temple n don't forget to carry your camera.

title: must do visit in nainital
review: it has 2 parts, tallital and mallital . boating in mallital is more scenic and longer. it is closed to naina devi temple. charges are 210 for full round and 160 for half.

title: enjoy
review: we were quite apprehensive about the water levels going down which actually is the case but there is enough water in the lake to enjoy the boat ride. the balmy air takes away all the worries. do go and enjoy the ride.

title: Nainital Trip
review: Awesome place to Visit....Boating with family is an amazing experience at Nainital.lots of fishes can be seen in the lake.

title: In autumn  specially in Dusharra  it looks like heaven
review: Nainital is the famous city in Uttarakhand. This place is only 35 kms. from Kathgodam Railway  Station and 65 Kms. from Pantnagar Airport. Taxi services are available from both the places to reach Nainital.

title: A place well kept and had all the assistance for boating
review: The experience was memoriable.Boating ithe quite and clean atmospher was soothing.

title: Cool and calm surrounded by nature beauty
review: -place is good but very crowed in peak season

title: Centre of Attraction
review: The Nanital lake is the centre of attraction in Nainital.  We can get a good boat ride for Rs 210/- and its all well regulated.  The water is clean and the boat ride is very refreshing.  Add to it one can walk down the mall road and enjoy the lake.  There is also a lake view point high up and one can take a cab to go to these places.

title: General review
review: Been here so many times, still can't get enough. I have visited many hill station. The lake always have my heart, so beautiful and serene.

title: perfect place for boating
review: The lake is huge and is a perfect place for boating. They have now introduced yatchs also which is a very interesting experience

title: Beautiful and serene
review: Water level has gone down but maintenance has improved resulting in  a pleasant overall experience, weather is excellent all around

title: Clean and Clear
review: Lake is clean and clear as compared to it was 7-8 years back, though it was small and shallow because of less rains in last two years, but pleasent experience

title: Identity and Heart of the city
review: This is the Identity and Heart of the city. You can enjoy boating here. The water of the lake in neat and clean, even you can drink it.

title: The Gem of Nainital
review: Naini Lake beckons every visitor to Nainital to enchant the with the boat rides. Experiencing sunset while boating is something to cherish. Dotted with shops around this is one of the foremost attractions here in Nainital.

title: Serene, beautiful ..always brings peace to ones mind and soul
review: We stayed for three days in Nainital and did boating on the Nainital lake at least once every day. Though the water level had dipped alarmingly, the Nainital lake was beautiful and as always it excites our entire family. Its the reason of our frequent visits to Nainital

title: Awesome lake
review: It's a great lake for boating. Most important among the place of visit in nainital. Just located beside mall road area.

title: The word is "Beautiful"
review: Its a huge lake and definitely worth it.. U can spend the complete day just sitting there and observing different people.. Had boating here at around 5pm when the sun was about to set.. Had an amazing view of sun rays coming between the mountains and water surrounding us.. I could just say its amazing !!

title: A WONDERFUL LAKE
review: The most enchanting attraction of Nainital is a long mango-shaped placid lake called Naini in the heart of the town.   A neat promenade with a drive-way alongside has been picturesquely developed with plenty of photo op spots.  Trees, flower plants and benches at intervals provide a touch of elegance.

title: Peace of mind..
review: Life stops here with peace

title: wonderful lake
review: take boat ride.lake is very good & select sunset time.boat service is safe & reliable.life jackets been given.just on bank ,Naina devi temple is there.

title: Shimmering Green waters!
review: I've been here quite a few times and a few years ago. Sadly TripAdvisor does not give time options.

title: The Eye of the Goddess
review: According to Mythology....during Mahadev's Tandava dance..the Eye of the Goddess fell here..and the lake was created!!

title: Good lake with pristine clean waters
review: Boating in lake available for reasonable price. Walk on lake side is also refreshing. Lake is maintained very well.

title: We visit almost everyday
review: Memorable experience that's what i can say, everyday early morning i used take round of Naini lake  it was so beautiful that i can not explain. Huge Ruhu fish you can see front of you. we used feed them a bread regularly. one of the best attraction in Nainital which you must visit.

title: Weekend Romantic Trips
review: A great weekend get outs with family... i was there during winters and i love the winters... the scenic view and the nearby 5 taals is also a must visit. Ranikhet which is near by is also a must visit.

title: Lake with beautiful views
review: Lake is surrounded by pristine beauty,Mall Road. Best part of this lake is Boat ride. Read in school books " Nainital mey Nauka vihar'. Not finding appropriate words to describe the beauty of this lake. Highly recommended.

title: Serene lake
review: We were a bit hesitated to visit the lake as we had a 2 year old kid and they don't give life jackets for her. Lake is amazing with well organised ticket place and beautiful places to see during boat ride like Sherwood college.

title: Nice view and great place to hangout in evening
review: Lake is just awesome. You can spend full day here by boating, roaming around, shopping at Tibet and Mall Road market.

title: !!Serene!!
review: The lake is so wonderful. Book an hotel on the mall road to view the serene beauty of the lake.. A boat ride will refresh u. The depth of the lake is 28feet so be careful and enjoy..

title: Great Lake.
review: Good sized lake with good view all around. Its very deep and having boating like shikara is unique experience. Loved it overall.

title: Amazing place to be
review: Really cool & awesome. U can do boating for rs 210 a full round & view is great. Carry a camera for amazing pics

title: Peaceful Place
review: Sit by the lake, eat by the lake, go for rowing, you will feel no tiredness at all. The lake offers boat rides, take the longer one, enjoy the time.

title: Walk around it or take a boat.
review: This lake is the center of Nainital. You can either take a walk along mall road and admire the beauty of this lake or take a boat to enjoy this lake.

title: Excellent View
review: You will love boat ride at this lake. Full of scenic beauty. Boat ride for Paddle Boat (Self Driven) is Rs. 210 and for Shikara Rs.210.

title: Exquisite place
review: We stayed for 3 days in Nainital and never missed the every evening stroll down and up the lake. Also enjoyed half an hour of boating. The boat man was gentle and very down to earth like most of the people in Nainital.

title: Peace in the mid of the City
