review: The experience was just awesome. The Lake is surrounded on three sides by Road. Among which two sides have Fences for Walk lovers across the bank of the Lake. Its very nicely maintained and the Boating facility (Rs 210/- per boat) to travel across one corner to the other corner as well as to roam in the Lake while viewing the sunset is just an awesome experience :) Naina Devi Temple is at the fourth side of the Lake. the ringing bells of the temple gives a nice musical note to the Lake Viewers and won't allow you to be distracted away from this beautiful lake. Morning jogging on the Thandi Sadak on one side of the lake let me view very beautiful birds :) Will come soon to revisit,

title: Nainital's Bestest...
review: Set in the picturesque landscape the lake boasts clear waters and best location. Infact its this lake that gives the place its identity. You can take a romantic boat ride across the lake at a very nominal charge. This is very centrally located near all the food joints and another attraction Naina Devi temple.

title: Serene setting away from the crowd on Mall Road
review: Sitting squat opposite the Mall Road with its multitude of shops, restaurants and people, Naini Lake is a sight for sore eyes. Even though the cleanliness has reduced over the past decade, the lake still remains your best bet for having a soothing time with your loved ones. You can paddle along peacefully while enjoying a snack or two in the evening. But please don't litter. That is the biggest problem all our tourist places face, indiscriminate pollution and littering. Please enjoy the serenity of the greenish waters and take in the views of hills in the background. Naini Lake, I'll visit you again. Soon.

title: so permanent
review: it is iconic . it represents nainital . the basic attraction of being here . it is one of the 51 Shaktipeeths of Godess Sati . it exudes peace and natural beauty

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Boating is must, the authorities maintain the lake very well. One can see trouts (mahaseer) near the shores.

title: Nice Lake
review: Boating in Naini lake experience was awesome. Nicely maintained by authorities. There is naina Devi temple and a gurudwara on one side of the lake.. Sunset experience is very good. Lake is centrally located along with the wonderful view around. one side Mall road , one can enjoy eating joints, shopping and souvenirs fro nanital. Overall; wonder full experience with no pollution.

title: A big lake in the hill of Kumaon....
review: One of the choices of new married couple..... but also got place to hangout with your dear ones... i was there last year and enjoyed a lot.... there... Its a wonder the such a huge lake is there in the lap of Hills.....

title: Awesome
review: its a very clean and well maintained lake. Altought there was bit less water in lake due to subsized rain and snow, but it is still better than ohter lake in nainital. if you are going for boating then hire boat from mallital .

title: Dont visit in april
review: The lake is good and you can check other reviews for that. I visited 27-29 April. Right now many places the forest is burning and smoke is almost everywhere in Nainital. Effect of smoke was there inside our guest house rooms also and at some places difficult to breathe. Its good to avoid visiting now and visit after summers when there is greenary. Overall OK experience but not great.

title: Naini Lake
review: Nice clean lake. awesome scenery. enjoyed boating and photography. Good place for nature lovers. photogenic place.

title: Beauty of Nature
review: This is a very beautiful place for nature lovers and a very polpular spot for honeymoon couples. The boatride in a sheer joy.

title: Its not just a part of Nainital ,It is Nainital.
review: NAinital named after naini-Tal(lake in hindi). City is all over its circumference .You can sit here ,eat food around or do anything you want. If you are visiting Nainital,You just cant miss this lake even if you dont want to see it .

title: Beauty of nature
review: Great view

title: One of my Favorite Lake in North India
review: I have been going to Nainital since 1963 when I was a school kid. But even today I am not tired of visiting Nainital after so many trips just because if Nainital Lake. It was getting dirty over a period of time due to ever increasing visitors but concerned government decided to clean the lake and ensured that lake is no more allowed to be dirty. Lake gives you such relaxed feeling when you are sitting on a bench by lake side of using a boat. You can enjoy beautiful view of lake if you are staying in a hotel on the side hills. Most beautiful view comes in night. I do not think I will ever be tired of visting the lake again and again

title: UNFORGETTABLE BOATING EXPERIENCE IN NAINI LAKE...
review: The place is awesome. Surrounded by hills from all the side with beautiful temple of Naina Devi at one of the edges, boating experience in the Naini Lake is unforgettable. The lake is situated in the middle of the small town of Nainital. Infact the name of the town is derived from the Lake itself: Naini is the name of the lake and Tal means lake. In fact boating in the lake is one of the major attractions in Nainital. The view of Thandi Sadak which is running parallel to the Naini Lake on one side and the Mall Road which is also running parallel on the other side is the beauty. Thandi Sadak is having number of temples which can be visited by just walking through the path. The most Important being Prachin Hanuman Mandir. After boating one can have Darshan of Naina Devi temple. View of the lake is fantastic from the temple also. One can have small boats at very nominal rates engaged for 45 minutes or more.

title: Nature at it's best...
review: Have been here many times but always feel like visit for the first time. You will feel good when you do boating with your loved ones or with friends. Everyone must visit this place once in a life.

title: A cool weekend getaway
review: One of the main attractions of Nainital. Surrounded by mountains and hotels and markets its a good destination for a short vacation.

title: Good to have booting in evening and morning..
review: Good to have booting in evening and morning only as its little hot in midday. As i am there in April

title: Good place
review: Enjoy early morning or sunset experience, its a good place to have a stroll and do boating. Only place where people go to nainitaal.

title: Its like any other lake.. Nothing special about it.
review: Its like any other lake.. Nothing special about it.  Although at night, you can sit beside the lake. It's pleasant.

title: Superb View, Awesome lake
review: Boating is cheap and the experiences was more then expectation and yeah! it was really awesome. IF you're visiting Nainital, Please go ahead and start boating

title: A lake (rather lakes) on the hilltop is all we need to know about the beauty of it all!
review: Nainital is almost a must visit for an Indian Tourist. The road is rough and the ride to the city is torturous and costly! Any car ride from Delhi will cost more than Rs.6000 if you can negotiate well. Consider yourself lucky if you can get AHA taxi, which will cost Rs.4000 or less.

title: Highlight of Nainital
review: Among all Himalayan hill stations Nainital  is provided with a unique flavour.  Beside Himalaya darsan the Nainital lake adds another mandatory activity Boating.The lake has soothing effect on you during the morning,  will enchant you during the day time and  tantalize you during the night with lights from surrounding hills reflecting from its waters.

title: Hotel was
review: The hotel i stayed with was pathetic ad even the food , service , ambience was not at all good . room service was worst .

title: Never seen such a beautiful lake before
review: Boating is must for a traveler who love to sit in lap of nature

title: Kohinoor of nainital
review: The lake is like kohinoor for nainital.  without this i doubt whether nainital will be so attractive,  the lake is beautiful surrounded by mountains and its view from height/ hill top is beautiful. if you want to stay in nainitl you should take a lake view hotel or homestay

title: Trip to Nainital & Corbet
review: The major & most important attraction of Nainital. Very beautiful lake. You can enjoy boating & walking around lake. It will take about 40 minutes at medium speed to complete a round.

title: Overcrowded
review: It provides a few good views but most of the time it's overcrowded. One can take a stroll along the lake and enjoy boating ( Be safe and Be aware of overcharging) but the water is not fit for swimming.

title: Serenity amidst the hustle
review: A calm lake in the middle of the city. Its the main attraction. The boat ride was fun especially at sunset time. Makes for a wonderful photo op. You cannot miss it.

title: One of the signature attraction of Nainital
review: Crowded but attractive lake, very deep ! Must for any visit to this hill town. Boating ride is easily available.

title: A serene outing...
review: The mango shaped lake of Nainital, is pretty amazing, not only because of its location also because of its expanse. we really enjoyed the boating activities on the lake. the view of surrounding mountains added fervor

title: Nice lake to walk around and to enjoy Boating
review: Its very beautiful Lake on high hill, surrounding place and market is also very nice. at evening you can take a walk on the road beside the lake and enjoy the weather.

title: Beautiful lake both during day and night
review: The lake is really huge in proportion. A walk down the mall road is also fantastic. One can go for a boat ride early in the morning or after 4pm in the evening. Though it really starts getting cold after the sun disappears behind the mountains.

title: Main Attraction of Nainital...
review: Must try boating in the evening in summers and anytime in winters...Nature at its best.....the lighting alongside the lake adds to the beauty of lake...

title: Naini lake - Evergreen fun for family n kids
review: Enjoying boating since last 15 years  . First time enjoyed when kids were 4-10 years. recent visit when kids are teen aged again enjoyed boating . A good place for fun....boating rates are reasonable. Go for full round.

title: nice
review: Nainitaal is one of the nine lakes in the city of the same name, located in Uttrakhand. The lake is very beautiful and is well known for its scenic beauty. Thousands of tourists are attracted to this lake every year. The lake is best experienced on a boat ride. The cool summers at the lake, offer an unforgettable experience.

title: Sailing on the naini lake
review: Lake is really pictersque and a must visit place. You wont be able to miss it. The smell of fresh water as cool breeze flows past you is so refreshing. I Chose for yatcht sailing from many boating options (like rowing and pedaling) available and loved it. The way breeze blows and the boat moves and tilts slightly on speed is a gr8 experience and fun to have. Naini lake is the highest sailing point of the world. The lake can be visited any time but during the night it looks more beautiful.

title: Beautiful Lake...!!!
review: Naini Lake is the first tourist attraction when one comes to nainital. This Lake is know for the marine life and the beautiful view it offers to the tourists that come to nainital.

title: Mesmerizing boat ride
review: The Nainital Lake is broadly divided into two parts the Talli tal nad the Malli Tal. There are lots of boats available for giving ride to the tourists. They charged around Rs. 210 for a ride which lasted for 45 minutes in Malli tal part of the lake. For taking a ride around the complete lake they charge double. The complete Nainital and the mountains surrounding the place is visible during the boat ride.

title: Not so amazing
review: Like with any other hill station in india, nainital has become too commercialised. I went there for family trip and it was jam packed. It's better to leave your vehicle outside the lake complex. Every time you cross the lake you have to pay toll which doesn't make sense. The lake is nice specially during sunset and sunrise. Do go for walk around the lake. Boating is also nice but a little expensive. Lots of food options but the delhi theme restaurant is the best.

title: Pleasure spot
review: In March 2016 we visited Nainital. This was our third trip in last ten years. We found a big change as far as cleanliness was concerned. Lake was very clean. Most of the rubbish noticed during earlier visits had been removed. People still do not learn and throw garbage here and there. Boat ride was good and govt. arrangements on boat traffic mgt and traffic mgt on main road works very well. Water level was low due to poor rainfall last year. With wate increasing this year, they shall bring in some water sports to promote the area.

title: Great Place to visit
review: This lake is really maintained and there are several type of boats for hire from the counter. Very systematic no middle man in between and no chance of cheating. I recommend for visit of this lake.

title: big and beautiful lake
review: naini lake is one of the famous lakes of india in the mountains of wonderful uttrakhand.view is so beautiful you can enjoy self paddle boating also other side of the lake is famous mall road of nainital.

title: Good view
review: Good scenic beauty, but too much of walking on the mall road, the vehicle road mostly has traffic jams, restaurants always packed, but good place for road side shopping

title: Loved this place
review: I usually travel 2-3 times to Nainital in a year just because of this beautiful lake. I made a point to do the boating in this lake on my every visit without which my journey remains incomplete. Try to get rooms with lake view to soak the beauty.

title: Peaceful boat ride
review: We took a 30 mins boat ride in the evening. It was quite a pleasant experience with not too much of noise around and cool and fresh wind blowing

title: Well maintained
review: We were in Nainital before the holiday season started. Moreover we were staying at a resort outside of Nainital. Hence our visit to the lake was devoid of crowds. We found the surroundings clean and well maintained. The lake water is also quite clean. The view of the lake from the Rope-way is spectacular. No doubt it is the number one attraction of Nainital.

title: A superb lake to spend your evening
review: An excellent place to spend your evening .A boat ride is a must do activity.You can even ride the Horse around the lake .All in all a good place.

title: Nainital Lake
review: The mall road and the Lake is a great tourist area to relax enjoy and shop.  The views of the lake from the Naina devi temple is awesome.

title: Serene Boat Ride
review: Worth it. Time well spent. There are many people offering it. It is right on the main road of the city. Can get really cold in the evening, so pick a time that will suit you.

title: nainital lake
review: A good place for a short holiday. Calm, peaceful, lovely weather but a little bit crowded. Friendly people, boating on the lake. Walks along the mall road and shopping. Good eating places along the lake

title: The only good place in the city
review: The lake is in the heart of the city. Very pretty. The temple near the lake is must visit. boating experience was decent.

title: Beautiful place
review: The best time to visit the lake is in the morning. As the sun shines bright and the wind is warm boating gets better. If you get a hotel with a lake view nothing is better!

title: Emerald of the Mountains
review: The serene mango shaped lake nestled in the mountains soothes the weary eyes of the traveller. This lake lake never fails to mesmerise me. Wish there weren't so many shops and hotels around.

title: Vivek Chaudhary
review: Hello all I would like to give all heartiest congratulations to Manager Mr.Rajender Rawat for doing an excellent job he is very friendly and very caring as he looks after us so well.

title: Ecologically maintained lake
review: The lake is the real treasure of the small city. The govt. there has taken its right care by implanting and maintaining the aeration system in the lake which is rarely seen and found in India. Must visit and enjoy the boating here.

title: Beautiful, Calm and a natural wonder
review: Go for a walk in early morning, Go for boating, enjoy the view of lake in night with lights. Its miracle of nature. Enjoy the peace. But go there is a cold season November to april when it is less crowded.

title: Good lake ride
review: Fairly crowded, but the lake itself was quite clean & cold. Worth a visit when you are in Nainital .

title: Nice Lake
review: Gud place to visit in all season.. Naini lake is clean in comparison of all lakes located near by..Weather remain awesome in between April- Nov

title: Very Good Lake / Neat & Claen
review: I visited Nainital after 6~8 years gap .It has become too crowded .

title: Serenity
review: This is the highlight of Nainital.  A true gem. Don't miss the boating experience in this beautiful lake.

title: Very beautiful place
review: The unique thing about the lake is its location..its located in the middle of the market. The cars and buses drop you 1 Km before the destination and you have to trek to reach the point.

title: Beautiful lake amidst the hills.
review: Loved the nature's creativity. Beautiful lake. One can stay there for hours.

title: Beautiful
review: This is a beautiful lake, the identity of nainital with famous naina devi temple at bank.

title: Very good experience
review: Different types of boats(sail, row, padeller)...we got into paddler, and row boat and enjoyed it to the full...But row boats are driven by boat guys who quickly wants to finish and get next customer.

title: Beautiful, Big and Breathtaking!!
review: Indeed a beauty. Taking walks along the lake with fresh n cool winds blowing was such relaxing. Many options for boating here, and the authorities have done great work to maintain cleanliness around.

title: Naini Lake !
review: This was on walking distance from our hotel and in the vicinity of mall road ! The best lake we have there !  Awesome boating, we can see numerous beautiful fishes from the boat while boating. A must visit, must to do thing !

title: Mesmerizing Place
review: Awesome lake, with  a amazing view. There is road along side the lake where one can take a nice refreshing walk and enjoy the mall road and the serenity and coolness of the "Thandi Sarak". The boat ride in the lake with the amazing view and the chilly air, was a mesmerizing  experience for me. Looking forward for my next visit soon.

title: Well maintained lake
review: It is a clean and well maintained lake with good boating facilities. Also the promenade around it is also well paved and beautifully decorated.

title: It's really amazing.
review: I was really amazed to hear it has water oxygen machine to improve the quality of water. Thus ensuring the best water for marine life. Very neat and clean. Even the local people are keen to keep the lake clean.  The depth of water is still much unknown. Thus make the lake ride very existing. Very tourist friendly place.

title: Beautiful setting
review: Beautiful setting for this hill station popular with both Indian and Overseas visitors. A walk around the lake takes about an hour and is a very enjoyable experience

title: Awesome
review: I have been there 5 times and this has become the most popular place I visited. every time with something new I have picked from there.

title: Dont visit Nainital on Long weekends.
review: Wanaa waste your weekend visit Nainital/haridwar/rishikesh/Shimla.

title: amazing experience
review: awesome boat ride at naini lake which had a picturous views , we ride with both boat and a paddle boat .paddle boat ride was amazing.

title: Really relaxing
review: This is one of few Hill stations on India which have all of it. From site seeing, adventure sports, hotels, local food and shopping.

title: Highlight of the trip
review: We spent hours together by the lakeside just people watching, enjoying the cool breeze and the scenery. The lake is decorated with pretty little boats and yachts and makes it nothing short of a  swiss dream. Definitely a must visit if you are around Nainital

title: Nainital....the queen of lakes
review: Shocked to see the lake in pathetic state..level of water have dipped by 5 fts due to no rains here. Anyway enjoyed boating in it with family

title: Very Nice
review: Very beautiful lake it is. Everything was perfect. Boating is in very nominal rate with awesome view. People are very good there.

title: Must do
review: Lovely to do the shekara boat ride.

title: Boating!!!
review: It is one of a kind, with various legends about its origins. A peaceful spot in the middle of the hustle and bustle of Mall road, it has amazing views!

title: Best Lake In India & huge
review: Very beautiful lake and we wen for Boating twice in our stay. The lake is situated in between the Mountains,  From Lake whole city and rooms are visible. There is a long lane along the Lake. Local Tour is bit costly.

title: Nice lake
review: nice lake its fells good to walk down the lake on Mall Road for boating I would recommend other lakes

title: Well maintained
review: The lake is fairly large sized being in the hills.The water was clean & Authorities have taken great care of surrounding area including mall road & are maintaining high level of cleanliness.could notice no of Toilets/ Washrooms provided in public places.On the whole,good experience.

title: taal o me taal-nainital
review: As by saying its really fantastic lake.never experience such a beauty of nature.lake at a very high altitude.

title: Nainital lake
review: It is a beautiful lake. Boating is excellent. The surrounding city on the hills give a great view. The nearby Naina Devi temple is a must-see temple. The city itself is named after the deity only.

title: Great experience
review: Went on a family vacation, had an awesome boating trip in the lake. Beautiful, calm and serene place, enough to evoke the philosopher in you. Would love to have a half day at least, just sitting on the banks, looking at the lake...

title: Great Experince
review: great boating point. but make sure you had done your boating before 5pm. as after sunset it is not allowed.

title: The green lake
review: Nainital lake is a one of popular tourist spot in North India surrounds by mountain. From top it looks green water lake. I was searching for source of water of this huge lake. There is no river no water falls. Later I came to know that water comes from bottom of the lake, you can visualize it.

title: Cool Naini Lake
review: Visited lat year in March.... Lake is so big and beautiful.... In d Evening it is Fantastic and roam around Lake and Mall Road ... Great view

title: Great for boating and relaxing
review: The Nainital lake is the main attraction point for the city. You can do boating in the lake or just hang around at the sides. There is large open space nearby where you can sit and enjoy the breeze or watch locals play a cricket match.

title: A beautiful natural view...
review: Me with my family visited Nainital in last June..I liked this trip for nainilake ..it's nice.cool..place to pass time peacefully..we enjoyed boat ride in lake..its really amazing..and its not too expensive.In June Nainital  trip little expensive because schools are on vacation people rush to spend holiday.Even weekend must be avoided if someone looking for cool leisure.Its a nearby place of Delhi so in weekend  it becomes so much crowded and expensive.There is a zoo but very difficult to access.

title: Lovely
review: Enjoyed a lovely boat ride with a lovely skipper. The surroundings are very picturesque and is worth taking in a deep breath to truly immerse yourself in the novelty.

title: organized boat rides and very clean.
review: One thing that hits you is that this lake has been kept very clean. Boat rides are well organized and rates are fixed. The water and surroundings are clean and beautiful . The lake is very deep so do not try any funny stuff when on the boat. fishing is banned. The locals are sweet and no tourist traps as far as taking a ride on a boat is concerned.

title: The life of nainital and most important attraction
review: Naini lake is the lifeline of nainital tourism. It is one of the most mesmerizing lakes you'll ever see and is surrounded bu huge hills or mountains to give a beautiful picturesque view.

title: Lake
review: Lake is worth the boating in evening. Its is only 210 per boat. boat is actually divided several part among different boat clubs. rate is same for all. but they cover a fix area only.

title: naini lake
review: Best lake in hilly place. you will enjoy the location with mall road.

title: Beautiful well spread lake
review: Main attraction of Nainital is the Lake. The lake is very well spread and boating is available, which will be enjoyed by everybody of any age. Lovely experience we have there.

title: business
review: Centrally located in Nainital right in front of the mall road and the naini jheel. The view from hotel balcony is breathtaking. Food is...

title: Beautiful
review: Nainital is the city of lakes. And Naini lake is the best among all. Visiting to Nainital, boating in this lake is a must try. You get all types of boats at a nominal cost. Lake is clean and you're not allowed to carry any food item with you on boat like chips or kurkure. Its good.

title: Very beautiful
review: Nainital is a beautiful place. The lake is the main attraction of this place surrounded by Himalaya foothills and trees. You can enjoy boating as the lake is big enough. If you love shopping go to the local markets or to the Mall Road. You can get different varieties of candles in a reasonable price.

title: Good lake. Great view. Must visit!!!
review: One of the best lakes in India. Must visit once in lifetime. Scenic view and boating is also a good.

title: Mesmerising
review: Beautiful lake. A must visit in Nainital, we went boating in the evening and it was the best time, the sun was setting, the weather was chilly as we visited in February, beautiful picturesque view. Ticket is available at the counter.

title: awesome view
review: the view of naini lake from hotel is awesome............. and fishes are very cowerfull and beauty full in tha lake.................

title: Overhyped
review: It is just an ordinary lake with a road alongside.It looks like a mango when viewed from a Height.All the restaurants are situated on the mall road.The old world charm of quite and peace has disappeared with the growing number of cars and the constant honking of horns.

title: Very clean
review: I went to nainital at the start of April. There were less visitors that time.lake is very clean.water is green colour.view of Lake is best from the hills.It looks like a mango.There is boating facility that is also good. very less pollution and the air is very clean.The best part of nainital is that it's a valley and not like other hill stations where u have to climb up.very comfortable with small kids.

title: Nanital is beautiful place. Close to nature
review: Nanital is a beautiful place to relax and enjoy. We visited in the month of November and it was awesome atmosphere. Snow fall starts around January so If you are waiting for snow then you have to wait till January. However November is considered off season.

title: Beautiful and Romantic
review: "Beautiful" this is the only word if you tell me to explain Nainital in one word. This is the very safe city. You can take a walk with your love also after 11AM. This is the one most romantic place in India. The boating in the lake is just excellent and the charge is reasonable.

title: A good experience
review: This is the only reason why people visit nainital for their holidays. Boating in this  lake is very good. It is a very romantic place.

title: the lake
review: amazing lake, Surrounded by mountain,

title: Breathtaking Nainital Lake
review: Nainital Lake is a beautiful setting surrounded by mountains on all sides. It was raining when we visited so we could not do boating, but simply watching the lake, being in Nainital and soaking in the surroundings felt heavenly !

title: Nainital Diaries
review: If you haven't been to Nainital,Let me assure you should totally add this name up in your wish list.Hit this place for numerous beautiful lakes..for numerous adventurous options to try like paragliding or for an experience in a serene and very beautiful surrounding..you can explore the whole area in two-three days..and yes it won't cost much to ur pocket as well.

title: The only best thing in Nainital
review: Only best thing to do in Nainital. You must visit the lake in a boat. There are different types of boats available. You can chhoose based on your requirement. It was a good  experience.

title: Very Beautiful n peaceful Lake
review: Nainital Lake is a very beautiful and clean lake surrounded by mountains.It is very big in size.Boating in this lake with your loved ones give heavenly feeling.

title: Beautiful
review: Its Beautiful & well maintained lake.The lake has great views & is surrounded by mountains.this lake is one of the famous attraction in naintal.There is a nice market around the lake to hang around.

title: Beautiful!!!
review: The center of attraction in entire Nainital. Beautiful lake to walk around and to enjoy boating.

title: Heaven on Earth
review: Nainital lake a beautiful.lake surrounded by hills.trees mountains . A peaceful.place to spend your time for relaxation and peace.    It's an awesome place .A heaven on Earth.  The lake has a  Naina devi temple .  You can spend many hours sitting near the lake watching the peaceful divine lake..  I enjoyed and have been in this lake as I was staying  in nearby hotel classic The Mall hotel.which is just opp the lake.    The boating in Lake too is enjoyable ride with the boatman very friendly in nature honest and simple people

title: Nice place in between the Hills
review: We went to the Nainital Lake in the evening time frame, there was an awesome view of lighting on the lake water, one can sit around the lake & enjoy the beauty of nature.

title: Breathtakingly beautiful!
review: Living on an island, I always seek the waterways when I'm travelling. Even if you do not have the privilege of beaches in your home country, Naini Lake is a refreshing getaway to immerse yourself in. Ensure you bargain for the appropriate rate of the boat ride and simply behold the beauty of the lake, listen to the religious history behind it and even take photos for a lifetime!

title: Good
review: Nice place !! Boating in a big lake within mountains give heavenly feeling. Really bad thing was plastic waste around lake . The tourist should take care of not spoiling beauty of the place.

title: Ntural Beauty
review: Very romantic place i have ever visited the place. peace and calm. my kids enjoyed the boating in lake and nice view

title: Nice Wide Lake
review: Firstly the lake is big enough to satisfy your Natural Beauty experience as it is very wide to enjoy Boating in it with a Beauty of Himalaya Foothills...

title: serene lake and lovely boat ride
review: the lake is neat and clean. It has lots of fishes which kids love watching. There are some swans also in the corner where you can row the boat for a close look.

title: Peaceful & Serene Atmosphere!
review: Naini lake is close to the nature with scenic views.It offers a peaceful and Serene atmosphere! Take a walk around the lake ,behold the nature.You can also do boating on the lake!

title: Neat and clean lake with beautiful view
review: I have visited  Nanital about a dozen times but this visit was first after it was separated as a  new state from State of UP.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Nani Lake is situated near Naina Devi temple. Near lake Fooding counters are available & quality was good & economical. I will strongly recommend this place for the visiting new couples . In the lake boating facility is also available.

title: Serene but not exquisite
review: Not much it's a lake with high population and honking of four wheelers. The mall road shopping is similar to one in shimla except one could find little peace. The bhotia market near naini Devi temple is much better than mall road. Zoo park made me realise the potential we humans do the cage animals.

title: Serene boating experience
review: I have been to this lake more than a dozen times in the last two years. The climate of Nainital makes boating in this lake very lovely. The breathtaking sorroundings ensure that you feel you are part of a film shoot.

title: Serene As Always!!
review: I have been visiting Nainital for the last 20 years and it has not changed at all. One of the most unique hill station of India.

title: Gorgeous gem in the valley
review: The nanital lake area reminds me of Colorado's Estes Park. There is a long row of shops, though none of them sell higher end artisan items. Lots of nicknacks And some cheap/lower quality kashmiri textiles.  You can drive up to the top of the mountain for great views and you can have a boatman row you around the lake for a fee.  There's a few other sites like a laughable water fall (barely 20 ft) and a botanical garden which late Dec was mostly brown.

title: good place to visit very peacful
review: good place to visit very peacful...I visited Nainital with my family for first time my family is frequent visitor to this place however I find kind of one time trip

title: Main attraction of Nainital !!
review: It is the central attraction for Nainital. You can have boating and spend some good quality time with family. There are around 6/7 points from where you can take boat. Both paddle boat and oars (chappu) are available. I would like to confirm that no swimming and motor boat is allowed in lake. Although people do feed fishes but as per law it is prohibited and written at many places as well. If some law enforcing person catches you, you will have to pay a fine of Rs 500 !! So be careful. Also lake is extremely deep and clean. As per persons living there no one exactly knows how deep lake is (assumption is more than 150 Feet)

title: nanitaal lake
review: nainital taal lake is very big and very neat and clean .when you boat in it you can enjoy all natural beauty and a look of maal road together .must visit place

title: Good for short trip
review: Good place for short trip....you can enjoy boating....can have lea sure time at naini Jheel ....can feed fish

title: Nainital visit
review: Nainital is a good place where we get a beautiful weather and piece place to spent a god time where we had visited marinade I temple and had boating in Nainital lake which gives us a beautiful experience of life. Food and local market near the was also very good in taste with reasonable price. When we are in boat and sun rays coming from opposite side hill top was giving a superb view. Sun gives light to half lake and shadow to half lake which create a beautiful image of lake. Handcraft market near nainadevi temple is a good place to find a new and useful items.

title: Beautiful lake very well maintained
review: this lake is very big, water is neat and clean, you can see fishes swimming beneath water. boat ride was very nice. local people and friendly to tourist. We visited temple nearby that was also very nice. Food in local stalls was tasty too.

title: Nainital Lake - The Top Spot in Nainital
review: Nainital Lake suddenly bursts into your view as you drive in into Nainital. It dominates the entire landscape of this charming hill station. It is definitely worthwhile to take a boat and go around the lake. The rates are all Govt specified, and hence you can be sure that you are paying what it is actually worth.The Muncipal Corporation of Nainital deserves all the credit for keeping the lake free of garbage and pollution despite the heavy tourist load in Nainital. Overall a good experience.

title: Nainital, another hidden Gem
review: Lots to see in Nainital, the lakes is a wonderful place to take a boat out, take the cable car up to the top of the hill and look across towards the Himalayas. Wander through the streets, eat ice cream and watch the sun go down...Whats not to like?

title: Stunningly beautiful
review: One of the most under rated places. The lake is so beautiful, one cannot keep eyes off it. We went in winters and fortunately it was a sunny day. It was a piece of paradise.

title: Heaven on Earth
review: What a place to be. We were fortunate to go on a weekday thus the streets werent so crowded. We enjoyed nainital thorougly.

title: Awesome
review: Nainital lake is the heart of Nainital which has 1.5 KM in length and around 250 ft deepness. It fulfills daily water needs of people living here. You can take a closer look of it by boating in the lake.

title: Polluted
review: Gone are the days when the colourful boats sailed majestically across the transparent waves of water. The lake has shrunk in size and the polluted water stinks, fed by untreated slush from surrounding restaurants & hotels. Try Bhimtal.

title: Cool, Calm and beautiful place
review: beast month to visit in October. pleasant environment, beautiful.

title: one of d favorite place for a vacation in north
review: one of the most crowded and frequently visited place in uttarkhand. lake is very good. the fog keeps on playing hide and seek,boat ride is enjoyable. evening walk on the mall road is very famous

title: Mesmerizing lake relaxing boat ride
review: Spent a good hour enjoying the beautiful Naina lake. Awesome view of mountains and clean,beautiful lake. The rates are fixed by  government. There are many folks who make their living through this. Very relaxing beautiful and scenic boat ride

title: Beautiful lake surrounded by hills and colourful houses stacked closely.
review: A beautiful lake with blue water and colourful row boats, for as little as 150/boat you can spend got 30-40 mins enjoying the lake from the boat. The boatman will give you decent information about the history. Really beautiful.

title: Mesmerizing!
review: A must visit place for once in a lifetime. The locals here live & cherish on Tourism and this is one of the main reason, Nainital Lake and all attractions here are worth the time & resources invested for the trip.

title: Naini lake boating simply super duper
review: Visited Nainital in January third week this year,climate was amazing though too chill, The boating at lake was beautiful. Less.Less crowded place,clean city,well maintained,calm place.Its a true holiday spot where we can relax peacefully!!

title: "simply beautiful"
review: every thing here is awesome..go with family or friends will enjoy to fullest and will love to go again n again

title: Prime attraction of Nainital
review: After a long time I went around the lake for morning walk. One must walk around this lake once in a lifetime.

title: One of the most picturesque Lakes in India
review: If we consider only the prominent hill stations , then this is one of the most picturesque Lakes in India. A 1/2 hour boating is a fantastic affair in a lazy sunny afternoon. You can take a walk around the lake , eat Chinese / Tibetan food and spent a nice evening. But , the only drawback is the city remains crowdy throughout the year , definitely not favorable for peace loving people.

title: sweet lake for single visit
review: nice lake, but people around for boating profession aren't so friendly or good. try to cheat you more and less time given. are not so educated about history

title: Heavenly view
review: Morning Lake view makes you feel like you are standing in Heaven with Fog all around you... Boating Strongly recommended in Lake...

title: Nainital lake
review: Amazing excellent great place to enjoy relax and unwind with family.best season to visit marital is December to March no rush you can enjoy every bit of Nainital.

title: Awesome boating experience
review: Perfect for day boating in the bright sunny day. Options include peddle boat, yacht, chappu boat. Charges for 2 seater boat: 160 and for 4 seater 210

title: Amazing Nainital
review: We stayed at Naukuchiatal and went to Nainital as sight seeing. Lake is like dream land. Ambient Temperature was 0 degree. Roads are well maintained. There was no plastic found at nainital as a movement of Government.

title: Nainital and in real sense its the jewel in the crown.
review: Take a walk along side the lake in the mall road area and that's the best.The lake also have a huge variety of fishes which can be seen around the shores if you go early in the morning.

title: Peaceful lake town
review: I have been going to Nainital every year .  Avoid peak seasons when tourist rush is high. Feb / Aug/Sep  is good time to visit.

title: Stunning
review: The NAini LAke offers you amaing vista as you take a walk around it and also from the hotel. The clear still water, the surrounding hills and the lights and reflections are spellbinding.

title: A Beautiful Riding ......
review: Awesome roads... u can cruise beautifully.... and aftr reaching nainital... your whole tiredness magically gone.... u must go there.... and i prefer u ride along the way

title: Some snaps
review: Its best to go there in off season as the crwod is less! Especially winters ; the cricked ground and the scenery around is breathtaking

title: Scenic!!
review: Weather is awesome in feb, Lake is clean and it adds beauty to that place.

title: Beautiful !
review: I had an amazing view of this lake from my hotel's balcony ! Calm , serene and quiet !! Pathway parallel to the Mall road , perfect for a nice long walk :)

title: Clean lake with lots of activities and shops around
review: I can spend hours besides this lake sipping coffee, reading a book, and eating Maggi. This is a place which will calm your nerves while the rest of the population goes by without bothering you.

title: Simply mesmerizing....
review: The best attraction of Nainital and in real sense its the jewel in the crown. Take a walk along side the lake in the mall road area and that's the best.

title: clean and serene lake
review: Worth spending load of times at the banks of the lake. Plethora of things to do like boating, sailing and just staring at the lake while munching snacks or sipping hot beverage.

title: Beautiful lake must take boat ride
review: Since i am a disabled person on wheelchair its very very difficult for me to get on a boat but the boat owners were so nice they all together helped me to get into a boat. we took one complete round to and fro we were 3 of us and they charged about 240 Rs or somethingand there are two points to take the boat one from the side of the temple and one on nainital lake side we took it from the lake side and not the peddel boat but the normal one.wearing the life jacket.

title: Awesome
review: Lake view is a main junction of Nanital its also known as Mall Road. Best for shopping, eating and roaming

title: 5 stars..
review: Nice experience. ..

title: Cool place to spend time
review: A one/two hour boating in the lake provides a very good view of the hill slopes around. The lake also have a huge variety of fishes which can be seen around the shores if you go early in the morning.

title: 1 Day trip to Nainital
review: We covered the major points like lake, cable car to the 5 point check, Zoo and shopping market. Must say had the of the  best one day trip of My life with my 2 yr old kid.

title: Best Place in Nainital !! Night Wake is Must !!
review: This is one of the best place in Nainital. In day time you can enjoy Boating and Night Wake after Sunset is one of the best !!

title: Best Lake in The World...
review: Yes. that's true this is the best lake and i love to do boating again and again and cleanly maintained.

title: Nainital 2014
review: Visited Nainital  just after Dassehra. Lot of people ther due to vacation. Enjoyed boating in naini lake in the morning and evening.

title: Nainital can't be imagined without lake
review: Nainital is all about the Naini lake, and the hills nearby. In fact this town is named after this lake only. Beautiful place with temple, gurudwara nearby and lots of shopping on adjoining mall road. Boat ride and cable car trip is a must to enjoy this place completely.

title: Take a lazy ride on the sail boat with a book and eats for half a day
review: The lake is cleaned and much welcoming. the sail boat has always been a hit with me and the amazing designer candles that make a wonderful giveaway.

title: Heavenly views
review: What a scenic beauty! It's a life time experience to visit Naini Lake. Boating is a pleasure. Boatmen are very nice. In winter days you feel chilled. Really a tourists attraction.

title: New Year 2016 Trip
review: This was my first trip of new year 2016, Weather was not cold as expected in Nainital, due to new year celebrations, whole area was decorated with lights, clean lake with boating facilities up to 5 PM. Covered with so many hotels.

title: Beautiful Place
review: Excellent place. The lake was quite serene. Boating in the lake was real fun. Best attraction of Nainital.

title: Green lake of Nainital
review: Enjoy the green hills while you ride sikaras, paddle boats on the lake. A cool breeze engulfs and you relax on cool water.

title: Key place in Nainital
review: This is a key tourist spot in Nainital. It is a very large lake. Walking across the lake is a good experience. Many restaurants along the road adjacent to the lake

title: Awesome Lake
review: Very Large lake with fantastic view. One side of the lake have  Thandi sadak with lots of tree plantation. other side Naina devi temple. Boating is at reasonable price. we paid Rs. 150/- for 30 mis. paddle boat.

title: Nice Lake
review: Long Lake.... Nainital is around this lake. Boating is really a GREAT experience... Chilled air flowing and boat is rowing....WOW  !!!!.... Lot more things are on a lake side

title: Beautiful & Cleanly maintained lake
review: Beautiful & Cleanly maintained lake. good activities to do and also very nice streets around the lake to hang around.

title: BEAUTIFUL
review: It's one of the most beautiful view which you will remember for a long time... The lake is situated just at the center of the city... Surrounded by hills. Once there do try boating... Which is really relaxing...

title: The Centrepoint of the city
review: All the activities surround this lake and this is what draws the tourists to the city. The road along the lake is picturesque and worthy of walk. Boating in lake is not to be missed.

title: great view
review: boating and yachting can be done on the lake.provides a great view.ariel view of the lake is awesome.

title: Must Visit...
review: You can take Yatch ride also... There Yatch Club near Lake.. and Restaurant attached to it.. Good Experience

title: Good place
review: Good place, but parking is a big problem at Mall road and adjacent areas.  Even during average rush, parking was full and we faced a lot of problem to find a suitable parking space for vehicle.

title: Star attraction of Nainital
review: One of my favourate place which I visit every year . From the fishes which are visible in pristine water to the peace of the place one can spend hours sitting on the bank of the river or take a peaceful boat ride which can be taken from boat counters built all along the shore line .

title: Peace of mind
review: Nice place to enjoy the boating with family and friends. A great Bhutani market surrounded at one end.

title: Beautiful Lake -  makes for a good two night vacation
review: Nainital lake is by every measure a beautiful,  idyllic lake which is circled by a lively mall Road and adorned by boats.  The lake is a valley lake which is enclosed by mountains and the civilization which has taken over these mountains makes for great starry lights in the night.

title: Beautiful!!
review: No wonder why this city is named Nainital and is so famous... This lake is simply awesome. Do enjoy a walk by the lake side..

title: Not the best
review: I thought before going to Nainital that it would be a fabulous hill station. To be very honest, I did not find this place very interesting. I would rate Kausani higher than Nainital.

title: Take a very nice boat ride
review: The boat ride is worth it. And it's cheap too.. I forget the price, but it was perhaps around Rs. 120 or Rs. 200 for a 30 minute ride. (A similar boat ride for a much shorter duration in Bhimtal cost Rs. 220). Lots of boats to see (exactly 222?). Some sailboats even.

title: Speechless View from nainital lake
review: Great place for boating, rope way and shopping. You can roam around mall road and can enjoy street food.

title: Refreshment to see lake
review: its energetic to view lake and too good when you ride a boat with family or friends.. i visit this lake 4 times and my mind says go again...its too good and clean lake, boat rider is well trained and lake is clean, roads is clean,,,

title: Superb Natural location of lake
review: The lake is located with mountains on three sides. The view is fantastic. The lake side need to be beautified by the authorities. The lake side is the main tourist attraction of the town, with option of street vendors.

title: good view
review: It was good experience .First time i was bot , the lake have good views , cost for bot 210rs for full round

title: Mesmerizing Nainital
review: A very beautiful and clean lake. You can enjoy boating here ( 9 am to 6 pm). On one side of the lake there is Naina Devi Temple. You can get down from the boat to reach the temple or you can reachl by road too.

title: Awesome boating experience
review: Nainital Lake is clean and spread over wide area. Boating in lake is much enjoyable preferably in the evening with sparkling colors of lights around Mall road. View of hills around is magnificent. A perfect evening indeed.

title: Romantic Nainital Lake
review: We had been to Nainital on Nov'15. Awesome place to go around. You can hang out with your Spouse/friends/family. Clean and well maintain. There is a temple near by where they put Bhajans. This makes atmosphere auspicious and energetic. Take your winter wear for your protection. Opposite to Lake, You will find Tea wala comes around 4:30PM-7PM. We enjoyed his tea. Day was full of fog and chilly.

title: Superb..
review: We visited here in 2012.. It's an awesome place.. Lake is situated in center of city.. Near by mall road pases .. It's really beautiful.. We enjoyed boating ... We stayed 5 days n almost Every day we did boating...

title: Looks green due to the trees all around
review: You can opt for boating on this lake.. There are lots of kiosks for boating and you can opt for it from anywhere.

title: Lovely
review: Great place for boating. Lovely lake with scenic beauty. Lot of shopping available. Also few places of interest nearby.

title: Nostalgia
review: The Naini lake is the most prime feature of Nainital, hence the name. It is a beautiful and well maintained lake

title: Naini Lake
review: Enjoyed boating on tiny boats made of different woods , jungping fishes were beautiful , we too half round of lake

title: Nainital Lake
review: One can enjoy a good boat ride. A nice walk along the lake while you eat in the restaurants besides it is a pleasant experience.

title: Very nice place
review: Nainital Lake and surrounding areas are very well maintained and very nice place to hangout. Its a must visit place in Nainital.

title: Great boat ride
review: The ride in the lake is quite nice and exciting. You can easily get a boat at the standard government fixed ratest therefore there is no tension of bargaining. The boat mans are locals and nice people. You can enjoy the ride with great views and nice sunshine.

title: Nani Lake...!!
review: One of the beautiful creation of god..Nani lake offers a picturesque view of entire Nanital and a boat ride.!!

title: Good
review: Very quiet place in Nainital.Nice boating facilities. Friendly people ......nice aquatic life. Excellent weather and environment

title: amazing to see sun rise, amazed to see the process of oxygen supply to Naini Lake
review: amazing always wake up early and walk all around the lake in the morning time you will see different colors of sun and take bread omlate with tea after you walk of 30-45 min. you would feel the purity and cold of air. very good sight in early morning

title: Nainital  = Naini Lake
review: This lake is the central property of Nainital and the reason why civilization came to this beautiful place and made Nainital what it is today. Wherever you plan to go in Nainital - you will cross roads with this Naini lake.

title: One of natural Lake
review: Have ever seen any overseas lake location ...you will get same feelings ....enjoy pleasant walk this is the best place of hill location...lovely climate entire year...most crowded in summers...winters you will enjoy the your privacy.

title: Best thing of Nainital
review: Heart of Nainital situated at heart of the city. Its quite breathtaking to view this lake from any side of Nainital. No need to say anything about natures beauty. Boat ride option is available in various option like Sikara boat, peddle boat or Surfing. The rates are reasonable and one should make sure to do a boat ride while Nainital.

title: Nice view, great boating
review: Lake is beautiful. It is clean, calm. Boating facilities are very romantic, with you and your better half can enjoy cold breeze in middle of the lake.

title: Magnificent views and a must place for boating
review: Nainital lake has a magnificent view whether you look from top of the mountain or while having a boat ride in the middle of the lake. Boating does not cost dearer on your pocket. Do stop for a while in middle of the lake to enjoy the peace.

title: The best attraction of Naintal
review: The USP for Nainital is its lake in between, The entire Mall road surrounds the Naini Lake. There are walk-ways around the lake and boating arrangement as well. The Nainital downtown looks stunning during evening with the lights around the lake glittering and with its reflection on the water.

title: Wonderful Lake
review: The lake had great views and the boating was an awesome experience. The lake is covered by mountains all around. This is a must visit

title: Lovely Lake
review: You in Nainital then this is a must visit. Hire a boat and just enjoy the lovely scene. It good to be in the lake and view the lovely mountains around. Safety jacket is must which the provide you.

title: One off the biggest and cleanest Lakes on Hill stations in India
review: One off the biggest and cleanest Lakes on Hill stations in India, lot of boating options and very scenic views

title: Awesome experience
review: Boating in Nainital lake is must for everyone visiting Nainital. It's a huge lake with various types of boats with Oars/Sails/Pedals to chose from. The water is clean and we thoroughly enjoyed the experience with lot of help from the boatman

title: The bean shaped Lake
review: The Nani lake is a huge lake and is bean shaped

title: The best lake ever!
review: Really the nicest and one of the most beautiful lakes in the country today.

title: Nainital
review: The moment you reach nainital town all you see is a lake nestled between the hills. A good visit will be an hour max while you eat around inthe restaurants besides the lake. We went in early morning & it was very pleasant in March

title: Enjoyed boat ride ..
review: Enjoyed boat ride, and a trip across the lake to a temple.  Good walk from there to get back to our hotel

title: BEST LAKE
review: it is one of the most beautiful freshwater lakes in the country i love to visit this lake again and again so i recomend people to visit this lake

title: Beautiful Scenery
review: Beautiful sight when you go for boating, you can see beautiful mountains around, adjacent mall road gives another beautiful scenery

title: A day at nainital
review: Weather was very pleasent. Natural beauty was stunning. sun rise with bells of naina devi temple with morning prayers made it incomparable place.

title: Changed a lot in 10 Years
review: I had been to Nainital when i was small, and I had fallen in love with the beautiful lake surrounded by hills... It was all shades of blue and grey... I again went in the year 2012. The place had changed completely. The mall road was buzzing with hotels and cars. Honestly speaking I did not like the place this time :(

title: Heaven on a lake
review: Health was down due to cols but the single trip on a boat in the lake cheered me up with the glowing sun in the cold adding pearl to this heavenly moment.

title: The lake is good but too crowdy most of the times.
review: I went to Nainital via Kashipur and the trip was good but it's very cold in winters so make sure to have your woolens packed with you.

title: centre point of attraction in Nanital
review: The Main Centre Point of local attraction in Nanital. You can Do Boat rides in naini lake with cheap  price ..Enjoy quality time with  your loved once by taking Boat rides or walk around nanital lake.

title: Family boat ride
review: This is in the heart of Nainital. The place is generally flooded with tourists. So, plan your time accordingly so that you can have a peaceful time. Nov to Feb is a nice time to visit the place.

title: So Beautiful
review: I always visit this beautiful city only and only due to this nainital lake. It is surrounded by hills, temples, market. You can enjoy boating here.

title: Main attraction of Nainital
review: The lake in the middle of a busy city is exquisite. The higher part of the lake is called Mallital and lower side is called Mallital. There is good walk way beside the lake (Mall road having shops, hotels). Boating is available on both ends however Mallital is popular because of the surrounding. Naina Devi Temple, Bhutia Market and the way to Ropeway is near to this place. Boating is normal as in any other lake however lake view at night is exquisite wid lighted city around the lake.  lake being located in such a busy area, but very well maintained. Strict traffic rules. Evening time 6 pm to 8 pm no vehicle is allowed on mall road. Do the shopping happily. Plenty of Eateries. Very enjoyable.

title: Calm & Cool
review: Some lake side areas are noisy but if you can ignore this a little bit then its a pleasant place to walk around, specially in morning & in late evening.

title: Mango shaped Lake
review: We visited Nainital is the month of January one of the coldest times to visit the place, however, boating in the famous Nainital Lake is an experience in itself !! Apart from the fact that all the major tourist attractions such as the temples,rope-way etc. are visible from within the lake. The person rowing the boat was such a great guide to the cultural heritage of Nainital. Life jackets are a must therefore safety is not of a major concern. Enjoy this lovely clean lake in the shape of a Mango !

title: Its a beautiful weekend destination
review: Nainital is a beautiful lake town with very good temperatures. Do carry an umbrella as it can rain anytime or buy one in nainital. The lake is named Naini Lake which is almost 1.5 km long, where everyone can enjoy boating. Its a must do. There is a ropeway which lakes u to a point whe u can see the himalyan mountain range and can enjoy doind various trilling rides or can just have a hot cup of tea.    Beside lake lake there is a mal road with shop hotels and restaurants.  Nainital also has a  stadium there a beautiful Mosque, a Gurudwara and a Temple and in the centre is the famous Tibetan market where one can bargain cloths and watches, etc.   One should go to Mallital where u can see the local life of Nainital and try some local cuisines..    It is best for 3 or 4 days vacation. And if u are planning for more days add  Mukhteshwar, Ranikhet, Bhimtal, Naukuchiatal,  and Jim Corbet National park..      April to October u will need light woolens during sunset and October to November it rains a lot. December to march it snows and its perfect for snow lovers to go in January and February. One can olso enjoy paragliding during May Mune and July near youth hostel.

title: Heart of Nainital
review: Boating in the famous Nainital Lake is an experience in itself !! It's liberating and romantic at the same time. All the major tourist attractions such as the temples are visible from within and a easy means to explore all the sides of Nainital. The cold breeze is rejuvenating at the very best and therefore is a must visit

title: Beautiful & well maintained lake in awesome hill station - Nainital
review: It is said that the name of the city 'Nainital' is derived from this beautiful lake, Naini lake. It is a superb lake with great view of surrounding hills, city, mall road and almost all the attractions of Nainital. One must do the boating in this lake when visited to Nainital. There are various boats available, yacht, traditional boat driven by person or pedal boat too. The best thing is unlike other hill stations where one would have to bargain with boat driver/person, here the rates are fixed for boat, so no need to waste time in bargaining the rent, instead select the boat, go & get the ticket and start enjoying boating in this beautiful lake. Despite a lot of tourists visits & boating, this lake is very well maintained, I came to know from our boat owner that there are lot of cleaning equipments have been placed inside the lake for purification. Go ahead and enjoy the boating in this beautiful lake.

title: Well Mainiatined and beautifull Hill station with strict Traffic rules around Lake
review: We went Nainital 3 days and 2 nights in November2015 , I found this place very happening full of tourist friendly places and people.

title: 2 days in nainital
review: nice lake. did boating. it was cold during diwali, but enjoyed it fully. but maintenance and cleanliness of lake should increase

title: Beautiful
review: I always love this lake. this time when I visited it was less crowded, lake was at its peak. I went for morning walk & took a round of lake. It was looking beautiful in clear weather. to enjoy its beauty you go in the morning, take around & sit near by & enjoy divine feeling.

title: gorgeous lake for a romantic boating experience
review: The lake is sparkling clean and light breeze creates the perfect atmosphere for a romantic boat ride.

title: AWESOME NATURAL BEAUTY
review: Visited Naini lake in November 2015, relatively off season. The lake is nicely maintained with rather clean water and lots of fish were seen during boating. The boatride is a must have during visit to Naini lake. The boatboy was doind the duty for more than 20 yrs and explanied details about Nainital & lake. The lake water is filtered & supplied for drinking purposes by Municipal corporation. The panormic view of lake is just awesome with mountains & Buildings on both sides of the lake. Small cricket ground is seen adjoining lake.Evening walk is as great along the lake side on Mall road with shops on one side.Most of the hotels are within walking distance from the lake. We have happy memories with Naini lake as we had our honeymoon in Nainital 27 yrs back.

title: Nainital Lake - relived my old days of rowing!
review: During my college days I used to row in small boat at Boat Club behind Krishi Bhavan, New Delhi where water is hardly 3 feet deep. I loved a brief experience allowed by the boatman, to row in very deep Lake (maximum 90 feet).

title: Huge Lake it is!
review: In spite of the lake being located in such a busy area, it is very clean. Hats off to the administration. There are rowing and paddling boats for boating. Adjacent to the lake are the naina devi temple and the bhutia market.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The jewel in crown of Nainital is the LAKE. Marvelous!! Boating is a delight, simply gazing it and its surrounding mountains is awesome.

title: Beautiful Lake !!
review: This is the main attraction of Nainital, the lake is surrounded by mountains provides awesome view. You can do boating or roam around the street. Several restaurant and food joints are located along with the Lake.

title: Beautiful lake in this height of himalaya
review: People can enjoy by watching innumerable fish and duck. Boating is also one of the major attraction of this lake. Moreover, there is no bargain. The rates are fixed, which makes tourists very ease.

title: NAINI LAKE
review: NAINITAL most beautiful place to be visited the place enhancement is incomplete without naini lake............amazing lake..with boating facility.

title: Very beautiful neat & clean
review: First time, we saw a lake in the middle of a city, so neat and clean. The boating/sailing was really beautiful, so also was the boatmen with his bollywood picturisation stories. Anycase, if you are in Nainital, do not miss riding on these boats.

title: Serene and romantic
review: The lake is exquisite when viewed during the night when its sparkling waters toy around with the numerous lights hanging on its edges, and lend it a beautiful magical appearance. It looks almost enchanting and mesmerizing that when I entered Nainital I couldn’t help but take pictures of the lake while we were moving in the car. The photos are a bit blurred but I hope you understand my predicament here. In the day, the lake looks equally beautiful amidst seven hills, speckled with pretty cottages and villas around. At night the lake turns magical when reflection of multitudes of bulbs from the hill sides and quite a large number hanging near the lake’s edge shoot their magic light into its waters. You can walk around the lake in about an hour – the southern side is more peaceful and has good views of the town. Boatmen will row you around the lake in their brightly painted gondola-like boats, or the Nainital Boat Club will sail you around the lake and you also have an option of the pedal boats for hire.

title: Amazing Place
review: Nainital is superb.. Boating at nainiee lake is so nice and soothing.. the Mall road is amazing. I advise to stay on mall road.. classic the mall is a good choice.. Having a good view..

title: just 40 minutes ride away from Haldwani. best place to hangout and enjoy
review: Nainital,., famous for candles, food, beautiful natural scenic beauty. you will fall in love with this place. Good place for Photographers aswell.

title: Best attractions
review: This is one of the center of attraction in nainital.. The lake is very beautiful and you have many things to do apart from  casual walk in the evening. Near by shops are very good. You will find good eateries and souvenir shops.

title: nanital lake
review: Nanital lake is very big and very neat and clean .here you can enjoy boat ride of traditional style .mall road is all arround it

title: Tour
review: Good palace to visit

title: A weekend destination
review: It can easily be called as one of the best weekend destination. Naini Lake surrounded by hills all the side make Nainital a beautiful place to relax. In summers when the sun is red and hot, Nainital provide the perfect weather, cool breeze blowing across the lake and all the Mall Road hotels light falling into the lake makes it heaven. There are good quality restaurant to eat. If you are a street food lover then Bhutia Market is the perfect place. Apart from this there are numerous activities for kids like gaming and enjoying a ropeway ride.

title: Beautiful...
review: Boating experience in this lake is the best you can get. When we traveled the weather was awesome. I would surely recommend.

title: Old British time hill station of Kumaon Hills
review: Attracts crowds from all over and is famous for Nainadevi Temple, Naini Lake, Himalayan views from tops, ropeway, horserides, mall road with market place, famous for perfumed candles, caves garden.

title: Clean City
review: Nainital, the 1st hill station that I visited in North India. It was a delight to walk on the lake side in Nainital. Exquisite view where colourful boats are sailing on Lake, surrounded by mountains on one side and hotels on other. Dustbins are fixed on 100 Mts. Distance. People are helpful and friendly.

title: Naini lake
review: Beautiful lake surrounded by hills . Boating is as normal as in any other lake.Cycle rickshaw ride from one corner to other corner is a different experience.Mall road is on one side of the lake with hotels & shops.

title: Awesome experience in diwali time
review: Really great experience in the time of diwali 2015. The surrounding was so lighted up that it creates a breath taking view in the evening. The calmness of the lake it self is so engrossing that people like to spend most of their time beside the lake.

title: Beautiful lake in busy vacation town
review: Lovely blue Nainatal Lake is tucked in a valley cradled by the Himalayan foothills.  We hired a boat and it was an exceptional experience to see the town and foothills from this purview. The weather in November was warm so only light jackets were needed on the water.

title: Still Beautiful...
review: The lake continues to have its eternal charm of a large water body. surrounded by mountains - actually kept clean, thanks to some solid work done by the local administration. Its still fun boating in the lake or paddling along in different styled paddle boats. The surrounding mountains provide a picaresque view. The adjacent bhutia market is a shoppers paradise for knick knack wears & fares for the winters - from woolen stockings and socks to warm night wear to bags and ruck sacks at very resonable prices. The temple on the banks is a peaceful prayer spot for the religious and the umpteen restaurants offer acceptable food and cuisine to choose from - the Uttarakhandi chinese variation to the typical butter chicken and naan! The pony and horse rides are always popular. I prefer the quiet times to visit, away from the popular holiday week ends. But if you enjoy the hustle bustle of a crowded mall to walk up an down the mall - any time is good time to visit the Naini Taal lake.

title: Sagar
review: Nice city with lot's of things around there is zoo,on top of the hill Rope way to see the beautiful view of Nainital lake and Himalayan mountains, mall road is always full of people and naina devi Temple facing the lake and lastly very cold city to enjoy your vacation

title: Awesome Lake
review: The quiet lake with exquisite surroundings and exotic setting is simply mesmerising. You would feel overwhelmed and captivated completely.

title: Relaxation in middle of hills.
review: One of the hilstations that I can visit everytime I plan a vacation. Very neat and clean lake between the hills. Boating feels good. Take the boat which you can paddle to take a complete round of the lake.

title: Mountain Lake
review: Just like any other lake but clean and large. The usual facilities of boating. Mall road is on its eastern periphery.

title: Good to spend time
review: Good lake and tourist attraction, can take rest after visiting zoo. boating experience and big Maggi point.

title: Lake View, Boating, and Horse riding is very very awesome.
review: Please don`t try even rope way. Nothing to see, waste of time & money. Food in Embassy Restourant was excellent, even you can try Shere Punjab for Non veg, and Nanak for Pure veg.. Excellent food.

title: Beautiful!!
review: This lake holds its significance due to an old legend.Also it is one of the main tourist attraction.You can do boating and yatching over here while browsing the beautiful surrounding.

title: Good lake
review: Very clean and maintained lake.boating is good fun there.view is great from lake.both paddle and shikara type options are there.

title: Great Lake
review: I visited Nainital, back in 1998, then it was not that Good. It was smelly and didn't had fishes in it.

title: naini lake
review: amazing fresh ,scenic,mesmerizing view ,lake is clean with lots of fish,boating was awesome with coole breeze passing by your face...must visit

title: Amazing
review: Paradise on Earth. Clean fresh water. Boating in the lake was an amazing experience. Gives a complete view of the city.

title: Take a break on a boat
review: The lake is much cleaner now that it use to be. Its nice to rent a boat and relax on the lake. The south side can be very crowded. Its better to get a boat in the northen side or in the middle.

title: great place for a morning boating session
review: we went for boating after a morning walk along with the lakeside. the water can be cleaned and maintained well. its a eye shaped lake or more of mango shaped....few temples around the lake....n lot of hotels offer lake view rooms

title: Sail boat is real fun in the lake.
review: Hope to get good amount of wind, so that real adventure can take place.

title: Soothing!
review: If you're not visiting the hill station during the peak season, a walk around the lake is enjoyable! The lake is clean and calming.

title: One of the Best and Neat Lakes in India...
review: A big lake on the Nainital Hill Station with options of Boating, Eating, Shopping at local market etc.

title: Boating, Yachts, clean-green water forms the Heart of Nainital
review: The entire town is based around the lake. It is beautiful. The lakeside is decorated by what seemed to be like Maple trees. Row boats, Paddle boats and Yachts are all available. Yachts ply from 9 AM- 4 PM. Charges INR 500 per yacht for two people along with a sailor. They are supposed to sail across the entire lake but the timing is uncertain and depends on the wind speed. The row boats are available in Tallitaal. They accommodate 4 people and charges INR 210 per boat. The boat covers the entire Tallital, it takes about half an hour. The boatman was very friendly. Paddle boats ply in Mallitaal. A library rests on stilts over the lake.The lake is very clean and well maintained.

title: Best Lake in INDIA
review: Nainital is one of the hill station where you can find peace. Weather is always good, even in winters. Boating experience at nainital can't be missed.

title: “Serene, calm & soothing experience.”
review: Naini lake in Nainital is the main tourist attraction of Nainital. One can sit for hours next to the lake or spend time boating on the lake, this is the best place to spend your time in Nainital. Whether it is towards Tallital or Mallital, the Naini lake in Nainital is the main tourist attraction of Nainital. The entire water seems green because of the high hills surrounding the lake. At one end is the bus stand & market. Along one side runs The Mall, a split level road crammed with hotels, food outlets, gift shops & tour shops.

title: Mesmerizing experience in natures lap
review: Mesmerizing experience in natures lap surrounded by mountains all around. Must visit place. Evenings are quite chilly so try to finish boat ride before 5pm. charge Rs 210 for full trip till Pashandevi Temple and 160 Rs for half trip

title: Nice open space
review: We ended up taking a paddle boat and cruising around at our own pace, even sitting in the middle of the lake reading. There are lots of people everywhere and the water could be cleaner, but pretty decent way to spend an hour or two.

title: Nice place
review: The star attraction of Nainital. . There are several boating  available, including paddle and row boats. , restaurants, hotels and shops border the lake.

title: Stunningly beautiful!!!!!!
review: Its the beauty of the lake that can draw you there more than once...The deep blue water, surrounding pine trees, the beautiful town, charming weather, boat ride...The experiences are never ending...DON'T FORGET TO VISUALIZE THE CASHEW SHAPE OF THE LAKE FROM HILLTOP

title: Still mesmerizing
review: I visited Nainital after a gap of 10 years but it has its own charm. Spend some relaxing time just looking at lake or do boating. It has its charm.

title: Awesome Lake
review: Awesome Experience. Naini Lake is must for Tousrits visiting Nainital. It runs parallel to Mall road and has great boating option. A walk along side Naini Lake in the evening is a must. It has many Eateris and shop very near to it for local shopping Experience

title: Simple, Calm, Beautiful
review: Just roam around on mall road or take a boat ride with your friends/ family and enjoy this beautiful lake. has been maintained quite well.

title: Lake nestled in between hills
review: This beautiful lake is situated in between hills and a 1 hour boating will make you feel refreshing.

title: Nice experience of boating
review: Naini lake is the best place for boating & roaming around in evening.This is the heart of nainital itself.

title: Amazing Experience
review: Awesome Place And Atmosphere. One of the best hill station with entertaining stuffs...

title: Ohh What a bliss
review: Had heard Naini lake is great, though wondered what could a place known for just one lake offer!

title: Mountain View
review: We visited Naini Lake on a cloudy & cool day & decided to boat for 45 minutes.Its approximately Rs.200  for 4 people for an hour.

title: Star Attraction!!
review: The star attraction of Nainital. The evening boat ride is strongly recommended. There are several boating options available, including paddle and row boats.

title: Best attraction in Nainital.
review: Trip to Nainital is incomplete without a boat ride in Naini lake. Boating in the green water has made our trip memorable. The photo taken by photographer at the lake are memories to be treasured.

title: A nice place to tour for 2 days
review: Spent 4-5 hours near Naini Lake, spent time, boat and go for street shop.Weather is awesome there all over the year even. Its looks beautiful in night.

title: Nice lake
review: Very good lake with Crystal clean water boating over the lake is very nice experience. You will find lots of shopping and food stalls around the lake.

title: Soo much improved
review: It was crap when I went years ago. But now its a lot better with more types of boats etc

title: very good ride on a sunny morning...
review: After the snowpoint view via ropeway, we were at lake by 10:30 in morning and not much rush..had a good trip till Talitaal and return. Got embarked at Nainadevi temple ghat. good boatman, explained the details clearly...

title: nice horseriding
review: Nainital is one of the best hill station in india. its has many atraction places for visitors. Nainital gets quite costly during peak season however off season is best time to go around. many prestigious school are loc here like sherhood. st joseph.. place to visit stone cave .. bada pathar..mango lake etc.. if u gets a chance to visit Governor house  at nainital it is worth going. its a historical building n beautifully done up n well maintained.. boating in naini jheel,n tali taal during sunset is awesome..gets chill in d evening so carry light warm clothing with u.

title: Boating Must in this place
review: The lake is very beautiful with mountains around and many other boats including sail boats and many others. The water is crystal clear and the atmosphere is serene and pollution free.

title: Refreshing; Cool Breeze; Serene; Rush;
review: Nainital is a very cool refreshing place with a big eye-shaped Taal in the centre of the mountains. Again Like all other hill stations, MAll road is the main attraction over the tall.

title: Boating at Naini lake
review: One of the most serene lakes of Nainital, the boating at evening is awesome, combined with the trails of light and shade and the sound of temple bells.

title: Great view with boating
