review: Peaceful boating area with your mate. Can have good view around while boating. Best time to boat between 12 - 3 in noon.

title: good big lake
review: Good big lake with lots of boats..having thandi sadak and road for walk.. other is mall road crowed raod

title: Good Old Naini Lake
review: Watch the wind make ripples on the water surface - stand enchanted seeing it on a full moonlight night or stare in the dark waters from thandi sadak . Naini lake has many hues experience it

title: Beauty between mountains
review: am not sure how the water comes to the lake. it is out of this world.

title: Mesmerizing
review: The unblocked view of the nature is on offer while you go boating in the Naini lake. You will fall in love with this location and experience.

title: Worth a try
review: Boatride in nainital lake was pleasant, with the depth of the lake being unknonwn till date, the riders claim it to be around 120 ft. deep.

title: The best place in Nainital, serene, calm and beautiful
review: Whether it is towards Tallital or Mallital, the Naini lake in Nainital is the main tourist attraction of Nainital. Whether you would like to sit for hours next to the lake or you spend your time boating on the lake, this is the best place to spend your time in  Nainital

title: Wonderful place full of life
review: Wonderful place full of life. Very nice boating spot. The emerald green color water is fascinating. Anyone will love looking at the lake for hours.

title: Has not lost the charm
review: Usually when we visit a hill station, the mall road will be very crowded, buildings everywhere, and the nature's beauty would be seen nowhere these days in India. But Nainital somehow has kept up the natural beauty and gives immense tranquillity.The mall road runs adjacent to the lake and you can do your boating, walk down the mall road, do your shopping and so on.... beautiful place to visit. There is parking near the Naina devi mandir at one end of the lake. You can enquire anyone for direction. Actually, we got dropped in mall road and from there we went to Naina Devi mandir through boating. Rs.200 is the costs.

title: Awesome
review: Delightful experience. Lovely boating experience.

title: One of the best lake on the hill
review: Nainital lake is the one of the most beautiful lake on the hill , very beautiful and in night its look amazing, you can do boating there , i just love it

title: Lovely place
review: This lake is the epicenter of Nainital. It is very well-maintained & clean. Loved the sail boats & other boats... very colourful & nice. The road from Tallital to Mallital is walkable, though the distance is tiresome at times. There is a rickshaw stand with long queues. Actually there is no dearth of rickshaws here, but the rickshaw-pullers are mostly resting & strangely refuse passengers. Wish the local Govt. could do something about it. The thandi-sadak (the other side walk from Tallital to Mallital) is very beautiful & ideal for a romantic walk.

title: Scerene, calm & soothing experience.
review: This was our 2nd visit to the pristine lake town this year. The town leaves us spell bound.

title: Good Place
review: This is one of the most beautiful lake which i have ever seen. Boating in this lake is really enjoyable.

title: Pure nature
review: Pristine clear waters; well managed place with a beautiful view of the place around. The  lake is divided into two halves - the one further from the beginning of the mall road is more happening (and more crowded also).

title: Feature of Naini Tal.
review: The Lake is the focal point of Naini Tal, being the receptacle of all the water that pours into it from the steep surrounding hills.

title: awesome view
review: this lake was very clean and  clear just like crystal clear ... the total atmosphere and the view and the relaxation is too nice while roaming in the boat in the lake ...the view of the hills was also nice and ita nice experience to share as well

title: Don't miss the boating
review: Just enjoy the company of water and peace. Go and take a boat. Its better to do it in morning or evening time. Get up a bit early you lazy people. :)

title: Nainital's Star Attraction !
review: This is the prime reason why i enjoy Nainital over other hill stations. A maginificient lake so large that the entire hill station has been built around the lake. The lake is clean and well maintained. The boating is regulated with 2 options - peddle boats or rowing boats which can be hired from the booths at fixed price. you can also take a sail boat from boat house club which is also open for non-members. pls note small children are not allowed on the sail boat.

title: Lovely views from the lake
review: The lake itself is quite dirty. But we did a half hour boating on the lake and the views of the mountains on either side were beautiful.

title: Beautiful!
review: The best lake experience. Glimmering clean lake between hills. Serene and pristine with the Mall Road next to it. Superb. Been here so often and still feels refreshing each time

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The lake is just so beautiful. There are many spots to take photographs. Its very romantic if you are with your partner. Would definitely recommend a boat ride. The entire water seems green because of the high hills surrounding the lake.

title: Nice & Clean Lake
review: It Was Really Super & Clean Lake..Excellent View and Boating Experience...Its really Nice destination for short Vacation...

title: A perfect walk starts from here ... On Mall Road
review: Been to Mall Road Nainital so many times , was truly mesmerised when seen this lake & mall road first time ... Now what i feel most is the temptress of the walk on this mall road , i don't go for Baoting & Shopping ... but enjoys the best of the views , atmosphere , weather , people & smell . Be there & enjoy the best of the coffee around , don't know why , but a coffee from a tea hawker also makes it special ... this the kind of Magic Nainital has in it . Must in a lifetime .

title: Beautiful view
review: Serene experience, especially early morning when sun light fall on the lake it seems poetic.

title: very clean lake, and awesome experience
review: visited last week to Nanital was a visit to remember, Nani lake now very clean, new attraction is sail boat , but  simple boats with oars are best, +plus point now they provide compulsory life vest , lake is very clean..

title: Must watch
review: Best thing to do in Nainital is boating.

title: I am In The World Of heaven
review: Lovely place to visit ,specially in summer.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: As in every hill station, this lake is also main attraction of the city and everything evolve around the lake. its deep. you can do boating and spend time at the shore.

title: Serene
review: It was a welcome break from the hustle bustle of Delhi. A pristine clear lake with lovely boating facilities.

title: Beautiful lake
review: We went to nainital in June. Weather was very nice and pleasant. But as it was vacation time, nainital was full of tourists and there was no place to roam around the lake. It was overcrowded so couldn't go for boating. But the lake is very beautiful. There's a road parallel to naini lake called thandi sadak where you can walk and enjoy the lake.

title: Great Experience!
review: Excellent View and Boating Experience, full of beautiful fish species and boating in it will provide a great view of Nainital

title: Best of Nainital
review: Big lake and good boat riding. See flock of fish. Enjoy the view. Morning walk and Night watch are recommended.

title: Beautiful lake
review: .Took boat ride from Naina Devi temple to Zoo side.Enjoyed the ride.Weather was good.Not much crowd during our visit.

title: Naini lake Nainital
review: Awesome place you can enjoy over there apart from as usual tourist attraction of india this place is not crowded by over charging guides and brokers rates are mostly fixed and written on the boat booking point , beware while booking you can assume that full lake ride actually means starting to middle of lake and not full lake circumference , it would be better to enjoy the majestic beauty of surrounding scenario here , total ride may take 1 hour or more

title: Pristine!!!
review: Have been to Nainital several times and describing its beauty in a few words is a very tedious thing to do. Still, for my fellow travelers here are few words that will describe it best.

title: One time visit
review: The place has only one main attraction which is Naini Lake. All other so called sightseeing attractions are merely fillers to spend some time out there. There is nothing special other than Naini Lake and awesome weather.

title: nice place but a little bit crowded as well
review: the place is good having ample of restaurants hotels and all but not for a person who is finding peace in hills. a little bit crowded in off seasons and a hell jam packed in holidays.

title: Heart of City....
review: Naini Lake is really heart of city... I visited the lake walking from malital Badabazar area  and during my visit Famous Naina Devi mela was going on, weather was awesome. my trip was a business trip so couldn't stay more but overall loved the place.

title: Naini Lake
review: Visited here a number of times. Just next to the mall road. The lake is neat and there is a walk way all around the lake.

title: GOOD LOCATION BUT...
review: Convenient location near to taxi stand  . Rooms did not match with description or pictures . Except four bedded rooms , bouble bedded rooms were shabby -rooms never mopped . broken glass ventilator through which monkeys can enter any time . toilet - broken tiles ,leaking pipes and door latch defective. No provision for hot water . breakfast - everyday 'parathas'.  Staffs did not care to attend . Every time I had to personally speak to the owner.

title: Naini Lake - An awesome experience
review: Best lake I have ever seen. Very Clean.

title: Peaceful and Beautiful Nainital
review: Nainital is an awesome place if you're looking for a 2 day trip! The weather is Amazing and the Scenery is mind blowing! #PEACE!

title: Awesome time with friends
review: Very nice place to spent time with family, friends or partner. Boating available from morning 7:30 am to 5:30 pm. Awesome restaurants (Embassy and Gianni's) and Hotel (New Jagati) are available on the edge of the lake.

title: Beautiful Summer Capital
review: Naini Lake is set amidst seven mountains that surround this stagnant water pool and high peaks that almost touch the sky. The mall road has smooth pavements, making it extremely pedestrian-friendly. During the summer season, entry is denied on the mall from 6 to 9 PM, making the road a pedestrian's dream. The town is fairly small and there are some very interesting shops and emporiums in the mall, making the walk a pleasure. Do boating in morning time.

title: Time pass
review: There is nothing much to do around Naini lake except for boating and walking around the lake in the evening. The view is spectacular. If you have time and you can walk around with your loved ones, Naini lake is the place for you... With cool breeze(visited in October 2015) and nice view. In the evening when the lights of the buildings in the surrounding hills are turned on, the reflection of the same in the water looks very pretty.

title: Beauty of Nainital
review: Beautiful Naini Lake. A must go if you visit Nainital. Go for Paddle boating its lot of fun, you can also go for "Chappunav". Easily available tickets.

title: Good place for weekend trip
review: Good to spend time with family. Travelled from Delhi to Nainital by my own car. Neat and clean place. Good for boating. Can also hire bike for self drive and visit nearest places by own if anybody like to enjoy the bike riding on hills but need to very safe.

title: The peaceful naini lake
review: Naini Lake is great! it is surrounded by mountains! it's got boating and the view is amazing.  I really loved the view of the lake from a point as it looked like the lake was merging with the clouds! Really amazing!

title: Pristine lake but overcrowded
review: The lake is just situated next to the mall road with rowing and paddle boat ticket vendors present at several location. Nainital being a tourist hub, the lake is always overcrowded and sometimes you fail to appreciate it's beauty. Nevertheless, it offers breathtaking view of the beautiful Nainital city.

title: Lifetime experience
review: The day we reached Nainital, it was a bit sunny and cool breeze was moving. We enjoyed our boating that day and the next day it was all cloudy and foggy, we again went for boating which was altogether a different experience than the previous day due to weather. We missed sailing on Yacht. If someone does so, pls do share your experience. I am keeping it on top of my TO DO List if I visit Nainital again :)

title: Naini lake
review: Enjoyed boating at naini lake..the govt charges were really low..210 for one boat. Although the water was not that clear but loved the overall experience.

title: Awesome Place
review: Its great place and nice fishes in the lake. Best place for shopping around the Lake i.e. Mall Road.

title: Awesome
review: very clean lake. Boating facility is awesome. Scentic views while boating and cool breeze will take away your fatique.

title: Boating amidst the beautiful mountains!
review: The naini lake was so charming that it is well located among the beautiful hills surrounding it. The green water and the green mountains refreshed us off the tiresome travel we had to reach there from Delhi. The lake is well maintained and the water is pure. We could locate lot of fishes in the lake and special facilities like aerators were provided in the lake to enrich the presence of fishes. Boating is a must-do activity and it gives 360 degree view of pure nature. Viewing was a real pleasure from any angle. Rope car can be seen while boating. Car ride is allowed around the lake which gives plenty of views of the lake.

title: “Boating in a beautifuly and busy area”
review: BOATING WAS AWESOME WITH GOOD VIEW OF MOUNTAINS.Good neat lake, unlike many places I have been. There is boating and also you can walk on the mall and visit the temple.

title: Only Good Place in Nainital
review: This is the only good place in Nainital and also the main attraction of the place. Other than that there doesn't seem to be any other good attraction. The boating in the lake is awesome experience and overall a value for money.

title: Good to visit
review: Nice view. Boating is available. Choose a pedal boat if you want to stay in the boat for long time..

title: mesmerizing view
review: It was an awesome boat ride on a chilly evening... Nice scenic beauty around.. the best part..the price of the boat ride are fixed...

title: Most attractive
review: Brilliant place to pass time in Nanital

title: Pheonomenal
review: Naini Lake is a beautiful Lake, I went there once when i was a kid and didnt really remembered much so i planned another visit in sep 2015. and i must say the place is so beautiful and romantic that you would never wanna come back. We first decided to take half round of the lake which lasts around 15 minutes but when we were actually in lake we realised we can enjoy the beauty of lake in just 15 minutes and we took a complete tour of the lake.. its was phenomenal. I loved it... i will go back again soon...

title: Boating
review: Boating in Nainital lake is a treat. A 2 mile boating in cool air with heavenly siite of hills on both sides is awesome.

title: beautiful lake
review: It is the one of the most beautiful lake second only to Saattal lake (near Bhimtal). One must try for foot paddle boat if there are more than one person. the boatwalas try to convince you not to take foot paddle boat but believe me you will cherish this ride more .it is not so tedious as they try to convince you.

title: It is beautiful. It is serene.
review: You will agree that the stimulus for visiting Nainital comes from the thought of boating in Naini Lake. During my childhood days, from my vague memories I can remember the paper boats made by my father that I used to float and feel happy about.

title: Good beautiful place
review: Good neat lake, unlike many places I have been. There is boating and also you can walk on the mall and visit the temple.

title: Boating in a beautifuly and busy area
review: Very nice view while boating, with complete road and hills around you, when you are in the boat. You would get both peddle boats if you want to go yourself, or else boat with a person who would take you a round.

title: Lake is fine bit dirty at banks
review: Mallroad with lake aside looks beautiful. Walking at evening with cool breeze feels good. People can eat and shop at mall road. Lake is good for boating as well.

title: boating in lake
review: boating is divine,did it after five years my child hood memories came alive,  tried rowing after 5 years ....loved it.

title: Nicely maintained lake
review: I heard that the lake is very deep but I feel that it was nicely maintained by administration.  They have oxygen arrangements for fishes which keeps fishes healthy and thereby lake remains clean.  September weather is nice, neither hot nor cold and cloudy weather makes it look serene.

title: A boat ride to forget the world
review: pay for a 30 mins ride across the lake and you might just go in a world of its own, the sun playing hide & seek behind the clouds and the reflection on the lake water. love it, recommend it

title: “Beautiful lake”
review: It's a beautiful lake in the middle of the mountains. You can take a leisure ride and enjoy the view. It is on the mall road where there are plenty restaurants and cafes.

title: nice
review: Naini lake is very nice and had very good boating experience . it has  great views and nice views . thumbs up

title: A beautiful ride
review: It was a beautiful ride under cloudy misty skies with the sun playing hide and seek. Also enjoyed seeing the ducks--sent picture of them to grand daughter who was thrilled. On the return a very unusual sight--all the ducks moving in single file and going towards their , abode, as if going for their lunch

title: Serene & Beautiful
review: Nice Place for sightseeing, peddling boats are easily available. Nice view when you're in the centre of it. Worth going to when in Nainital

title: Boating on Naini lake
review: Nothing to write here; the Shikara ride is economical and a wonderful experience. The water is clean and on a good day, you may fall asleep while boating.

title: Beautiful and Relaxing Place
review: This is a grand lake surrounded by mountains and pine trees. The view alone will bring your mind and body at peace. Various boating options are available and you can enjoy nature's beauty at it's best here.

title: Awesome boat ride at Naini Lake
review: You must take a boat ride when here. The boat ride costed us Rs 210 for a full chakkar. Prices are fix so don't worry about getting cheated. Just enjoy the time and hill view.

title: Beautiful.......
review: worth an experience! City sprawling around around the banks of lake, peace, clean water, weather and mountains around makes a perfect setting!!

title: Relaxing in the picturesque view of Naini Lake
review: Its really a nice place. I spend 2 hours doing boating here. and at evening I hired a paddle boat and spend a long time there. I used to stop my boat in the middle and then I was doing smoking.. it was nice.. :P

title: Beautiful lake
review: best lake I have ever seen in my life , never expected that this lake will be soo clean and soo beautiful . loved it tottally.

title: Naini Lake - Heart of Nainital
review: Naini Lake, beautiful is the word. Must try - boating that too with 2-3 different kinds of boat.

title: Good for Boating - thats all !
review: In the heart of Nainital city lies this lake where you can do boating or eat some street food by the bank.

title: Green lake...
review: The yacht ride was an exciting experience! You can borrow one from the Boating Club and forget about the paddle boats or the row boats!

title: Only charm of nanital town
review: Love this lake. Views are awesome. Had a nice time boating around. Lake is full of fishes. Whole town surrounds around it. Lake attracts a of people. Zoomland is addon to it. Must visit place of nanital

title: Nainital - City of Lakes
review: Nainital, known as the city of Lakes...is truly a beautiful natural place, its all-green during the monsoons. The view across Naini Lake...white/grey clouds covering the lake....boating in the lake is a one-of experience never to be missed. The suicide point, waterfalls and the cave garden are must-visit points in Nainital.

title: Lake
review: It is one of the most beautiful location in India. Makes one feel being in Zurich...

title: SERENE
review: boating ofcourse, clouds all over.. it was majestic.. the view of the mountains if simply stunning with cool air hitting ur face.. i didnt expect the lake to be so clean but to my surprise it was and we could see alot of fish as well..

title: Serene, Peaceful
review: Roam around the mall road, boating on the lake, walk along the thandi road!! Visit the Naina Devi Temple take the blessings and get some beautiful views of lake from there.

title: Over-crowded go during low season
review: Nainital is a scenic location but it can get too crowded. It has hoards of hotels and restaurants on a strip called the mall. It can get so busy you can hardly move. But in slower seasons it is very pleasant with nice walks around the lake and good restaurants. Boating is a favorite - boats can be rented from several spots and a half lake tour is Rp 160.

title: Okay Okay
review: Good lake. /nice to view from distance but too much commercialized and you go in the peak season, expect crowd and dirt.

title: Queen of Nainital, dressed with pal naukaas, available for boating.
review: This is the main place of Nainital, without it Nainital is none in itself, Malroad & Naini lake r the combo places, where films were shooted before and after, all the business of Nainital is based on this unique lake, here is house boat also, Nainital club is another feature for High Gentry, where everything is provided, 31st December is the one unique day when this club is at its youth.

title: Nanital a Natural beauty
review: Nicely maintained Lake with lots of shopping & boating experience. One can buy famous candles here. Boating available at most convenient way. Boat Men are caring. One can spend hours here.

title: SOUL of Nainital
review: The lake needs no introduction, it is a beauty, difficult to put in words. Surrounded by hills, boating any time of the day, especially in afternoon, is memorable. Sit by the side and watch the water change colour with the movement of the sun.

title: nice lake
review: As you travel u see weather changes ,when we started it was sunny in few minutes it become foggy an than rain started this is the beauty of nainital and naini lake is the best place to enjoy that.

title: Scintillating and serene
review: The Naini Jheel is absolutely amazing and beautiful. One can spend hours just enjoying the beauty of the mountains, waters, shikara rides, swans and ducks, the mall road running along it, shops and eateries etc.

title: The Queen of Lakes
review: What fun doing boating in the rain. I loved the fact that you pre pay and board the boat in queue. No haggling with anyone and no stress.

title: Beauty
review: One of the finest hill stations in North India. The LAKE enhances the beauty, one can spend an entire day by its side. There are many site seeing spots nearby, hill tops, trolley rope way, the mall, and the famous Naina Devi temple.

title: Naini Lake Nainital
review: Amongst One of the most beautiful lake I've ever seen inside India, if you ever have a plan to visit Uttrakhand. I suggest you to do visit this place once in you life :)

title: Pleasant Place to be...
review: The setting, the jogging track running all over the entire periphery... The magnificent mall road.... so clean & well maintained... The lovely fish...

title: Naini Lake - The queen of all Lakes
review: Very few places you will find a natural lake atop a hill , this is one of those exquisite ones . Lovely green water along with the Mountains makes it really awesome.

title: Must visit and if spent time on boating if one wishes to do so
review: Nice place to boat and enjoy sunset. after boating one can go for evening snacks or dinner at mall road, A bit of shopping can also be done along with selfies and photograpic sessions.

title: Good Boating Experience
review: I Have visited Nainital only once and Naini lake is one of the main attraction of the Nainital along with the mall road. I find it is a good lake with huge area and it goes along with the main road.

title: Great Lake!
review: Have been to this lake a couple of times. Must do at Nainital. Though nothing extraordinary about it, it's a nice place to look at the place around.

title: Excellent Lake
review: I visited only once at Nainital & the main attraction is Naini Lake, which is amazing and beautiful...

title: Naini lake god's gift- Dont miss it.
review: Excellent. Excellent. Excellent. . No more words. Naturals beauty. wow. amazing. clouds around the area. cold climate. boating was excellent. Naturals beauty getting our soul very happy. We are enjoying the boating. 230 rupess per boat. We are rounding all around the lake. I recommend all of you. Please stay here at least 3 days. Choose lake side hotels. And enjoy the lakes beauty. We went august 8, 2015. That time slightly raining. But not too much. Lake's opposite one Pizza shop is there. We are enjoying food in the Pizza shop. I recommended all of you must come once in our life.

title: Fascinating view of hills.
review: Really Fascinating family ride at Nainital lake. but be sure about yr safety rules. there is not safety arrangemnets for tourists during boat ridding. but its wirth watching enthralling view of hills. Should book room in much advance. better you plan in off season, not in rainy season.

title: Boating and walking
review: Its good lake for  boating. You can see naini  lake from maximum top resorts . most of the mid hotels  are on the side  of  naini  lake. Love to walk  on the side road of  naini lake.

title: Naini Lake
review: Nice lake with boating. You can take a leisure ride and enjoy the view. The only problem is that they dont provide or dont have life jackets for small kids.

title: Good place to visit
review: Visited this many times with family and with friends. Every single time exp was good. Boating is awesome during winter season.

title: Beautiful Place!
review: Naini lake,located in Nainital - 'the city of lakes',is a very pleasant place.Just hire a boat,or if you are in energy saving mode :P,then just sit in the surrounding of the lake,where you can look to the beautiful view of sunset.The hills around are fascinating and if you want to go shopping then mall road is a good option.

title: Best thing in Naintal
review: I have dun 4 times boating for a stay of 2 days as it was awsum .No one can explain the feeling when cold wind blowing comes to your face and you just want to last this forever while boating.A must thing to do if u r in Nainital

title: Sin coming without family
review: When you reach the lake and is about to enter the boat you feel why its so breathtakingly. Wow its a very cool and comfortable experience and a sin coming without family..

title: Have a splendid  boat ride
review: The best part of our Nainital Visit. The boat ride was awesome. The walk on the mall road and sitting on the lake side were great. Spending an evening on the Lakeside was truly mesmerising. You can go shopping on the Mall Road.

title: Improved, but still a crowded weekend getaway.
review: Since my last visit to Nainital around 3-4 years back, there has been a marked change.  The lake is much much cleaner and looks beautiful.  The traffic congestion on mall road is much better, you have place to walk.   Although walking it is still a bit dangerous, specially with kids, as cars still speed by on the narrow lane.

title: Fun boat ride with serene views
review: Boating was serene. Don't worry if you reach out there and skippers surround you asking if you want to ride a boat. There are union rates so no one can cheat you and actually these people are friendly and they guide you a lot about Nanital. Atleast our skipper was such person.

title: Trip To Nainital with Friends
review: The view from the First Floor of the lake is outstanding. Sitting in the balcony & having a lovely view of the lake specially in the monsoons is beautiful

title: Picture Perfect/Romantic
review: the best thing in nanital. picture perfect location. best location to spend time with ur loved ones. highly romantic.

title: Mesmerizing Scenic
review: It is a hill station in the mountains of the state of himachal pradesh. It remains very cold in winters. We visited in December and the place was freezing at a temperature of -2 degree celcius. We hired a reasonable tent house and enjoyed the cool night born fire. One can see the beautiful scenary of mountains which was covered by snow. Sight seeing here was amazing. A must visit place......

title: Great
review: Naini lake also known as mango lake.

title: Nice lake
review: Nice calm lake. with good views of nainital all around. The lake looks amazing when it is covered with clouds.

title: Naini Lake - Prime attraction
review: This is prime attraction of Nainital visit. Don't forget to enjoy boating.  Nearby place and amience is very good to roam around and for food & shopping.

title: Nice peaceful place
review: We visited in August, which was an off-season. Hence the good thing was, crowd was minimal and weather was also good. Most of the times there were clouds and sometimes fog as well. We enjoyed the boat ride and the walk on its bank. Because of weather and greenery around the place, I found overall experience peaceful and relaxing. I would recommend to check the weather forecast before planning a trip here.

title: Over hyped crowded place
review: Nothing much to write about this location. An over crowded dirty place. You can go for boating with 100 other boats in Naini Lake or go for a walk on mall road.

title: Good lake
review: Very good and clean natural lake with fish. It is a good place to visit. Boating is available . One must visit there at least once.

title: The Highlight!
review: This has to be the highlight of a trip  to Nainital. There are shikharas where a boatman does the hard work and you sit back and savour the beauty or you can try a pedal boat where you use your leg power.

title: Good boating experience
review: Excellence lake, clean water, a lot of fish are the attraction of this place. Boating can be done in nominal charges. The lake is well maintained.

title: Priceless Experience
review: Beautiful Lake, a lots of greenery. You should must visit this place,  during your holiday at Ninital.

title: One of the best Hill Station Lake
review: Paradise to be at Naini Lake, all options at one place to have fun with family and friends... superb must visit!

title: A City of Love a City of Lake
review: A very good place to explorer even if you are a frequent Visitor to Nanital then also you will something new everytime.

title: Superb !
review: The lake has been well maintained and offers good boating opportunities, don't miss to hire a paddle boat !

title: Very peacful
review: Best: It is kept clean and well maintained. Two wheeler on rent is available to have look and feel of the local area.

title: Must see
review: If you are in Naini tal, take a walk around the lake - takes about 2.5/3 hours to cover the whole of the lake, very nice and peaceful

title: Breathtaking !
review: Quite surprised after visiting the lake, the way it has been maintained (neat & clean). Don't forget to paddle a boat in tranquil water.

title: nice!
review: Its a beautiful lake in the middle of the mountains. People can enjoy a boat ride at this lake. It is on the mall road where there are plenty restaurants and cafes... It is not as clean as it used to be, but the view is really nice.

title: Beautiful.. Soothing and mesmerizing
review: Recommend you to carry your camera and go for a boat ride where you will feel the actual peaceful natural beauty and the sound of water in the calmness of the valley and of course the photography enthusiastic people may increase their collection...

title: Naini Lake- Life Line of Nainital
review: Its a delight to take an hour boat ride in Naini Lake which is the heart of Nainital. Though I wish it could be better maintained, better cleaned.

title: Beautiful serene and soulful
review: Had a great experience. Beautiful as always. Boating was fun. Spent a lot of time boating. Gives peace.

title: peaceful
review: beautiful lae with awesome view in raining .

title: A beautiful romantic lake
review: As beautiful as eyes of devi maa. As per mythology devi maa`s eyes fell here. There is a temple of Nainadevi. The whole city is around lake. A soothing view of nature . Be it evening or morning lake looks awesome

title: Look at the lake from other side
review: Its been a fun time to do boating here. A must try. Also. you must do the road on the other side of the lake (which is away from bus stand and mall area). Its quieter and peaceful.

title: like a heaven
review: I want to live just there,, my drams world is nainital. That's was a week tour by bike is fantastic... A road trip by bike from agra to nainital

title: try a walk (trek) around the lake
review: Though this is the summer getaway for North India, the best time for travel is when the air is clear in October to November.

title: Must visit place in Nainital
review: Niani lack if the main tourist attraction of nainital, the lack is quite big, you can enjoy boat ride, can do photography, just the place where you can enjoy.

title: choosing hotel in Nainital
review: ... a fantastic destination to rejuvenate yourself. Boating in Naini lake is a must... people visiting in Nainital must opt for hotels having lake view and located on the mall road. I made a mistake staying in a hotel located in the zoo-road which was not a good choice. It is not necessary to book hotels on line or in advance. choose your hotel on the spot and bargain as much as you can. you will always be benefited. This tip was given to me by the local drivers (at least three of them) and I found it was true indeed.

title: nice hillstation
review: Lake in the heart of the hill station..very nice looking..shape of the eye..neat & clean..no pollution

title: Must Visit
review: How can one not do boating here after going to nainital.

title: Beautiful
review: Amazingly beautiful still. Preserved by the nature and the way it is managed is amazing. So clean the water was, there were beautiful fishes in the water. Went for boating thrice. The clouds ascended and kissed the lake and we were admist the cloud which was a delight to see the way God has created this place so beautifully. Also impressed by the native people staying there, how they care about the nature and cleanliness. ...God bless and keep this place beautiful always

title: A Divine Experience
review: Naini Lake is an amazing boating experience covering the length of the Mall Road in Nainital. Also, the serenity and the blissful surrounding makes the place a divine experience. You can spend hours on the boat taking laps of the lake (you have to top up your ride everytime your time is over) listening to the history of the Kumao region and the goddess Naina Devi.

title: Wonderful place
review: Naini lake is a wonderful place to spend some leisure time when in nainital. i visited nainital with my family and my son loved this place. there is boating facility available at naini lake. there were so many ducks also in the lake.

title: Cool lake to Enjoy Boating
review: Lake is located adjacent to mall road, You will enjoy boating. very calm place in the center of hills.

title: beautiful town
review: A town built around a lake, it is just beautiful !! it was meant to be a 4 night stop over but ended up staying 10 days . A walk around the lake is wonderful watching many boats passing, or strolling through the markets, the mall road lights up at night when cars are no longer permitted. Dont miss this fantastic place!

title: Once can go
review: In this August, boating with drizzles.....A fantastic Experience. As a less tourists, can enjoy more as we get a VVIP treatment.

title: Good Place to See
review: Good Place to See.

title: Romatic Lake
review: Loved boating in this Lake. Its very Romantic. Surrounded by Hills on all the sides - in fact when you are driving to Naintal, you can never imagine that there would be such big lakes over there. Our Boatman was superb and he definitely made our Boat ride memorable.

title: beautiful lake
review: excellent place to stay surrounded by hills on all the sides. very calm place, a walk around the lake is wonderful.

title: Soul of Nanital
review: This lake always fascinates me. Nice place for boating or you can just sit around & spent time on banks of the lake,cleanliness is an issue here as i could see a lot of garbage floating in the lake.I would suggest to visit this place in  off peak time of the year.

title: Wonderful evening in Naini Lake
review: Very beautiful location and boating in evening is great fun with family. Very pleasing experience. try paddle as well as rowing boats

title: Beautiful
review: The lake is well maintained and cost of rides are fixed resulting in a hassle free trip. All safety measures are adhered to. View from the lake is very nice.

title: WORTH the ride
review: Good, dont MISS this,visit this place for SURE... you will enjoy each moment of the visit, i enjoyed the lake with a boat ride with family it was a long plesant sailing in a small boat

title: A must place for Nature seekers
review: I visited Nanital in december, I got lucky, I witnessed snow fall there, I felt that I was very close to nature. If you love the nature then you must visit Nanital you will definitely love it!

title: A wonderful sunrise boat experience
review: This place is just wonderful you must visit this place at sunrise/ sunset and have a boat ride there.

title: Dont miss Ride
review: Nicely maintained lake , must take a foot  walk around it , also must take a boat ride on the river .

title: Beautiful lake surrounded by hills
review: Beautiful lake surrounded by hills, Water is clean. One can take a "Shikhara" (boat ride) or a paddle boat to explore the lake. The cool breeze will take away all your pain.

title: The Heart of Nainital!
review: Naini Lake is definitely the heart of the city.. The whole city revolves around the beauty of this gorgeous lake! <3 Totally eye catching, and serene <3

title: naini lake
review: Lake is surprisingly very clean and boat-wallahs very friendly. Boating charges are also quite nominal.

title: Big Lake in Town
review: located in center of the city, all hotels are surrounded by this place, we were able to see clearly this lake from our hotel room, its big.

title: Lost in the beauty of Nainitaal
review: Well while travelling to Nainitaal it seemed like usual mountain scenery. But when reached Nainitaal , we were astonished to see the serene beauty of the place. Endless 9 Lakes at such height in between the mountains, surrounded by beautiful city -Perfect. Trip to Nainitaal is a lifetime memorable journey and definitely not usual mountain trip.

title: Paradise
review: If someone wants to experience paradise on earth then they should definitely opt for Nainital. The place which explains serene beauty of hills, lakes, clouds, skies beautifully. The chilled weather accompanied by the Himalayan is like a cherry on the cake. January to March is the ideal time for the families and Diwali to December for the honeymooners.

title: A Romantic Late and Ride
review: Excellent Romantic Getaway Boat Ride... Really Bone Chilling on winter evenings... Nicely maintained boats.. perfectly safe

title: Beutiful view all around.
review: very nice cool climate with memorable view seen in life... really very good scene @ the time of boating

title: city with a beautiful lake
review: it is a wonderful place to relax . lot of activities could be undertaken like boating, visiting naina devi temple and other picnic spots which are close by.

title: Romantic, Quiet and Beautiful
review: Beauty between trees, in moist weather one will feel like traveling through the SKY. Quiet place and romantic

title: clean waters for boating
review: lake is clean. boating facility is available. better to go boating in the early mornings to avoid rush. we can board the boat and get down near Naina devi temple.

title: Serene
review: Well managed boat trips with fixed rentals. One has choice to go for a peddle boat/ guided boat/sail boat with differing rate for each displayed prominently on ticket booths surrounding various entry points to the lake. Provided picturesque view of the Mall Road and surrounding hills.

title: Naini lake
review: Well managed boating, lake is clean. best part is boat price is fixed. you have a choice to go with peddle or guide boat

title: Boating is a pleasing experience !!!
review: Nice lake offering self pedaling & rowing boating options through prepaid booths. Ride lasts 15-20 minutes.

title: Boating in Nainital lake
review: We avoided the peak season when Nainital can get over crowded. The weather was kind to us and we hired two boats for 8 of us. We sang songs in the lake ride and had a good time.

title: Must Visit
review: You Can't miss it. Without Boating in Nani Lake your trip will be incomplete. So what are you waiting for just pack your bags and leave for Nainital - The City of Lakes

title: peaceful
review: the boat rider will give you the complete history of nainital. evening walk by the lake. peaceful and scenic

title: Sheer beauty
review: Boat ride was awesome.

title: pretty awesome
review: You could do boating or just walk by the bank..pleasuarable atmosphere. Sit down on one of the benches by the lake with hot tea and some snacks....your day just got better

title: Simply Awesome at Night
review: C shape lake , feel great in the night when walk along the lake.

title: Boating with the mist!
review: Boating in the evening with the mist all around is an experience of a lifetime. We could barely see where we were going.

title: Boating in the clouds
review: One of the main attractions of Nainital, you can enjoy it in any season through out the year. While boating, you may encounter clouds at one side while sunshine on other side of the lake. Walking on mall road by side of the lake is another experience people wish not to miss.

title: 9 Lakes
review: There are 9 different lakes at this place.

title: nice lake
review: It is a clean lake with beautiful surroundings The hills and scenery around the hill is very beautiful and we enjoyed boat ride in naini lake

title: Nainital visit in May'15
review: We visited during peak season after the school closed down for vacation and on top this was a weekend. While it was crowded the first day, later on Tuesday onwards crowd thinned and we were able to enjoy the evening walks by the lake. It was particularly impressive to see the level of cleanliness maintained by the administration. We noticed masseurs and tried one for foot massage. This was good.. 15 mins foot massage for Rs. 100 was not bad. Had a good time with friends .. 3 children with us thoroughly enjoyed the stay. In future I will cautious about the dates .. do not want to land up in peak season but definitely will love to come back here again.

title: good and and the best one in nainital
review: good and the best one in nainital. There is no other lake better than naini lake. it is the big lake in comparison to the other. no need to waste time moving around in other lakes.

title: Beautiful lake surrounded by mountains
review: The lake is beautiful, surrounded by mountains all sides. The water is very clean and the lake is very well maintained. There is boating available as well and one can get paddle boats, sail boats or row boats as per preference

title: The main attraction of Nainital is ignored by the authorities
review: The main attraction of Nainital is its Naini Lake but unfortunately it have  been  completely ignored by the authorities. The water of lake is very dirty with dirty surroundings, the boats are in bad shape which needs immediate replacement with some better boats

title: Its a beauty
review: Enjoyed a lot with my wife during my visit to Nainital in July 15. Weather was great. Don't forget to buy some Candles to gift your loved ones from Bara Bazar, as they are very cheap and in different shapes and variety available.

title: Amazing experience
review: It's a great experience to do boating in Naini lake. Still water surrounded with mountains. It's only lake in area where cleanliness maintained properly. Young kids like fishes of the lake.

title: nainital trip the classic
review: boating/shopping/eating/relaxing/walking on the mall road/waiting for the next holidays to come.classic hotel is just on mall road,sit at balcont and enjoy the view from mall road,view of lake

title: The Lake Paradise
review: Boating Experience at Naini Lake was awesome. The person on boat allowed us to have a rowing Experience. Also the Price of the Boating was Reasonable.Had a Great Time.

title: Lake and mountains around.
review: I have been there  twice. Take a boat ride in the day, or walk around the lake and enjoy the beautiful view of the mountains with the lake in between.

title: Beautiful lake
review: People come to Nainital because of this lake. A very big and clean lake right in the middle of the town.  Infact this hill station is better than all other hill stations of north because of this lake.

title: good lake with boating
review: go for boating & shopping as the rates are good in comparison to other hill stations like shimla. All type of boats are available like for 2 seater for couple or a big one for whole family too. it is the main attraction of niaintal visit for everyone.

title: A calming sight
review: I loved boating in the Naini lake. It is an experience to be cherished. The lake is huge and it takes quite a while to boat around its perimeter.

title: Delightfully Clean and Beautiful Lake
review: Amazing. The water was clean, walkway was good. The boat ride was calming and relaxing. Lot of shopping and lot of eateries along the lake.

title: A lake with a great atmosphere..
review: I love this lake. It's clean, big, full of fishes, good activities, and great shopping. Overall I love the atmosphere of this place and it was fun experiences, doing the shopping for candles, having chai on the lakeside, dining and boating. Couldn't get any better.

title: Nature
review: Nanitaal is great place to visit with family ....lakes and natural beauty is really life time experience...

title: A must to do !!
review: One must have a boat ride at Naini lake. The serene beauty of the lake and the surrounding hill will charm you for sure. I would recommend the boat ride during evening hours as the weather cools down at that time (if you are visiting in summer).

title: Nainital - Jun 2015
review: Naini lake is one of the best lakes in any hill station and by far the best among other lakes in Nainital District (Sattal, Bhimtal, Naukuchiatal). It is at the heart of the city. Boating in Naini lake is fun. Boating rates are standardized. The view of the hills, mall road, 'thandi sadak' from the lake is also beautiful. A Nainital tour is incomplete without boating on the lake.

title: Relaxing
review: Relaxing either you are viewing it from your hotel window,balcony or you are having a boat ride in it, Its very relaxing and feels very good

title: Outing mar 2014
review: We love going to nainital. Naini means the eye and the lake is in the shape of the eye. Boating here is romantic. Lots of things around the lake with night markets and shopping.

title: Stunning scenic view...
review: Its the main attraction of Nainital. The lake water is blue, surrounded by mountains all around. sit and relax on the chairs beside the lake, take a ferry ride on the lake or simply walk down the mall road adjecent to the lake.

title: Gem of Nainital (but keep it clean)
review: 11 out of 10 for the beauty of the lake...

title: Great place
review: Boating is a must do activity, there's also a temple towards the end of the lake also followed by soccer ground

title: Needs more cleanniness and maintenance
review: City's garbage flows into the lake making unpleasant near banks and boating points.When they say full round of the lake,it is actually full round of particular area and not full lake.

title: Lakes all around
review: beautiful locations with nice view of all the 9 lakes on the entire stretch. If you love photography and nature then this is the place to be

title: Mesmerizing Boating experience.
review: A lake surrounded by hills from all side. One side of lake so quite and so peaceful and other side with the fast moving Mall road.

title: very large lake
review: boating is must for a tourist and it is at a fixed price go for a larger area to enjoy the nature and surroundings just be careful while sitting on boats and do wear a life jacket

title: Natural Beauty
review: I frequently visit Nanital for holidays. This lake always attract you.. there is something special about it. Its natural and full of life in monsoons. One must take a boat ride to enjoy serene and tranquil surrounding.

title: Not much fun
review: You have two options to choose either round of full lake or half lake, So its better to take half lake just to enjoy the view.

title: One of the best lake
review: Naini lake has one of the best location and boating there is fun and exciting especially in the small sailboats.

title: A beautiful Hill station worth revisiting
review: I have visited Nainital three times now - twice during school time and once last year. Its appeal still remains unchanged. I love boating in the Naini lake and buying candles from the nearby market.

title: tranquil..
review: its been 4 years since i m coming here to Nainitaal regularly every year and being in the lake for boating is a regular feature of my tours..it is a relaxing one hour when in taal after your family have finished their shopping in the market nearby..

title: Awesome trip
review: there was nothing to dislike here. i highly recommend here to go while nainital visit. have paddle boating here...

title: Must swim along
review: Must do the boating whenever you are in nainital. maintains the lake very well with air filter for providing enough oxygen to the fish in the lake.

title: Calm and peaceful
review: its a wonderful experience to do boating in the lake specially in the evening when the aarti is done and  the sound of bells from the Naini Mandir make it worth a ride.

title: good
review: lake is very beautiful but they should clean it on regular basis ,view of the lake from outside is very pleasing we enjoyed boating lovely experience.

title: Breathtaking
review: Had been to Nainital hillstation.sattal is the best venue to discover the inner peace and hv fun with family and Friends.enjoyed boating at the lake and views of himalayas from pangot.very much felt in the arms of dear mother nature.

title: Great place to chill
review: Excellent location..has a teardrop shape and offers boating options. It is the centrepiece of Nainital.

title: Wonderful place for boating
review: The lake is surrounded by hills, hotels on one side and umpteen pedal boats float amidst the serene water. A great romantic gateway. By the lake side some snacks can be enjoyed and in case you dont wish to pedal, motor boats etc are alao available.

title: beautiful lake
review: The lake is so beautiful and one should take a ride and with safety dress. dont avoid safety dress, as the lake depth still not known by any one.

title: Ok nothing great, but a ride is must!!
review: The lake is good for a boat ride, if you have ample of free time and nothing to do.  Else there are many places all over India to enjoy much better boat rides.

title: Beautiful & Spectacular views
review: It is one of the beautiful, spectacular, super locations. Weather is very pleasant. It is surrounded by natural beauties like hills, trees, landscape one should enjoy. All around natural senses are good food for Camera who loves photography. People are very helpful and offer very tasty food. There are so many very old temples to visit with guidance of local people, all are worth to visit & get experience.

title: over crowded taal [lake]
review: i would prefer visiting bhimtal-sat tal -pannt tal-for peace of mind.everybody is in a rush the vistiors the boats men the sellers,

title: What a place!!
review: Serene..tranquil...cool clean waters is pure bliss.

title: Boating and street food during the walk on the Mall Road
review: Nice, calm and quiet place, if that is what you are looking for this is a place to be in. It is a place where you can walk and at the same time enjoy a boat ride.

title: Calm, serene, romantic..
review: The lake looks beautiful at night. Also, a couple can stroll at the boundary/roadside of the lake & have a experience on various shops & restras. Nice place to be.

title: extremely beautiful lake
review: Extremely beautiful.Amazing and very very clean.Must watch.Naini temple is amazing as well.Worth visit once.

title: Nice lake with beautiful view
review: Visited June 2015, lake is clean, big and overall gives a very good impression. Boating (thru various types of boats) is highly recommended.

title: Avoid peak tourist season, and you might get a glimpse of the real beauty.
review: the largest and the best-known of the several lakes of Kumaon. Nainital lake is a marvel to look at - but only if you're at the right place and at the right time (of the day as well as the year). During summer, the small township is overflowing with tourists and traffic, making it a nightmare of sorts for the peace-seeking traveller.

title: Lovely Boat Ride in a lake surrounded by hills
review: Everytime we visit Nainital, the lake is major attraction. We try to have as many boat rides as the kids enjoy it most. The lake is very big with many types of boats available. The breeze while boating is amazing with an excellent view of surrounding hills.

title: Row your boat and chill in natural spendour
review: Naini Lake allows the walker to explore, the rower to traverse its green waters, animal lover to enjoy the friendly swans, and the romantic to woo at leisure. Ah cest la vie!

title: Avg place
review: It is an average place, I like saattal rather than Naini lake... it has better view and a very natural.

title: Nice
review: You will just enjoy the boating part, its really very romantic & the lake is very clean. Infact if you have kids then your kids will love this place

title: Scenic lake with good boating facilities
review: Boating in the lake is a nice experience with skilled oarsmen rowing to almost end of the lake. We had a nice experience with the sun out though not shining on our heads.

title: Hotel was good and service is also fine
review: I stayed there two times already with my family and enjoyed our stay there. Staff is helpful and rooms are also very clean. Just opt for this hotel for your stay and enjoy nainital beauty.

title: Mesmerizing and beautiful
review: Naini Lake (Eye shaped) is such an attraction which draws millions of tourist every year. I hear lot about this and when I reached there I found it mesmerizing and beautiful lake surrounded with lush green hills all around. Boating in lake and walking all around is a pleasant experience one can have there. The moment you get in to the boat and go little away from the shore you feel out of the world with greenery all around, cool breeze gives a cake on the ice and you get in to pleasant journey of  clam and deep dive in to your thoughts. Overall this the most cherished moment of my Nainital trip and I recommend everyone who go thre should experience the boating in Naini Lake.

title: Amazing Lake
review: Nice Lake with flowing water. Boat rides are awesome. But lake should be cleaned, its not at all maintained

title: Blue water surrounded by cloud covered mountains
review: Boating in naini lake was a unique experience. The lake is very big and clean, the perimeter road around it is full of good restaurants and hotels. There are cheap chinese products availabe which are good.

title: Nice lake
review: One of the main attraction of Nainital. Can enjoy boating and can sit by the lake and enjoy the scenic beauty of the place. Can feed the fishes also.

title: Hills, Lake and sceninc charm.
review: Splendid summer break destination. You can unwind at this tourist destination. Walk along the Lake and to the Bhutia Market selling all imported goodies.

title: Naini Lake
review: Its always a pleasure to hire a boat and roam around the lake . The Lake is in the middle of the city. the water is not clean so avoid putting your hands and its not safe either. At times you can also find clouds so close to you while roaming on boat

title: Undoubtedly the Best place in nainital
review: Nature is best when its in its original form and naini lake is one such big natural thingin naintal. Its a huge lake in mango shape. We can enjoy here by boating in the lake or just wandering aroung it. And the best thing, the mall road and tiebatian market is here where we can get good shopping choices and food too. Not to forget the nainadevi temple to visit also.

title: Very nice lake
review: This hill station is having very nice lake. We had nice boating experience. But still cleaning of the water is required often to avoid foul smell. Otherwise , the lake is quite nice to pass time for either boating or sitting near by and enjoy.

title: best place in nainital
review: dont forget boat ride in naini lake...its mango shaped lake, very clean .walking along the lake is unique experience.

title: Clean and awesome
review: One of the best part of Nainital. Take the boat and enjoy for hours. Lot of fun and when there will be rain in between , it will be added advantage.

title: Like any other lake
review: Its ok. Unfortunately in our country, we dont know how to make these places really beautiful. We have the resources but we dont do much about it. Unprofessional, tacky, boats are from the last decade.

title: Nice and Clean
review: Nice and Clean lake, must try to do sail boat before 4 pm and walk beside the lake. Other options available are paddle boat, shikara ride etc

title: I liked the Shikara experience and the walk on the mall road.
review: Naini lake is the most popular tourist destination one must go for the Shikara ride in the lake. Swimming in the lake is not advisable as the same is known to be the home of monstrous fishes. You would find a lot of shops and hotels around the lake, tourists enjoy the walk on the mall road (which is on the periphery of the lake).

title: Super Attraction ...
review: Hey folks, Naini lake is the main attraction in Nainital, in fact the complete city is spread around the lake. Its pretty deep though 27m approx 90 feet

title: One of the best lakes..
review: Its an awesome feeling to walk around Naini lake, no matter what month of the year it is. Holds hands of the family members, loved ones, engage yourself in talks and you wouldn't even notice that you have walked back and forth the Mall Road. Great views from where ever you stand on its periphery. You can see mist forming up on the lake, clouds taking shape and so many different things and colors of the nature over this lake.

title: Awesome lake
review: Lake of Nainital ,what to say about it,very beautiful view standing beside .Its color changes according to weather. Boating on lake is very relaxing. Seeing lake sitting on bench from mall road keeps very cool and relaxing.

title: it's best
review: naini lake the place name nainital it's best  oppction to vist in nainital ...... booting is so oooooo good we do booting 3 time in 3 days there chages is normal so good for everyone

title: As always awesome
review: Walking down the lane of Mall-road and watching lake is itself a fun. off course, you could watch the crowd as well as it remains full of crowd in May, June.

title: Nice but crowdy
review: Beautiful but nothing special. Like other natural lakes, crowd has make it noisy and dirty. Weather was nice due to rain and mall road nearby is a nice shopping place, over expensive though.

title: Nice lake
review: Main attraction of Nainital is Naini lake so enjoy boating in this lake.this is very neat & clean palace. weather of this palace is pleasant. very nice place for family.

title: Interesting Place good for a vacation with family or friends!
review: The roads are wide and good.There is too much fun in boating as the lake is great.In the shops nearby we can get handicrafts of wood,marble ,we can get candles of different designs and sizes and the connectivity from nearby cities is also great!

title: Best enjoyed with clouds
review: It is really a magnificent lake in between the hills and absolutely the best across all lakes near Nainital. We did both a simple boat ride as well as paddle boat. The scene and atmosphere is best early morning when even the crowd is very less.

title: Astonishing view
review: Cool water of the lake and lush green forest to the left and mall road to the right of the lake, makes it worth going for a boat ride.

title: Nice View for Photographers
review: The only thing i dislike is people throwing eatables in the lake and making it look bad.

title: Nice and refreshingq
review: I went to Naini lake for boating as my experience was quite good and you seem to have you me time in the middle of the lake. Also the beauty of the lake increases in the evening as the reflection of the lights fall on the water and it glitters. Very nice view.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Everything is good just some bargaining needs to be done ..

title: Only place to visit Nainital
review: Naini Lake is the only place where you can enjoy the nainital. Naina devi temple is also here. you can do boating here. some good restaurants are also here.

title: Pleasant...
review: Really pleasant experience to say the least...must do once a day everyday throughout ur stay..fixed prices ..gud boats, very clean .all in all totally worth the hour n money spent on boating....watching over the lake having a hot snack or coffee strolling on the mall road ....the most important must do in nainital.

title: A pleasure to behold!
review: It soothes the senses and is refreshingly clean! A leisurely stroll along its banks or a quiet corner to view the still waters has a calming effect! At night, the view from one of the many benches on its Malli tal bank, is awesome!. One can sit for hours simply gazing on to the serene surface of the lake. However, some maintenance work along its banks, on the steps leading down to the water and the beautiful wrought iron fence and benches is a much needed necessity!

title: Neat destination!
review: Great view! Neat and clean place... Love the mall road. Shopping and strolling and boating becomes major most attraction!

title: Beautiful lake
review: The lake is very beautiful and we spend more of our time there only. The market is also near to it only.

title: Almost a fairy tale venue!
review: It has been my favourite hill station since childhood! But I have yet to get used to that awesome first glimpse, as we mount the last step of the journey and view the lake in all its glory! It never fails to take my breath away!

title: Enjoyed the boat ride and Stroll !
review: The peddle boat riding is must to do if you are in Nainital.

title: Very clean, scenic and enjoyable
review: I visited 30 yrs ago first time. Though not many tourist visited, the lake was not very clean or maintained due to lot of algae. In 2007, surprisingly cleanliness on roads was worth noticing, hand-pulled rickshaws were organized and controlled but still the lake was bad.

title: Boating amidst Kumaon!
review: With breath taking views surrounding the Naini lake, after a long tiring day in Nainital, you can enjoy the refreshing boating ride. Must do in Nainital..you can catch a glimpse of historic places there!

title: Good sized lake.
review: Loved boating in the lake and also taking pics of it from all the three peaks(Snow View, Naina Peak and Dorothy's Seat) surrounding the lake.

title: Deepak sharma
review: Much better than manali ,shimla and mausoorie. Green and clean,peaceful,no hussle and affordable to visit . Weather and lake touches heart

title: Boating is so mch fun!
review: If you are visting nanital then boating at Naini lake is a

title: Boat Ride on this Lake is Must
review: Naini Lake which has lost bit of charm few years back due to uncleaned shores is back to original self. Boat ride on this lake is must.

title: Cleanest LAke
review: BEst place for boating in the country. The water is so clean that it feels like to continuously  keep the hand in water during the entire boating session. Dont go for pedal boat, instead go for paddle boat.

title: post diwali is the best time to visit as snowfall starts around that time.
review: I was in nainital for 2 days, and this is probably the best destination if you are a peace lover. Amidst the mountains the serene beauty and calmness of the lake is the feature of nainital.

title: One of the Most Happening Place at Uttarakhand
review: Looking at Naini lake itself is a great stressbuster and beauty which surrounds it will mesemerize You with its charm. One can have a good walk towards mall road and enjoy shopping along with Naini lake at your side. Mall road is full of candles shop, food items and other utilities, specially for kid. You can enjoy sail boating through boat club at mallital and other boat rides You can ride from anywhere. Prices may differ as per season (which is worth) and in oct and winters there are boat races which happens at naini lake as being told by Boat-Man.. Lol. Its under blessings of Naina Devi and you can have a 360 degree view of entire lake and surroundings. Please behave well with boat persons and appreciate their efforts and efforts of administration who has kept lake Natural as it is always been. There are heavy fine if you throw any waste in Lake or try to feed fishes. So, enjoy Your trip in the lap of nature:)

title: Can't get much of it..!!
review: Naini lake is the most wonderful lake i have seen. It is always amazing to spend time boating/spending time around the lake. If you are looking for a peaceful walk try the Thandi Sarak (Cold Road); this is the road on the opposite side of the Mall road. I have experienced every season in the lake from summer heat to monsoon rains to fog and snow. Overall a nice place but provided you don't go there on a weekend... its over crowded now.

title: Baoting is must if u r in Nainital
review: For sure it is the most visited place in Nainital. Boating is the common activity in Naini Lake.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Naini lake is very beautiful lake surrounded my mountains. It is a good place to go for boating and enjoy your time.There are many boating options available, like you can paddle by your own, or you can opt to sit and relax while a person will paddle the boat.

title: A wonderful walkway in the evening.
review: Offers boat ride, a walkway beside the lake with cool wind blowing  is indeed a refreshing experience, Tibetan market and Bada Bazar on Mall road for shoppers.Food courts and Cable car is also nearby.

title: Beautiful,beautiful and beautiful
review: This lake is the heart of Nainital.Our hotel allowed us a view of this at all hours.And it was different everytime.At night you see the dark interspersed with golden lights from the city hotels and homes.Early morning the lake is calm and serene.During the day you see it bustling with boats and people.

title: very crowded
review: it is situated in mall road which is very crowded. peddle boating had a boating of 1 hour. it costs around 200 for 4 people boat and 150 for 2 people. normal boats were available but they are boaring as you have to just sit. i wanted to do peddle boating but was unable to do so.

title: Mango Shape Lake
review: Boat Riding, Evening Walkway, cool breeze, motor rides, shopping arena and line of hotel/resorts make it a must see place. Beautiful weather. Trolley ride, Zoo, and eating outlets add flavours to the trip.

title: Soothing...
review: Do boating here, nice breeze in this huge lake is an experience in itself and not to be missed. You could just paddle to the middle of the lake and just sit there to enjoy a serene view.

title: The life line of Nainital
review: One of the best things about nainital is its beautiful lake.

title: Loosing It's charm.
review: Naini lake is the biggest attraction in Nainital. It's no doubt very beautiful. However over the years it is loosing charm due to increasing pollution and lowering water level.

title: Stunning views
review: Went to the lake late evening. Cool and breezy even in peak summers. Its really nice to take a walk along the lake. The view of the hills across the lake is stunning.

title: Busy Lake
review: Not the right time to go there... Too crowded and no parking space. Nicely maintained though and very clean by Indian standards

title: Naintal tips
review: Nice Boating experience. Mall road is good in night. All type of food options for foodies. Pls do not miss to go to Mukteshwar. It is abt 60 kms from Nainital. Very good views & very peaceful place.

title: Class Location
review: Nainital is a wonderful hill station visited during the month of March 2015 and stayed at Sterling Holiday Resorts India Ltd.at Bhawanipur, resort is newly aquired and it's a wonderful property and on all the days of stay breakfast and dinners were taken at theresort and the food quality served or prepared were of excellent quality.

title: Beautiful lake
review: the lake being adjacent to mall road looks very beautiful at night. Boating in the lake is very soothing experience.

title: beautiful
review: Very Peaceful.  The Photo in the local attire is a must to take outside the lake.  Lake is very big and neat and clean

title: The gift of Nature
review: It is a beautiful pace to be in....

title: Beautiful lake above 6000ft
review: The best way to explore Nainital is to take a walk around the lake. We stayed in Hotel Himalaya in tallital and started our walk from there. From tallital, the right side is the busy market area and one reaches the mallital, where Naina devi temple is situated on the bank. After the temple the rest of the walk is serene and less crowded and prefered by locals and joggers.

title: "Beginning to stink"
review: The lake seems to be getting all the dirty water from the town and now is beginning to stink. It has boating facility. The Fishes in the lake are so huge...wonder why they are not sold? If the administration does not take quick measures the lake will become a stinking pond for sure.

title: Very Nice
review: I along with my friends & family visited nainital & did boating in naini lake. The boats are good with life jackets facility. The boat people are nice with friendly behaviour. The lake looks better then before & the entire ambience is very nice. Worth visiting

title: Naini lake is beautiful
review: lake water is clean and  boating at any time of the day is enjoyable. Carry water / cold drink and something to munch while gooing for boating, but donot throw the waste in lake. in Evenings take jacket for kids ( if they accompany you)

title: It's a very beautiful place with lot of hustle and bustle around it
review: Even in summer afternoon the place is very pleasant and boating can be enjoyed even in after noon.  We enjoyed the Naini lake boating ride with cool breeze blowing.  There is also Tibettan market around the lake which could be explored for people who loves shopping

title: Excellent Place to Relax
review: Just enjoy the beauty of place. Naini Lake is awesome. No more activities to do. Shopping is not advisable. Sightseeint is easily skippable.

title: Great place to spend your time.
review: Crowded

title: Amazing Lake on Hills
review: Both the side of lake is Amazing ... Tallital and Mallital.. be away  from boat guys and local sight seen Drivers.. if you don't like boating and sight seen..! :-)

title: cool place for summer
review: nice place,taal was also nice ,evening boating would be better then afternoon.there are lots of food chains,like dominoes,sanjha chulha,cafe coffee day etc.there are big fishes near the lake one can feed them.BUT in peak season book hotel online.

title: Beautiful lake and view
review: Must enjoy boating preferably evening time in summer. Boating prices are fixed so no worry about bargaining and cheating.

title: Superb, Clean
review: Boating is only activity done at naini lake for which Charges are fixed. Enjoy the food and walk at bank of the lake.

title: Nice Lake
review: Lake is located is at best possible place. Gives nice view of surrounding ... you can actually see that you are sitting in a valley surrounded by mountains and it's another 100 ft. below you in water. excellent boating experience. Naini lake is landmark of nainital.

title: Beautiful views
review: Try to rent one of the colourful rowing boats. Beautiful views from all around, very nice setting. Not far away from the Himalaya

title: Must visit site in Nainital
review: I liked every thing about this lake....cool breeze.....large spread of lake.. heavy deodar vegetation around...and....boat ride....was amazing.....

title: Boating in Naini Lake
review: I simply loved boating in the Naini Lake. The boatman was very nice as he took out most care of me and my mother while getting in the boat and even getting out of the boat. The lake is very beautiful and it is a pleasure boating in the lake. It is very safe as the boatman ensures complete safety of the guests.

title: excellent view
review: excellent view from all directions. the boat ride was enjoyable and great to see motor boats not allowed to keep the water non polluted. must visit place in nainital

title: WORST GUEST HOUSE,  NEVER THINK TO VISIT
review: Everything poor, no dining hall, no parking, approach road very poor and damaged ( snaps attached ). Providing used dirty bed sheets with multiple spots ( snap attached ).  Please never think to use this dirty guest house in Nainital.

title: beauty of hill station
review: if you love hill station then one must visit this place. tha lake is surrounded by hills which one can only feel by going there.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Had a nice boating for half an hour. There is a pedestrian path around the lake, one side with shops and other side real peaceful. We did one round of lake on foot which was a great experience

title: Nice lake
review: The lake is beautifully situated near the mall road.while boating one can enjoy the hills all around the lake.Almost the whole nanital is visible while boating.The lake requires lot of cleanliness as the charge they take for boating is too much.

title: best view
review: panoramic view fantastic natural beauty

title: Lake view
review: Nice view of lake , did some boating and nice place to shop.

title: Beauty and serenity, coupled with fun!
review: There is a sense of calm that a view of the lake provides.  And hence boating here is a must do.  On the other hand, the entire mall road adjoining the lake is saddled with restaurants and shops for the  ones who want to make the most of it!

title: relaxing place
review: Great place to go and relax while you are boating in the naini lake.

title: enjoyable
review: Naini lake is divided in two components namely Mallital and Tallital. Together they look like an eye. As per Hindu mythology, Sati's eye fell here which made the lake. The Naina Devi temple at one end is a siddh peeth. The whole of Nainital is built on the hill surrounding the lake. The boat ride is very enjoyable. One can also walk around a path. All in all, well worth visiting.

title: must see
review: This is a must see place in Nainital. good experience with pedal boat. Go for either morning or evening boating.

title: Beautiful!!
review: A beautiful lake located right in the centre of Nainital city, it is the central attraction. Tourists enjoy boating on the lake. Authorities should clean the lake more often and also arrange for better lighting etc. to make it more attractive.

title: Serene waters, in the hills!
review: Naini lake is beautiful and serene with high hills in the background. It's a nice place to hang around but a bit commercial for my liking.

title: Very Crowded
review: Parking a big problem, heavy traffic and restrictions, Heavy selling by agents for food, boating shopping, hotel rooms, food, Ropeway and Zoo entrances on & near Mall Road

title: Beautiful
review: Too much crowd and too many sellers irritating you. The lake is beautiful and the boating is worth it.

title: Boating and strolling
review: Boating in the lake was an amazing experience. also it feels wonderful to walk along the railings of the lake eating popcorn :)

title: Very clean Lake
review: The best thing was there was no bargaining for boats . Full boat with 4 cost Rs.210 . The tickets were issued from the window .The boating experience was nice .The naini Lake is a beautiful and clean lake .

title: very good
review: beautiful lake.. clear and nice.. enjoyed boating her and was a good experience. boat cost 210 rupees for a round trip, well organized, next to maal road and shopping is awesome there

title: nainital - place for family & romance too.
review: the tibetan market naini temple n d boat rides , the ropeway n the zoo all make up a good holiday. lot of walking to be one in the zoo.

title: family vacation
review: Crowded city, not much to do, but the hotel is meant to relax, chill and lovely view. Just enjoy the hospitality and unwind.

title: clean and nice lake.
review: very nice and beautiful place.boating on it was an amazing experience.you can spot the clouds around you while boating.amazing.

title: Jewel of Uttarakhand
review: It is an amazing place offering varied attraction to tourists. To start with, its connectivity is very good from Delhi, trains and buses are readily available this also leads to overcrowding during peak seasons. Naini lake is at the heart of city and most of the hotels are around the lake. One can enjoy boating in the lake, then their is a ropeway which takes you to snow view point. Horse riding is another attraction. For shopping, you get beautiful candles here. One can visit Raj Bhawan i.e Governor's House to have a feel of British legacy. Around Nainital one can visit different lakes, temples, tea garden and view points that offer great Himalayan view.

title: main attrection
review: i cant describe in words, it's maker is my god , nothing negative about it . still in good condition because of local administration and local people administration, people working there have a system for visitors which is good. rules and rates to visit lake is same for all.

title: great if you visit in evening
review: Great if you visit in evening otherwise you may feel bit of sunshine.

title: Pleasent Ride
review: They have two types of ride one is half and other is full, the full one costs around 200 Rs and it takes half n hour for same, must for visitors in Nainital

title: A beautiful lake
