review: The lake has a nice water front road going all around the lake. On one side is a busy road, with shops, restaurants, hotels. At one end is the Naina Devi Temple, a church and a mosque. On the other side along the lake front, is a quiet road, where one can take a peaceful walk.

title: Fantastic holiday destination
review: We took the Shatbadi from Anand Vihar Terminus Delhi to Kathgodam and thereafter a taxi outside to Nainital.  Taxi cost Rs 600 approx.

title: Beautiful Lake & Awesome Climate
review: In the mid of May 2015, I found this lake and surrounding area picturesque , quaint and cozy weather.

title: Children enjoy
review: It was really exciting for the children to take a pedal boat and have a go. They were so excited that they decided to each day during the 3 day stay go once.

title: Good place to spend an evening
review: Nice place to spend an evening and have morning walk.Normally cowded over weekends.Boat ride is good.

title: Very good.
review: Nothing to dislike. Everything was fine. Water was clean.Boatman was gentle and honest.Fees is normal. Walking along side of the road of lake was very pleasant.

title: Amazing boating experience;  soothing to the eyes
review: The natural beauty of the lake is simply put - awesome.  The mango shaped lake is huge.

title: Heaven
review: This place is just heaven. No matter how your mood is... Once you visit Naini Lake and spend some time looking at the water, your stress disappears and you become a part of nature. Simply awesome!

title: The Nainital lake is the best place in whole Nainital
review: Nice place, the only problem is the food which we didn't like in Nainital, there are few other place which yo can see. I heard the zoo very good, we were unable to go to the zoo as we were short of time. Maybe next time for zoo.

title: BEHAD KHOOBSOORAT
review: ABOUT NAINI LAKE NOTHING TO DISLIKE, The lake is extremely beautiful, largest lake among all the lakes and at a higher level,weather is cold what we were searching for,to beat the heat its perfect place

title: lake district,spectacular views
review: I visited nainital in may 18 to 21, this is a lake district, I visited all the lakes...naini lake,khurpatal,naukhuchiyatal, sadiatal, bhimtal,sattal,sukhatal...largest is nainital with a cold weather then nauhuchiyatal..this lake encroaches the tress and surrounding forest  u can recall the movie black water.bhimtal boating in night was awesome.

title: Nice Lake
review: Worth time spending at Naini Lake. Very nicely kept. Very neat and clean. Have a nice walk at Mall road and enjoy the beauty of Naini Lake.

title: beat the heat ...trvellers paradise in u.k.
review: I liked the naini lake  very  much,boating in evening in naini lake when the wheather getting colder,wind taking its speed,your boat getting little bit disbalance...thrill with joy ...what I searching in naintal I got it during boating in naini lake

title: Beautiful.. I love this place..
review: This is heart of Nainital.. Lovely lake.. One should enjoy boating in this lake. Big enough. Can also take pedestal boat and stay for some time in lake. I usually love it because you can go in the middle and stand still for some time and take a look around. No 1 spot in Nainital.

title: Excellent
review: Excellent place to visit. Cost around Rs 210 for per boat which is hand driven by the boatman. You can fit in around 4 person comfortably (though advice to go 2). Takes around 20-25 minits for half way ride inside the lake. You have option of taking paddle boat, which cost around Rs 150 (for 2 seater and Rs 200 for 4 seater for 1 hour ride. Plus refundable deposit of Rs 200. Advice: you need very good stamina to paddle, as wind will push you in different direction. Very well maintained by the Local body. No bad smell of water at all. They actually use water pumps to pump in oxygen in the lake. How often you see that in India.

title: Lake paradise
review: Nice relaxing, hired a row boat and also must do is ride in a yatch which cost around rs350. Best time is between 10 a m to 2 p m.

title: Naini lake is a complete travelers’ package.
review: Naini lake is main attraction in Nainital located on Mall road. We visited Nainital in the month of November, the best time to enjoy cold climate. Naini Lake at times becomes quite windy in the evening. At the same time day weather is quite bright and sunny. There are boating options available for couples (paddle boat, Shikara-types boat) as well as for families. You can walk around the lake and have good views of mountains all around. If you are a foodie there are varieties of options available on Mall road. Enjoy food with the view of beautiful Naini lake. Visit to Naina devi temple and zoo is a must. View of Naini lake from Rope way (Cable Car) is simply breathtaking.

title: Boating climate and climate its all about it.
review: The lake is extremely beautiful, largest lake among all the lakes and at a higher level,just enjoy the boating

title: Beautiful view
review: Naini lake form a nub of beauty in nainital.Girdled by lofty hills studded with attractive villas and cottages.

title: Cool wind in my hair - Eagles
review: The view when you come up to the Mall Road and see the Naini Lake for the first time is awesome - a deal clincher.You can sit on one of the benches placed there and appreciate the beauty of the lake and the hustle and bustle of Nainital.

title: Naini lake
review: Sunset was beautiful. However it started drizzling and we couldn't go boating. But the view is pretty romantic.

title: Nice lake and surrounding area
review: Naini lake is one of the main attractions of Nainital. It is placed between the famous Mall road one on side and mountains on the other. You can take a boat ride for an hour or half and enjoy the beautiful and scenic area.

title: A place for everyone
review: Whether it be a couple, family or  friends. An ideal place to admire.

title: Special eye therapy
review: Beautiful lake surrounded with mountains , it's good to see lake from little higher place like hotel room or mountain . Cool breeze freshness all the time , good place to visit

title: The Best Part of Nanital
review: You won't get such views daily. I have seen lots of mountains or rather hill station but Naini Lake is totally refreshing . They have created a pathway along the lake and there are seats to sit there. Feel like they have planned everything to enjoy the beauty of lake.

title: Nice lake
review: Walk the mall is greatadjacent to lake though crowded on weekends.Choose hotel facing lake.visit snowline and other lakes nearby.club is a mustvisit if possible

title: Excellent Views
review: You got two options either a normal boat or a yatch .... excellent views from the lake... if you like some adventure choose a yatch if its windy... :)

title: Serene beauty
review: Nice lake for boating. Very quiet and gives you good peace of mind even to walk around it. Tibetan market closeby is good for shopping and Sakleys restaurant is a must visit for their pastries.

title: Beautiful Hill station
review: around 8-10 hours drive from Delhi ... excellent hill station ... breath taking views... they have a well maintained Zoo ... u can go shopping... enjoy the weather .. lots of things to do...

title: good natural beautiful lake
review: States government need take care of its cleanliness. It is duty and responsibility of local and tourist also  to take care of lake cleanliness.

title: Peaceful hideout !!! Paradise !!
review: Nainital is one of the places in India where one can spend peaceful time. And naini lake its very geographical location makes it amazing. With freezing temperatures and a serene beautiful lake its an amazing experience. Do take a boat ride and traverse the entire lake.

title: Stunning
review: you can simply keep on boating here and still be u satisfied; choose from options like rowing boats, paddle boats or yatch; enjoy the serene surroundings around while boating

title: Beautiful surroundings
review: The surroundings of the lake are pretty, which makes the boating experience good. With the new initiative of the local authorities about cleanliness in the city, even a walk by the road on lake side is a nice and peaceful experience.

title: Beautiful lake and surrounding
review: The surrounding are very pretty, neat and clean. On one side of the lake is mountain and on the other side is the market. The lake is clean and you can easily hire a boat to spend an hour. Cool breeze increases the fun of boating.

title: Very nice and vibrant place!!
review: Enjoy nature, do boating through boating club, take a round at Mall Road, go to Tibet market eat at road side eateries on Mall Road!!

title: Tres Bien. Did the boat ride two times.
review: Lake is pretty clean. Did the peddle boat one time and the "chauffeured" one other time . Was yearning for a third go.

title: Good Big Lake
review: Enjoyed boating on this lake Rs 210 for one boating round in a rowing boat. Take rids only from official counters.

title: Fantastic View
review: Enjoy the nature while having drinks on Boat Club. Sunset is the most amazing site. Reflection of stars and weather is added beauty.

title: Seren!
review: One of the most serene and beautiful lakes in India. The water is clean. Nice if you take a boat ride in the lake. Also, go for a long walk along the sides of the lake. You will feel good!!

title: Memories made at the Lake last lifetime...
review: Undoubtedly, the numero uno attraction of Nainital... and rightly deserved... all action in Nainital is around this lake... boating is a must at this lake... charged at Rs 220 per ride... takes about 40 mins...

title: Splendid
review: Hello, truly God's grace to have such a beauty which this place is famous for. The lake is well maintained. The boating facility is good. So cool, and an exotic view of nature.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Beautiful big lake .It mesmerises the viewer with its calmness and beautiful surroundings.Especially it looks great during early mornings.A morning walk beside the lake will be really wonderful.

title: Wow What a Place,Wonderful,Awsome
review: Enjoy Boating,Perfect place to spend time with family, it is clean and does not smell,fresh air adds more pleasure

title: nice place for yoga retreat
review: i visited this place with husband.place is full of positive vibes and natural beauty.when you stant near by lake with closed eyes ,you can feel that you are enersise.....

title: naini lake
review: A beautiful lake with mango shape... The boat ride in shikkari boat was too good an experience. The Naini lake is protected by oxygen suppliments in many places in the lake which is a very good effort by local admn. Took photos with local costumes at the lake bund. Naini temple view is very good. FIshes are so big & worth watching... The boat driver was very good & informative. In Nainitaal the tarriff of public uititily is tranparent & very useful to the traveller giving no room for suspection & negotiation

title: Super....and super clean
review: I havent seen so many boats / peolpe baoting at one time, ans still it doest look crowded..its huge...and well the scenery is just splendid.  with the hussle bussle of the mall road on one side, the thandi sadad (greens on the other)...just so peaceful...simply amazing.

title: the center of attraction of nanital
review: it is kept clean; cannot miss it; boat ride a must; a great view; perfect photo place; must with a family

title: awesome place for peace seekers
review: when you travel to this place you will feeling like meditating and sense of inner peace. it's heaven for peace lovers. and you will love beauty of nature which will mesmerize you

title: Beauty personified!!
review: the nainital lake is one of the most beautiful lakes in India. it is one of the most wonderful creations of nature that I have come across.its beauty beats even the best of Man made structures in the world. Its the centre of attraction of the town and all the activities happen in and around it the lake is about a kilometre long and about more than 400 metres in Width. they have a couple of variety of boats and the entire experience of the lake is wonderful and worth while

title: Beauty of nainital
review: Its a place where you relive the old time. Do some boating, both paddle and shikara. Towards evening it gets a little chilly so try and do the boating during the late afternoon. Though the water is full of mosquitos.

title: ALSO KNOWN AS MANGO LAKE
review: Boating is the very good experience and you will find so many local shops near the lake. around the lake there are shops for umbrellas and tibbat market is also there. The Mall is very near to this place.

title: A dramatic scene
review: The lake has lots going around in it and around it. From paddle boats to small yachts with sails. One can even sit around the numerous Victorian benches and soak in the morning sun. (afternoon sun in case of winter). There are quaint boating clubs and libraries by the banks.

title: Peaceful View
review: A visit to Nainital is incomplete without have experience of Naini Lake and a boat ride in it. The place is very beautiful and situated in the middle of the residential area of Nainital. And the advantage, you can see Naini Lake from many places of Nainital. Love the peaceful view of Naini Lake and Nainital while boating. Overall the location and the atmosphere aroud the lake makes it worth visiting and expieriencing.

title: A pleasent stopover in hills-Nainital
review: Calm, quite and serene- A walk along Naini lake is far more rejuvinating  than one could have imagined. Bhutia Market situated on one side of lake is a shoppers delight. The lake is centrally located and conveniently accessible from all corners of city. It indeed adds to the charm of this hill station.

title: Tal on Tal
review: Best place to chill and boat in the huge lake, clear waters, just to pass of time, eat strawberries by the lake, watch kids play cricket by the ground on the lake side. shop for woolens in the tibet market

title: Main spot
review: The lake is good .clean water. with nice boating facility. The deepest point of the lake is still to be discovered. Give peaceful environment to valley

title: Scenic views
review: It's a fairly large lake situated in the heart of Nainital. The water is quite dirty and there are quite a lot of boats here (was told around 450 odd). Quite a bit of fish as well but all around the border due to the boats in the lake. Despite all these points a round of the lake is recommended. Don't forget to wear your life jackets.

title: Natural Beauty
review: Natural Beauty - Lake is famous attraction point in Nani lake.

title: Must see in Nainital
review: The view of this lake is excellent in Night time. Boating is available in The lake and a good place for the couples. The Mall road along the lake has many shops and shopping can be done. you can get varities of Candles and Dresses there

title: Lake View
review: Lot of disturbance from the people who want lure you to boating ,sightseeing, hotels. Cleanliness around lake is an issue during rains.

title: hotel sheela
review: room conditions, servicing, cleanliness.hotel boys are reluctant to provide service to the boarders. they are only keen on restauraant and college tours boarders

title: Naini lake..
review: Beautiful lake from which the city itself have derived a name.. Boating gacility availablle at reasonable prices and must have the experience init.

title: Pretty from a distance.
review: Its popular, crowded, and the usual built up areas close to the lake shore make these places ugly, in my opinion, and far from the natural beauty they should and must have, in earlier days, exuded.  Boating may be fun on a cool sunny day.

title: Nice place
review: Bang on the mall-road, it is a must visit place when in Nainital, go for a boat ride which is really refreshing and connects you with the lovely nature.

title: Serene Waters
review: The lake....like most lakes in Uttarakhand ....is surrounded by mountains and forests on all sides which give one an out of the world feel. Very clean and well maintained surroundings....the water is calm...they just have paddle and row boats so once you are in the center of the lake its just the swish of the waves, the occasional call of the birds and the view of the majestic mountains..do remember to carry a camera with a long range lens!

title: Centre of attraction
review: This place is centre of attraction of Nainital and literally its at centre only. The view from mall road or anywhere above is picturesque. Its main attraction is boating in lake, which is a must do.

title: CLEAN AND CUTE
review: Known in epics as Thri rishi sarovar - as Legend has it that sages - Athri , Pulasthya and pullaha brought water from Manas sarovar through their spiritual power to fill this place with water. ,

title: worth going once
review: A beautiful lake, but the boat man takes only 2 adults and 2 kids (below 10). Hence if u r in grp you may be disappointed.

title: nice
review: nice place to chill and enjoy with family, in the sun, must in nanital, for every one who is coming for the first time, its so relaxing

title: beautiful!!!
review: Its a beautiful place with a stunning view of the lake. the zoo, china peak, lakes around bhimtal such as Naukuchiatal etc are nearby. The really beauty of the lake can be felt if u r at any of the hilltop resort, with the reflection of lights into the lakes nearby!!

title: Peaceful and serene
review: Peaceful and nice in feb - Quite cold and fun. There werent many tourists in feb. it was cold. so the lake was nice peaceful . An afternoon boatride was also fun

title: "One of the best in Nanital"
review: Most Romantic place to go....Couples must go to boating or Shikhara in this place...this is the moment you love to make the memorable moment

title: PEACE
review: peace and serenity are the two words that come to mind when you talk about this place. boating makes the place even better .

title: Peaceful Place
review: The place is very serene and the view is amazing. Boating makes the experience even better and photographers will have an awesome time there.

title: Lovely Serene Beauty
review: The Boat ride here is enjoyable. The beauty of Naini lake doesnt need to be described...its world famous :) Its lovely.

title: BEAUTY
review: It is a Lake of Kumaon Hill situated in Lake District of India. The place is peaceful with an amazing view.The lake is surrounded by panoramic seven hills and the view is such that it can compel any writer/poet to describe it's beauty.Don't Miss the boating as it will help explore the beauty..!!

title: True Gem
review: Bounded by the high and steep peaks right in the proximity of the township of Nainital, the natural kidney shaped freshwater body, namely Naini Lake is considered to be the true gem here to generate captive tourist years after year.  No doubt, the lake has empowered the township of Nainital to be so special a hill station.

title: my fav
review: This lake is like a diamond in the crown..I mean to say

title: A must do in Nainital
review: Boating in the Naini lake is a must do on a trip to Nainital. The lake in the middle of the mountains is very serene and peaceful. It is also very clean and will maintained

title: Nice place to have boating in Nainital
review: This is very nice and calm place. The best part is that motor boat is not allowed in this lake to keep it clean...

title: Good view but too crowded
review: Other Taals are much better. This one is too commercialized for boating and experience. Try and get sail boats but they are available only from Boat club.

title: Peaceful
review: Despite it being a cliched thing to do, i really had a nice time boating on the lake.

title: Very special
review: Nainital is one of the best hill stations, I have ever visited. The lake, surrounded by steep heels creates a special mood here. You can sit here on the benches, positioned by the lake, you can move around the places near to and far from the lake.  Yes, undoubtedly apart from the Naini Devi Temple, the Bhutiya bazaar, here the lake is the main attraction that creates the difference between Nainital and  many other hill stations.  The authority here provided special concentration for the tourist by pronouncing the mall road as vehicle free from 5 pm to 8 pm.  No vehicles (not even rickshaw) during this period are allowed to pursue in the corridor.  Thus, the tourist can enjoy every moment by hanging around the mall road area.  And, yes, the people here are pretty tenderly, amiable and helpful as well.

title: Superb
review: Didn't go for boat ride ;-p Go for pedal boat till Naina Devi temple. Best viewed from higher floors.

title: Breathing Lake
review: The lake has some machines installed at the base of the lake that keep that oxygen level at a optimum level in the lake which keeps the water clean and best suited for fishes.

title: Lovely Boat ride on Naini Lake
review: Boat Ride is awesome, but be careful while paying for boat rides. Don't give the receipt to the boatman until you sit on his boat.

title: Excellent boating experience but gets crowded in summer
review: Boating in Naini lake is an excellent experience but this gets crowded in the peak seasons. If you want to enjoy your Nainital visit more avoid the peak time and rush.

title: Awesome Place
review: Best part of lake is its surrounded by hills which makes this Lake wonderful. We can enjoy Paddle boating and row boating.

title: Should definately do boating
review: The rates of boating are fixed and not very expensive. One should opt for a rowing boat for half an hour.

title: Refreshing
review: Great boating experience, though it was bit scary in the starting. Cool, fresh breezes that further enhances the exprien

title: Lovely place to relax your body
review: Lovely place to relax your body. Naini Lake is the best part of this Place. Its Kidney/Mango shaped lake. We can enjoy boating at the lake, while the stunning scenic surroundings please your senses. One of the best highlight is Mall Road, Nainital trip is incomplete without taking a walk around here.

title: quiet and serene
review: the shikhara is a nice experience.

title: boating
review: rs 300 for shikara type boat was quite handsome and surely good thing to do, evening ride is good time to be there

title: Cold!!
review: it was 6 degrees or lesser in the night and was freezing cold...

title: nice and very clean
review: all boats are good , staff is helping. no polythen no mud . water is deep take care.we were 4 persons . there should be some guard like person to guide and help as well

title: Stunning Lake !
review: The lake is huge and stunning. Boating was real fun, except for the cold winds which almost froze me. Go for boat no. 160, An elderly man. He was just too good. Must Visit Place if you are in nainital.

title: Beautiful !
review: This is one of the most beautiful hill stations i have visited. Very serene and surrounded by beautiful lakes. You should also visit other areas like Bhimtal , Sattal & Naukachital.

title: Paddle Boat - Felt like 10 year old
review: So, we visited Nainital after a 2 nights stay at Corbett. The weather was superb. 2 kinds of boats - 1 is the paddle and another is with the boat man! We chose the paddle as we were 4 of us. The lake is undoubtedly clean and overlooks the hills on 1 side and mall road on another. Charges are INR 200 per boat per hour for 4 people. Well if you are not strong in your legs,dont experiment this option as in excitment you will paddle for half an hour and reach till the end...The main issue will be to come back and that will seriously take the life of you.HaHa. Anyways, its a great place to chill. I strongly recommend this once during your trip to Nainital.

title: Boat riding in naini lake
review: good experience of riding naini lake in nainital. too cold that day but still enjoying a lot. charges are nominal but we didnt take the self operating boat because of wind that day.....

title: Fantastic viewpoint
review: The Naini Lake has a fantastic viewpoint..but, the boat riders are a small nuisance, interrputing you every now and then to hire their boat for a ride

title: Very good hill station
review: Nainital is a famous tourist destination of india, attracting hundreds of both domestic and foriegn tourists every year. Its shines as a glittering jewel in the himalayan mountains and is surrounded with lakes and natures bounty.....

title: A bit too crowdy and full of people
review: This lake is so pretty but is totally run as a business unit! There are buses full of tourists arriving every hour and people throwing trash all around.

title: Beautiful_ heart of lake district of of india
review: Naini lake one of the most beautiful lake of India. In fact Naini lake is heart of lake district of India, which is having nine lakes. Nainital city is situated all around the lake, which look beautiful in the night. Nanital is around 300km from India's capital and well connected by rail, road & air. My only advice is never visit Nainital during Holiday season, because it is jam packed & it is hard to move on the Mall road, so if you want to enjoy beauty of naini lake then visit off season. And when you are there then visit other lakes also.

title: Clean and Clear
review: Being rainy season very few tourist were around hence enjoyed peaceful serenity of the lake, also this made the boat rower to go around the lake a bit longer.

title: Beautiful
review: We hired a sail boat from the boat club and it was amazing. The lake is very beautiful even the normal boating experience was superb.

title: Boat Ride with Nice view
review: i visited this place with my freinds good to see the view for the lake we book a cab for around 700rs. and he took us to 5-6 place in 1 day itself we actually enjoyed the most when we came here beautiful view of the lake people walking around the lake market is very near to this place.boat ride is must.Place is neat and clean.

title: Crowded Place but Water makes it enjoyable
review: I am not a lover of this station because of over-crowdedness yet I find myself there because of the attraction & enjoyment opportunities that any water body has. Wife & Kids are sure to enjoy at such a place.

title: Must do, go for the yacht
review: You can't miss the Naini Lake if you visit Nainital.. Most of the tourists take the regular pedal or row boats, however, you can also go for the yacht which can be booked at the Yacht club at the banks of the lake.

title: NICE
review: boating in this beautiful lake is a good experience & a major attraction of nainital entry to this lake should be much more maintained

title: Nice Place for Short Trip
review: If someone is really willing to get out of concreat jungle and this is best and the nearest option for Delhi people.

title: breathtaking!!!!
review: very beautiful place..such a greenery..stay was good eventhough it was raining continously. a must visit place

title: nice, peacefull, and awesome atmosphere with beautiful location
review: we visited nainital in february 2015, it peak off time for nainital. less visiters are there that makes it so peace full. nainilake maintained well and clean lake.

title: Beautiful lake
review: A lot to do, very serene and beautiful. Boating is a must. You can also check out the rope way, or the Tibetan market. Get the prices from a local before you do anything touristy around here.

title: Nice location
review: enjoyed botting. Naini Lake is best place in Nainital to enjoy the nature and boat riding. it is a wonderful place

title: Good and cheap
review: get the pictures clicked by the person who is rowing your boat. They have good sense and idea. I got some really good snaps.  Take 1 hr trip.

title: Cleanest of them all
review: Besides being beautiful and breathtaking , I am amazed with cleanliness of the lake . Kudos to the people and the government there . This is soo beautiful and serene that you can spend hours and hours doing nothing on banks and keep staring at it . Naini-tal is so majestic .

title: Naini Lake...beautiful and calm
review: Excellent. It was end of winter and not many boats to be sighted. Calm and cool sailing experience. The lake is clean

title: beautiful, nice & clean lake
review: We Visited naini lake in 10/02/2015. it was superb and memorable experience at lake. lake is so beautiful and clean. we enjoyed paddle boating a lot. Atmosphere was so good. During our 3 days stay we all day went there. we love to seat at lake side for hours. sunshine in morning makes so beautiful weather, in evening it was little bit cold than day time. But you can enjoy it also.

title: Excellet
review: Amazing experience, would love to visit again.

title: Naini Lake
review: This lake is beauty of Nanital it shape is like a kidney or cresent shaped. Naini lake is one of the four lakes of kumaon hills other there lakes are Sattal lake, Naukuchital lake and the bhimtal lake. This lake historical records confirm that in 1839, Mr. P. Barron, from Rosa, an English business man in sugar trade, on a hunting expedition accidentally coming across the lake at Nainital was so captivated that he decided to build a European Colony on shores of the lake. The news magazine, the Englishman Calcutta, reported in 1841 discovery of this lake near Almora

title: Splendid place with awesome surroundings
review: Woke up to the chilling cold of Nainital, boat ride a must wherein you can enjoy the view by riding the boat in Naini Lake and enjoy a Hot Chocolate available nearby. Also there is a ropeway which will take you to the top but the view on the top is not that great, though the view while you are going up is good. Lots of Tibetan restaurants nearby and a very well maintained Govt Run Bar-cum-Restaurant near the Bus Stand Petrol Pump

title: Serene
review: The lake is fed by an underwater spring but is not very clean these days. Opt for the sailing boats instead of the regular ones.

title: Lake with 360 view of Nainital
review: Excellent lake with complete view of Nainital. Govt monitored and hence no cheating by any boat owners. Must take warm cloth as it's windy inside. Visit between 12 noon to 2 pm for better view

title: nice
review: It is a beautiful river. It is situated in the center of Nainital. It is a very big Jheel.when we went there , there were many boats and boatman who took us for a boat ride. It was very good. When we went boating the boat man told us that it was very deep and there was a belief that there were mermaids in this lake. It was interesting to know that it is a spiritual lake , it is believed that an eye of Hindu goddess was felt their that is why it is named as " Naini Jheel" .

title: Beautiful but commercialised
review: Very beautiful place,  but as I am from South India,it looked like Kodaikanal lake.. So nothing new to see.. This  place is more commercialised and crowded.. When we visited,  it was heavy raining... The candle shops are good..

title: Good Boating ride
review: Avery good experience , Enjoyed full round of lake though weather was cool but it was bright sunny day which was reverse in plains with lot of fog , overall a must visit place

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The lake water is clean. Boats charges are not overpriced and nominal. The mall road market by the lake is very enjoying for a morning or evening walk with family and friends. Mall road or Tibetan Market is flooded with materials easily available in small towns. I found nothing special to buy from these markets. If necessary one can buy locally made(as they said) shawls, winter caps and candles as bring home for family. People of Naini-Tal are very good and friendly as I observed in my 3 days stay. 2 or 3 days stay is sufficient for this place to see all the places nearby. Summer is the best time to enjoy and in January end or February heavy discounts are offered by Hotels when temperature falls down to 3 degree at night when few people mostly from corporate groups come here for conferences or meetings.

title: Naina
review: Has a tiny market and the Nainintemple just next to it it's relaxing and rejuvenating. However I would suggest a visit in off peak times

title: main attraction of the place
review: this is the first thing you see when you get in there... its good to roam around it along with the local market

title: Nice Naini lake
review: Awesome wide spread lake...Nice boating options during the day till evening...sometimes few swans also float around during the day...

title: Focal point of Nanital
review: Only thing you can do here is boating .. try not taking paddling boat in case you are accompanied with fairer gender ;)

title: What a view..
review: Excellent view..especially looks really beautiful at night!..Do visit the Pahari store and the Tibetian market for good bargains.

title: It's Big
review: It's one of the biggest & clean lake in all the nine lakes in Nainital. Plenty of multi colored fishes tells about the quality of water that is fresh. Enjoyed boating in the evening as weather was really nice.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: This is the best lake I have ever been. This located at the prime area with Mall road running on the side of it where you can shop handcrafted items. Enjoyed boating here with mountains around and had plenty of boat options and fixed fees. You are sure to have a good time here. We came here for boating on all 3 days of our stay.

title: Main attraction in Nainital
review: Nice lake with Boating option. It is the main attraction in Nainital located at the mall road. There are boating option available for couple and family. This is a mango shape lake which makes the lifeline for Nainital.

title: Beautiful lake
review: Its a very beautiful lake in the middle of the town. I was there in Nainital for 3 days, and went for boating in the lake twice. Both the time I went after my lunch, took a paddle boat, went at the middle of the lake and just relaxed.

title: Tal means Lake
review: Did boating in afternoon when winds on lake are not so chilly. Enjoyed the sun and tranquil waters. The lake is absolutely clean with nil trace of algae. Good view of mountains whole around. Lake has good eateries on the Mall road. Took boat No 74 and the owner was very nice and took us for more than 30 minute ride. One can also try pedal boats which is tiring.

title: Good place to relax
review: This the best place in case you plan to just chill out and not do much.

title: Main Attraction of Nainital
review: Very good lake. Nice scenery around. Must take boat ride. Which costs 300/- for full round and 250/- for half. They informed that the rate is fixed.

title: fantastic view
review: Good view being mountains on one side and mall road on the other. Boating can be done throughout the day. You can also visit Naini devi temple which has historic significance . and at the same time one can enjoy the shopping of woolens and innovative products.

title: Enjoy boating in the lake ....
review: Its a quiet hill resort ...ideal for a vacation.While going to the town you have to drive through the congested market place ...  I am told it will soon be taken care of as the work on the main is near completion..

title: verybeautiful
review: Beautiful....clean...nice to row around the lake..nice walk around the lake...main attraction ti on of the British town. ..wonderfully lit up in the evenings

title: See it at night
review: Beautiful Lake...

title: lake
review: crowded like any tourist spot... good for shopping... there is a honey shop and a spot to watch fish...

title: Beautiful and serene
review: A must visit place if you visit Nainital. An hour long boat ride is all you need to calm yourself. You can opt for rowing boats or the paddle boats. Personally i feel the paddle boats are more fun!!

title: Beauty..
review: Naini lake is the main attraction in Nainital , u'll will boating in this lake...highly maintained lake and water I svery clean ....if you visit Nainital in Monsoon .....clouds will come personally to play with you while boating session...

title: Nice
review: Amazing my heart remains there n wanna go again such a lovely place to visit.

title: Calm & Serene
review: Calm and serene enjoy the boat ride or walk past the thandi road or sip coffee sitting at the CCD overlooking the lake .... perfect place to relax and rejuvenate. One cannot spend more than a couple of day out here.

title: Fantastic Boating experience
review: Nothing to dislike. Everyone will like the place. In the winter, 2 kind of boating experiences, during the day time, with sun light, & in the early evening. Fantastic experience.

title: great lake
review: great lake to sail in boat. Be careful it is too deep in centre. It is lovable all the day. in the evening one can walk on mall road along with lake. view from hills is excellent.

title: Nainital Lake - Its a beauty near Delhi
review: The mall road is very clean and beautiful that you can go there again and again to sepnd your vacation.

title: Excellent Sceneary
review: Its an excellent place near Delhi for a short trip. Children can enjoy boat rides, stroll down the mall road, some shopping, and even adventure trips in and around Nainital. A visit to cave garden and the zoo is a must.

title: Heaven on the earth
review: Naini Lake is a natural resource of water; we can say it is the life line of the city Nainital. It is quite big in size also. At the day time people use to enjoy boating in it, location of the lake is also on the sunny side during the whole day. We enjoyed the boating and really it was a good experience.

title: nani lake upper view
review: nice view of nani lake its looks like mango in shape nice visit point to see. take a photo with proffesional photographer.it takes 10-15 mints to reach this point.

title: Nice
review: A good break from the hustle and bustle of the market place. But I so wish it was neat and clean and not so strewn with litter. Still there is water, there is a boat and the skies above with the setting sun which lets you ignore some grime:)

title: A lake of serenity and silence
review: It was indeed a very soothing experience visiting such a beautiful lake. Its clean and beautiful with all the boats full of tourists enjoying the view of Nainital from the lake and the silence of the lake with a rhythmic oaring.

title: Must visit while in Nainital
review: A visit to Nainital without a boat ride in Naini Lake is incomplete. You get different varieties of boats and if you are the adventurous kinds then you may try out all of them on different days of your stay. Take a ride and I am sure you will come back for more. If you become pals with the boatman then you get a few extra minutes of ride time. Give it a shot.

title: Best lake in the valley
review: Great lake for boating purpose. Pedal boat is the best way to enjoy boating in this lake. Belive me you will enjoy a lot. From lake view of hills is excellent.

title: Clean & Beautiful
review: Great place for boat ride, Clean water.

title: Nice Place for Travel
review: Its a nice place to visit. There are various things to visit.The number one should be Nainatal Lake.

title: Nice boat trip
review: If you go anywhere near the lake you will be repeatedly asked if you would like a boat trip, but if you politely say no then you will be thanked for listening and not hassled more by that person.

title: It is all about the lake/view/ and climate.
review: In the month of Dec14 ending, worth to enjoy cold climate / view / and the lake which is the centre of attraction.  Travel the hillsides to enjoy valley/snow and mountain side.  If you are a foodie, you will love to eat in all the variety of places available, for the same.

title: serene
review: time slows down and you can sit back and watch the fellow boaters, hear the bells toll at naina devi temple, dip your hands in the freezing cold water talk to the locals on the mall ..eat blueberries that come in leaf pouches as you inhale the fresh air and forget everything else

title: A beautiful lake located at this height
review: Thy have boat rides which are very reasonable. The lake is well maintained and clean as well. It is the main attraction of Nainital as the city gets it's name from the lake.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Naini lake is good for boating and the leisure walk around the lake i.e. the Mall road. Go for the boating between 11 am to 4 pm as the wind chill is taken care of by the Sun.

title: Nainital Lake
review: Nainital lake is one of the major attractions of Nanital Its beautiful..and a boat ride is an awesome experience. The authorities have done a fairly good job of keeping it clean, Just sitting by the lake and gazing and the waters is refreshing.A visit to Bhimtal is also recommended

title: Picturesque Landmark Lake
review: Beautiful lake. Great boat ride experience. One must try the paddle boats. Very picturesque for photographing on both sides of the lake.

title: Picteresque!!
review: Naini lake is very beautiful and nestled between the bustling mall road and green hills. A shikara ride/peddle boating/yatching across this lake is something that should not be missed while you are at Nainital. Evening is generally preferred

title: Awesome Lake!!
review: It is a very awesome lake for spending time and enjoying boating. It is one of the best attraction in Nainital and along with city gets its name from the lake,"Naini Lake"

title: Nice surrounding
review: Naini is a beautiful lake in between the hills. They have boat rides which are very reasonable. It's very calming.  The lake is well maintained and clean as well. It is the main attraction of Nainital as the city gets it's name from the lake.

title: The Exotic Nainital
review: The place Nainital is simply mesmerizing with natural beauty and tranquil grace of the environ. The name is named after lake. This lake is shaped like a beautiful pear and surrounded by lush mountains. This lake attracts lots of people coming from all corners of the country who love to enjoy boating, paddling, yachting in the lake. When it comes my chances to visit the place I was simply ecstatic. The first place which I and my friends visited was Naini Devi temple which is a sacred place for worship. Situated at the top of the Naini Hill, it is believed that goddess’s sati’s eyes fell in this place that’s where every year devotees in huge number come to this place. We reached there by climbing. Inside temple we not only saw the main idol of maa naini devi, but also lord ganesh and mata kali devi. People told me that if I don’t visit the height peak of Naini taal then my trip is incomplete. Therefore our next destination was China peak also known as Naina peak. A horse ride took us to the peak from where we had the panoramic view of the mesmerizing snow capped Himalayas. After coming down to the plains our next destination was mall road, the busiest road of the town. The road is full with many busy shops, banks, hotels, restaurants, street shops etc much comforting to the city dwellers like us.

title: Pot of Water between the Green Mountains
review: Cool lake to Sail on it. ideal for group and couple boating!

title: Chlling
review: Too crowded. Liked the weather. Enjoyed boat club & food @ Embassy Restaurant but lot of eating outlets to choose from.

title: grt place
review: great place for evening stroll & hangout & shopping in the mrkets nearby. the market near the mandir is more cheap than the mall road markets . thats our tip for u all

title: Silent beauty
review: There is nothing to dislike....if you like boating.

title: good experience
review: its a very deep lake. but ot of excitement. good experence good people thee. you can negotiate your rate for 2 hours. its not very expensive. enjoy

title: Serene, calm, relaxing
review: The first impression of the lake is that it is right in the middle of the busy mall road with all the traffic and honking. But when we got into a boat and went a little bit farther from the shore, it was hell of a peaceful experience. It was so serene and calm that we felt like sleeping. The lake is still so beautiful after so many years. The boat ride experience is a classic and not to be missed even if its a cliche and all.

title: awesome place for boating and walk around lake
review: walk on mall road in July/Aug is like walk on clouds with sprinkle of rain it was awesome experience in rainy season...

title: Nainital' beauty
review: The lake is situated in middle of Nainital. Boating in the lake gives you amazing experience. On all sides of it, you have Nainital and it is situated in middle of hills

title: Awesome experience at Naini Tal
review: The Naini Lake or Tal gives Nainital its name. The major attractions alongside the lake are the Upper & Lower Mall Roads and the Naina Devi Temple. You can buy wax figurines and candles at the shops or have Dimsums (Momos) at the Mall Road shops. The Ropeway to the hilltop is also nearby. Boating in the lake is a must if you have the time. Loved taking pictures of my family and nature in front of the lake.

title: Awesome Natural Beauty
review: Nainital is very beautiful natural scenic place.I really wondered by seeing that lake.lake is surrounded by hills in eye shape.super attraction to visit in nainital.I went for boating in that lake, it is awesome experience for me.

title: Calm
review: We visited Nainital on our way back from Corbett as the road from Corbett to Noida was pathetic. As there was time left we decided to take the boat ride and it was worth. You have to take tickets from counter and price is regulated based on the duration of ride. The only drawback is there's lot of construction on the hills which destroys the natural beauty.

title: it is wow
review: huge , clean , peaceful lake. looks amazing

title: beautiful
review: Boating in this lake or walking along the mall is heavenly. Rest of the Talli Tal area is crowded with cheap restaurants

title: Beauty in the hills
review: Nainital owes its beauty to the Naini lake.

title: Very nice place to spend time
review: Naini lake is very nice place to spend some time and to enjoy boating. Naini Lake is the centre of the city. Along with Naini Lake is the Mall Road, very beautiful in the night.

title: Amazing lake view. Beautiful and serene
review: It was so nice lake. At 2.30 Pm i saw sun and moon together.

title: Boating at Naini Lake :)
review: It was one of the most pleasurable experience to boat in this beautiful lake.

title: Nice and Serene!!
review: Lake and surrounding area is very beautiful. It was so calm and really enjoyed the boating. After boating visited the mall road which is adjacent to the lake and the walk is really nice.

title: Nainital and Naini lake and mall road. Uff! Nature's beauty
review: One of the best hill stations in India. It has awesome lake. Naini and bhimtal.

title: worth visiting
review: a visit to nainital is incomplete without a boat ride in naini lake. one can just enjoy his evenings sitting on the benches at the borders of the lake. or a walk on 'thandi-sadak' around the lake is equally refreshing...enjoy your boat ride with fog engulfing you and than giving way...heavenly experience..

title: Boat ride was really nice
review: Its a nice lake with lot of bollywood history! A boat ride is a must.

title: Very nice and cool place
review: By far one of the most beautiful places I have been to.. The best time to visit is from April to November

title: Nice and Serene!!
review: Lake and surrounding area is very beautiful. It was so calm and really enjoyed the boating. After boating visited the mall road which is adjacent to the lake and the walk is really nice

title: Beautiful and Clean Lake
review: Hats off to the authorities and the locals in maintaining and keeping this must see this big lake clean and beautiful. This is the most important attraction of Nainital and is located at the centre of the city.

title: Fantastic well maintained tourist spot
review: Good place to enjoy boating, walking, and shopping at Tibet market near by. It is well maintained for traffic and cleanliness ( no plastic use was big surprise and it is being followed by all including the locals)

title: Great view
review: I visited this place after a long period and find it is still a beautiful place to stand at the Banks of Lake and watch people Boating in blue water.

title: Nice big lake, must visit for boating
review: Naini lake can bee seen from many places of Nainital, center attraction of Nainital. must visit place if you are visiting Nainital.

title: clearner than every
review: Good views while boating. Should take the full round with a driver or a paddle boat and stop in the middle and enjoy the view. It has been cleaned and there is no smell in the lake. You can also see this lake and its beauty from most of the hotels in Nainital

title: Everything at one place
review: This place is very beautiful and situated in middle of the residential area of Naini Tall... which is Mall Road.

title: Excellent
review: Naini Lake is the best attraction of nainital one must do boating there there are 2 types of packages for boating 160/ for half round of lake and 210/- for full round of lake one can take paddle boat which i don't recommend because its too tiring take boat with driver as the charges are same.

title: Nice Lake
review: Beautiful lake, clean water situated between the mountains and gives a lovely view during clear weather.

title: Lake ride!
review: it will cost 350 as per the government rates. Nice ride. We had taken this to have one of my brothers birthday celebrated. Nice thing have the cake cut , right in the middle of the lake. :)

title: it is still beutiful
review: I visited this place after a long period and find it is still a beautiful place to stand at the Banks of Lake and watch people Boating in blue water.

title: Out of the World Experience
review: Must have visited the lake over 5 times now. every time it surprises me. take a boat from 4.30-5.30 slot. it closes at 5.30. As the natural light wanes & lights on building comes up- the town awakens...

title: Superbbb...
review: Among all lakes around Naini lake is the best...and also the town...and the mall road,the boating,the temple,the tibetian market and all...

title: Awesome experience
review: Naini lake made me and my wife feel very near to nature. The water is clean with only rowing and paddel boating alowed. Superb view of Nainital while boating. The lake looks awesome amid fogg either in morning or during the day.

title: Great natural beauty,lake water is quite clean,can see fishes is bunch.
review: Liked the chilled winds in the evening.Talli Tal is quite windy in the evening.Day weather is quite nice.No need to wear woolen clothes.Boating with family is enjoyable.For evening snacks,Momos & Noodles,at Bhotia market are delicious.To feel the god & to touch peace,visit Temple Humangari & Nana Devi.

title: Beautiful view and calm waters
review: Visited Nainital this trip to India the guy who drove there was skeptical about it but i enhoyed the calm and cool climate but it was a bit too crowded the view was pretty the vast lake and calm and smooth boat ride. Recommended to visit the place at least once.The most beautiful view though is while going top to the snow view point and from the top.

title: Beautiful
review: Awesome view, and wonderful weather, friendly people, peaceful place...a weekend gateway, little heaven near Delhi...loved the place.... will go there again and again and again

title: average
review: average lake as far as beauty and ride is concerned ..  nainital is all about mall road so can be a good time pass while roaming around in mall road but no doubt it can be maintained in a better way to attract more tourist.

title: Unending Boating
review: Clear big lake with many options. Boatmen are helpful and the boating tkts are well organized and not left to individual touts etc.

title: Great view... well maintained
review: Worth taking a boat ride. Clean and well maintained. It looks great after dark. We loved taking a walk as well as rickshaw ride during morning and evening hours..

title: Very Well Maintained !!
review: One of the best lakes I have ever been considering the fact that I have seen lakes in Switzerland, Scotland and Austria !! Only thing which bothers me is the surrounding mountains are full of houses!! No space at all :(..Otherwise, the lake is very well maintained, not like some other lakes in India ..

title: Beautiful
review: You have to take a ride in the naini lake if your in nainital. I guess it's a kind of a ritual. And a suggestion would be to take the boat ride in which you dont have to roe the boat. :P

title: Star attraction of Nainital and a must Visit
review: No amount of words will do justice of the beauty of lake and the thrill of a relaxing boat ride in it. Dusk is perhaps the best time with fading light( and sun on some hills) make for a great backdrop!

title: Cool Atmospher
review: LIked : Best lake, Best weather, Cool shops around lakes and climate change in every 15-20 mins...sunny day to cloudy and rainy to sunny etc...Boating is amazing experience.

title: Boating
review: We had great fun being rowed from one end of the lake to the other and back. We then took out a pedal boat and had even more fun as our rudder did not work properly. It was also nice to walk along the edge of the lake on the Mall.

title: Serene Naini lake
review: Excellent location amidst the mountains and boating in the Fog was a very good expierience.. Overall the location and the atmosphere aroud the lakes makes it worth visiting and expieriencing.

title: Incredibly clean
review: For a lake with such a heavy tourist load, it is surprising to see the water sparkling clean. The lake is protected and artificially aerated to ensure this and sustain the marine lifeforms. The fishes and swans in it are lovely.

title: Lake ... boating in the soft cool breeze, surrounding hills
review: It is a fresh water natural lake & there are different types of boats in which you can sail and enjoy.

title: boating
review: boating on naini jheel is an awesome experience.we could alse see fishes floating in the lake early morning from the rooms of the hotel and the beautiful sunrise.

title: Amazing experience
review: You would love to go for a boating on this lake. It feels heavenly. However, make sure that you bargain and ask at least 2-3 people before you make a deal. You won't get cheap rates, as there is a fixed rate. But, people fool around by charging for full lake circle and will take only half. They give you excuse that it is not allowed. But, trust me it is allowed. Also, they try to sell full day deal for Nainital. Don't fall prey to them.

title: NAINITAL IN A NUTSHELL AROUND
review: Everything you would wanna know about nainital and its culture is in and around this lake.

title: Beauty called Naini Lake
review: The Best time to for a Boating in Naini Lake is Aug. It's So Beautiful to do Boating in Cloud. The Lake is Absolute Beauty with Mountains Around . And the Best Part is Its Very Clean.

title: nice place to visit
review: You can visit this place any time of the year. Will always enjoy boating on the lake. The weather can change any time...but it will be a nice experience.

title: Superb Place
review: The surrounding hills and atmosphere around is mesmerizing..I would suggest everyone to visit atleast in their lifetime..

title: Excellent lake to view
review: It is a very good city in the hill station. Nearly all types of Foods and hotels are there. Lake is the Main attraction over there.

title: The heart of Nainital !!
review: A boat ride through the lake is a "must" when you visit Nanital !!You can choose from a row-boat(more convenient) or a paddle-boat(good exercise). The lake is quite clean and supports a good number of fishes and ducks

title: Naini Lake……….nature at its best
review: I feel Nainital is one of the best hill stations in India. Nainital has a pear-shaped lake (Naini Lake) surrounded by the mountains. You can experience the beauty of the place by going for a boat ride. It’s a beautiful place to relax and forgot all your worries. The thing I liked most in my trip to Nainital was the evening walk alongside the lake in the constant flow of the cold breeze. The whole ambience was so relaxing and since this was the mall road of Nainital, we got an added advantage of exploring the local market of the city along with our walk

title: Fabulous view, clean and well maintained lakeside
review: Fabulous view of the lake from all around the city.

title: Excellent lake
review: We visited in October first week, when there was extended weekend rush. The lake is beautiful, worth a boat ride. And if there are clouds, you could even see them touching the lake.

title: Just Awesome
review: Both are too good, walking around the lake and boat riding. I suggest that, if possible, go twice for boat riding. Once, before the noon and take a yacht and another once in the evening taking the other kind of boat...

title: Beautiful Location
review: Calm and deep lake, for Nature lovers its a must to take a boat ride and a morning walk around the lake or a hot tea on the banks of lake make it a lovely moment to cherish.

title: Beautiful Lake with very soothing weather
review: Naini Lake is very beautiful and big one, not like small name sake lakes.

title: Soothing Place But Crowded At Times
review: Calm soothing Lake...Crowded place yet clean water...Good place to enjoy A peaceful evening...If you are seeking a secluded place this is not for you...for a family this place could be a nice evening

title: nice views
review: absolutely good...lots of boats....near mall road... best thing is it is located on top of the hill.. one thing is to be taken care of is boating is not that much safe...

title: Beautiful Lake and quiet surroundings
review: The natural beauty around the lake and the well maintained lake is a treat to your eyes. We just enjoyed our time here.

title: Clean, great view and awesome boating experience
review: City administration has done a remarkable job of cleaning the Naini Lake. Last time I visited was around 10 years back. That time the lake wasn't clean, you could see all kind of trash in the lake. However, now a wonderful rejuvenation of the serenity of the place has been done. Lake is very clean now, with good amount of fishes .

title: Awsome
review: The place really good  and people over there are toooo coperative .

title: Amazing Lake with Boating......
review: The lake located in the heart of Nainital is a must visit place in Nainital.......Boating is also amazing at a cheap price.....Must try the PADDLE BOAT......overall awesome experience.

title: Walk around the lake
review: This lake is heart of Nainital, most of the places around just build up around it. I would recommend to have a walk around the lake rather then boating.

title: Good for one time visit !
review: This is a good weekend get away for those in Delhi close by areas, the place is a famous tourist place and if you love bird watching then DON'T MISS PANGHOT

title: Beautiful Place- Must to visit
review: Nainital with its lakes, green landscapes and pleasant weather has always been a favored tourist destination in India. The ambiance here is so pleasing that you would never want to leave this place.

title: Nice view and boating experience
review: nice view .. nice boating experience ...you can get the boating tickets from near the lake only ....

title: Very good...best in weekdays
review: Go for Yatch. It can be booked from the club at little extra charge (350 per yatch) but is worth the experience. Don't think twice, go for it.

title: clean, calm, peaceful, tranquil
review: A must boat ride for all to enjoy serene beauty on and around the lake.

title: lake overlooked by the naina devi diety
review: the lake is surrounded by the lush green forest all around. well maintained and taking a boat ride is very soothing and comforting . a must see for the nature lovers

title: Family place
review: A clean lake surrounded by hills. Has a lot of eateries and shopping avenues on the sidewalk. Also offers boating etc making a good place to spend time with the family.

title: Best in Nainital
review: The heart of Nainital. It attracts so many travellers every year. Very peaceful. Really enjoy the boating.

title: clean & full
review: not much of crowd inspite of tourist season & a very good weather.every shopkeeper was just waiting to welcome you.great time to be there.

title: Sparkling peaceful evening
review: Wow, when hundreds of diva enlighten lake , it gave me feeling of stars at night , in open sky . Traffic less , peaceful mall road , roaming with partner , gave a feeling of walking in heaven ..

title: Beautiful lake - the Naini Lake
review: What a wonderful lake - the Naini Lake.  Boating here is a pleasure & the season was perfect, we had clouds all around us boating along with us on the lake.  In minutes the weather would clear & you can see the beautiful nature, city, hills all around.  Very well maintained lake (no motor boats allowed to avoid water & air pollution) (no polythene bags allowed) & it's peripheral is superb to walk, shop, have a cycle-rikshaw round.  It's more than a perfect monsoon picnic spot.  Reaching by overnight train, exploring the place in 2 days & returning by overnight train - a perfect weekend trip, if added with one more day, nothing like it!

title: The hotspot of NAINITAL
review: Cleanliness has definitely improved from last visit 6 years back and water level in high. Maintenance has improved the beauty of Nainital.

title: Nani Lake
review: It really wonderful place ..i really enjoy the place lovely weather during Dec.i stayed in the Evelyn Hotel which is located opposite to nani lake with lovely view .cleanand Good service .

title: Breath-taking
review: Very clean, beautiful and peaceful. You can walk around the lake. We specially enjoyed our walk on kacchi sadak.

title: Big & Beautiful Lake
review: Superb lake for boating and spending a pleasant time with your partner. I had been at this place in June 2013. Good market place adjacent to lake, food stall is good enough with variety of snacks and fast foods. I was more beautiful to visit the lake and naini devi temple (adjacent to lake) at night during Aarti time.

title: The best lakeside after Kodaikanal
review: Very well maintained, clean and lots of activities. Naini lake is always buzzing with activity. I can go back any no. of times to spend some time and unwind by Naini lakeside.

title: Great place to enjoy
review: Nainital's central attraction is this lake. Most of the restaurants and hotels are around this lake.

title: serene beauty of naini lake
review: We were 6 friends ,took 2 boats.It was a ride of 45 min. something.enjoyed a lot.Basically,we made 2 groups,were competing with eachother in a chance to acclaim the first spot.Really,the trip was unforgettable.It was bit of raining with a fog so view of that lake was at it's height.Do go there,but remember alone one will be gone,go in groups.I am nature loving person so it was a heaven for me,I so much liked the lake that we all visited it again on next day.So,go and live it.

title: Nice lake but polluted
review: It is a huge lake with a very nice view but the sad part is the pollution Boating is available in the lake though we did not take it up because of the rain

title: Naini Jheel
review: Jheel is natural but the dirtiness around the Jheel is man made / created... water is clear in the mid of the Jheel, we should protect it by keep it clean and pure...

title: Very pretty lake, nice place to visit
review: I would definitely recommend the boat ride across the lake. There is also a path all the way around the lake, so if you are looking for a break from the chaos of the mall road shopping side - try the other side of the lake. It has a very peaceful quiet path with twinkle lights that is very relaxing and has some great views.

title: lake surrounded by beautiful mountains
review: It is Impossible not to like this lake.This lake is surrounded by the beautiful landscape. Here are cafés,hotels, shops at the square, walking paths and people from all over the world.

title: Boating amidst the clouds ....
review: The lake is the lifeline of the city " Nainital". When we reached it was raining , we waited a while and when we finally took the boat it was just awesome .. the weather was helping our cause of enjoyment

title: A main attraction of Nainital
review: The boating that to in slow drizzling rains, I love the most. But the time given for the rowing boat is only half an hour which seems to be very less.

title: A Mango lake
review: A Mango Shaped lake which looks beautiful when you view it from Top of nainital,It was a amazing vie lake which looks small but very fascinating the lake in day have color Bluish green then towards evening the reflection comes and lake changes it colour.water is clear in the mid of the Jheel

title: Nice place
review: The lake is Surrounded by all greens. There is  Row boating. Places to shop and kids enjoyed fish watiching at lake side.

title: Magically Magnificient
review: I was lucky enough to visit this natural wonder during the onset of monsoons, amidst gorgeous clouds and sun-soaked mountains that surround this calm lake with pristine waters. The time of my trip couldn't have been better with the rains just starting mid-july as the crowds had lessened compared to the peat tourist season. Boating (paid, for a nominal fee) on this late is like sitting in the lap of natures best surroundings & soaking in the fact that the lake is situated almost 2000+ meters above sea level. Surrounded by handful of amazing religious spots, roadside eateries & fancy restaurants with a view alike, with the mall road running the length of the river from 'Tallital to mallital', this spot is a must visit & boating is a must (even twice a day would not tire you from gazing the the beauty of this beautiful creation of Nature).

title: Amazing Place!!!
review: Amazing place to visit mall road, lake and tibetan market, Lovers point, Himalayan darshan. Overall its a beautiful place to visit 2 or 3 days and visit offseason where you will not get too much crowd otherwise you will not enjoy

title: Peaceful Lake
review: Must be on the cards when visiting Nainital as this is the only most importatnt attractions this hill stations has. Take a full round of the lake, charges are not high, but one enjoy the beauty of nature while on the boat.

title: Boat ride
review: Don't miss the boat ride, thats the main activity to go for, you get the beautiful view of the town and surrounding.

title: beautiful place
review: would love to go every year n would either stay in alka hotel or KMVN hotel for good view..loved row boats and yacht from boat house club..

title: Best lake ever seen.
review: This is the most beautiful lake i have ever seen. You can do boating in different kind of boats. Ducks all over lake make you feel like in heaven. I went in july, so lake was cover with clouds. Clouds and fog touches the lake and make it looks more beautiful. At night also reflection of lights makes it look more beautiful.

title: b'ful lake
review: Naini lake  is the essence of  queen of hill stn Nainital.It offers fantastic view of hills all around.Boating is great pleasure.The pity is that there was not much water and filth was present  on the shores.One also sees Lord Hanuman's temple by the side  of lake.If cleanliness improves it can anyday compare with lakes of european countries.

title: Naini lake
review: Boats men were amazing, ride was awesome at Rs. 210 for a round it was a good deal. Since the Lake is being aerated via ADS tubing

title: Beautiful
review: Though this is the only USP of Nanital which attracts lacks of visitors every year, government authorities has not shown any consideration to maintain and develop this place. Though the lake has some water filters and recyclers but the boundaries (Ghats) are not maintained. Broken stairs and really rough patches you need to cross to reach the boat. But never the less,  once you take your boat its fun. Would suggest to take a peddle boat instead and just enjoy the peace.

title: Pretty Lake
review: A peaceful and a calm environment for a boat ride wth your loved ones. It’s a beautiful lake in the middle of the locality with boating facility and has a walking path around the lake for morning and evening walkers. Close to nature right in the city.

title: Such a great place to do boating and relaxing
review: Such a great place to do boating and relaxing. Its pretty clean and has a good 360 degrees view. During my 2D stay, I did boating twice. Once on a clear eve, and once one a Foggy morning. It was such a great experience

title: Beautiful
review: Gr8 place to relax. The boating is good & the view is nice. USP of nainital.The stairs need repair. Market & eating joints are there around.

title: Serene
review: It is calm and peaceful. And not commercialized yet. We had good time boating and sitting around this lake.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: Its a beautiful lake surrounded by Nainitaal town. Unspoilt and colourful is how I would describe it !

title: one of the cleanest lakes
review: simply looking at the lake at all times of the day and the cool breeze flowing over it soothes deep down to the soul. even in the midst of the city, populated with tourists, just sitting beside the lake, watching the fish in the lake, boating on the lake is good enough to relax tired city dwellers. its not for nothing that this is one of the most popular hill stations.

title: Superb Lake of Nainital.
review: Dear Friends,

title: Boating and enjoy green beauty around you
review: Enjoy boating! a trip to Nainital is not complete without a boat trip in the lake and without a sip of tea or coffee along the lake side.

title: Over crowded....
review: Likes????? It would have been better if we would have been to some water park... in delhi only.

title: Awesome as long as you dont go in May & June
review: I absolutely love water bodies and lakes especially so for me it is one of the best hill stations in India as long as you dont go in May or June because of the crazy crowds.

title: Looking for peace ! Go  for it
review: We went in December & It was quite chilly but very nice.  The boat ride is a must  but mae sure you do the boat ride during afternoon as after that its starts getting chilly and you can not enjoy the same. Its  is crowded on weekends specially. Do not forget to buy  candles.they are amazing.

title: Beautiful Nature
review: Great experience, journey to Nainital in early morning was awesome. The Naini lake is astonishing. Full too nature time.

title: Beautiful place for a short vacation
review: It is a wonderful place for a short vacation. It was very crowded during the time we visited as it was summer and vacation time for most families.The lake is not very well maintained, but kids do enjoy the boating experience.

title: Awesome place with beautiful weather...
review: Awesome place with beautiful weather...Doing self boting is a good experience play to sit in the evening..

title: lovely trip to Nainital
review: we enjoyed boating at the lake, weather was awesome, had great time in company of friends & the family. lot of people were there this time. the lake is quite clean

title: Awsome
review: well if u want to be at natures best then u have to go there when u will be in the middle of the lake surrounding by water and hills awesome scene whenever I get chance I will go there

title: Beautiful and Mesmerising
review: Well this is the key place in Nainital.

title: The mist and the lake
review: The naini lake boating is the best attraction of this place the moment you start climbing from kaladungi the changing weather enthralls you and the boating is awesome and for full ride its not costly 210 only plus enough eating option around make sure you don't miss ropeway it has heavy booking so I suggest the moment you arrive

title: Lovely !!
review: How can one visit Nainital and not do boating. Well i too visited this fabulous place in June and enjoyed boating in this lake. It was a fascinating experience. Hired boat no 36. The boat keeper was a gentle person,told us abt the city n clicked sme memorable photographs. We took a full round f the lake. It was a beautiful experience. There was a lot f rush in June but still we had grt fun.

title: fabulous
review: the heart of naintal. anyone can enjoy it many times. we found this lake very serene. we enjoyed a boat ride in the lake and my children took many snaps of the site.

title: Get pedal boat
review: if you will rent boat with driver he will irritate you.. also liker and fod not allowed so you will get bored

title: Good for children to enjoy boat rides.
review: As far as lakes go this one was very commercialised and there was nothing out of the ordinary about it. Plenty of opportunity for boat rides and local shopping to be had.

title: Grand and beautiful
review: At the heart of Nainital. Beautiful lake. Try enjoying it in the early mornings. Otherwise the area gets pretty crowded. If you are a shooper , there are plenty of shops around . Enjoy boating in the lake, or browsing through the innumerable little shops, or just sit beside the lake enjoying the views. Nice one

title: geeeee
review: nainital is like my second hometown n i luv going there. n of course nainilake is one of the best attractions over there. apart from doing only boating u guys shud try yatching n i assure u ur gonna enjoy it

title: panormic view in nainital
review: Awesome feeling in nainital during the winter season , their many restaurant available near the lake where you can eat your choice food

title: best boating place in hills
review: naini lake is the main attraction of the hill station we enjoyed boating it was a amazing experience, we enjoyed the street market located just next to the lake eating food and doing shopping

title: Only the beauty of Lake is nainital
review: Roads were ok. There should be separate walk in street for visitors. there is no traffic rule. Bikers were driving rashly on the mall road, thieves were roaming like anything. Ruining the beauty of this hill station seriously.

title: Scenic beauty
review: beautiful lake beautiful weather, amazing everything around the lake. thandi sadak is awesome. the view is breath taking

title: An out of the world experience
review: The sheer size as well as the experience of boating in it. Its once in a lifetime kind of a thing - to be surrounded by hills with sweet sunshine and lots of cold,clear water around.

title: Wonderfull Time
review: I booked hotel anamika it was very gud and budget to my pocket. I had boating in naini lake with my family. that time was very gud in my life.

title: very good whether
review: good whether, nice location, very impressed, go for relax and feel the whether and nature. boating. at night very good

title: Good option for evening enjoyment...
review: It was cold once you enter inner area of the lake, view from center of naini lake is a different experience...

title: Beautiful
review: Its a beautiful n magnigicent lake. Once u startin boatin u jst frgt everythin else..the views n peace.

title: Fabulous
review: It is serene and beautiful. While boating in mid of the lake you feel heavenly calmness.rest of nainital is quite overcrowded but when you are in midst of the lake it shuts you of from the daily humdrum

title: Naini Lake
review: The Naini lake is calm and serene. I did not enjoy the yacht experience but I would recommend it. Best time to go boating is early morning or evening.

title: Natural Beauty
review: A visit and boat ride to Naini Lake is must do activity in Nanital. Not costly - value for money rates for boat ride. Helpful boat owners with no false promise, they will explain each and every route for boat ride to avoid any misunderstanding later.

title: Awesome
review: It was at one time so dirty that one felt sad...lovely to see a clean lake. Awesome weather and an amazing boat ride

title: Queen of lakes.........naini
review: The main attraction of nainital is Naini Lake, surrounded by beautiful mountains.

title: Serene and calm
review: loved the lake, beautiful. Went for a boat ride and it was cool with the surrounding hills.the best part of nainital.

title: Good Place to relax with Family.
review: A Visit & do a Boat Ride at naini Lake is a Must if you're at Nainital. There are two type of boats are there, Padal Boat & Sikara Type Boat. The Rates are Fixed By Association. so no chance of Cheating. I Feel Padal Boats are Safe compared to Mount Abu's Lake. Enjoy th eRiding at Early Morning(after 7/8am-10am) or at Evening. The water is Clean.

title: Boating
review: enjoy a good view of lake from Naini temple, snow point and boating is good option to pass 3-4 hours at Lake

title: boating experience superb
review: boating was very nice experience. Take row boat as it is safe. View is amazing. Better go in the afternoon around 12 noon when it is empty in tourist season May to July

title: Best place in Nainital
review: It is arguably the best place to spend time in Nainital..... you could take a stroll on the lake side in the evening.. or do boating.... you'd simply enjoy the view of the lake amidst the hills.

title: In the Lap of Nature
review: All likes  for Naini Lake. Relaxed and amazing ! best part is cellphone signals are very low so we can enjoy our relax holiday and nautre. Short break from running city

title: good location-boating is nice experience
review: Naini lake is a main lake of nainital.A lake with surrounding hill.In here enjoyable boating. Also famous mall road side by lake for good setting,shopping and food. just be crowded here.

title: Heart of Nainital
review: Central attraction of Nainital. Must do boat riding - try with paddle boat for awesome time. Surrounded by mall road and local shopping hub which is nice.

title: Boat ride
review: boat riding is a must especially if you going in winters.Also the stalls around the lake are nice and appealing

title: The only unique thing in Nainital town
review: Except for boat shores, the lake is generally clean.

title: boating in this lake is an everlasting memorable experience
review: very beautiful lake,well maintained by nainital administration having boating facilities also, boating in this lake is a memorable one, you have to experience it by yourself going there,it cannot be explained in words,its truly magical and divine

title: Excellent
review: Excellent Lake. the lake is in the shape of a mango. The boat ride was awesome. It looks very beautiful when you take the rope way.

title: This is the crown of Nainital
review: Boating in the lake flanked by tall mountain on one side and the mall on the other. The number of boats is increasing by the year....introduction of life jackets is a welcome change. evening is the best time to enjoy the serenity of the scene. I love it to th point of atleast 2 trips a day !

title: Heaven on Earth
review: Naini Lake is one of the main attractions of Nainital. Its having super natural beauty surrounded by hills on one sire , Mall road on another side and Naini Temple at one end ! Worth visiting the place !

title: wonderful place
review: awesome!!! this place is just different from rest of india this city is clean, wonderful scenic beauty,,,, the amazing ride up to the mountains is just the best part of the journey.....!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Lovely lake
