review: Just loved boating & eating the local berries.. Better to take a local guide from there as he can take you to beautiful sightseeing locations and they are quite cheap around Rs. 250 - 300

title: Good Boating experience
review: Take the boat that you can paddle and then enjoy the view the the boating!! Or else if you are feeling lazy, you can sit and relax, but personally paddle it all the way!!

title: Great setting; beautiful
review: Cant miss it if you are in Naini Tal

title: Great Lake and Boating experience
review: I suggest not t waste your time to Bhimtal, Naukuchiataal and Sattal lake and enjoy the beauty and Boating at Naini Lake itself. For a true and spectacular view of the lake go to Snow view point via ropeway or move to the road leading to Raj Bhawan or Governor House.

title: a good lake ,
review: clean  lake , the boat ride was cool and exciting , also the lake water was  free of garbage and small plants .

title: Best spot
review: Paddle boating was great which takes about an hour. We did this twice during our stay. You can the boat around the lake, there are about 4 entry points

title: Nature’s beautiful Creation
review: The main attraction and the city revolves around the lake.There are 8 sides of the Lake from where one can avail boating facilities.Even when you are roving on the mall road the boat men are frequently asking for a ride. There are options of taking a long boat costing Rs.200/- with a boatman for ½ hr or you can take paddle boat.Even you can book a boat from one side and drop at another side.Don’t take any food material or plastic item when you are in the lake otherwise fine may be imposed on you.

title: Wonderful Experience
review: Nainital is an excellent holiday option during summer.  Naini lake is a good place to relax and the view is awesome when you are in the lake and when you see the lake from different points.  The boatman gives you a good story telling during the rowing boat ride and its real and worth it. Last day we took a paddle boat and lazed around which is also good

title: Para..Para..Paradise
review: Nice views of Nainital...from the water..front..that you wont get from anywhere...and you would be doing your bit..for the local economy in terms of keeping it clean..

title: boating great
review: hi, last week i was there. Boating in naini is awesome. Go for it at around sunset, for pleasant weather. Sometimes they offer you to row the boat, which was a great experience.

title: Best place to walk around
review: Its best place to visit to enjoy shopping, boating, zoo, ropeway, nainidevi temple, bada bazar, tibetian market, not forget Sonam's Momos.

title: Beautiful Lake !
review: We visited Nainital in the first week of May, and this mango shaped lake is the first attraction to visit.  The lake is big and relatively clean, water cold as expected and surroundings picturesque.  We took the row boat.  The person who rowed us was very kind, and even allowed our son to row with the extra oars for sometime.  In all it was a wonderful 45 minutes and the beauty of the city surrounding the lake made the experience unforgettable.  The nainital mall road runs along the lake, with many hotels and paid public restroom facility nearby.

title: Beautiful & boat ride is a must
review: Naini lake is the heart of Nainitaal. The lake is really beautiful & needless to say that you must try boating in it. There are small kiosks / ticket counters from where you can go for boating at Govt rates. It will be an amazing feeling. You can explore the mall road which is around Naini lake. If you want a non-crowded walk then "Thandi Sadak" is the place to be. Bhutia market is also near it. Lots of shopping & eating options there. In short, everything is around Naini Lake only. So book your hotel near the lake. You will have a great time then - even if you dont have your own vehicle :)

title: beautiful
review: serene calm and the best beauty in nainital still has the old world charm the boats etc etc the lake is the heart of the hill station

title: sooo coooool
review: very relaxing lake in nainital . we had lunch at the boat house club . very nice view of lake from the boat house club . around the lake tibetian market is there  very nice goods like footwear ,kids dresses . in mall road perfumed candles  varitie of fruits on sale .we had lunch in chandini chowk on the next day . from the rope car the nainital lake magnificient .in the boat ride very comfortable and safe with life jacket.lake is clean

title: Best Experiance
review: nani lake is very good place.best due to self boating.we have seen all good place like zoo,himalaya point,mall road,lover's point,bhimtal,naukuchiatal.i like horse ridingetc.

title: Excellent place..
review: Boating in naini lake is always good experience.. For full ride (in 210 Rs.), travellers to check if they are getting complete round, some of them take U turn from half of the lake...

title: Serenity at its best. .
review: Beautiful lake.. lovely breeze.. clean surroundings .. Its an awesome place to relax !

title: Huge and clean Lake
review: Very huge, net and clean place with crystal clear water. Surprised to see oxygen plant installed in the lake to keep the marine life safe. Taken a boat ride for 45 min and it was an amazing expereince

title: Serene!!
review: Beautiful lake!! The cool breeze refreshes your senses.The views of the temples and the mountains is beautiful.

title: Beautiful lake... the main reason behind the awesome views of Nainital
review: Beautiful lake... the main reason behind the awesome views of Nainital. Boating experience was also quite good

title: awesome view
review: Nice area , stroll around the lake in evening enjoy the the gentle breeze as during noon it might be hot depending upon the season u planning to visit . Lots of restaurants are nearby, you ll get plenty of variety food from chineese to south indian.

title: Best of nainital.
review: Boating was the best part of my trip. Weather was pleasant and we enjoyed it the most because of that.

title: Nature Beautiful
review: You will really love the beautiful ride ...we hired a row boat and were taken around the lake with nice vistas and could spend a good 1 hour in the evening  5.30pm onwards for one of the most peaceful and scenic tours...

title: refreshing
review: since my last visit , a lot of improvement. the lake looked cleaner and boat rides were better managed.

title: Heart & Soul of Nainital
review: Surprisingly, the lake is kept very clean and maintained very well and has got a very good marine life.

title: Wonderful Experience
review: This is not the first time i have visited Nainital and did the boating but every next time i go, my social status is changed. First time i visited with my friends, then with my wife and this time with my daughty who enjoyed the place and boating very much. It is a natural lake which apart from inviting tourists from all around also provide water to Nainital. Locals and tourists respects its santity and help administration to keep it clean

title: A refreshing and enlightening  panorama
review: A walk from Tali Tal to Mali Tal on the Mall Road window-shopping and admiring the variety of products, particularly the abundance and assortments of candles, carved wooden boxes, trays and walking sticks. We always visit Ramlal and Sons at Malital and admire the admire very well designed woollen garments. We end our evening with refreshments at Sakley's.

title: touristy
review: The lake is a typical tourist spot . Nothing spectacular about it . But the berries that are sold around the lake by street vendors are to die for

title: Great Boating Experience
review: Kids loved boating at Naini Lake. We did 2 extra rounds. They have very good facilities at the lake. All the Boat guys and service providers were very courteous and honest.

title: Beautiful! but be watchful!
review: Clean, green and beautiful lake. Boating experience is so serene!

title: Do not miss Boating!
review: There is nothing to dislike about the lake. It is clean, nice and peaceful.

title: an amazing view
review: This is one lakes that speaks......it changes color every 30 seconds...we went in early April, tourist season had not yet started,  experience was no less than the visit to lake district in UK

title: Beautiful
review: The lake is the star attaraction. Nice boating and shopping options around the lake. the temple borders the lake on 1 end.

title: Beautiful Lake..
review: This is really a good place in Nainital. It has got boating facility avaliable. generally 200- 250 INR  sufficient for 4 people.

title: Serene Place
review: Visited with friends. 10 adult expats + 3 Kids on a long week-end.

title: Best lake of India
review: It is main attraction of Nainital and central part. Very beautiful and large enough lake surrounded by hills. Great pleasure of evening walk on Mall Road along with the lake view. Boating should be on must-to-do list of one visiting there. There are different types of boats available. Best part of my trip was early morning jogging for one complete round of Naini lake which comes around 5KM. This lake is the main reason traveler prefer to stay on Mall road. It just complements the beauty of Mall Road.

title: beautiful lake
review: The lake is the star attaraction. Nice boating and shopping options around the lake.Good and chilled feel have boat riding.

title: Good ride. Thats it.
review: Probably now we have voting facilities everywhere. This is not much different. Could be tried if you have spare time.

title: Worth a ride, but only once
review: One of the foremost star attraction of Nainital, Naini Lake lives upto its name. We hired the boat from upper end of the lake, which seemed better choice to us. There are boatsmen standing on the street offering boat ride, but the ticketing system is quite straight forward and hassle free.

title: Life of Nainital ...
review: This is best of nainital. Lake surrounded by high mountains from all sides with colorful buildings all around. Boating in the lake is a great experience. two type of boats available there- four seated boat driven by boatman and paddle boat for 2 person which you have to drive by yourself. Naina devi temple is situated at corner of lake. if you are going as couple i suggest you to take a walk on thandi sadak(road parallel to lake) , but only in daytime. there are various food and handicraft stall all around the lake which give various items at a very reasonable price. I personally suggest to have a famous Lakeside Maggie.

title: Simply Amazing
review: The Naina lake is the Heart of Nainital. It is just amazing. Just a view of the lake from hotel balcony gives you immense please. Boating in the lake or just walking besides it on the Mall Road or the Thandi Sadak is a heart soothing experience.We were lucky to see the lake coverd with fog and also some snowfall over it.

title: Great
review: Views Views, and Views....go for views, cold breeze and relaxation.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: This lake is the heart of Nainital. Located right in the centre, it captures your attention from all vantage points, be in the Nainital Zoo, the Snow View Centre or the top of the hill where your hotel may be situated.  It is quite clean and is fun to go boating on the lake. If not, one can always go for a leisurely stroll on the Mall road which overlooks the lake. What we really enjoyed was sitting on the balcony of our hotel and looking at the lovely vista of Nainital lake.

title: Enjoy Boating
review: You can enjoy boating in Naini lake, main attraction is boats are not motor driven, it is floated by man. No need to bargain, rate are fix for boating.

title: Cleaner when not crowded
review: In March, when schools are still open, this the place you must visit. The lake was clean and the footpath along it has been repaired. The boat ride is worth it. However, constant traffic along the lake road is a big joy killer. It is worthwhile to ask some one for a good restaurant, before you select one on your own.

title: boating at naini lake
review: its always fun to go for boating with my family. my children enjoy there like anything, lake is good and in evening with surrounding with lot of other people you find more attractive. best place for honeymoon couple to enjoy their time.

title: lake and mountain
review: a natural lake surrounded by mountains, with clear sky blue sky above and ropeway along with a huge shopping bonanza and strolling by the lake and enjoynig the boat ride...are the main attractions of Nainital

title: Excellent boat ride
review: Excellent boat ride with breathtaking views in the calm waters. We did not try the self paddling one due to the lack of time.

title: chill
review: good and chilled feel have boat riding and take a round to mango shaped lake......and visit naina devi temple and market

title: Boating...
review: Nainital Lake- Also known as Naini Lake, it is situated in the heart of the city and it is owing to this lake that Nainital earned its name. The eye-shaped lake is a tourist hotspot and acts as a magnet for all those visiting the hill resort. Here, a person can either take a leisurely stroll or indulge in boating and enjoy the surrounding beauty. The northern end of the lake is called Mallital, while the southern one is called Tallital. The Lake Bridge that connects the two banks has quite a few shops as well as a post office, the only one in the world to be located on a bridge.

title: awesome lake i have ever seen
review: we boated about an hour here ...every body must obey the rules for riding on boat and the rules of Nainital

title: The best lake!!!!
review: Beautifully maintained lake. The whole city is around this lake and the name of the city came from this lake only. The boating is must to do here. Just take two seater boat(150 per hr) and enjoy if you there for honey moon. The People of Nainital is really really awesome and down to earth. Not single person we interacted was rude or annoying. Everyone is helpful and caring in nature. Also when you visit Bhutia market dont forget to get Bhel from Bombay Zelpuriwala. Amazing guy!!!!

title: Soothing
review: A boat trip in this lake is a must when someone is in Nainital. Beautifully colored boats sailing across the lake is a breathtaking experience. All boats come with people who will row the boat for you.

title: Serene lake between the hills
review: Naini lake is of course the central and main attraction in Nainital.  Its pretty large and going from one edge to the other in a foot paddle boat is very difficult. My advice is get a normal boat with a rower who will also tell you some interesting stories. This will save you a lot of energy too. The rates are reasonable for an hour. Go on a sunny day ti enjoy most.

title: Boating in Naini Lake
review: Good lake. Friendly boatman. He clicked a lot of picture. The rates of boating is fixed by tourism dept. so no bargaining or hassle on that front. Though we went in evening and it became cold.

title: Lovely Lake , however cleanliness needs to be maintained
review: The lake is the focal point of Nainital , visit the boat house club and take walks along the Mall Road , and ofcourse the boating is fun

title: Scenic place
review: The lake is extremely scenic located at the heart of the city and extremely clean...u can opt for a row boat or a paddle boat, rates of which are quite reasonable

title: Beautiful lake
review: It was very good to be in nani lake. The quality time and peaceful place. Everyone must visit to nani lake for voting

title: Naini Lake- The soul of Nainital
review: Naini Lake is the essence of all there is to Nainital. It is a beautiful, kidney-shaped lake. The track round the lake, by the Mall road is very nice. The walk, especially in the evening when the lights are on, is soothing. The city authorities should focus on putting up more street lights and keeping the area clean. The lake is a nice spot to have a boat ride, which is a fun experience.

title: Nice pleasant lake
review: Lake is a very pleasant lake. The mall road over looks this lake and entire town of Nainital revolves around this. There is nothing apart from boating as part of activity.

title: Great!
review: Boating (worth your time and money) + THE view and beauty of the lake integrated with the weather is just awesome.

title: Boating in the clear waters
review: Nice and cheerful lake on a bright and sunny December morning. The waters looked green in the sun and blue in the shade. Spotted a bird on the drums floating around and took some pics. Surprisingly, though the wind was chilly, the water was calm and though I am afraid of the water, this boat ride was very comfortable. It is reasonably priced too.

title: Beautiful and lovely experience
review: This is the best place where I enjoyed completely,first thing travelling time is lesser when we travel from delhi and other thing the route through road is really good.I went in the month of july,rainy season when i reached nainital,the fog covered the whole place.when we entered the place,the fog slowlyremoves so we can see the whole lake,the climate,lake surrounded by the mountains all looks lovely.Dont miss the boating,where you can feel the peace.get the accomadation in the mall road itself,so you can enjoy completely.

title: Awesome experience
review: The boating experience was awesome. We paid 210 bucks for around 30-40 min of a boat ride. The blend of cold and sharp sunshine made the experience and our photography experience superb.

title: Excellent
review: Just sit beside the lake and can easily spend the whole day relaxing. Walk on the road beside the lake which is a memorable experience

title: Perfect
review: Very calm atmosphere, My stay at channi raja Hotel which location was right front of the Lake so i dont need to go far for the boating.I enjoyed the boating very much,

title: Ultimate attraction
review: I am a die hard fan of Naini lake. that's why i chose hotels on the mall road with rooms facing naini lake. i make it a point to daily have a boat ride during my stay at nainital.

title: mango lake
review: the shape of the lake is very unique as it has a mango shape and you get the best view on the way to tiffin top and through the trolleys

title: One of the best Hill station in North India
review: Very well maintained lake and surroundings with beautiful views. It has something to offer to all age groups from boating, horse riding, picnic spots, etc.

title: Nice lake
review: Very neat and clean and disciplined tourists. I have been to lot of hill stations but so far Nainital beings the cleanest and neat hill station. specially lake are so clean. Boat ride is affordable and one really enjoys the entire ride

title: Pristine
review: Lake is enormous and is very nicely maintained. The size just amazes you when you first lay your eyes on it. Its green with all the algae inside. Boating on it is so much and you get spectacular views of the surrounding hills and Mallital & Tallital, the two main banks, while on the boat. Oarsman was friendly and he let my 5yr old hold the oars and row. The floating ducks and their quacking make it so pristine. The rising mist and the surrounding hills make it all the more surreal.

title: Perhaps the best in India
review: Have to say its the most serene and beautiful lake I've visited. Its got that calmness about it that you feel like boating on it for whole day. Also, the hustle and bustle of the road is not too far away and somehow you also seem to love that while in the lake for boating. The boats are oar driven by boatsmen and they charge around 220 bucks for a good 50-60 min ride.

title: Beautiful!!!!
review: Naini Lake is heart of Nainital , Whole hill city is located surrounding Naini Lake, The nucleus of Nainital’s exquisite beauty is beautiful lake .In the day ,mirrored in its waters stand seven proud hills,dotted with pretty cottages and villas . This reflection alone holds one spell bound. More beautiful than this however is the lake at night when the myriads of bulbs from the hill sides and quite a large number hanging near the lake’s edge stab their magic light into its waters.

title: Good and Calm Place
review: Naini Lake is beautiful.Horse Riding was fun with a enthuiastic guide showing various points and clicking pictures., Boating in Naini Lake was serene and beautiful.

title: Refreshing
review: We were at nainital in November last week just after my younger brother marriage.  The experience was very refreshing. I like the cleanness environment and local administration.  you can enjoy this place with your family

title: Good place to start
review: Its infront of where you get off the bus generally.A good lake to enjoy boating in.I loved the strawberries and "shehtoot" being sold near the lake by street vendors.The place is calm and joyable.

title: Worth 2 days (at max) visit :)
review: The naini lake provides a great view, go for boating (its really worth your time and money)

title: Boating in Naini Lake!!
review: Nainital Lake is situated amidst the township of Nainital. The town has subparts: Tallitaal and Mallital, so is with the lake. Go for a boat ride in Nainital lake from either side and you will feel delighted. Its quite well- maintained by the authorities. You can click amazing pictures as you have mountains and beautiful sky in the backdrop. Must say that its the most beautiful and serene place I've ever been. The oarsman are quite friendly and you can ask them also to click pictures for you. On one side of the lake you have little ducklings (I think it's Mallitaal); who look so pure and pristine. Its a must to go for a boat ride there. :)

title: Beautiful!
review: The lake used to be dirty and stinking but its been cleaned up and looks fresh and clean with lots of fish in it. One can walk along it and there is no stink now.

title: Serene!
review: Beautiful lake nestled in the lap of mountains, weather is fantastic. The lazy walks,the boat ride, the cutting chai and the restaurant facing the lake at night makes for a wonderful holiday destination. Recommended for a weekend getaway.

title: Romantic
review: Excellent feel. My wife and myself had a boat ride and we went back a decade at heart to our pre-marriage days.

title: Walk on the Thandi Road
review: Very quite. No crowd. Same views as from Mall road. However avoid this road if you are there in cold weather. As the name suggests, it is much colder area than other side.

title: You will feel as if you are out of India
review: The Lake is one of the Best maintained areas of this Country. The Roads are small but pretty clean and well maintained. The roads are systematically divided into two parts due to which the traffic is organised well. The road besides the Lake is one of the most beautiful roads of our country. The landscape, the view, the boats, ducks, the Naina Devi Temple, the Gurudwara, Mosque and Garden besides it are added advantages. The place is worth visiting once.

title: Beautiful and divine lake
review: The place has a charm of its own, no matter how many times you visit..its mesmerizing! Check out the cable car, boating and the gravity fall ride(must do). You get the beautiful view of the Nandadevi snow capped peaks..

title: heart of nainital
review: I drove down from delhi to nainital in sep. The very sight of the lake surrounded by hills took all the fatigue away. All the buzz of nainital is around the lake. Its surrounded by hotels, mall road and temples. Boating in the lake is a must. I took a paddle boat without a conductor and we enjoyed the ride around the whole lake. The boat ride gave us a good idea of the activities and places around and we could decide which place to hit next. We could also get some very good views of the hills around. Boating in Nain lake is a must and is strongly recommended.

title: Beautiful Lake, Clean Lake !!
review: Its a very huge lake at this altitude. Very clean water. Its about 150-180 ft deeep as mentioned by the local guides. Very nice boating experience.

title: Romance by the lake
review: I love to take the boat ride. The breeze is so pious and pure...it adds so much to the romance in the air.Temple next to the lake, a beautiful church or the magnificent Mosque. i love the market there, shop for some amazing candles, or the visit Sakley's bakery for a great coffee and cake.

title: Wonderfull boating experience in the Heart of the Hills
review: The Naini Lake is just beautiful. The best part about the lake is wherever you look you just see Hills, S0 it is more like Boating in the heart of the Hills.

title: Calm n mesmerizing...
review: Just sit down along side the lake and have a sip of coffee...It really soothes your soul. Just perfect location to have a relaxing evening. Though everyone feels boating is the best here..but Sattal is the place where you must do boating..

title: Excellent place to visit
review: Good place to visit when you are travelling to nainital. Do boating here. Nice place to go with your family and friends

title: Bean shaped lake
review: The town of nainital is built around this lake, it's the central attraction. Offers row boating, paddle boats and yachting (signature of naini lake).the beauty and calm of nainital comes because of this lake.

title: boat ride on nainital
review: Boat ride on the lake was most enjoyable. Colourful boats are decorated nicely. One can choose the size and shape he or she likes.

title: No Naintal without Naini Lake
review: A very deep lake with boating of Paddle & Row facility. Enjoy the ride in morning or evening before shopping. Can see a whole view of Mall road. Most enjoyed by couples or teens.

title: Lake Surrounded by Mountains...
review: Do visit for boating experience ... really grt place to be there. Lake which is surrounded by mountains is a fine experience, you will always wonder how a lake is in between mountains with an altitude of more than 4000 ft.

title: Beauty amidst hills
review: The lake is very beautiful and clean. A walk around it is refreshing particularly on the mall road side if you want to see crowds and on the opposite end if you wanna be with nature.

title: naini lake -heart throb of nainital
review: w/o nainilake there s no meaning of nainital city.Its the heart throb of nainital for the general tourists.Most of the hotels are based surrounding the lake.all common/good eating hotels are situated alongside the.Also,for marketing there are a no. of good as also low priced establishments are along the lake.Only due to space restrictions due to adjacent lake,the road cut thro a divider for one way traffic is always crowdy.

title: Unique experience
review: I have visited the Nainital several time but every time it looks me new because of beautiful Naini lake. Pedal boating is better than chappu boat.Everywhere rates are fixed and no bargaining at all.Very nice to stay here.

title: Mirror Like
review: The lake area is clean , in the morning as the sun rises it shines like a mirror, though people visiting the area next to throw lots of garbage which should be stopped

title: Mindblowing Momos at Tibetan Market, Nainital
review: I had been to Gangtok, Darjeeling, Delhi's Tibetan Market but I have never so delicious momos which I luckily got in Tibetan Market, Nainital. My friend told me about some SONAM momos in Tibetan Market, Nainital. Just go till the end of Tibetan Market. There on one side you will find famous Naina Devi Temple, on the other side you will see narrow streets surrounded by shops. Just keep walking till 1-2 minute and you are on right place. You will see their big cooking utensils of momos. There is steamed mutton momo & veg momos. Mutton is so tender and hot red chutney will give you unforgettable taste. It is a MUST Go PLACE in Nainital.

title: Beautiful Lake
review: The lake is the heart of Nainital. A very beautiful and clean lake. It gives a beautiful view of the town. There are shikaras and paddle boats for venturing into the lake. The Shikaras cost Rs. 160 for strictly for 4 persons. Paddle boats cost Rs 150 for 4 persons. We did boating on all days and on both type of boats. Shikaras really give you a royal feeling and all the rowers know how to click wonderful pictures.

title: Superb Beauty
review: endorse everyone should visit this lovely enchanting place set amidst glory of hills and species. Home to Superstar Amitabh Bachchan's school.

title: Enthralling Uttarakhand
review: started our trip from Tamluk, West Bengal to Lucknow for 2 days and then headed towards Nainital and rest of the surrounding places that covered the various Taals,Ranikhet, Binsar, Kausani, Patal Bhuvaneshwar and Jageshwar...............each of the places are extremely divine with great people all around

title: an experience which creates memory n force to visit again n again
review: serene n cool location of nainital attracts everyone around the world, experience of boating in naini lake and having hot chocolate around lake

title: As good as it gets
review: A must see if you travel to Nainital..."Queen of the hills"..the boat ride is beautiful.. YOU must take a long ride, do not fall in for short rides, tell the boatman to take you all along till the end.

title: Calm, Beautiful and Serene...
review: Took the boat ride around the lake. Temperture was ok. Took a 20 minute boat ride. When we returned back to ground the temperature dipped almost 5 degrees in 20 min. The lake was beautiful, calm. Swans and ducks swimming....An experience to remember.

title: Romanticism at its best when boating
review: The lake was so fantastic that i just cant explain but what i liked the most was the Romance in the air while boating, quality of boats, feeding the fishes, our rower Mr. Ajay Bisht who really clicked some good pics for us, feeding and playing with ducks, the peripheral view of nainital and its peak and the whole town, Naina devi temple. Whatever the lake has to offer we liked it all and would want to visit again. FANTASTIC

title: great experience on the boats.
review: We went in the boats and clouds covered the whole of the lake. We could not see much around the lake but the being in the clouds was wonderful. The boats are easy accessible and costs 160 for a full ride and 110 for something they call a half ride. Only 4 persons are max allowed in the boat. The boats have life jackets.

title: Smoothing.. Relaxing Location "Heart of Nainital <3  "
review: The lake was so fantastic,  Romantic at its best when boating” ,We went in the boats and clouds covered the whole of the lake. We could not see much around the lake but the being in the clouds was wonderful. The boats are easy accessible and costs 160 for a full ride and 110 with life jackets.The lake was beautiful, calm. Swans and ducks swimming....An experience to remember.Boating, walking in the hillside and around the lake, visiting the Tibetan market, visiting friends , Doing puja at all the temples, Naina Devi, Hanuman garhi.  We went for Two day trips.. to Sat tal, Bhimtal, Naukuchiata. I also watched a golf tournament at the Rajbhawan Golf course.l

title: Enjoyed boating.
review: enjoyed boating and walking though the lake side on the mall road.

title: Boating in Naini Lake
review: You get a boat....paddle it light....and enjoy the view.....and the only thing you can do is gasp in awe with the beauty of hills lining one side of the lake and the city line on the other.  The vast spread gives you ample time to row around and enjoy the beauty and the fresh air.  Cool water if you want to dip your fingers in and be in a playful mood sprinkling your loved ones with that cool water.  Boats are easily accessible with a nominal fee...also comes with life jackets if you like.  You can go for paddle, row, or sail as you like and are comfortable with.  Trying rowing from one end to other that will give the complete idea of the spread of this beautiful lake and again make you gasp in awe and also some for air.....it is not easy to row that much....enjoy your ride...

title: rowing experience is fantastic.
review: one must know the rowing, it becomes a great experience and will make your tour complete. the number of boats are too many and that adds to the charm, thrill and excitement to enjoy the boating.

title: Bravo!
review: A great example of what India CAN do to preserve its natural heritage. The lake is cleaner than it was last time I came and I'm dazzled by it. Congratulations to the whole community!

title: Majestic Experience..
review: No question of disliking.. Just Explore the Unexplored....A massive lake with boats and natural beauty will make you like in wonderland.

title: Relax with nature
review: I visited  Nainital most of time but every visit i feel more existed due to Naini Lake, enjoyed boating and walking though the lake side on the mall road. Lake views in the evening and night is awesome

title: Wonderfull moments with friends on lake riding
review: Visited nainital with friends and enjoyed boating all along the lake with jokes,stories,songs etc etc.It was very fun and enjoyable as winter was just started.took adventure in reaching remote places of the lake for thirll.Good place to visit and enjoy time for all.Availability of good boat taking time at the lake otherwise lake is maintained in good condition .

title: awesome mango shapes lake
review: I visited with 7 other friends, and I loved it. The first day was cold and cloudy, but the next 2 were sunnier and the lake was reall beautiful. We rented boat too, and it was a wonderful experience. I regret I didn't try the paddle boat :(

title: Its Chilli after 4PM to be near the lake.
review: Excellent experience, There is a lot to offer from Nainital. Roam around there are a lot of religious places around.

title: Very average experience
review: Very average experience......not much to do...Nainitaal is that overcrowded kinda hill station, which one should avaoid...its polluted, overcrowded....there are better places to explore in Uttara khant

title: Naini holiday
review: Boating, walking in the hillside and around the lake, visiting the Tibetan market, visiting friends , Doing puja at all the temples, Naina Devi, Hanuman garhi. I had meals at restaurants such as Sakley,s and Machan. I went for day trips.. to Sat tal, Bhimtal, Naukuchiata. I also watched a golf tournament at the Rajbhawan Golf course.l

title: Visit to Nainital with family
review: Beautiful lake, coo & clear water. Excellent Boat ride with all safety gear. Good place for taking a break with family

title: Another name of peace!!!
review: Simply it's just beautiful and so calm and peaceful that you are drowned into it for a period of time. It's awesome!!! Just don't expect the noisy people here...

title: Nice and quiet
review: Visited it this August, not much rush. The lake was clean, we were give life jackets to wear. The lake is too deep, 200 ft till a certain point but then the depth is not known after that point. Do visit Naina Devi Mandir after boating.

title: Good but Dirty
review: It's a must visit when in Nainital , boating is good but water has become very dirty.

title: Naini lae is magnificent
review: We also had the good fortune to see shifting nature , brilliant sun sign followed by swift movement of cloud over the lake and light rain

title: Highlight of the Trip
review: I think it's the one and only good thing in Nainital....we went there in January so it was pretty cold there.....we went for a boat ride which is not that costly.....the view is amazing from there, the lake is covered from mountains and on one side at some distance one can see the snowy mountain peak so it was really good.....

title: A nice tourist attraction - Naini lake
review: While on the visit to Nainital, one simply cannot ignore visiting the Naini lake. Touring the lake on the boat makes it a very attractive option. You are taking a round of the lake surrounded by mountains. One also gets a complete view of the mall road while in the naini lake.

title: Just enjoyed the water
review: A pretty nice place to visit. Enjoy the boat ride in the chilling water of Naini Lake.The boat ride cost is very minimal and generally it lasts around 40-45 minutes.. Have a view of the serene beauty.Make sure you have your cup of tea..its just awesome..definitely worth a visit

title: A serene lake
review: The best way to spent your evening. The boat ride is very good and it became excellent if you get rider who knows a lot about nainital :)

title: Do boating either in the early morning or evening
review: the mall road adjacent to the lake is one vibrant place. Boating is fun in the lake and safe too with life jackets for each passenger. Fixed rates for the boats. You can visit the naina devi mandir on the northern end of the lake.

title: v serene
review: brilliant and awe inspiring its like a jewel in nainital worthy place to go and v beautiful boating is rs 120 or 160 pretty reasonable its like meditation

title: Must see
review: It's the best attraction in Nainital.

title: Majestic Lake
review: The lake is majestic. I have been there multiple times as a child.

title: lovely lake
review: the breeze the feel makes u fell exhilarated , mall road stroll .......tibetian matket all are excelent  the fishes in the lake its simply awesome

title: Cleaner than before
review: The Lake is much cleaner than before. Boats are now regulated by the authorities. No cheating or haggling required. We enjoyed the boat ride. Take atleast half lake ride to enjoy.

title: centre of attraction
review: nainital is named after naini lake so its the heart of nainital,its of mango shape when seen from a ariel view

title: Lake that children love
review: During the summers, lake,s cool waters provide a great relief. Evening lights reflections in the waters are a treat to the eyes. There a number of restaurants along the lake to take care of every taste. However, the lake is not as clean as it used to be, The toilets in restaurant are generally not clean.

title: Decent place to get away from the stress of work.
review: Could not go boating, but seems people liked boating in there. Clean place. Avoid the brokers who ask you for boating. They overcharge.

title: Bhimtal & Nainital during Monsoons
review: Great Place with cool breeze and a great attraction. Nicely maintained, and liked it more because there were less tourists and hence less crowds.. but overall a great place to visit and enjoy for a few days..  Truly a great place created by god on earth

title: Naini Lake
review: Boating in the lake is best thing. U can also take boat with or without sailer. Also feeding fishes in the lake is also good time pass.

title: In the lap of mother natue
review: I would like the tourists to maintain the beauty of this place. The lake is quiet and with ducks swimming it is a lovely view. Don't forget to wear the life jacket even if ur boatwala does not asks u to. Take a lot of picture with various beautiful backgrounds.

title: Natural freshwater lake
review: The Naini lake is one of the main attractions @ Nainital. It is a treat to take a boat/ shikara ride on the lake and always advisable to have an experienced boat rower .... he can tell you some interesting facts/ stories about the lake & city. FYI the lake is very deep in the center. One can click some amazing pictures while on the boat & enjoy the natural beauty on Nainital ...

title: A realy superb place a to visit and chill
review: We recently visited in June 2013 the lake is divided into 2 parts they call it MAllital and Tallital now here is the catch that if you go for boating the rates are INR 200 for Pedal boats for 1 hour and for row boating you get a person rowing it up for you for INR 160 but this is limited on per round basis they have kept a metal diesel can on there allocated point and they just take a round to and fro from there over all there 2-5 points from where you can hire boats for a boat ride, they have also started Sail boats over here which are a property of Boat Club they charge around 200/250 per hour and if there is no wind then you are stuck, over all we enjoyed the views you can see that in the pictures.

title: Very pretty
review: The weather is going to be very important. There should be no harsh sun. So either go there when it is cloudy or do very early morning or late evening. The view around is nice, though not as breathtaking as the Dal lake in Srinagar.

title: Naintal lake
review: Great lake for boating and also for a walk around.Fantastic path.Dont miss the path on other side of the lake which has got a better view

title: nice lake
review: i enjoyed boating with my family.rope way is really at very high.dont have much time.weather was also good after rain

title: Enjoyed boat riding
review: Fix rate, nice view of Nainital (bottom to top), mandatory to wear safety jacket. On the way many ducks will come near to you. It is advisable not to feed them but still travelers used to do.

title: Nainital's Naini Taal
review: Nainital is known by naini lake.

title: Take a boat ride
review: The boat ride of around 40 minutes cost us only Rs.180. But the views and the experience was worth a lot more than that. Don't miss this.

title: Heighted Waters
review: Nainital lake is situated at the middle of Nainital and is very deep. The thandi sadak opposite to mall road is very cool and the lake offers good boating site. The lake has many large fishes which you can feed and have relax yourself.

title: Nainital
review: This is the best time to visit the place when you can enjoy little rain, roaming clouds along withthe mountain beauty. There was nothing to dislike. Take a guided tour and its done.

title: naini lake
review: its a very attractive place in the nainital , the name nainital comes from naini lake. This ia a main attraction of the nainital . Boating in the lake feels you very pleasant . Two type of boats available for boating . one with self paddle , other one with person come with us & sailing in the boat. Choice is yours. If you do not boat in naini lake then no meaning to visit nainital. Life guad provided by agency.

title: Lake city of India
review: I visited this wonderful city which is 300 kms from Delhi. The roads that lead to the city from Delhi was horrible (roads in UP - Uttar pradesh). What a beautiful place to visit in Summer! It was so very cold in the evening. Beware of all the guide who are touts. They will cheat with the rate for showing all sort of hill station points. Some points are walkable distance. Ideally you can pay 700/- for all the points which are 11 in total I guess. Food is decent (surprising that you get Dosas and idly's there).

title: Pedalo fun
review: The lake is at the centre of Nainital, and provided that it isn't raining it gives many options for entertainment. We paid 100 rupees for an hour in a swan pedalo, and bought a couple of photos from the photographer to remind us of the experience. At 50 rupees each this was expensive, but nowhere near as expensive as a similar service would be in the UK. An hour was more than enough time to explore the whole lake. There was also the option to be rowed around the lake by a boatman, but we decided against this.

title: BEST LAKE IN THE WORLD
review: best lake in the world, loved it, visit almost 5-10 times every year and i love naini lake and love to do boating on this lake , neat and clean and clear water loves it

title: Nanital - a crowded hill station
review: Visited Nanital in the month of June. The place is awfully crowded with never ending traffic jams. No peace or tranquality experience for which one visit a hill station. Not recommended for holiday

title: The lake is alive
review: The authorities making efforts to keep the lake alive through aeration. This is a good step. area aroung the lake was much cleaner this time around inspite of the tourist traffic

title: overcrowded lake
review: its a nice lake but nothing to die for!!! There are lots of paddle boats and rowing boats all ambling around - in the heat its hot, when it rains its wet.....a sport for kids maybe?

title: Ok Dokey
review: The lake is now clean, but nothing special. The Sattaal lake is better. The boating is a very transactional experience and its not worth visting nainaitaal if boating is the main objective

title: A great Lake
review: Naini lake makes nainital a special hill station. Paddle boats are available and you can make your own way in the lake.

title: Good, clean lake but very crowded place
review: Naini lake is a big, well maintained lake. However, the place including mall road is very crowded. But what I observed was that the people there are not very greedy for money like the rest of the tourist places. A nice place nearby delhi to visit.

title: nice but need cleanliness
review: The lake is at the centre of Nainital, and provided that it isn't raining it gives many options for entertainment. We paid 100 rupees for an hour in a swan pedalo, and bought a couple of photos from the photographer to remind us of the experience. At 50 rupees each this was expensive, but nowhere near as expensive as a similar service would be in the UK. An hour was more than enough time to explore the whole lake. There was also the option to be rowed around the lake by a boatman, but we decided against this.

title: Top Most attraction of Nainital :)
review: Boating in this lake during evening is best experience of life, you can see the wonderful lightening  of Nainital and keep on enjoying cold feel of lake water. If you are going  to Nanital , boating in this lake should be your first  choice.

title: Stunning
review: The lake - is indeed cleaner now and stunning , like always . The boat rides are good . Do ensure that the INR160 you pay is for a FULL LAKE ride not half .

title: mountains descend sharply as if in the Pacific or Alps
review: Seen photos of volcanic steep mountainsides descending almost vertically to a lake in the Alps or to the ocean in the Pacific?  This is like that.  And at night the lights twinkle magically all around the lake.  Delightful.

title: A nice languid boat ride !!
review: Nainital lake is beautiful and nature's real wonder. A huge water body at that elevation does give you a strange feeling. Actually Nainital is all about Naini lake. All other attractions are just additional.

title: Peaceful, bilssful, serene
review: Go there to enjoy an almost blissful, peaceful and serene boat ride in the crystal clean waters surrounded by the Kumaon hills and a leisurely long walk called the Thandi Sadak (or the Cool Road). Enjoy options to ride your own paddle-boats, small wind powered sail boats or be chaffeured in comfortable rowing boats. Mandatory life jackets ensure your safety.

title: as usual it gives a pleasant sensation
review: boating in the yacht was very pleasing. and it maddened us with joy when it started raining. the water is crystal clear, and the rates are fixed. so nothing to worry about price fixing and negotiations.

title: Pleasant & Peaceful
review: There is something in the Naini lake that makes you feel happy and peaceful. Boating on the lake with kids is a special experience; moreover when you see the hills that surround the lake from all sides it makes you feel that you are experiencing unbridled joy in the lap of Mother Nature.

title: Naini lake
review: Very clean, well maintained area. whole of Nainital is very well maintained unlike mussorie which is like a atrocity on the hills.

title: relax on the paddle
review: the naini lake is the main attraction of Nanital (apart from the weather).

title: Crowded but beautiful
review: Boating in Nanital is really amazing but in summers it's too crowded. Better we enjoyed at Sattal lake.

title: Too crowded
review: View is good. Rates are fixed but too crowded. Worth boating once. You can even take fixed price rikshaw ride around.

title: Cynosure of Kumaon
review: Naini Lake is the biggest lake of Kumaon and most visited place of kumaon. Lake is huge in size and surrounded by hills. Naina devi temple is situated on the bank of it and worshiped by all hindus. The very first visit of this lake will certainly attracts .

title: fun
review: it was fun and everything went on in an organised manner. life jackets were not clean so we had to wait for others to return and select best one among the one available.

title: Nice Lake
review: Its the main attraction of Nainital. Beatiful lake along side the Mall Road. One must do the boating here.

title: best view
review: enjoy the boatride.enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride. enjoy the boatride.

title: Amazing experience
review: Beautiful lake. Enough boats. Price is reasonable. Boatmen are plenty and reliable. Avoid going in monsoon

title: Neat
review: The Lake is very neat and clean as compared to the other lakes. Enjoy boating and even enjoy feeding the fishes inside.

title: lake nainital review
review: had a great time boating in the lake, Rs.100 only charges for one hour boating. me and my son, just 2 of us took a paddle boat for i hour and travelled the whole lake up and down.the water was super cool.

title: Beautiful lake
review: A very beautiful and calm lake surrounded by temples and mountain. It has mall road on one side and "thandi sadak" (cool road) on another side. A troll on thandi sadak is a must do activity with no one to disturb you and cool breeze touching you all the time. Nainital lake has got deep green colour from the surrounding forest. You can enjoy the boat ride in the lake even in the afternoon as the temperature is always low. Must carry an umbrella during Nainital visit as it can start raining anytime.

title: Lovely lake setting for boating
review: Naini Lake in Nainitaal is a Lovely lake setting for boating, walking along the promenade or for just soaking in the hill station experience. The underwater oxygen supply for the fishes adds a special charm to the same.

title: Beautiful lake
review: This lake is beautiful, surrounded by hills and temples. Flats market is full of stuff from Tank road delhi

title: Magnificient lake
review: Excellent place with clear blluish green water. Good place for boating. Nice shopping place just outside the lake.

title: Cool Lake
review: A cool wooden boat ride, which can accomodate a family of 2-adults and 2-small children, in deep Naini lake in the evening was sheer pleasure, one round cost aournd 160-200/- INR. Once can easily see the town mushroomed around the lake.

title: leisure time best spend at boating
review: its the best part of nainital...its big enough to easily have 1 hour ride in the boat and quiet place. Good to be with the family

title: Serene & Clean
review: The lake was beautiful, well managed and clean. For once you don't see people littering in the lake.

title: Very good place to enjoyment with family
review: I liked the beautiful landscapes of nainital  hills and the boating in the naina lake is memorable...

title: beautiful..
review: Lot of options to choose your boats.. You will get hounded by people asking you to go boating and that's the only bad part. Nice views of the city up there. Beautiful lake and great time boating.

title: Boating in Naini Lake
review: Visited Nainital on 16 May 2013.

title: Beautiful lake
review: This is a beautiful lake , the heart of nainital . One must stay on the mall road facing the lake & the views are breathtaking.

title: clean , beautiful , Nature in its best Mood
review: now govt. is taking good care of this old ancient , beautiful lake , water treatment plants and oxygen mixtures are installed inside the lake , plastics are banned now and for safety of the tourists while on the boat - safety jackets are provided.

title: Pristine lap of nature... Relaxed setting
review: For people who like Hindi movies - Naini Lake is the same place where the famous song from Kati Patang "Jis Gali mein tera ghar na ho balma" featuring Rajesh Khanna & Asha Parekh was shot.

title: Nice relaxing experience.
review: The weather was nice and place around the lake was pretty clean. The boat ride has nothing exciting.

title: Enjoy boating in chilled weather....
review: Excellent weather conditions in Nainital. We found temperature around 10 to 15, even in April afternoons. Excellent view around. You can enjoy boating in the lake or shopping at mall road, visit Naina Devi Temple at the lake. Cable car ride just ahead of lake. Tibetan Market for woolen clothes, coats, Wax Gift artcles etc. Nice place to enjoy your HOLIDAYS.

title: average hangout place
review: Naini lake is a big and comparitvely clean lake. However there is not much activity to do except boating. The market at mall road and at flats are not much equipped. You can take a fifteen minutes boating or can finish your markiting activities in one or two hour. Apart from the temple and hotels and restaurants round the lake there is nothing much to do there.

title: Awesome!!!!
review: Peddling boat in Naini Lake is cheap and best option to admire the beauty of Naini Lake. You can carry soft drinks to enjoy it with nature. You can have nice view of Nainital from peddling boat. Stay at the corner of lake you love too!!

title: Rs.160 for a boat trip was just great (april-2013)
review: Rs 160 fix price for a 20-30 mins boat trip, easy ticketing (the boatman would help you at the counter, dont worry, just offer change). All boatmen are good photgraphers so they'll click u good while u go cozy with your partner :). Lifejackets are supplied onboat, they have even for children. Do wear them. Also check if the boat has an extra pair of 'chappus'... in our case he broke one while steering, and another boatman had to lend him one mid-lake!!

title: pretty
review: do carry some light woollens and umbrella... ideal activity would be boating and a walk by the lake. small shops around the place add to the charm of the hill station

title: Nice beautiful lake !!!
review: Nice beautiful lake. We went boating and it was cold in the water due to weather conditions so do remember to wear or take warm clothes with you.

title: Awesome lake-complete mind of peace
review: Liking->

title: Mythological story about Naini lake..
review: Nani Lake a natural fresh water body which is 42m wide 1432m length and 273m deep. Is one of the magnificent lake in India. Lake has become synonymous with beautiful Resorts around.The story of this lake has some Mythological touch. Its is believed the lake was formed when the goddess" Sati" lost her eyes at this spot when she was being carried by Lord Shiva so than the lake was formed. It was Britishers who discover Nainital as a holiday resort in 1841. I have been several time at this place and believe me the place is relay outstanding.....

title: Naini Lake is best place in Nainital
review: Naini Lake is best place in Nainital.

title: Main Tourist Attraction
review: Its one of the Main Tourist attraction which u automatically see while entering in Nainital surrounded with hills with mall road and hotels on one side and Hanuman Temple and Boarding schools on the other side.

title: Quite scenic
review: Tranquil but touristy. Boat ride costs £160 round trip and fixed Govt rate. It includes visit to Hanuman temple.

title: Nostalgic!
review: Naini lake remains one of the flagship lakes across India and indeed brings in lot of nostalgia..Obviously, boating here is COMPULSORY, but the boats have become shoddy/unsafe..

title: naini lake
review: its so cool and peacefuk and all the activities and shooping is near to lake and also in evening is so lively u  really enjoy it

title: A GREAT LAKE OF KUMAON.
review: The character of water, vibrance, spread n clarity is a great attrction of Nainital. U will go miles to njoy its feel n beauty at various times of day n from various heights.

title: beautiful place for lesiure
review: walk,sit ,roaming, eat at mall road,you shoud see lake in morning ,evening, and night.relaxiing place

title: Amazing
review: This is the main attraction of Nainital, The boating is cheap and really enjoyable ride of around 45-60 minutes. Try doing it during sunset when sun has almost set and it about to get dark. The view you will get of lighted nanital is superb.

title: Pristine
review: Clean and surrounding area is well maintained. Boats are available for good bargain. People are helpful.

title: Perfect Getaway..
review: Small Place but yet so many things to do when you are in Nainital, Located around 280 Kms from National Capital , It is a perfect getaway .We Reached there on a cold windly Thursday of  December 2012, The Moment you reach Tallital you tend to forget the fatigue of Journey , Just by the first look of the Lake .

title: Fantastic Boat Ride
review: We had a fantastic boat ride and more than half hour spent on the boat was divine and serine. Just Awesome.

title: family fun & key attraction of Nainital
review: Naini lake is the heart of Nainital, most of the action happens around. Boat ride is very reasonable cost, evening walk around naini lake is fun and gives some breath taking views of nature. Surroundings are fairly clean.

title: Prime Attraction of Nainital
review: Naini Lake is the prime attraction of Nainital. The lake is surrounded by hills and its scenic beauty makes the attraction. The boat ride in the lake is a real fun and it brings you closer to the Indian Swans swimming around.

title: Nice lakh
review: Hello! I wanted to personally thank your entire staff for the enjoyable experience we had during our stay in Abbotsford from the 16th - 19th of Dec. Right from my interaction with Mr. Dinesh while making my booking to Mrs .XYZ.... who did a fantastic job while we were on property. She took utmost care of each and every detail which definitely made our experience of staying in the Room a memorable one.We travelled with 2 kids 7 months and 21 months and because of the amenities and the level of service provided it was a breeze! The chef did a super  I must commend you on your staff selection. I would highly recommend this place to my friends in Delhi. Thanks once again.

title: Freshwater Lake
review: Paddle boats,row boats are allowed but fishing is not allowed. There are designated timing for boating. One can  enjoy its beautiful view from Kill bury road, snow view points and any mountain which is surrounding it

title: Boating and fooding
review: Nice place in evening swelling with tourists.Do boating at evening will enjoy the sun shade on mountains

title: Nice but over crowded
review: Nainital is a nice hill station. A lot of natural beauty is there. surrounded by thick pine trees. Boating in Naini lake feels good.Everything is fine but the place is over crowed in May and June.Actually local administration has no control on the vehicle entry in to the Mall Road area as in Shimla. on weekend  days  you can not find place to walk on road and room to stay in night. Bhimtall near Nainitall is a good place,stay here if you find room in hotel.

title: Beautiful!
review: Traveled in dec'2009. The Boat ride is excellent.. The one we went around was named Damini and the sailor was very good and decent. He also offered to take our snaps..

title: Memories of Rajesh Khanna
review: Its a lake in the mid of this hill station rather we may say that the city has been developed around this lake.Its 2 mile long and surrounded by 7 hills. Lake has two ends Mallital (northan end) Tallital (sounthern end). It has a bridge on it with post office on it. In Manas Khand of Skand Puran Nainital is called Tri-Rishi-Sarovar they myth is that Rishi Atri, Pulatsya & Pulaha upon finding no water in Nainital dug a large hole and filled it with water of Mansarovar. Another belief is that its one of the Shaktipeeth. Here the eyes of Sati fell when Lord Shiva was carrying her body and from Eyes the place got name. The temple of Naina devi is also there at the bank of the lake.

title: Beautiful clean lake
review: This is a very beautiful and surprisingly clean lake around which the town of Nainital is setlled. Boating here is very peaceful and serene. I will recommend you take a canoe instead of the paddle boat and let some one else row while you sit back and enjoy and give your legs and arms some rest.

title: Best of India's lakes
review: Nainital best place for honeymoon can see almost all the climate at same time if you are lucky enough. Soothing atmosphere, the crowd at mall road and the lake by the side makes it utterly romantic place to visit. Boating in the lake is itself a different experience. In almost all the hill stations in India nainital suits for couples the best as you can feel both hot n cold temperature bearable. Most of the place of sightseeing are nearby so you dont feel so tired after a day walk can come back to mall road anytime.

title: Landmark of nainital
review: Cleanliness is what is best of this lake.. Fixed rates for boat riding, courteous boat riders and just a lovely experience is what you can ask for at this lovely place:)

title: tranquil waters
review: I liked the location,and the boating on the lake is very beautiful and everyone should give it a try.But the baots should be a bit more spacious because there is no space for movement once you get to step on it.

title: Sole attraction of Nainital ... not to be missed
review: If I say that this lake is the sole attraction when you are in nainital, I won't be wrong. There are few other things apart from the Lake but everything is pretty much around it. Naini lake is really beautiful surrounded by mountains on both sides. On one side you would see the hustle bustle of mall road and on the other side its the quiet mountain and scenic beauty, while you are boating. Boating would be one thing I recommend. You will have options in terms of paddle boat or the other shikara like boat, depending on your energy level and who you are with (friends or spouse), you can choose. There is no question of bargaining because you have to buy ticket from the ticket counter and you don't have to pay anything directly to the boatman. Depending on the time of the year you are visiting Nainital, this lake can be too beautiful or not so enchanting because the area is not so big to accommodate large crowd. So if you are going in the peak season you may not find it that attractive as all you will get to see is people all around you, boating in the lake, walking on mall road. However if you go in the so called off season you will be able to see its beauty at its best.

title: boating in sunny day with windy weather boating in sunny day with windy weather
review: very beautiful lake, boating in sunny day with windy weather, boating in sunny day with windy weather

title: Biggest Attraction of Nainital...
review: It is lake the city is named after, city's drinking water is supplied from this lake...boat ride is good..boats are small..therefore can only seat 4 ppl..you have to sit still cannot make any moves on the boat...but still very attractive scenery...

title: Cold but very enjoyable
review: Lake is very good if really like water, take one guided tour than in the afternoon paddle one yourself

title: Wonderful memories of boating in the Naini lake
review: Wonderful memories of boating, nice environment and relax while boating a shikara in the Naini Lake.

title: Lake with a experience
review: We had visited three lakes during our trip namely Bhimtal lake, nakuchiatal lake and naini lake

title: Boating
review: Boating as such is not great, because of the increasing population on the Mall Road has added to noise and onlookers to a great deal. However, the boats seemed packed all the time. A Boat ride during sun shine is ideal, gives a serene feeling. Rates are average, however, don't expect world class boats. If you happen to take more than one boat rides then be prepared for a  variety of versions of the lake's history.

title: Mangoel shaped from viewpoint
review: This lake is the main attraction of Nainital and nestled between the mountains.  Boating is the main attraction and visitors to this hill station should not miss out on the boat trip.  Shops surround the lake shores.  Sadly found a lot of littering which gives a poor impression of the upkeep by the authorities.

title: Nostalgic Experience
review: Boating here was a unique experience it was the mystic view which lead us into a nostalgia, When we started it was about to sun set and then entire Nainital city was glittering in lights. we really enjoyed it and not to forget the Temple near the Lake do visit at the time of aarti !!

title: Nostalgic
review: Nainital has derived its name from this lake. The lake is central to the life and activities of this peaceful hill station. Boating in the lake offers panoramic view of the valley and mall road. Go for yatching which gives nostalgic feeling.

title: Fantabulous.
review: The naini lake is a mango shaped lake,and what to say aout this lake really,the lake itself is a masterpiece creation of mother nature which makes the city looks like one from any europian hill station in switzerland....and of course there is the boating facility,which makes your experience more unique.

title: wonder's of wonder
review: Nainital is a lake city but naini lake is the best of them. Near the lake their is a very beautiful temple known as naina devi temple and one gurudwara which is attached with the lake.One the whole it's very wounder place to visit.

title: Clean & Lovey Lake
review: Centrally situated, it is lovely how the goverment has kept this lake & the area around it clean.. Eventhough you would find hoards of men after you to choose their boat for a ride, the good part is that they would not fleece you as one has to pay the pre determined money to the ticket counter. a boat ride is highly recommended.

title: beautiful lake surrounded by beautiful hills
review: The Naini Lake is an amazing and beautiful lake with the best views of the Kumaon Hills. To wander around this beautiful lake there is one only one thing you should do that is hire a paddling boat and go anywhere in the lake to take pictures of the spectacular Mall Road, or to take pictures of the several ducks and swans that swim in the lake. The lake is huge and surrounded by many green charming hills. Its a definite visit.

title: excellent
review: we like the mall road, zoo was very good & well maintained. We disliked the zoo location it was on height which the middle age or the old people cannot travel.

title: next best to kashmir
review: only houseboats were not there but is so beautiful next best to kashmir its the beauty of nainital and key attraction and it justifies its name

title: refreshed
review: it was a change riding a boat other than travelling in a car or train. the people are very good and helpful

title: Clean, clear and nice walking path
review: on one 1/2 of the lake (granted the shady cool side) there is a pedestrian only path.  It was nice with informative  signs at the local aeration pump houses and nice vegetation on the adjacent STEEP hill.

title: love lake..
review: loved the naini lake as every 1 would say...and yup ofcourse the shopping....and the eating I even visited the temple next to naini lake ...the boting was awsome ...but its just at on place only after all this at 1 on e place nothing much is left

title: Clean and cared for
review: The water is very clean and they pump oxygen in to keep it that way.  Fish are thriving.  Food and drink are not allowed on the boats and the surrounding hills are very pretty - especially at night when all the lights of the houses are twinkling.

title: Nain Lake good natural lake
review: Naini lake is very good for boating. We took a boat round and visited the temple.

title: Extremely Beautiful & romantic
review: The view is excellent and the overall feeling is very nice and romantic. While Boating there u will feel realxed and got freshness in ur mind and body.

title: The MANGO lake :-)
review: To be honest, the Naini lake looks more like a banana than a mango but, that's what the locals call it.

title: It still amazes!
review: Naini lake is a nice place to spend your mornings and evening. Walking on the lake side still has its own charm. Make sure the eat momos in the stalls opposite Nainadevi temple, would recommend China town restaurant. Boating is must if you are in Nainital.

title: Kapil's Inn at Nainital
review: Very good stay offered at Kapil's Inn, 218, Naya Bazar, Tallital, Nainital (Near Bus Station).  Phone and Fax No. 05942-236516.  You can directly contact the owner Mr. Anil Kapil on 09412084516.  The rooms are very well maintained and cleaned regularly.  LCD and Intercom facility is available.  The charges are moderate.  The staffs are very cordial.  Especially Mr. Shivlal Singh who is willing to help at all times and with any of your questions / queries / requests.  I stayed in the hotel room No. 201 & 203 from 21.11.2012 to 23.11.2012.  Really comfortable stay with my family.

title: One of the best place to Feel d nature in India...
review: Nainital is like to me the seat of nature,where u can be at perfect peace of mind..u can find ur romantic nature revealed to the beautiful hills.....it so romantic!!! The naini lake adds to the beauty.. The inhabitants are so noble at heart...

title: scenic!!
review: it is a real beauty..the lake and the thandi road.. the boat ride..all the temples near by..small tea stalls and offcourse the fish feeding in the lake..truly enjoyed evry bit of it!!

title: Beautiful, blissful, clean
review: Enjoyed boating and the NainaDevi temple. You can paddle on your own or get a ride from the boatman. Enjoy the nature and views around

title: good
review: i like nainital but hotel anamika was bad and worst and never visite in near future please friends for the sake of god dont enter this hotel anamika

title: Naini Lake Nainital One Of One World Most Beautiful Places
review: I have traveled to see so many lakes and rivers of India but I found Naini Lake is the most beautiful  lake of India. As its natural beauty covered with green mountains one the one side a beautiful small hill town, boats around you birds, clean water clouds around boats, smiling faces of tourists on other boats, Sound of bells of Tamples around Naini Lake and weather of endless love you wont find a better tourist places in northern India. Book Your Hotel Early as in season you wont find a single room in whole Nainital to spend a night.

title: A nice lake for active ppl
review: also we did rope way which was again a good exp. they charge 100 rs per person i think for the rope way. also the tibetian market is good, but if u are going in winters its extremely chilling in the evenings so be prepared or go in the afternoons.

title: Joy in emerald coloured water
review: Excellent experience and joy on the shikaras at the lake. My daughter enjoyed a lot and according to her it's the best lake she has seen in her 12 years life. The lake is really very beautiful,clear, and well maintained. The sides of the lake is also very beautiful like marine drive style. We will come back to Nainital because of this lake.

title: Beauty at its Best!!!
review: Every time I visit Nainital the beauty of the lake just make me feel amazing, it is so calm and peaceful and while boating you feel the positive vibes and the fresh air around you. The water is so cold and the hills around you make you feel more refreshing.

title: A Wonderful Place to be - Naini Lake
review: One of the nicest place to be in, with a serene environment. Boating in the Naini lake is a must if you are visiting Nainital. The rates are  INR160 per ride on the boat for a full circle. For the half circle rate is INR110. These rates are for the boat without pedal. The rates are fixed by the government. You are allowed 4 adults and 1 child in a ride.

title: Naini Lake..beauty of its own
review: this one is the prettiest lake in nainital..evry corner of this lake has its natural beauty whick makes it the best lake out there..the moment you will reach this place you would feel its beauty..its a real nature..fab place to see

title: nice
review: Boating and walk around lake. shopping area, hotels and other all fun is around the lake only. have a food and fruits from local sellers

title: nainital
review: boating is such a fun at nainital lake you can see fishes in the water so clearly enjoy basking in the sun ...while paddling

title: a boating place
review: the naini lake is the one of the best lake in north india in nainital,the nainital is the just 6hrs distance from delhi,it just 325km from delhi .

title: Biginning of Nainital known called Nanitaal
review: Visitors should not get confused. The famous Naini lake is devided into Nani taal and Talli taa. Both togather form the Nainitaal ( Naini-lake)

title: enjoyable experience
review: Nani lake is ideal for boating,there are many points from where you can get rowing boat with a person to row or paddle boats for 2 or 4 people. The cost of rowing boat is Rs 160 for full round of the lake and Rs 110/- for half round as the boatmen are controlled by an organization so no overcharging.Once you are in the boat you not only enjoy the lake but also there are ducks in the lake and on the sides you get to see flowers fauna and birds a full round takes around 45 mins. Boating should preferably done in early afternoon as closer to the evening there are chances of rain or cold wind blowing

title: Naini Lake
review: Naini Lake is one of the best lake I have ever seen. A boat ride in this lake rejuvenate your mind and body.

title: Lake is great
review: Lake is no doubt great but its the thousand of people their which makes this place no go for me. Prefer to go in off-season and then only you can seriously enjoy the lake.

title: clean lake
review: the lake is cleaner now. Rs.160 for 30 minutes of rowing boat and Rs.150 for 60 minutes of paddle boat.

title: Naini Lake the heart of nainital!!!
review: Its a very big lake, boating was a lifetime experience, The boatwaala became our guide and told us many things about lake and nainital town. Overall it was a very pleasant experience. Must Go Place!!

title: fun with all
review: scenic beauty cool breeze, oak trees, spicy corns and lot more to see, To Shop with your friends and family, walk around, do boating  yatching , enjoy rope way, lot many gardens to see , watch out for snow clad Nany peaks Amazing place.

title: nice hill station
review: sounds great. with a lot of place to explore in and around of you have time to spend. Good lake to spend time.

title: excellent
review: water is clear, view is awesome , strolling around lake is not that interesting as it used to before ,roadside street food eating options are fewer

title: abut naini lake
review: well u get perfect view of hills nice photo scenes n u enjoy boat ride in naini lake wid awesome view of MAA NAINA DEVI TEMPLE

title: Boating
review: Lake is not that clean but surroundings awesome. one can opt for paddle boat or a rowing boat, for me it was paddle boat.

title: boating
review: loved the dragon shape boats lovely pictures we clicked boating with the clouds. Authorities should try and keep it more clean

title: Amazing Lake with amazing view. Panoramic view while you do your boating. You can see Naina devi mandir while boating
review: Amazing Lake with amazing view. Panoramic view while you do your boating. You can see Naina devi mandir while boating

title: Clean and Peaceful
review: We went thinking that we shall spend an hour around Naini Lake and shall bound back to Delhi. Well, we were wrong. This place shall strike you - ONLY IF YOU GO DURING THE OFF-SEASON!

title: Simply breathtaking
review: Very clean and well maintained, enveloped at one side by mall road and one end by naina devi temple, its simple tranquil

title: Good lake...
review: To enjoy its best view opt for cable car ride. . In Nainital cable car ride is from down to up and then up to down. While you reach up one can enjoy beautiful view of lake

title: Awesome!
review: Nainital is amazing... with all the lakes - Sattal, Bhimtal, Naukuchiatal... All of them amazing!

title: good experience
review: we loved boating.  they have maintained it pretty well.  Even saw two siberian birds there. view from the lake is good.

title: I love this place
review: What a beautiful place! You can have boat ride all day and not get bored. Lovely local people who are eager to share theit experiences with you. Boatmen are very cooperative.

title: Calm lake, silent Himalayan hills, birds watching in Pangot & more
review: Calm lake, silent Himalayan hills, birds watching in Pangot & more. Unforgettable time in Nainital, we like to thanks for our driver Mr. Bhandari, who suggest to plan our travel (Kathgodam Car Rental dot Com)

title: Nice...
review: The lake has really improved from last few years. It felt good taking a ride in the huge lake at a nominal fixed price. The clouds had descended over the lake and it was pretty magical.

title: Boating fun
review: Boating was fun in Naini lake. I haven't seen a hill station like nainital. The view from the boat is amazing.

title: Awesome
review: Great Experience! Love to visit there again and again. I have spend 3 nights in nainital. Really and awesome experience. I will suggest everyone to go there once in his/her lifetime.Naini Lake is heart of Nainital , this beautiful lake looks like a eye and name just resemble with the Goddesses Naina Devi .

title: Pristine Views - specially nice in Monsoons
review: Imagine yourself surrounded by clouds all around n you in the middle of the lake...

title: well gods own land:)
review: just loved the natural beauty of uttarakhand as a wholebut nainitaal was one of the best places in uttarakhand..

title: awesome:)
review: naiantal on the whole is so pleasant n beautiful....crowded yet so charming n peacefull..have a stroll on the very famous mall road n shop in local market...have  a delicious food n had a niice tym with the local people who are just sooo nice n cheerfu:)

title: Great Lake
review: Beautiful surroundings,good crowd yet peaceful...It has lots of boats for visitors,It provides an excellent opportunity to those with family to book in a hotel on the Mall and Lake looks like heaven in the nights specially.

title: Gift of Nature - being put under immense pressure
review: The original Kumaoni inhabitants kept the location of this holy lake a secret from the british, till they were forced to hand the area over to them. This was a tragedy as the immense tourism pressure is choking this beautiful town and lake. There are simply too many tourists, and most of them are bent of eating something out of a plastic wrapper, all the time!

title: beautifull
review: beautifull city of lakes, you can fall in love. we are not a very good travellers but the lakes called bheem tal , sat taal, naukuchiatal must see. water fall and him darshan can also be seen and for the childrens cave garden, zoo and rope way.

title: beautiful lake
review: This lake is the life of nainital. It adds beauty as well as ambiance to the place. the boating is heavenly. Also, the cleanliness done is perfect.
